2 --> Volunteer: Web Developer
VotingSmarter
Newport Beach, CA
VotingSmarter is a civic tech nonprofit. We are founded on the idea that in order to fight voter apathy, political corruption, misinformation and paralyzing partisanship we must address the incentives that cause them. That starts with "cheaper" and fairer information. Everything we do is centered on being fair, fast, and fun. Be began by fighting voter apathy in 2020. We built a "dating app for elections" that matched thousands of voters to the political candidates that matched their political preferences rather than political party or immutable characteristics like race, age, or gender identity.

Since the 2020 election, we’ve been designing a tool to fight the political corruption created by large corporate donations and lobbying. We are super excited to announce that after months of development and thousands of hours of research, our new Chrome extension that matches shoppers to the companies that donate to candidates that share their political values has been approved and is live in the Google Chrome Store!!!

Who We Are

Our team is made up of passionate people from all over the world, from all walks of life, and from all over the political spectrum. At VotingSmarter, we recognize that our political process is broken and that being an informed citizen is hard work; it takes too much time and emotional effort.

VotingSmarter’s 2020 "dating app for elections" turned 4000 hours of boring political research into 4 minutes of "fun".

VotingSmarter’s new Chrome extension turns countless hours of research into a tool for conscious consumerism. The businesses you shop at everyday use YOUR dollars to support THEIR values and political agendas. With the VotingSmarter browser extension, you can be sure your dollars are spent supporting YOUR values.

Join our team to help us combine these two great products into a new platform in both web2 AND web3 and give people their political power back.

We have an upcoming NFT drop and are starting to design a metaverse for politics. Leave your mark on the future of politics.

Web3 Future

When looking ahead, the discussion of Web3 is inevitable. Our team has some exciting ideas for ways in which we can achieve success in the Web3 space. We are looking for motivated and creative individuals to bring those ideas to fruition and apply their skills and knowledge to add value to the space.

Responsibilities

Work on multiple client projects for multiple teams
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
Take ownership of projects and optimization
Communicate clearly and openly with all team members
Utilize creative problem solving to provide solutions and explanations for challenges
Develop and build out responsive emails and email templates
Manage project tasks, timelines, and communication
Perform routine site maintenance as needed

Skills

Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as SASS Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
This is a volunteer opportunity provided by VolunteerMatch, in partnership with LinkedIn for Good. ">

Desired Skills and Experience
This position requires the following skills: Computer Science, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Software Engineering, Web Design, Web Design / UX, Website Project Management

You ideally have shader knowledge
You are a super open and a friendly person
You solve problems until they are done.

WARUM WIR?

Die rooom AG ist ein global agierendes Startup mit über 120 Mitarbeiter:innen in Jena, Leipzig, München und den USA. Unsere ExperienceCloud ist eine All-in-One-Plattform für das Erstellen, Verwalten und Veröffentlichen von beeindruckenden Erlebnissen in 2D, 3D, Augmented und Virtual Reality. Wir wurden mit über 20 Awards ausgezeichnet und arbeiten für internationale Unternehmen wie Porsche, Telekom, DHL, e.on und Vodafone. Werde Teil einer unglaublichen Erfolgsgeschichte und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft des Metaverse.

DAS ERWARTET DICH

Beteiligung an unserem Erfolg mit Mitarbeiteraktien möglich

Bei uns herrscht eine lockere Arbeitsatmosphäre mit flachen Hierarchien, in der du als Individuum ernst genommen wirst. Du hast eine Idee? Raus damit! Du hältst dich lieber zurück und machst einfach deinen Job? Mach das! Bei uns fühlt sich jeder wohl. Werde Teil unseres Teams und hilf uns dabei, die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen! Aus einer Idee, Kreativität, Mut und Fleiß ist mittlerweile, dank eines genialen Teams, etwas Großes geworden. Wir haben zahlreiche Auszeichnungen erhalten und begeistern mit unserer Art zu Denken und unserer Technologie auch einige der bekanntesten Unternehmen Deutschlands.

Wir sind easy Access und Open Access und gleichzeitig Enterprise. Unser Working Space ist wie ein Zuhause, nur noch wohnlicher. Er ist wie ein Büro, nur noch produktiver. Er ist wie ein Atelier, nur noch kreativer. Du wirst es lieben.

Wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf deine Bewerbung!

How To Set Up Your Job Description In Greenhouse
Step 1: Review the Datapeople workflow documentation: "Datapeople | User Guide for Recruiters"
Step 2: Download the Datapeople Chrome extension (this enables you to use the Datapeople tool without needing to leave Greenhouse)
Step 3: To start writing your JD, click the purple Datapeople icon (next to the "Job Name" field)
Step 4: Click "Write New Draft" or "Apply Template"
Step 5: Enter the Job Title and Location. Use the "General (Default") template.
Step 7: Add 3-5 sentences about the team and role
Step 8: Add 5-6 bullets under the "You Will" heading to describe the responsibilities and tasks the person in this role will execute
Step 9: Add 5-6 bullets under the "You Have" headings to describe the basic, required qualifications and experience needed for this role

Through solving complex onboarding challenges and removing barriers to entry for game developers and players alike, BoomLand’s goal is to make blockchain gaming accessible for everyone.
BoomLand is backed by BoomBit, a leading gaming studio with more than 1.1 billion downloads to date. Press Coverage: Yahoo Finance
THE GOAL

As the Lead Full-Stack Engineer, you will join our platform team and work on backend systems for the blockchain publishing platform. You will build APIs & features that interact with our blockchain frameworks and our games’ endpoints, as well as web facing products interacting with users directly. Tech-stack includes Solidity, C-Sharp, Node.js, Typescript, MongoDB, React, PostgreSQL, and C++.

RESPONSIBILITIES

Lead the development team in technical and architecture discussions
Own the technical design and implementation of robust, scalable and extensible online services.
Collaborate with the blockchain team to implement back-end services for our current and upcoming games, websites and SDKs.
Maintain complex systems combining multiple services and providers.
Build web services to interact with the blockchain as well as game servers.


REQUIREMENTS

Proficiency in Node.js or equivalent runtime environment
Strong programming background and knowledge of back-end infrastructures and best practices
Prior experience working on shipped full-stack applications. Experience with AWS and Docker.
Experience with SQL database, database design, as well as NoSQL database paradigms.
Experience with MongoDB and PostgreSQL.
Familiarity with C++.
Problem-solving abilities.

NICE TO HAVE

Experience with Game Development.
Blockchain experience
Front-end development experience.
Experience with react.
Experience creating and maintaining REST APIs in node/typescript.


WHAT WE OFFER

9 --> Frontend Developer with React
Freeverse.io
Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain (Hybrid)
We are Freeverse: a fast-growing, well-funded startup, recognized last year as one of the most innovative companies in Spain. We’re revolutionizing the digital asset ownership market – valued last year at $22Bn and growing exponentially - by bringing next-generation blockchain technology to the metaverse. We are the home of ‘Living Asset’ NFTs – digital assets that can evolve and change based on how they are used, so that their value is determined by their utility, as opposed to speculation on their rarity. Read more about our company at http://freeverse.io; and more about our vision at https://medium.com/freeverse-io

Our unique approach to digital asset creation and usage, powered by our patent-pending technology, has permitted us to sign marquee customers in our core target verticals. With our most recent Series A funding round, co-led by Earlybird and Target Global, we now need to scale – and that’s where you come in!

We are seeking a Frontend Developer experienced with React to join our team, in order to help scale the deployment of our products and support our B2B customers. At Freeverse, you'll be working with seasoned developers like yourself who understand front-end methodologies inside and out and how to build robust, secure, and efficient applications. If you’re a motivated, self-starter who can power through ambiguity and work independently to achieve results, you'll thrive in the fast-paced, dynamic start-up environment inherent to a high-growth technology company like Freeverse.

What You’ll Do

Create and maintain applications for our Living Asset NFT API, whether as first-party products or in collaboration with our partners.
Implement advanced UI for client dashboards, tracking, and analytics.
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to efficiently implement designs and workflows.
Collaborate with both internal and external backend engineers to shape and define API contracts.
Use the latest technology, based around the React ecosystem; yet propose new technologies and approaches where appropriate.
Work with automated build and continuous integration systems.
Ensure the smooth operation of and participation in emergency response situations for outages in our front-end applications.
Design and implement testable code that is highly maintainable.
Have ownership of your work, from design to deployment and operation; making an impact on helping to decide what we build and how we build it.

Job Requirements

At least 3 years of hands-on experience in front-end development using Javascript, preferably with direct experience using React.
Ability to quickly and efficiently convert UI/UX design into production-ready applications.
Experience interacting with a complex backend API (either via REST or GraphQL).
Experience with Test Driven Development, or understanding of its importance.
Maximal autonomy, with a critical thinking mindset, capable of constructively arguing about your view on how something should be done.
Fluency in English.
An “appreciate first” attitude to teamwork – always providing honest feedback, while assuming that everyone is doing their best.
Strong interest in the sector of blockchain, NFTs, crypto, web3, and gaming.

Not mandatory, but valued as a plus:

Experience with NodeJS and/or GraphQL.
Knowledge of blockchain development.
Fluency in Spanish.

What We Offer

Competitive compensation package.
Latest generation equipment.
Flexible work environment: REMOTE if you are far from Cataluña OR combine home office and vibrant office life (hybrid modality with a flexible schedule).
Stylish office with a terrace and panoramic views in the Barcelona beach area (22@, metro Marina / Bogatell).
Free lunches with the team twice per week.
Unlimited coffee and tea in the office.
Work in an open-minded, dynamic, and international team of highly qualified professionals.
A company culture that is respectful and empathetic, while being innovative and challenging.
Flat company organization where everyone gets their say.
Possibility to progress and evolve within the company.
Continuous training opportunities.
Team events, after-work celebrations, and company offsites in great locations (for example, this year we all went to Ibiza for 3 days).

We place fun gameplay, awesome user experience and mass adoption at the forefront of our creative vision.

Backend Engineer Responsibilities
Consistently define and achieve goals during each development cycle
Take ownership over parts of the product and constantly suggest and iterate the product
Design, develop and improve server-side applications and databases.
Ensure backend solutions are built with security, performance, and scalability in mind.
Assist with DevOps if required.

You May Be a Good Fit If You
Have good communication and interpersonal skills.
Being able to work with the team to scale up features and solutions. Experience leading a team is a bonus.
Are able to understand robust system design and architecture
Have an urge to write clean code and build reusable modules/plugins.
Have an urge to collaborate and communicate asynchronously.
Have an urge to document everything so you don't need to learn the same thing twice.
Have an enthusiastic, just do it attitude. When you see something broken, you can't help but fix it.
Consistently ship small features and improvements with minimal guidance and support from other team members. Collaborate with the team on larger projects.
Know your way around Linux and Unix Shell.
Have strong experience with Nginx, Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, or similar technologies
Have strong programming skills in TypeScript, Rust, or Golang.
Have strong knowledge in no-SQL and SQL databases like Redis, Postgres, and FoundationDB.
Have a strong interest in anime and mobile games.

Projects You Will Work On

Maintain, upgrade and iterate existing features

Our team comprises of mobage, MMORPG and anime enthusiasts and it is our passion to build a high-quality, believable fantasy world enjoyed by as many people as possible. From day one, we have been a community-driven project that has grown to be a part of more than 1.4 million Discord communities. We are a close knit group of artists, developers, business and community staff who enjoy working with each other to deliver the best experiences to our players.

12 --> Sales Development Representative - SaaS
GEEIQ
Tottenham, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
About us!

GEEIQ, pronounced ‘Geek’, is one of the major players in the metaverse. Brands of every shape and size are using our platform, from Gucci and Mercedes-Benz to Tommy Hilfiger and Fnatic, to help them navigate the metaverse through data - not just media hype and buzz.

We’re on the hunt for talented new GEEIQs to help drive our rapid growth and make our mission a reality: To become the platform for brands looking to engage the metaverse through data. We’re a team of 30, but we won’t be for long. Are you our next GEEIQ? Do you want to work in the most exciting industry in the world? You’ve come to the right place.

About The Role

As our first Sales Development Representative, you will be working closely with our Commercial Strategy Director to lead GEEIQ’s outbound lead generation. You will be using prospecting techniques to create new opportunities for the business, whilst educating brands on the value of GEEIQ and our services. This is not your typical, mass email, mass cold call sales role. We’re looking for smart, innovative people who passionately believe in what we do. This manifests itself in a ‘never give up’ attitude and a fearless approach. You’ll play a vital role in our growth as you’ll be the first point of contact of our future subscribers.

This is a great opportunity for you if you:
🌱 want to grow in a sales role
💥 want to have a measurable impact on a small, growing software business

What You Will Be Doing…
Prospect, qualify, and generate opportunities to support the growth of the GEEIQ platform
Send outbound emails to drive customer meetings for Commercial Strategy Director
Write creative prospecting emails to get your target brands thinking about us
Following-up with prospects that respond to marketing campaigns to engage, evangelise, and qualify opportunities for the sales team.
Consistently meet or exceed phone call and social media outreach activities, pipeline development and qualified opportunity quota goals
Collaborate with Marketing to research accounts, identify key players, and develop scripts and messages

What We Are Looking For…
Experience in sales or a similar role (preferably in SaaS) and a consistent track record of overachieving in previous roles
You have a good knowledge of prospecting methodologies and processes
You can talk passionately about what GEEIQ does
Ideally, you have experience using LinkedIn, SalesNavigator, and other lead generation tools
A self-starter who thrives on autonomy, enjoys a rapid pace, and wants to make a real difference to the company
An understanding and passion for technology and stay up-to-date on the latest news
Ability to communicate professionally, confidently, and clearly
You are excited to make an impact and enjoy prospecting to identify key accounts, creating messaging, and speaking with key decision-makers while working in a collaborative, enthusiastic team environment

Understand the technical know-how of exploring new ways for devices to interact with the users apart from voice and touch
Work on primary programming languages like Java, Swift, Python, etc.
Understand the concepts and commands like control logic, encapsulation, loops, etc.

14 --> DevOps Engineer
Cheil North America
Plano, TX (On-site)
MDLab / Digital Product

DevOps Engineer

Cheil Dallas is searching for a passionate and enthusiastic DevOps Engineer to build, coordinate, and manage software development pipelines to support projects in metaverse, web, and android software.

And that brings us to you… or rather you to us. Pushing boundaries of traditional marketing requires a curious mind undeterred by the never been done. You are a tinkerer, someone who likes to take things apart to figure out how they work, and then put them back together to work even better. You do not mind working on small-ish teams, and you have been known as “the problem-solver” in the group who figures out how to get things done. If that sounds like you, read on!

About Us

Cheil Worldwide is the 11th-largest creative agency in the world. Headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we were founded by Samsung in 1973 to grow its local and global business. While Samsung is still one of our main clients, our roster has evolved to include other globally recognized brands such as Adidas, PayPal, ESPN, Lego, Coca-Cola, Nivea, Starbucks and many more.

Cheil Dallas serves as the lead agency for all Samsung projects in North America and is located steps from their office at Legacy Central in Plano, Texas. It’s the home base for more than 170 creative problem-solvers who share a passion for developing groundbreaking ideas rooted in data, driven by insights, and enabled by innovative technology.

About You

Who you are is just as important as (if not more important than!) what you can do.

You have experience with software development, most likely in languages like Python, C++, Go (golang), or something along those lines.
You can set up a project in GitHub, manage a README markdown file, and put triggers in place for automatically deploying branches to specific staging/production environments in your sleep.
You are a proactive leader and problem solver.
You’re naturally curious and strive to learn.
You’re a good colleague who cares about the well-being of your team members.
You work well on inter-team collaboration with product managers, software developers, data analysts, and account services.
You probably make comments at happy hour like, “DevOps is more than just a sys admin who talks to devs,” or, “Here are ten reasons why I’ll take z-shell over bash,” or possibly even, “Isn’t it weird that depending on what branch of Amazon you work for, ‘continuous delivery’ can mean two completely different things?”
If you go quiet on Slack, it’s probably because you are setting up automated unit tests with GitHub actions.

About The Role

Like you, this job is multidimensional. And every aspect is crucial to creating culturally relevant work.

Collaborate with team leadership to understand project requirements and plan the best way to exceed them.
Work with developers to create, manage, optimize, and integrate their development and deployment workflows.
Troubleshoot operation issues across multiple projects.
Develop solutions that can support large capacity and scale reliability
Create and monitor the CI/CD pipeline and respond to incidents.
Document everything.
Deploy product releases working with external tech teams or through our own systems.
Help scope new business opportunities, providing technical recommendations and estimates based on provided requirements.
Manage, oversee, and help grow our junior and mid-level tech team members.
Stay on top of the latest trends in our industry and suggest ways to keep Cheil an industry-leader.
Participate monthly as a contributing member in the Metaverse Standards Forum on behalf of Cheil.

About The Requirements

You’ve got to check the boxes before you can think outside of them.

Bachelor’s degree in a related field preferred.
3+ years’ professional experience with development infrastructure.
Skilled in AWS or similar package services.
Experience with GitHub/GitLab/Jenkins/Jira/Confluence, or similar services.
Networking experience.
Ability to: quickly understand, simplify, internalize, and communicate complex digital concepts.
Proficiency to negotiate trade-offs to get alignment with cross-functional teams.
Aptitude to deal with ambiguity and evolving business needs.
Passionate, positive, and solution oriented.
Must be able to work in a hybrid office environment.

15 --> Web3 Developer
Non-Fungible Labs
Auckland, Auckland, New Zealand (Remote)
Non-Fungible Labs is a creative tech company working on the cutting edge of web3 and creative design to help build an engaging, open, and fair metaverse.

Now in our second year of operation, Non-Fungible Labs has already scaled faster than almost any other company in New Zealand history. In December 2021, less than a year after being founded, Non-Fungible Labs “FLUF World” project was named as one of the top 10 NFT projects of 2021 by CoinTelegraph, and in a recent Forbes article was put head to head against Facebook/Meta in the fight for an open and inclusive metaverse.

FLUF World exists on an underlying digital infrastructure, powered by innovative brands in the blockchain, NFT, gaming, media and sustainability spaces. Having just recently announced partnerships with the likes of Snoop Dogg and Wētā Workshop, we are entering a second phase of growth as we continue to cement our position as industry leaders in NFTs and the metaverse.

We are looking for a highly skilled, technically excellent Web3 Developer with some high volume Solidity projects under their belt, to join our core Technical team and be well versed in the security, performance and commercial viability concerns of developing smart contract based applications. You will ideally have experience with Functional Programming, Typescript, React, GraphQL, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, Kinesis and API Gateway or Unity Game Engine would be highly desirable. This can be a fully remote position and we are open to candidates located anywhere in the world.

Ready to move on from the mundane and work on the bleeding edge of technological development? Want to leave an impact and lasting legacy with an organisation that’s laying the foundations for an open and free metaverse? Then read on and see if this sounds like you.

Key responsibilities:
Develop  software to meet agreed technical and design specifications to a high-quality, with little supervision;
Make contributions to product architecture;
Effectively review other developers’ code;
Contribute to business requirements and technical specification documents;
Thoroughly test software and log defects including - Unit Tests, Integration Tests, Performance Testing; and
Provide on-call support to applications in production when necessary

Requirements
Experience designing, delivering and supporting secure, high volume smart contracts
The ability to design smart contracts to minimise gas costs to users
Proven experience with Ethereum and a strong understanding of Solidity, ECDSA and all token protocols (ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155)
Confidence in designing critical, high value contracts for token vesting, liquidity mining and play-to-earn gaming
Experience integrating backend/frontend applications with smart-contracts and execution logs
Experience with MongoDB and Mongoose, with an understanding of how to create your own database models, query data and optimising queries to be as efficient as possible
Experience in ExpressJS with an understanding of how to create a reliable API service and maintain best security practices and performance
React Experience with a robust knowledge of how the React DOM works and how to consistently maintain the highest performance that an end user expects
NodeJS experience and be up to date with the latest ECMA standards, ES7 as a minimum
A full demonstrable understanding of how the event loop works, as well as maintaining the best error handling
Experience in Ethers/Web3 and be able to build up transaction objects from scratch that can be signed, as well as initialising providers, signers and contracts to interact with
Basic Python knowledge with ability to read and understand existing code
Understand the versioning procedure in a company with Github, as well as maintaining clean and understandable code commits
Strong communication skills and highly effective when working with a team
Bonus points for DiscordJS experience with the ability to write out bots that communicate with our various API services.

Benefits
An exceptionally talented, diverse and experienced team.
A fun and rewarding workplace culture.
Competitive salary with potential for bonuses, benefits and token allocations.
Flexibility and remote work options.
Real work-life balance.
Plenty of opportunity to grow.
Great variety and exciting international projects.
A chance to engage with global leaders in gaming, blockchain companies, leading web3 investors and renowned media and entertainment brands.
A rare opportunity to be part of our vision for an open and inclusive metaverse.

Breda, North Brabant, Netherlands (On-site)
Functieomschrijving

Innovatie - ons DNA

Handpicked Lab heeft als doel innovaties tastbaar en zichtbaar maken voor onze klanten. Digitale trends of revoluties zelfs, wij zitten erbovenop. Bij thema’s die we zien als kansrijk, betrekken we klanten, ontwikkelaars en studenten. Samen creëren we nieuwe mogelijkheden. We doen eigenlijk niets liever.

Momenteel zijn we nog bezig om de thema's voor de stageopdrachten in 2023 te bepalen. Voorbeelden van thema's waar wij ons binnen het Lab mee bezig houden zijn Blockchain (Solidity / NFT's) & Metaverse (VR/AR/XR).

Wat is Handpicked Lab?

Handpicked Lab is een team binnen Handpicked agencies waar dedicated de nieuwste trends, technieken en innovaties onderzocht worden. Digitale trends of revoluties zelfs, wij zitten erbovenop. Bij thema’s die we zien als kansrijk, betrekken we klanten, ontwikkelaars en studenten. We doen niets liever!

Samen met studenten en professionals onderzoeken we de mogelijkheden en of we deze nieuwste innovaties en technieken voor onze Handpicked agencies en hun klanten kunnen inzetten en daarmee onze dienstverlening naar de toekomst toe elke keer kunnen vernieuwen en uitbreiden.

Labs & jij

Denk jij een goede opdracht te hebben rondom de thema's Blockchain & Metaverse? Wil je ons verder helpen de mogelijkheden te ontdekken? Ben jij gepassioneerd voor nieuwe technologische ontwikkelingen? En ben je op zoek naar een stage vanaf eind januari / begin februari 2023? Solliciteer dan nu!

Vereisten

Wat bieden wij?

De mogelijkheid om met de nieuwste technieken te werken en te experimenteren;
Als het gaat om afstuderen, zullen we altijd kijken naar een vervolg binnen Handpicked Agencies na jouw studie;
Volop ruimte voor creativiteit en eigen initiatief;
Gezamenlijke lunch;
Supergezellige vrijdagmiddagborrel (met tapbier!);
We geloven in samen doen, en dat voel je direct door de laagdrempelige manier van communiceren via de persoonlijke benadering en middelen zoals Slack en Google. Het zorgt voor een cultuur waar je altijd je vragen durft te stellen. Jouw ontwikkeling is voor ons ook een grote prioriteit.

Bij inhoudelijke vragen, neem zeker contact op met onze collega en Technical Director of Innovations. Hij is bereikbaar via syilmaz@handpickedagencies.com of 076 204 3063.

Heb je vragen over het werken bij Handpicked Labs & Handpicked Agencies, dan is onze collega en Recruiter Lotte van de Plasse bereikbaar op opleidingen@handpickedagencies.com of 06-43279465.

Benieuwd naar de ervaringen van een Lab stagiair? Bekijk dan onderstaande video!

야나두는 '인류의 잠재력을 깨운다' 라는 비전 아래, 성장과 성공에 대한 니즈가 있는 사람들을 지속적으로 동기부여 할 수 있는 시스템과 플랫폼을 구축하며 플랫폼 시장에서의 새로운 패러다임을 만들어 나가고 있습니다.

그 결과, 2022년 기업가치 6천 5백억 밸류를 인정 받은 후 누적 투자액 1,000억을 달성하며 폭발적인 성장을 이뤘고, 유아부터 성인까지 전 연령층을 대상으로 어학 공부부터 취미, 운동까지 일상의 성취와 성공을 도울 수 있는 다양한 서비스를 제공하고자 각 분야의 전문가들이 함께 하고 있습니다.

Sujet :
Mise en œuvre d’un projet NFT pilote#nft #web3 #metaverse #blockchain #java #python #nodejs #cloud #salesforce #nftcommunity #retail #devoteamsplatformObjectifs pédagogiques :· Comprendre le Web 3.0 et le concept du Metaverse· Comprendre l’apport et les enjeux des NFT· Se familiariser avec la démarche d’exécution d’un projet technologique de pointe· Apprendre à créer de nouveaux services à forte valeur ajoutée à partir de données et des technologies disponibles à un instant donné au sein d’une organisation ou à travers ses partenairesTravaux à réaliser :· Réaliser l’état de l’état des NFT· Construire une vision NFT structurée pour le projet· Monter en compétence sur les technologies sélectionnées· Etudier et argumenter quelques cas d’utilisation (clés d’accès à des offres spéciales, des badges pour des clients haute-fidélité…etc).· Développer un premier prototype validant la création et émission de NFT (plateforme cible NFT Cloud de Salesforce)
Qualifications

Informations supplémentaires
Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap. Devoteam est engagé dans une politique Diversité.

Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands
Job Description

Cutting Edge Concepts ? Het verkennen van de Metaverse ? Ben je op zoek naar een brede en innovatieve afstudeeropdracht binnen Software Engineering? Dan is een onderzoek Metaverse een mooie uitdaging!

Afstudeeropdracht

De Metaverse - een virtual- reality space , waarbij users met elkaar kunnen interacteren - groeit! Hoe kunnen we virtuele ruimtes gebruiken om onze systemen weer te geven? Hoe ziet bijvoorbeeld een CRM-systeem eruit in de Metaverse ? Maar nog belangrijker, hoe beveiligen we deze ruimte? Hoe kunnen we de Metaverse gebruiken om onze ontwikkelingsgemeenschap te ondersteunen? Als Avanade hebben we een enorme hoeveelheid assets beschikbaar, hoe zouden we deze kunnen weergeven in de Metaverse met behulp van Unity ? Als je dit baanbrekende gebied wilt verkennen tijdens jouw afstudeerstage, solliciteer dan direct!

Dit zijn wij

Onze visie? ‘To advance the world through the power of people and Microsoft’. Elke dag zetten onze mensen zich in om met de nieuwste Microsoft-technologie onze klanten te helpen transformeren. Door de combinatie van een brede expertise van onze talentvolle mensen en een enorme passie voor Microsoft kunnen we onze klanten wereldwijd vooruit helpen op technologisch vlak en creëren we geweldige ervaringen & oplossingen.

Avanade is een internationaal IT-consultancybedrijf, waarbij mens en IT de krachten bundelen. Je zult jezelf herkennen in de 450 collega’s die rondlopen, maar ook zeker in de 40 andere stagiaires die jaarlijks stagelopen bij Avanade. We hebben veel passie voor en plezier in voor het werk dat we verrichten en hechten waarde aan een gezellige sfeer op de werkvloer. Met ontzettend veel talent voor Microsoft-technologie, is Avanade een unieke club waar veel ruimte is voor ontwikkeling en je onderdeel bent van een grote club professionals. Gezamenlijk met de andere stagiaires vorm je een enthousiaste groep & community binnen Avanade. Je kan meedoen aan veel leuke activiteiten zoals kennissessies tijdens de lunch, koffiemomenten met consultants en werkborrels! Daarnaast bieden we een aantal soft skilltrainingen speciaal voor de groep interns en mogelijkheid tot het behalen van een Microsoft certificaat!

Wij zoeken jou omdat….

Je een 4e jaars HBO-student of een WO-masterstudent bent op zoek naar een leerzame en uitdagende afstudeerstage per 1 februari 2023 op het gebied van IT-consultancy;
Je interesse hebt in en wellicht al enige ervaring hebt met C#, Azure, Microsoft en Unity.
Je communicatief vaardig bent in zowel Nederlands als Engels;
Je gemotiveerd bent om een goed onderzoek op te zetten, je proactief en zelfstandig te werk gaat en je graag nieuwe mensen ontmoet!

Avanade biedt jou…

Een mooi en uitgebreid stageprogramma. Aan het eind van je stage ben je een aantal (soft) skills rijker, heb je een goed beeld van Avanade en heb je waardevolle connecties opgebouwd;
De mogelijkheid om samen te werken in een team van professionals;
Goede ondersteuning van een (technisch) stagebegeleider. Jouw stagebegeleider zal je zowel inhoudelijk als procesmatig ondersteunen;
Een stagevergoeding, laptop en een prachtig (sustainable) kantoor in Amsterdam-Zuid;
Budget voor het aanschaffen van een toetsenbord, muis en headset;
Mogelijkheid tot het behalen van een Microsoft certificaat op onze kosten;
Twee vakantiedagen per maand;
Veel gezelligheid; zo wordt er maandelijks door de Avanade NL Intern Committee een leuke activiteit georganiseerd!

Contact opnemen?

Kijk voor meer informatie op www.werkenbijavanade.nl en voor een sfeerimpressie op onze Facebookpagina www.facebook.com/AvanadeNederland en Instagram @avanadenederland.

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

Experience designing APIs with Test Driven Development, TDD, or understanding the importance of TDD.
Fluent level of English

Not mandatory, but valued as a plus:

1+ years in a DevOps role, preferably in an AWS environment.
Fluency in Spanish.

What We Offer

Latest generation equipment.

32 --> Metaverse Developer
Nokia
Budapest, Budapest, Hungary (Hybrid)
Come create the technology that helps the world act together

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work.

The team you'll be part of

The Metaverse Developer creates state of the art solutions for the components of the industrial metaverse, in cooperation with metaverse research scientists, domain experts in the various aspects of the metaverse.

Industrial metaverse is a focus topic of the AIR Lab which has an established record of ground-breaking research into problems of direct industrial and scientific impact.

Nokia Bell Labs is the world-renowned research arm of Nokia, having invented many of the foundational technologies that underpin information and communications networks and all digital devices and systems. This research has produced nine Nobel Prizes, five Turing Awards and numerous other awards.

We are looking for passionate metaverse developers who will build the critical bridge between Bell Labs AIR Lab research and Nokia’s next generation of high impact AI-powered industrial metaverse.

What You Will Learn And Contribute To

In your work, you will gain a deep understanding of the state-of-the-art localization, 3D reconstruction, spatial computing/spatial intelligence solutions being proposed by working closely with Bell Labs Researchers. You will work in close cooperation with researchers by:
Designing, developing, testing, deploying, maintaining research level solutions for the components of the industrial metaverse, utilizing approaches/methods/algorithms from state of the art research in the area
Managing individual priorities, deadlines, and deliverables
Collaborating with researchers to translate the outcomes of research excellence into working prototypes that bring research ideas closer to products
Contributing to engineering efforts from planning and organization to execution and delivery to solve complex engineering problems

Your Skills And Experience

You would be a great fit for this role if you have:
Minimum of a master’s degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Mathematics, or a related field
Proven 2+ years of Machine Learning development experience in relation to computer vision, 6DoF localization, 3D reconstruction of physical spaces/reality modeling
Experience with software development with one or more general programming languages (e.g., Java, C/C++, C#, Python, JavaScript, or Go)
Willingness to contribute with creative, out-of-the-box solutions, to problems arising in a dynamic environment, under high market pressure

It would be nice if you also had any of the following:
Experience in the full AI pipelin including data cleaning, building models with frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch, packaging them into Docker based microservices and deploying end-to-end pipelines
Proven exposure to the maintenance/management of AI pipelines via K8S/Kubeflow or any other AIOps framework
Strong research credentials and track record of disruptive innovation
Excellent track record of research impact through product or services creation, publications, and patents
Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Flexible working hours - the core time is between 9:30 and 15:30

Laptop and mobile phone (with SIM card)

Accompagner les partenaires (marketplaces, agences, créatifs…) dans l'évolution de nos besoins
Orchestration de campagnes marketing expérientielles (formats immersifs, interactifs…)
Veille des acteurs du marché et benchmark de leurs offres

Profil :
De formation école d'ingénieur, école de commerce, formation universitaire, ou expérience professionnelle équivalente, vous avez au moins 3 ans d'expérience professionnelle dans le digital. Vous avez une vraie appétence pour les enjeux et les technologies du web et du WEB 3.0, avec l'ambition d'acquérir une connaissance approfondie de ces sujets.
Vous avez idéalement eu l'occasion de gérer des projets importants de transformation digitale incluant analyse des enjeux, définition de stratégie, design et mise œuvre d'organisation, et accompagnement des usages.

현재 많은 나라가 있지만 자유롭게 나만의 생각을 펼칠 수 있는 나라는 크게 많지 않습니다.
매일 불안정한 주위 환경으로 인해 생각의 여유조차 갖지 못하고 살아가는 사람들이 많습니다.

저희 라임은 '인류는 평등하다'는 철학을 가지고 누구나 쉽게 이용할 수 있는 제품과 서비스를 만들고자 합니다.

About Multis

Over the last few years, cryptos and blockchain technologies have introduced a new paradigm (just like the Internet did 25 years ago!). Yet, it is still recent and most of the tools that exist on the market today are only suitable for individuals, not businesses.

So we created Multis.

Our mission is to support future generations of entrepreneurs, businesses, and organizations (DAOs, Web3, NFTs, Metaverse) in their growth by creating their financial backbone.

We offer an all-in-one app for web3 companies to manage their cryptos daily with cashflow monitoring and reporting tools and the possibility to make payments using cryptos (salaries, invoices, etc) or make exchanges in both crypto and fiat currencies.

We're a team of happy and passionate crypto-dreamers, convinced that crypto is shaping the world of tomorrow, with backing from world-class US and European investors including Sequoia Capital (Google, Stripe, Youtube, Paypal’s first investor), Y Combinator and eFounders.

Multis engineering is working at the cutting edge of FinTech, Blockchain, and Web3 technologies with incredible challenges ahead, that includes supporting multiple blockchain networks, integrating with financial and banking third-party APIs, and transitioning parts of our stack to NodeJS.

You will be part of a small development team at an early-stage startup in a fast-moving industry with a focus on delivery speed, high work standards, and team spirit!

Our engineering principles?
Customer-obsession: Our #1 priority is to support our users, listen and commit to them to build a strong product they can trust to navigate through the crypto uncharted territories.
Pragmatism: Blockchain is a fast-moving environment. We embrace change and navigate this world in the most realistic and practical way possible.
Ownership: We trust by default, value initiatives, and encourage open communication. Every team member is responsible for leading, delivering, and reporting features end-to-end.

As a software engineer at Multis, you will work with our Product and Design team to define the outcomes and success metrics for the next features prioritized in the roadmap. You will own the build from front-to-back and start-to-finish, designing with security and quality in a timely manner to continuously push to deliver value to our users.

More concretely, you will have the opportunity to work and leave your mark on existing and new functionalities across the application:
Integrate, via our Banking partner, a Business USD account, plugged to crypto exchange to allow organizations to swap between USD and Cryptos
Participate in the constant improvement of our analytics layer, gathering more on-chain and off-chain data across multiple Blockchain and services.
Expand our payment system to Layer2 and alternative Layer1 and integrate selected DeFi protocols into the app
Ensure every component can scale over time

Requirements
Based in Europe (+/- CET 2 hrs)
2+ years of experience as a full-stack engineer in the crypto or fintech space within an early-stage startup
Experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and acquainted with ClojureScript & re-frame, our frontend framework (or strong willingness to learn)
Ability to turn business and product ideas into engineering solutions
Experience shipping fast, high-quality products and features
Ability to improvise, lead and develop creative solutions when common approaches fail.
Strong value of pragmatism over idealism in times of uncertainty.
Proactivity and ability to own and deliver epics in autonomy
Strong appetite and drive to go the extra mile

Nice to haves:
Experience with the framework NestJS
Passionate about all things blockchain, crypto, and DeFi
Previous remote experience

Benefits

40 --> Internship | Open source development of social VR/XR communication systems for the metaverse
TNO
The Hague, South Holland, Netherlands (On-site)
About This Position

Social XR is about communication between people over distance as if you are in the same location. At TNO we are making Social XR as (photo) realistic as possible and seek for people to get involved and stretch the current boundaries of technology.

What will be your role?

At TNO, we create innovative media technologies aimed at providing people with new and rich media experiences, which they can enjoy wherever, whenever and with whomever they want. In the TNO MediaLab, we mainly develop streaming solutions on end-to-end communications, working from the capture side to the rendering side, such as coding, transport, synchronization, orchestration, digital rights management, and service delivery.

We are currently innovating and developing technical solutions to allow photo-realistic communication in eXtended Reality (XR) with the potential of transforming the everyday communication of people, especially in the context of the metaverse. We work on new forms of communication in virtual worlds that are currently not possible. Moreover, we design our systems to allow better communication across any distance in space, which has a direct impact on the life of tomorrow, and thereby create a more sustainable future. We take diversity and equity into our design considerations, such as the inclusion of the elderly and people with disabilities, allowing people to travel less and offer better access to knowledge and expertise. Thanks to our innovation, we break communication barriers.

If you want to know more, check out some recent videos about our work

https //www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZNQK97d6ZB8

https //www.youtube.com/watch?v=PcEmoM3d-dg

https //www.youtube.com/watch?v=jGnyQBb4JXc

And check out our TNO MediaLab website, where many references, demonstrations and publications can be found

https //tnomedialab.github.io/#immersive-media

We are actively looking for students to contribute to evaluating and improving our current technical development of an open source XR application with a focus on streaming and user experience.

This assignment is a combination of research and engineering. This assignment can also be turned into an HBO assignment.

Your work will include at least a few of these points

The software you write will be open source so that the societal impact can be maximized
The demo that showcases your work will be publiclyaccessible
You can work on both the frontend user experience and backend technical implementation
You will work with state-of-the-art telecommunications technologies that current web-based applications like Zoom, Teams and Google Hangouts are based on (e.g. WebRTC)

The focus of your software developments will be

Designing your software according to common methodologies like UML
Producing high quality software in a distributed systems environment
Prioritizing the user experience
Working agile and collaborating with team members

The focus of your research efforts can include at least (but is not limited to)

Benchmarking different state-of-the-art telecommunication systems to identify opportunities and improve our XR system designs
Comparing the performance of existing systems on the market with our Social XR communication system
Publish a scientific paper of this survey to a high-impact conference, such as ACM MM or ITW

The technologies that you may be working with are

WebXR(/WebVR)
WebRTC
WebAssembly
Unity
Media streaming and orchestration
WebGL shaders
(Application-level) Javascript, Python
Open source methodologies and ci/cd pipelines

The expected duration of an internship project is 6-9 months including the possibility of writing your thesis and/or taking part in a scientific paper writing. Furthermore, for this work it is expected to work from our TNO location New Babylon at The Hague Central station at least a few days a week.

What We Expect From You

Top students are invited to apply. We are looking for students with a technical background and relevant programming experience. Experience with media technology or virtual reality is a bonus. We expect a pro-active attitude, enthusiasm, curiosity and an eagerness to learn and explore.

You should be familiar with Javascript/Typescript, Python, or otherwise have a formal programming education or experience with fundamentals of programming.

Typical expected student background

Computer science;
Software engineering;
Telematics;
Electrical engineering;
Media and communication.

What You'll Get In Return

You want to work on the precursor of your career; a work placement gives you an opportunity to take a good look at your prospective future employer. TNO goes a step further. It’s not just looking that interests us; you and your knowledge are essential to our innovation. That’s why we attach a great deal of value to your personal and professional development. You will, of course, be properly supervised during your work placement and be given the scope for you to get the best out of yourself. Naturally, we provide suitable work placement compensation.

TNO as an employer

At TNO, we innovate for a healthier, safer and more sustainable life. And for a strong economy. Since 1932, we have been making knowledge and technology available for the common good. We find each other in wonder and ingenuity. We are driven to push boundaries. There is all the space and support for your talent and ambition. You work with people who will challenge you who inspire you and want to learn from you. Our state-of-the-art facilities are there to realize your vision. What you do at TNO matters impact makes the difference. Because with every innovation you contribute to tomorrow’s world. Read more about TNO as an employer .

At TNO we encourage an inclusive work environment, where you can be yourself. Whatever your story and whatever unique qualities you bring to the table. It is by combining our unique strengths and perspectives that we are able to develop innovations that make a real difference in society. Want to know more? Read what steps we are taking in the area of diversity and inclusion .

The selection process

After the first CV selection, the application process will be conducted by the concerning department. TNO will provide a suitable internship agreement. If you have any questions about this vacancy, you can contact the contact person mentioned below.

Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Platform Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our web platform efforts and work with cutting-edge gaming technology.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Platform team.

The web is the future for VR and AR. Wonderland Engine is the matching developer platform.

Our product is the Wonderland Engine, a developer platform for VR, AR and 3D applications on the web. Applications developed with the Wonderland Engine run through a web browser and don't need to be installed on the respective target device first (e.g. the VR glasses). This makes development much faster. The applications can also be published directly via a web server without having to wait for confirmation from an app store.

Development speed is the decisive factor in realizing the potential of VR and AR. For this reason, we are convinced that web-based applications will play a crucial role in the future of the Internet. Our goal is to become the world's leading developer platform for web-based VR, AR and 3D applications.

Remote

Who We Are
We're building a virtual world from open source and p2p technology that players create and own. Everything in the world is an NFT. There's an inventory system, so you can bring your items and favorite memes to share with your friends. Multiplayer is built with WebRTC and y.js (CRDTs). https://webaverse.com and our open alpha: https://app.webaverse.com

Why You Should Work with Us
We're a young company, but we've accomplished a lot in that short time. What we've done wouldn't have been possible without passionate people, dedicated to our vision of an open and democratic metaverse. If you too would like to get in on the ground floor of the next major Internet revolution, if you too have the passion, the singular obsession to see the 3D web realized in all its glory, then we want to hear from you.
You’ll Be Responsible for...
Designing and implementing standard ERC contracts (721, 1155, 20)
Adding extra-spec features to standard ERC contracts (e.g. metadata)
Quickly implementing and testing new smart contract interactions (game mechanics, on-chain business logic, manager contracts)
You’re a Good Fit if...
You are/have:
At least 2 years working in the startup/blockchain/gaming space as a full-time contributor at respected projects/companies
Expert frontend and backend Javascript/Typescript skills (Node.js)
Expert in Solidity smart contracts
You can share a Github which shows your contributions to smart contracts that are deployed on a mainnet
Expert in EVM debugging
Understanding of performance and gas in Ethereum
Strong understanding of mints, approvals, burns
Experience with ethers, web3.js, useDapp, and similar libraries
Experience in manual and automated contract deployment (Truffle, Remix, etc)
Experience in building multi-network frontend user interfaces
Manage permissions and authorization between addresses and smart contracts
Experience working with blockchain explorer APIs
Experience submitting transactions to the blockchain from the frontend
Experience working with contract-verified server-side signatures
Strong understanding of crypto security (keys, mnemonics, wallets, signatures, secure contexts, practical user interface spoofing concerns)
Can implement crypto user interfaces in React
Have implemented many tokenURI server-side endpoints, including 2d images, video, and 3d models
We expect this experience to find its origin in multiple years (at least 4 years) working in the startup/blockchain/gaming space.
Our Process
Application review
Interviews via Voice/Video Call or Discord Chat
Coding challenge - We will provide a task from our open issues - Any solution we use will be paid for
Contract negotiations
Total expected time to hire: A few days to a couple weeks

60 --> Consultant·e en Transformation Digitale - Digital Customer - Stage / Alternance H/F
Wavestone
Puteaux, Île-de-France, France (Hybrid)
Description de l'entreprise

Dans un monde où savoir se transformer est la clé du succès, Wavestone s’est donné pour mission d’éclairer et guider les grandes organisations dans leurs transformations les plus critiques. Des transformations qui visent à répondre aux grands enjeux stratégiques auxquels elles vont faire face dans les années à venir : l’accélération de la révolution numérique, l’intensification de la concurrence, ou encore la prise en considération de l’urgence climatique.

Le cabinet possède des compétences sectorielles centrées sur le cœur de métier de ses clients, des compétences technologiques parmi les plus pointues tant sur le digital, les systèmes d’information qu’en matière de cybersécurité, et des compétences en développement durable. Wavestone se distingue dans sa capacité à conjuguer étroitement toutes ces compétences, sans couture, au sein d’équipes pluridisciplinaires afin d’apporter une réponse à 360°, en phase avec les grands enjeux auxquels sont confrontés ses clients.

Le cabinet réalise un chiffre d’affaires de l’ordre de 470 M€ et rassemble près de 4 000 collaborateurs en Europe – où il figure parmi les leaders indépendants du conseil – aux Etats-Unis et en Asie.
Wavestone est coté sur Euronext à Paris et labellisé Great Place To Work®.

Pour plus d'informations, consulter www.wavestone.com

Tous nos métiers sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.


Description du poste


Contexte

Parmi les 8 practices & bureaux de Wavestone, la practice DC (Digital Customer) accompagne les entreprises françaises et internationales dans les secteurs du Retail, Luxe, Biens de consommation, Transport et Services.

Notre objectif est d’aider nos clients à réussir les transformations majeures de leurs modèles de ventes et de livraisons de produits/services, notamment :

Approche « Direct-to-consumer » et ecommerce

Mise en place d’offres « durables » - marché de seconde main, ventes « customer-to-customer »

Transformation de l’expérience client via les technologies de réalité augmentée, boutiques en lignes et du Web3.0 (metaverse…)

Enrichissement de la connaissance client et personnalisation des offres via l’exploitation des données et usage de l’intelligence artificielle


Fort de 400 consultants combinant des expertises sectorielles et technologiques uniques, nous sommes en capacité d’intervenir de de bout en bout :

Sur l’ensemble de la chaine de valeur, de la vente aux opérations (finance, supply chain)

Sur l’ensemble des aspects métiers, fonctionnels, applicatifs et technologiques

De la stratégie au pilotage de la transformation, en préparant le futur modèle d’opération agile


Nous créons de la valeur de façon durable, grâce à notre Positive Way, en privilégiant toujours la simplicité et le pragmatisme.
Nous sommes indépendants, tout en entretenant de forts liens opérationnels avec les principaux leaders du marché pour rester en permanence à l’état de l’art.


Objectif du stage

En tant que stagiaire/alternant, vous serez accompagné par un chef de projet expérimenté afin de réaliser :

Une étude autour d'un sujet prospectif et innovant (parmi les différents enjeux de la practice cités plus haut) permettant d'enrichir vos connaissances académiques et celles du cabinet, de découvrir en profondeur les sujets qui font l'actualité chez nos clients et d'appréhender la méthodologie reconnue de Wavestone dans les missions de conseil.

Des missions opérationnelles clients, au sein d'équipes projets, permettant de développer les compétences clés attendues pour un consultant junior (analyse et synthèse, relationnel, compréhension de l'environnement et du marché, responsabilité client/mission).


Nous vous donnons par ailleurs la possibilité de participer activement à la vie interne du cabinet à travers :

Le développement des offres de la practice

La publication d'articles sur nos blogs

Le développement de nos Assets : Shake 'up, CréaDesk, Research & Knowledge Center

La contribution au recrutement, relations écoles, réponses aux propositions commerciales, formations internes, événements internes

La participation à la stratégie RSE de Wavestone



Qualifications

Motivé·e pour apprendre et étudiant·e au sein d'une grande école d'ingénieurs, de management ou d'une grande université, vous êtes attiré·e par le conseil et vous possédez une forte appétence pour les technologies du numérique.

Vous souhaitez développer des compétences liées au métier du conseil et aux problématiques de transformation digitale des organisations.


Vos atouts :

Curiosité, esprit d’analyse aiguisé et capacité à vous approprier de nouveaux sujets, qu'ils soient métiers ou technologiques.

Orientation client, excellent relationnel et sens du service.

Goût du challenge et des résultats

Attrait pour l'entreprenariat et l'innovation.


Par ailleurs, vous souhaitez intégrer des équipes favorisant la proximité et la transmission des savoirs. Vous recherchez un environnement de travail stimulant, et voulez être acteur·rice d'un projet d'entreprise ambitieux en pleine croissance en France et à l'international. Vous avez envie de mettre votre enthousiasme au service d'un cabinet qui saura vous proposer une prise de responsabilités rapide.

Une expérience dans le domaine n'est pas requise pour ce poste.

61 --> Platform Team Lead
Mytaverse 
Austin, TX
Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Platform Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our web platform efforts and work with cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities

Leads development for the Platform team, responsible for all web applications.

Works across the full stack, building highly scalable distributed solutions that enable positive user experiences and measurable business growth.

Develops new features and infrastructure in support of rapidly emerging business and project requirements.

Writes, modifies, and debugs web applications using Node.js, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards code and architecture standards are consistently met.

Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.

Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.

Designs, codes, and manages automated test scripts, continuous builds, and deployment.

Collaborates with the other technology teams to ensure that development follows established processes and works as intended.

Creates and maintains workflows with the UI/UX team to ensure consistent visual designs.

Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.

Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.

Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Platform team.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

At least five years of relevant experience as a Full Stack Engineer or similar software engineering role.

Good knowledge of JavaScript, and Node.js, Java, Python, Go or similar.

Strong knowledge of modern web technologies (WebRTC, etc.) and frameworks (React, Vue.js, etc.)

Proficient with git and git workflows.

Demonstrated experience with databases and SQL.

Background working with cloud-native applications and commercial cloud technology (AWS, preferred)

Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.

Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.

Problem-solving attitude.

Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits

Exposure to streaming technologies.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Mytaverse is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. 64 --> Hardcore Degen at Crypto Start-Up
GOGO Protocol
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (Remote)
About 0VIX Protocol

Web 3.0 is the next wave of technology breakthroughs to revolutionize human society, with key pillars being decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, Metaverse, and decentralized autonomous organization (DAO). The space is growing at breakneck speed with enormous growth potential in years to come.

We originally came from the Metaverse with a trending top 15 NFT project on OpenSea called CryptoGOGOs that developed into GOGO Protocol, which is constructing the most user-friendly open source DeFi protocol for asset management and savings. The genesis came from the idea of merging the power of NFTs with a DeFi protocol that is as user-friendly as world-class FinTech apps. To further expand yield-generating opportunities for our users we realized that we lacked direct integration into a native money market. So we decided to build one from scratch.

The 0VIX Protocol is built by a global team of 35+ professionals, spread across 3 continents, with deep Crypto/DeFi expertise and with roots in banking, finance, tech, arts, entertainment, and gaming, as well as more than 10 years of experience in building multi-billion dollar tech companies such as N26, Consensys, Binance, Deutsche Bank and Sovryn.

Tasks

As the team Degen you will be responsible for being up-to-speed with the bleeding edge of recursive yield-generating strategies available across chains throughout the cryptocurrency ecosystem. You will serve as the contact point for everything requiring a fingers-on-the-pulse attitude. Your insight will be central in guiding the day-to-day investment strategies of our most high risk investments. In addition, you will be responsible for updating daily documentation listing the top yielding investment strategies across the major blockchains interfacing via DeFi, NFT and Metaverse plays. The daily investment operations commence with your insight and will be the source of numerous market reports and newsletters.
Conduct due diligence on crypto projects, including directly liaising with asset issuers.
Write internal reports that synthesize your learnings, working cross-functionally to educate various teams on all elements of the projects and program.
Help identify emerging trends, risks, blockers and flags to relevant internal stakeholders.
Build and maintain internal tools (including spreadsheets) to track information about different assets.
Stay informed of news, forks, governance, and other major events associated with assets linked with our platform.
Serve as the subject matter expert for exotic crypto assets and bleeding edge yield-generating strategies.

Requirements
You MUST be a hardcore crypto degen.
3+ years of high stakes crypto trading.
Knowledge using advanced tools to search for opportunities via well-rooted social/discord networks and efficient tweetdeck.
Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Experience building and maintaining spreadsheets, and performing basic data analysis.
Passion to be at the frontlines of the crypto ecosystem
Strong entrepreneurial skills, speed, initiative.
Ability to collaborate with teammates, navigate relationships in both crypto and the broader technology ecosystem, and ensure that entrepreneurs have an excellent experience with our platform

Awesome extras:
Top 1000 degen score (legacy.degenscore.com).

Benefits

With us, you’ll get:
A competitive compensation package, profit participation in our token, and performance bonuses.
The opportunity to be part in one of the most exciting tech projects of 2022
To work directly with highly experienced founders (built and sold 3 well known FinTech companies) on building and scaling a world-class DeFi product
Direct influence on our development and vision with your contributions being valued accordingly
A focused, communicative team with aligned goals
Great market opportunity and growth potential
Time off when you need it
Regular team lunches and fully-stocked kitchen

72 --> Stage - Développement et déploiement d'expériences Web personnalisées (H/F/X) - Février 2023
Mars
Haguenau, Grand Est, France (On-site)
Mars global Service– 6 Mois à Haguenau (Proche Strasbourg)

Mars Internship Experience

Ta Gratification :

Bac+4 : 1200 €/brut / Bac +5 : 1350 €/brut

Ta mission :

La mission se déroule dans le cadre du département "Digital Demand" et de son équipe d'ingénierie web, logicielle et digital. Le département est central avec une couverture mondiale (hors Chine et Russie) pour l'entreprise et ses segments. Il a la responsabilité unique de la mise en place des capabilités techniques et numériques au service de nos marques en ligne et de la collaboration et efficacité des Associés du groupe. Cela se concrétise avec plus de 400 sites web au travers d'une quarantaine de pays, des centaines de portails et sites Intranet pour 80 000 de nos employés et des dizaines d'applications mobiles. Tout ces actifs numériques sont de plus en plus alimentés et augmentés par l'utilisation de millions de données consommateurs. Données qui vont également servir à terme à incuber les nouvelles expériences de nos marques dans notre évolution vers le Web3 (NFT, Metaverse, Tokens, Décentralisation..) dont nos incubons les technologies et principes.

L'équipe se compose de gestionnaire de services, produits (product managers) et projets, d'architectes de solutions et d'écosystème digital, d'analystes, développeurs et ingénieur logiciels, et d'experts métiers (analytique web, applications mobile, Web CMS...). Ses membres se situent en France, aux Etats-Unis, au Brésil ou encore en Inde.

La mission consiste en tant que développeur Web junior a appréhender notre site système fonctionnant avec Drupal dans un environnement Acquia pour améliorer des composants existants et en mettre de nouveau en place afin de créer des expériences Web personnalisés sur nos sites de marques. A cette fin il sera nécessaire de découvrir notre kit de développement en assemblant plusieurs sites destinées à être mis en production, et à découvrir plusieurs plateformes de données consommateurs qui permettent d'identifier quelles expériences sont à afficher en fonction des consommateurs

Ta Journée Type :

Une journée de cette mission sera un mélange d'interactions enrichissantes en personne ou virtuelles, et des temps de développement et de test technique.

Tu organiseras un point régulier (daily stand-up) de 15 minutes avec ton maitre de stage pour partager ton avancement et obtenir des directions sur des sujets bloquants
Tu développeras sur le WCMS Drupal ou en REACT des nouveaux composants Web avec le but d'améliorer et de personnaliser les expériences web de nos marques
Selon tes besoins tu initieras des discussion techniques et sessions de travail avec des experts en développement Web travaillant sur les sites de nos marques (environnement Drupal / Acquia) ou sur leurs intégrations
Tu organiseras des sessions et entretiens avec les gestionnaires de plateforme et produit qui contiennent nos données consommateurs. Ce sont des platformes de type CDP (TreasureData), CRM (Marketing Cloud) ou analytiques (Google Analytics). Ceci pour comprendre la signification des données collectés et comment cela pourra affecter tes composants Web
Tu rencontreras des chefs de marque, de catégorie ou de marché du marketing pour écouter leurs besoins, gagner en perspicacité et utiliser les approfondissements obtenus pour le succès de ta mission,
Tu rejoindras et participeras à des discussions ouvertes sur les dernières news du Web3 dans notre communauté mondiale de champions et selon ton intérêt et tes connaissances tu pourras faire partir d'initiatives blockchain / NFT. Ces discussions se déroulerons parfois dans le "metaverse" avec un casque de VR type Oculus Quest auquel tu auras accès,
Tu auras un projet parallèle à faire avancer en fonction de tes disponibilités. Par exemple un module innovant pour des fonctionnalités de gestion de campagne marketing ou la gestion de QR codes.

Ton Profil :

Tu es en Master 2 ou dernière année d'écolé d'ingénieur ?

Tu es un as du développement Web ? tu connais peut-être déjà Drupal

Tu as déjà entendu parler de Web3, NFT et Metaverse ?

Tu es reconnu pour ta capacité à apprendre rapidement, ton esprit d'analyse, ton dynamisme, ta curiosité et tu aimes être à l'initiative ?

T'entretenir avec des directeurs du marketing de marque iconiques comme Snickers, M&M's, Pedigree ou Whiskas ne te fait pas peur ?

Tu es à l'aise en anglais en toute circonstance ?

Si oui, alors n'attends plus, nous avons hâte de te rencontrer!

Community Moderators are not only there to moderate and keep our community friendly and welcoming but they also get to be a voice for our community.

Community Moderators are not only there to moderate and keep our community friendly and welcoming but they also get to be a voice for our community. Ensuring the community are both heard and that their feedback and suggestions are seen by the rest of the company. As a Discord Community Moderator, you will moderate and maintain Discord chat and issues as they come through Discord and sometimes other applications. Using appropriate channels to document this information is also important so it may be shared with the rest of the company. This role calls for friendly and outgoing individuals with a community mindset and someone who’s familiar with the in’s and out’s of Discord. You’ll be responding to comments, messages and helping create and continue the positive conversation, and working with other areas of the company to provide our community feedback.

Key Responsibilities

Moderate chat in Discord, removing comments, muting, and banning members and bots if needed to ensure the whole community has a welcoming place to chat. Find fixes to various issues/bugs that are brought up in messages and channels. Joining our community in friendly conversation, even if it’s not directly tied to our software. Maintaining the discord itself. (Roles, channels, threads, etc.)Document and share feedback/bugs from our community channels. Communicate with other areas of the company to ensure our community's feedback is heard and bugs/issues are known and being addressed. Attend meetings to discuss feedback and ways to constantly improve our responsiveness to our community

Ideal Skills

Alert and responsive as discord chat is quick and always happening at the moment, when something comes up that should be removed it should be removed as soon as possible. An understanding of customer service or community representation. Experience with Discord.Ability to multitask and stay organized through multiple channels of communication Good communication and writing skills Adaptive and innovative to constantly improve our community environment and responsiveness.

Schwerbehinderte Bewerber:innen werden bei gleicher Eignung besonders berücksichtigt.

Was Wir Dir Bieten

Du unterstützt Dein Team bei spannenden Aufgaben und übernimmst eigene Projekte. Zusammenhalt schreiben wir groß. Unsere Communities bieten Raum zum Austausch und Netzwerken. Du möchtest einen Blick über den Tellerrand werfen? Dann nimm an einem Job Shadowing teil und entdecke, wie die Arbeit in anderen Teams aussieht. Ab dem ersten Tag steht Dir Dein Buddy zur Seite. Du kannst Dir Deine Arbeitszeit flexibel einteilen. Und auch sonst unterstützen wir Dich bei einer ausgeglichenen Work-Life-Balance. Dazu bekommst Du bei uns eine attraktive Vergütung.

Wir sind Future Ready, Du auch?

An unseren Standorten als Team zusammenkommen, ist uns wichtig, aber unsere individuelle Flexibilität auch. Nutze unser Full Flex Office Arbeitsmodell und arbeite nach Rücksprache mit Deiner Führungskraft und Deinem Team nicht nur am Dienstsitz, sondern auch von überall dort, wo Du es gut kannst und bis zu 20 Tage pro Jahr aus dem europäischen Aus-land. Und auch sonst unterstützen wir Dich z. B. mit flexiblen Arbeitszeiten und Gesundheitsangeboten bei einer ausgeglichenen Work-Life-Balance.

Wann?

Ab sofort für Dein fünf - bis sechsmonatiges Praktikum.

Bereit für das Neue, das Unerwartete, das Eindrucksvolle?

Dann bewirb Dich jetzt mit Anschreiben, Lebenslauf, Abschluss- und Arbeitszeugnissen, einer aktuellen Immatrikulationsbescheinigung (keine Notwendigkeit beim Gap Year) und Notenübersicht.

Möchtest Du ein Pflichtpraktikum absolvieren? Dann benötigen wir zusätzlich einen Auszug aus Deiner Studienordnung.

Schreib uns bitte in Deine Bewerbung, zu welchem Startzeitpunkt und über welchen Zeitraum Du gerne ein Praktikum bei uns machen möchtest.

Technologie von und für Menschen – damit geht alles. Als Teil von Vodafone unterstützen wir Dich bei einer Karriere, die sich auszahlt. In jeder Hinsicht. Sie beginnt mit Dir. Sie beginnt jetzt.

--------------------------------------
