Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Platform Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our web platform efforts and work with cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities

Leads development for the Platform team, responsible for all web applications.

Works across the full stack, building highly scalable distributed solutions that enable positive user experiences and measurable business growth.

Develops new features and infrastructure in support of rapidly emerging business and project requirements.

Writes, modifies, and debugs web applications using Node.js, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards code and architecture standards are consistently met.

Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.

Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.

Designs, codes, and manages automated test scripts, continuous builds, and deployment.

Collaborates with the other technology teams to ensure that development follows established processes and works as intended.

Creates and maintains workflows with the UI/UX team to ensure consistent visual designs.

Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.

Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.

Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Platform team.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

At least five years of relevant experience as a Full Stack Engineer or similar software engineering role.

Good knowledge of JavaScript, and Node.js, Java, Python, Go or similar.

Strong knowledge of modern web technologies (WebRTC, etc.) and frameworks (React, Vue.js, etc.)

Proficient with git and git workflows.

Demonstrated experience with databases and SQL.

Background working with cloud-native applications and commercial cloud technology (AWS, preferred)

Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.

Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.

Problem-solving attitude.

Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits

Exposure to streaming technologies.

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Erfahrung als Projektmanager

92 --> Game Tech Lead
Mytaverse 
Miami-Fort Lauderdale Area (Remote)
Role Description:

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Game Tech Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our work with Unreal, cloud streaming, and other cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities:

Leads the development of the Game Tech team, responsible for Unreal development, and cloud streaming and spatial audio integrations.
Develops new features, enhances existing features, and implements bug fixes in existing code.
Optimizes game engine deployment in terms of memory, frame rate and performance.
Guides team members to create work that adheres to the design of game systems while maintaining good style and optimization standards.
Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards are consistently met across the team.
Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.
Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.
Develops and maintains strategic operational systems, tools, and processes for production-readiness.
Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.
Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.
Develops software to integrate with distributed web applications.
Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.
Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.
Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.
Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.
Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Game Tech team.

Minimum Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
At least five years of relevant experience as a Game Developer or similar software engineering role.
At least two years of experience developing optimized modules in C++ within Unreal.
Strong knowledge of C++.
Proficient with git and git workflows.
Experience building libraries and APIs.
Up-to-date with the latest gaming trends, techniques, best practices and technologies.
Interest in learning new tools and technologies.
Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.
Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.
Problem-solving attitude.
Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits:

Experience with full-cycle game design and development.
Expert in one or more areas of specialization (artificial intelligence, 3D rendering, 3D animation, physics, multiplayer/networking, streaming technologies, or spatial audio).
Exposure to cloud-native applications (AWS GameLift, preferred).
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

You have strong experience leading software engineers and are looking for a company that is constantly looking to leverage emerging technology (such as sophisticated augmented reality and machine learning) while putting a high value on active learning and professional growth. At Rose Digital, based in New York City, we seek to empower a technical architect to bring their experience and ideas to the table to continue to wow customers into the future.

As a technical architect you will inspire confidence as you develop specifications and strategy alongside our world-class customers. From there, you will design technical solutions to meet these needs. Finally, you will work to orchestrate the implementation and delivery of these applications using an iterative development methodology with our talented and nimble engineering team. This is a chance to solve challenging software problems. This is a chance to learn and grow your technical repertoire at a company that will give you the tools you need to do it. Apply today!

Rose 2020 - Year in Review from Rose Digital on Vimeo.

In This Job You Will
Lead a technical team of engineers and quality assurance staff on project engagements for our clients.
You will estimate work, both initially at project outset as well as during implementation as changes are requested, velocity is determined, and individual features are understood in more detail.
Manages the development team through an iterative development process, monitoring progress against the plan and assessing where changes need to be made to improve overall efficiency and productivity of the team.
Responsible for project level staffing and task assignments - determines what skills and experience are needed on a project team, develops the implementation plan and technical architecture, and manages the distribution of tasks to the technical team for implementation.
Own the development of the technical design and architecture, defining the implementation plan based on project requirements, with input from the broader technical and QA team.
Develop and enforce appropriate and scalable approaches to application infrastructure, hosting, code management, CI/CD build processes, and testing.
Work as a senior level individual contributor / subject matter expert on some projects, personally taking on development of key features and functional areas.
On occasion you will create code for an aspect of the application that sets a reference and a standard for the broader team to refer to and adapt and extend more broadly across the application, but primarily you are looking to set up the ENgineering team for success.
Adapt your role on a project based on the needs of the product / application being built, the team, and the phase of a project.
Be the main client contact on technical matters, acting as the interface between Rose Digital and our technical and non-technical client stakeholders.
You Bring To The Table
7+ years of experience designing, deploying, maintaining, and refining project architectural requirements.
Strong experience developing applications with React+Node.js is ideal.
Strong experience designing solutions using cloud services is required, and specifically solid AWS experience with EC2, S3, Lambda, CloudFront, DynamoDB, RDS, Cognito, and Amplify greatly preferred.
Experience working in a fast-paced environment (at a prior digital agency, startup, or similar environments providing experience in rapid development for production) is required.
Experience developing solutions using headless content management systems (CMSs) to organize and deliver content and data via APIs to applications.
3+ years of experience working in an engineering leadership position on an agile development team - managing developers, distributing tasks, coordinating estimates, and ensuring that parallel development efforts are aligned.
Must be able to break down the overall development required in coding the final application into parts, ensuring that the foundation we build in early sprints is solid and that the features individual developers are coding throughout development will come together seamlessly as we iterate towards a release / launch.
Ability to look at the bigger picture across the project and identify opportunities for efficiency - developing solutions with modularity, component reuse, data normalization, and scalability in mind.
Ability to define and enforce coding standards and development practices including defining branching models, pre-production environments, stylistic standards, and other lower-level coding practices so that the broader team is aligned, and new developers can join the team and get up to speed quickly.
Experience, or interest, in developing augmented reality and virtual reality applications is preferred.
Experience with CI/CD development processes including tools like CircleCI, Chef, Jenkins, Amplify, Docker, Kubernetes is preferred.
ROSE is an award-winning digital innovation agency focused on helping leading brands leverage cutting-edge technology to innovate and delight their customers. As one of the INC 500 fastest-growing private companies and the fastest growing black-owned digital agency in the US we pride ourselves on the quality of our work and partnerships with our clients. We specialize in immersive technology (AR/VR) and technical partnerships leveraging web, mobile and back end development.We've used WebAR to launch a new shoe line for Adidas for over 110m viewers, rebuilt the technology powering the New York Lottery, helped Patrón bring gifting into the metaverse and did our part to rewild the world with Leonardo DiCaprio and Re:wild. In so doing, the team has won multiple Webby and Shorty awards, been featured in Vogue, WWD, and Harpers Bazaar, and more importantly, had fun doing it. Our mission is to create the most innovative digital agency of our time by guiding the world's most impactful brands/products into the metaverse.

The right approach to remote work is being discussed and tested since COVID-19 and it is projected that 1/5 of the US and EU workforce will work at least 3-5 days remotely in the future. One of the main challenges will be the question on how to maintain trust and a positive culture in a hybrid or remote work setting. beamya tries to solve this problem by becoming a long-term business partner for companies and help to ensure great team bonding even in a remote working environment.

The next pivot for beamya will be into the metaverse. Bill Gates claims that most virtual interactions will move from 2D to 3D in the next 2-3 years. The challenge is to become the first market player for team building events in this new space. For such a pivot, we are searching for a CTO to complement our team skills.

beamya is part of the Innosuisse coaching program

Twelvebytwelve GmbH

Julia Dürr

julia.d@twlvxtwlv.com

Welcome to the future of music! twelve x twelve ist eine Community Plattform mit integriertem NFT-Marktplatz und eigenem Metaverse für Labels, Bands, Artists und Fans. Gemeinsam mit ihrer Community entwickelt twelve x twelve einzigartige NFT-Kampagnen, Formate und Metaverse-Events, um WEB3 Erlebnisse im Musikmarkt langfristig zu etablieren.

Mit der Mission „Shaping the future of music“ bietet twelve x twelve KünstlerInnen und Fans die Möglichkeit, die Zukunft der Musik im Web3 gemeinsam zu gestalten. „Kuration, Kollaboration, Kommunikation“ sind die Grundsäulen der Vision von twelve x twelve. Fans werden über die Plattform mit Ihren Idolen, MusikerInnen mit Ihren Communities und KünstlerInnen untereinander verbunden. Es wird eine neue Dimension von Musikerlebnissen erschaffen, die den Community-Gedanken in der Musikwelt neu definiert.

Welcome on Bord? Der Name twelve x twelve (ausgesprochen: twelve by twelve) ist angelehnt an die Maße eines Schallplatten-Covers: 12x12 inch. Ziel von twelve x twelve ist, die Musik und das Artwork auch im digitalen Zeitalter miteinander zu verbinden. twelve x twelve arbeitet bereits mit renommierten Künstlern wie Scooter und Till Lindemann, mit dem elektronischen Musiklabel Innervisions oder - wie aktuell - mit der deutschen Rap-Ikone Haftbefehl und NFT-Artist Calentura zusammen. Die Twelvebytwelve GmbH mit Sitz in Berlin (TXT) und ihre Muttergesellschaft 360x Music AG, eine Aktiengesellschaft mit Sitz in Frankfurt am Main, wurden von einem Team erfahrener Experten in den Bereichen Musik, Urheberrecht, Venture Capital, Marktplätze, Technologie und Regulierung gegründet. Führende Finanzinstitute (u.a. 360X AG, Deutsche Börse AG und Commerzbank) sind strategische Investoren und Partner der 360X Music AG. Weitere Informationen unter: https://www.twlvxtwlv.com

Wir besetzen diese Stelle am Standort Düsseldorf.

Was Wir Dir Bieten

Du unterstützt Dein Team bei spannenden Aufgaben und übernimmst eigene Projekte. Zusammenhalt schreiben wir groß. Unsere Communities bieten Raum zum Austausch und Netzwerken. Du möchtest einen Blick über den Tellerrand werfen? Dann nimm an einem Job Shadowing teil und entdecke, wie die Arbeit in anderen Teams aussieht. Ab dem ersten Tag steht Dir Dein Buddy zur Seite. Du kannst Dir Deine Arbeitszeit flexibel einteilen. Und auch sonst unterstützen wir Dich bei einer ausgeglichenen Work-Life-Balance. Dazu bekommst Du bei uns eine attraktive Vergütung.

Wir sind Future Ready, Du auch?

An unseren Standorten als Team zusammenkommen, ist uns wichtig, aber unsere individuelle Flexibilität auch. Nutze unser Full Flex Office Arbeitsmodell und arbeite nach Rücksprache mit Deiner Führungskraft und Deinem Team nicht nur am Dienstsitz, sondern auch von überall dort wo Du es gut kannst und bis zu 20 Tage pro Jahr aus dem europäischen Ausland. Und auch sonst unterstützen wir Dich z. B. mit flexiblen Arbeitszeiten und Gesundheitsangeboten bei einer ausgeglichenen Work-Life-Balance.

Wann?

Zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt, idealerweise für ein sechsmonatiges Praktikum.

Bereit für das Neue, das Unerwartete, das Eindrucksvolle?

Dann bewirb Dich jetzt mit Anschreiben, Lebenslauf, Abschluss- und Arbeitszeugnissen, einer aktuellen Immatrikulationsbescheinigung (keine Notwendigkeit beim Gap Year) und Notenübersicht.

Möchtest Du ein Pflichtpraktikum absolvieren? Dann benötigen wir zusätzlich einen Auszug aus Deiner Studienordnung.

Schreib uns bitte in Deine Bewerbung, zu welchem Startzeitpunkt und über welchen Zeitraum (idealerweise 6 Monate) Du gerne ein Praktikum bei uns machen möchtest.

Technologie von und für Menschen – damit geht alles.

Als Teil von Vodafone unterstützen wir Dich bei einer Karriere, die sich auszahlt.

In jeder Hinsicht. Sie beginnt mit Dir. Sie beginnt jetzt.

116 --> Solution Architect - DaaS & Managed Services
Lenovo
Zealand, Denmark
Description And Requirements

Lenovo is seeking an experienced Device as a Service (DaaS) Solution Architect who will develop comprehensive, creative, and cost-effective services solutions for our customers within a Device as a Service model.

Your role will be to evaluate customer opportunities as presented in, RFPs/RFQs or engagements, from the Services Sales teams and use this information to develop solutions to meet customers’ requirements. Lenovo DaaS solutions may incorporate one or more lifecycle services including plan, configure, deploy, support, manage, and/or retire stages. You will collaborate with internal teams and Lenovo Services delivery partners, as well as travel to facilitate workshops with customers for scoping requirements.

Your other responsibilities include:

to partner across multiple organizations including, but not limited to, sales; finance; service delivery; customers, and business partners, and is expected to lead all elements of the services solution governance from the project kickoff; stakeholder coordination, and end solution strategy.
to contribute to customer presentations and briefings, provide input during deal qualification reviews, and prepare content for solution reviews with key stakeholders as required. Upon award, the DaaS Solution Architect is responsible for the development of an SOW contract with the customer as well as with any selected business partners, which includes negotiation with the partner and the customer to ensure that requirements are explicitly documented to mitigate risk.
to promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

Role Requirements:

5+ years of Contract Management, SOW’s, Business Development, Professional Services, Project Management and/or IT Services operations experience
Preference will be given to candidates with direct experience in Managed Services Industry focused on PC’s
Proven success in building solutions in the Managed Services industry
Proficiency in Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, MS Dynamics
Fluent in English Additional Preferred Qualifications
Experience with MS Dynamics, Salesforce & ServiceNow
Consumption-based sales experience in SaaS, DaaS, or Cloud Services
Global Account or Global Enterprise Account Sales experience with multiple stakeholders buy-in
A strategic mindset and sound business acumen are required, along with effective decision-making, contract negotiation and partner management skills

Travel estimated at 10%

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

119 --> Recruitment Consultant - Metaverse/Web3/Blockchain/Crypto, Amsterdam
Haystack People
Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Zie jij de technologische ontwikkelingen rondom Web3, NFT's en alles rondom Blockchain en wil jij daar onderdeel van uitmaken om echt impact te maken?
Wil jij meewerken aan de toekomst op de bleeding edge van de nieuwste technologie maar ben je zelf niet zo technisch?
Lees dan snel deze vacature want mass-adoption heeft de beste mensen nodig en jij kan daar één van zijn!

De recruiters binnen Haystack People hebben meerdere jaren ervaring in het aantrekken van talent in de Software Development sector. Dit is al jaren lang een ontzettend schaarse markt en in Web3 gaat dit nog een stapje verder want de beste mensen zijn nodig om de toekomst te bouwen.

Bij Haystack People delen wij de visie en het gedachtegoed van Web3 en zijn we als team trots op wat we bijdragen door de teams te bouwen van de tools die de fundering zijn voor de toekomst.

En die kennis gaan we overbrengen op jou want in je eerste jaar wordt je opgeleid tot niet alleen een expert in Web3 recruitment, maar ook een recruiter op top-niveau. Je gaat dus echt een vak leren! Je ontwikkelt jezelf op het gebied van recruitment, headhunting, accountmanagement, business development en consultative selling. Je zult beginnen om te werken aan recruitment projecten voor onze bestaande klanten, geleidelijk groei je door en ga je jouw eigen klantportfolio ontwikkelen. Er liggen volop doorgroeimogelijkheden om een combinatie van recruitment, accountmanagement en sales te doen aan zowel de kandidaatzijde als de klantzijde, deze ambities worden sterk gestimuleerd.

In de eerste maand beginnen we met je training over software development (we snappen dat je daar misschien nog niets van weet). Daarna ga je zelf kandidaten spreken, ze begeleiden tijdens het proces maar de echt kunst zit in het bereiken van de kandidaten. Maar waar vind je die? In de Metaverse, of nou ja, een variant daarvan.

Op dagelijkse basis ben je voornamelijk bezig om je kandidaten- en klanten netwerk in de niche waarin je actief bent uit te breiden. Dit doe je door middel van het bijhouden van verschillende (social media) kanalen en databases, (personal) branding, talent sourcing, targeting & advertisement, referenties, headhunting en cold / warm calls. Dagelijks zul je, je netwerk uitbreiden via Linkedin, andere social media maar bijvoorbeeld ook via Discord. Web3 is een community en als je iets weet van Crypto dan weet je hoe belangrijk deze is. Jij zult je actief mengen in verschillende groepen en ook zo jouw eigen online-identiteit en merk gaan gebruiken om het juiste talent voor jouw partners aan te trekken. Maar dat doe je natuurlijk niet alleen!

Je collega's staan altijd paraat om vragen aan te stellen en helpen je graag en samen met jou maken we ook een plan om er voor te zorgen dat jij uiteindelijk op eigen benen kan staan in deze wereld. Niet alleen als recruiter, maar expert binnen jouw vakgebied.
Je start op een bruto salaris van €2300,- - €3000,- met daarbij een ongelimiteerd bonussysteem gebaseerd op plaatsingen die jij realiseert. Voor iedere plaatsing die je doet krijg je een bonus van €750-€1250 per plaatsing in het eerste jaar (je doet er een paar per maand). Je bonus groeit mee met jouw resultaten en senioriteit, zodat jouw bruto salaris flink oploopt bij ieder resultaat dat je boekt.
8% vakantiegeld, 25 vakantiedagen en een telefoon en laptop van de zaak.
Dedicated begeleiding van het management en senior recruiters. Zij zijn erop gefocust om het beste in jou naar boven te halen en je alle tools te bieden waarmee jij jezelf optimaal kunt ontwikkelen. Je werkt als jong talent dan ook heel intensief met hen samen, maar krijgt ook de vrijheid wanneer jij zelf je ding wilt doen.
Veel doorgroeimogelijkheden. Je komt terecht in een snelgroeiende start-up, wanneer jij ervoor open staat kun je heel snel stappen maken.
Ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling; zowel interne als externe trainingsmogelijkheden voor recruitment, sales, accountmanagement en management competenties.
Binnen ons bedrijf heerst geen 8-17 uur mentaliteit. We zetten graag allemaal een stapje extra om het beste in onszelf naar boven te halen. Gelijktijdig heb je zelf alle tools in handen om een voor jou passende werk-privé balans te creëren.
Je kunt gratis gebruik maken van een crypto adviseur die je kan helpen om je bonussen te beleggen
Functie-eisen
Je hebt een bedrijfskundige of commerciële achtergrond of kunt aantonen dat je minimaal hbo werk- en denkniveau hebt.
Je beheerst de Nederlandse en Engelse taal uitstekend in zowel woord als geschrift.
Inhoudelijke kennis van IT is niet nodig, dit leren we je. Interesse in de IT wereld vinden we wel belangrijk.
Je hebt aantoonbare ervaring of affiniteit met de saleswereld in de vorm van een bijbaan, stage of andere werkzaamheden. Ervaring met koude acquisitie is een pré.
Je hebt een rijbewijs en bent bereid op locatie te werken in Zwanenburg en bent 40u per week beschikbaar.
Je weet het verschil tussen BTC en ETH, een goede en een slechte NFT en je weet dat een DAO geen broodje is.
Je kan meepraten over onderwerpen als Smart Contracts, P2E games, Chains, Communities, Minten, NFT's. Diepgaande kennis is niet nodig maar je begrijpt de basis.
Je zit in Discords om je favoriete projecten te volgen.
Je hebt een winnaarsmentaliteit, bent gedreven en wilt dat alles dat jij aanraakt slaagt.
Je bent ambitieus en wilt zowel op persoonlijk als professioneel vlak stappen maken om jezelf te ontwikkelen.
Je bent een makkelijkere prater, kunt levelen met verschillende soorten mensen en weet goed de leiding de nemen in zakelijke gesprekken.

120 --> Solutions Engineer
HyperMint
Miami, FL (Remote)
What is HyperMint? 🚀

HyperMint is Web3 infra company that makes it easy for enterprises, brands and creators to create and deploy tokens. We've built a robust and flexible platform that allows token (NFT) creation, management and distribution at scale. Think AWS for NFTs.

We're on a mission to empower everyone to be an owner. We're a developer focused and community driven business: with developer experience at the top of mind at all times.

Who are we? 👀

HyperMint was founded by three senior staff at MoonPay: Semyon Germanovich (Product + Engineering), Frederick Becker (Sales + Ecosystems) and Adrian Pang (Strategy + Special Projects).

HyperMint is backed by MoonPay, a multi-billion dollar crypto powerhouse who is trusted by 300+ leading wallets, websites, and applications (including some of the biggest crypto brands in the world Bitcoin.com, Dapper Labs, OpenSea, Ledger, Argent & Trust Wallet). This means we have access to the best creators, brands and enterprises in the space as well as significant funding.

The Opportunity

We're still incredibly early days in the web 3 space. We have about 300 million users in the crypto space. In the next 5 years, every brand on the above diagram is going to participate. We need to build robust, flexible and scalable tooling to enable these brands to enter web 3.

What You'll Do

Work with strategic clients to help sell and explain how to use HyperMint, becoming a subject matter expert.

Strategize and guide publicly traded businesses through the metaverse.

Become an advocate for HyperMint's main client: the developer.

Contribute to HyperMint's developer documentation, tooling and developer relations.

Handle day-to-day onboarding communication and support.

Provide constant feedback to our product team.

Participate in and shape an excellent engineering culture.

Lead an area of solutions engineering, eventually progressing to a team lead position.

Who are we looking for?

We're hiring a talented and driven solutions engineer.

You have excellent communications skills and emotional intelligence: you can explain deep technical concepts to non-technical folks.

You've worked on solutions engineering or a client facing engineering role for at least 2 years.

You've previously contributed to developer experience and documentation, both internal and external.

You propagate high standards upon others within your organization.

You can collect and filter product intelligence and feedback.

You've worked on products that have impacted millions of people.

You've been at a startup that has experienced significant growth.

Culture ❤️

We are a remote first company that champions ownership, self-reliance and decentralisation.

The cultural values at HyperMint include:
Ownership, autonomy and responsibility - we're hiring the best so you can tell us what to do - we want our employees to be owners and we see that as the key to our success.
Developer first, community led approach to product - we listen closely to our users and maintain engage key community stakeholders to inform our decisions.
Product focused organisation - our efforts are focused on building the best web 3 developer experience on the planet.
Excellence - we champion a culture of high standards.

Compensation 💰
Competitive salary, based on experience, market data and location 💰
Founding employee level share options 📈
Unlimited holidays + 2 week winter shutdown in December 🏝

Benefits 🤩
Fully remote: your life, your way of working OR work in one of our Offices (London, Miami and Lisbon)

The Department

We at NeXR are entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives. We are client centric, market driven and convinced that innovative concepts need fast decisions and clear business models. We create XR experiences, run our own motion capture studio and engage AR, VR technologies.

As a _Systems Administrator_ (x/w/m) your contributions are essential for the daily success of our company activities. Our hybrid infrastructure will expose you to a wide range of technology. We are maintaining own physical infrastructure in our local datacenter and most of the services are virtualized under Microsoft Hyper-V. We also host some services in Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS and use Office 365. Our servers and clients are running on all common operating systems like Microsoft Windows, Linux and MacOS.

What You’ll Do

On- and Off-boarding of employees as well as freelancers and external partners.
Drive projects autonomously or in a team setup. The project role can vary between a contributor, technical- or project lead.
Documentation of hard- and software configurations. Compiling end user knowledge base articles as well as IT operational procedures.

Doświadczenie w pracy z Unreal Engine 4 lub 5 i językiem skryptowym Blueprint.
Stopień licencjata lub równoważny z informatyki lub równoważne doświadczenie
silne dążenie do rozwoju zawodowego.

138 --> Database Performance Engineer, Tilia
Linden Lab
United States (Remote)
Company Snapshot

Tilia Inc., launched in 2017 by Linden Research, Inc., is a licensed money transmitter and registered money services business in the U.S. Tilia enables publishers of video games and virtual worlds to create in-world economies and monetize user interaction. Built to be robust, flexible, and secure, Tilia powers virtual economies of leading and cutting-edge publishers with hundreds of millions of dollars in circulation.

At Tilia, we value a workplace that’s as diverse as our products. As we continue to grow, we remain dedicated to building a company that is rooted in organizational health, strengths-based leadership, and the belief that teams are stronger than individuals.

If you want access to the forefront of virtual words, this is the place for you. We’ve created space for everyone to find belonging and invite you to come as you are.


Role Overview
We’re looking for a Database Performance Engineer to join our ambitious eCommerce team. You will build, scale, and support all of Tilia’s database needs.

This role reports to the Tilia Systems Engineering Team Lead and requires supporting our AWS managed Relational Database Service infrastructure while interfacing with teams to ensure their query design and usage is optimized. You will have the opportunity to own all of the database infrastructure and make key decisions that affect the performance and ability of the product to scale.


What We’ll Offer You

The stability of an established company with new startup momentum. An unparalleled opportunity to create relationships, systems, strategy and culture. An environment where your voice will be heard and your impact deeply felt. A sense of belonging where your work is appreciated and rewarded.

At Linden Lab, you'll be surrounded by creators, supporters, advocates, strategists, and hilarious human beings - all of whom are eager to collaborate and grow alongside you. We are at the sizzling intersection of metaverse/gaming and fintech, and we’ve got a highly engaged Executive Team with a nimble, can-do culture.


What We’ll Create Together

A database infrastructure that can support Tilia’s scaling needs
Definition of our sharding strategy
Query and Index designing that ensures applications run as optimized as possible
Long term architectural decisions that marry best practices with the needs of the business
Monitoring and metrics for database performance and tuning requirements


What You’ll Bring to the Team

At Tilia, we celebrate all the dimensions of diversity, including diversity of experience. We recognize that candidates applying for this role will be most successful if they bring the following with them:

8+ years of maintaining and enhancing the performance of existing database programs in a Database Admin/Engineer role.
Expert level knowledge of optimizing SQL queries and indices for maximum performance
Experience with performance tuning and scaling MySQL
Experience with sharding and other techniques to increase performance
Built, deployed, and maintained AWS RDS Aurora, RDS MySQL, RDS PostgreSQL infrastructure
Familiarity with Infrastructure as Code methodologies
Excellent customer relationship skills
Ability to write code in one of the languages we use: Shell, Python, Golang

If you feel like you don’t meet all of the requirements for this role, we encourage you to apply anyway. The confidence gap and imposter syndrome can sometimes get in the way of meeting incredible candidates and we don’t want it to get in the way of meeting you. We encourage you to reach out if you have belief in our mission and your own ability to contribute to our team!


The Fine Print

Work Environment & Physical Demands

As a remote-first company, we take great care to ensure an inclusive experience for the whole Tilia team. You may be offered the opportunity to travel to company meetings and events, however this is not a requirement. We aim to optimize for remote attendance, not just accommodate it.

The physical demands and work environment described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to use the computer and communicate with coworkers in a remote office environment. The employee frequently is required to stand or sit to complete work and may occasionally lift and/or move up to 10 pounds.

The statements herein are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees in this job. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills required of personnel so classified.

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Belonging Statement

Tilia celebrates diversity of thought, race, national origin and culture, age, experience, religion, economic and social status, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, marital status, veteran status or disability status. Building a culture of inclusion and belonging allows us to create and share experiences with each other, and with our virtual communities. Lees dan snel deze vacature want mass-adoption heeft de beste mensen nodig en jij kan daar één van zijn!

Functie omschrijving

De recruiters binnen Haystack People hebben meerdere jaren ervaring in het aantrekken van talent in de Software Development sector. Dit is al jaren lang een ontzettend schaarse markt en in Web3 gaat dit nog een stapje verder want de beste mensen zijn nodig om de toekomst te bouwen.

Je ontwikkelt jezelf op het gebied van recruitment, headhunting, accountmanagement, business development en consultative selling. Je zult beginnen om te werken aan recruitment projecten voor onze bestaande klanten, geleidelijk groei je door en ga je jouw eigen klantportfolio ontwikkelen. Er liggen volop doorgroeimogelijkheden om een combinatie van recruitment, accountmanagement en sales te doen aan zowel de kandidaatzijde als de klantzijde, deze ambities worden sterk gestimuleerd.

In de eerste maand beginnen we met je training over software development (we snappen dat je daar misschien nog niets van weet). Daarna ga je zelf kandidaten spreken, ze begeleiden tijdens het proces maar de echt kunst zit in het bereiken van de kandidaten. Maar waar vind je die? In de Metaverse, of nou ja, een variant daarvan.

Op dagelijkse basis ben je voornamelijk bezig om je kandidaten- en klanten netwerk in de niche waarin je actief bent uit te breiden. Dit doe je door middel van het bijhouden van verschillende (social media) kanalen en databases, (personal) branding, talent sourcing, targeting & advertisement, referenties, headhunting en cold / warm calls. Dagelijks zul je, je netwerk uitbreiden via Linkedin, andere social media maar bijvoorbeeld ook via Discord. Web3 is een community en als je iets weet van Crypto dan weet je hoe belangrijk deze is. Jij zult je actief mengen in verschillende groepen en ook zo jouw eigen online-identiteit en merk gaan gebruiken om het juiste talent voor jouw partners aan te trekken. Maar dat doe je natuurlijk niet alleen!

Je collega's staan altijd paraat om vragen aan te stellen en helpen je graag en samen met jou maken we ook een plan om er voor te zorgen dat jij uiteindelijk op eigen benen kan staan in deze wereld. Niet alleen als recruiter, maar expert binnen jouw vakgebied.

Functie-eisen

Functie eisen
Je hebt een bedrijfskundige of commerciële achtergrond of kunt aantonen dat je minimaal hbo werk- en denkniveau hebt.
Je beheerst de Nederlandse en Engelse taal uitstekend in zowel woord als geschrift.
Inhoudelijke kennis van IT is niet nodig, dit leren we je. Interesse in de IT wereld vinden we wel belangrijk.
Je hebt aantoonbare ervaring of affiniteit met de saleswereld in de vorm van een bijbaan, stage of andere werkzaamheden. Ervaring met koude acquisitie is een pré.
Je hebt een rijbewijs en bent bereid op locatie te werken in Zwanenburg en bent 40u per week beschikbaar.
Je weet het verschil tussen BTC en ETH, een goede en een slechte NFT en je weet dat een DAO geen broodje is.
Je kan meepraten over onderwerpen als Smart Contracts, P2E games, Chains, Communities, Minten, NFT's. Diepgaande kennis is niet nodig maar je begrijpt de basis.
Je zit in Discords om je favoriete projecten te volgen.
Je hebt een winnaarsmentaliteit, bent gedreven en wilt dat alles dat jij aanraakt slaagt.
Je bent ambitieus en wilt zowel op persoonlijk als professioneel vlak stappen maken om jezelf te ontwikkelen.
Je bent een makkelijkere prater, kunt levelen met verschillende soorten mensen en weet goed de leiding de nemen in zakelijke gesprekken.
Functie-voorstel

Arbeidsvoorwaarden
Je start op een bruto salaris van €2300,- - €3000,- met daarbij een ongelimiteerd bonussysteem gebaseerd op plaatsingen die jij realiseert. Voor iedere plaatsing die je doet krijg je een bonus van €750-€1250 per plaatsing in het eerste jaar (je doet er een paar per maand). Je bonus groeit mee met jouw resultaten en senioriteit, zodat jouw bruto salaris flink oploopt bij ieder resultaat dat je boekt.
8% vakantiegeld, 25 vakantiedagen en een telefoon en laptop van de zaak.
Dedicated begeleiding van het management en senior recruiters. Zij zijn erop gefocust om het beste in jou naar boven te halen en je alle tools te bieden waarmee jij jezelf optimaal kunt ontwikkelen. Je werkt als jong talent dan ook heel intensief met hen samen, maar krijgt ook de vrijheid wanneer jij zelf je ding wilt doen.
Veel doorgroeimogelijkheden. Je komt terecht in een snelgroeiende start-up, wanneer jij ervoor open staat kun je heel snel stappen maken.
Ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling; zowel interne als externe trainingsmogelijkheden voor recruitment, sales, accountmanagement en management competenties.
Binnen ons bedrijf heerst geen 8-17 uur mentaliteit. We zetten graag allemaal een stapje extra om het beste in onszelf naar boven te halen. Gelijktijdig heb je zelf alle tools in handen om een voor jou passende werk-privé balans te creëren.
Je kunt gratis gebruik maken van een crypto adviseur die je kan helpen om je bonussen te beleggen

141 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Portugal (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Upon award, the DaaS Solution Architect is responsible for the development of an SOW contract with the customer as well as with any selected business partners, which includes negotiation with the partner and the customer to ensure that requirements are explicitly documented to mitigate risk.
to promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

147 --> Scholarship in Digital Graphics and Metaverse Development
Condense
Bristol, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
Do you want to help bring live events to the metaverse?

Condense, LocalGlobe and ACC are proud to launch a funded scholarship on metaverse development starting in September 2022. We’re responding to the growing diversity problem within the tech sector and in metaverse development, relating to a lack of women and people from minority ethnic groups.

“Only one in ten A-Level Computer studies students is female.” Tech Talent Charter (2020)

“In a sample of the UK’s top 16 technology companies of the 152 board positions, only four were held by someone from an ethnic minority background. Of the 39 positions held by a woman, only one of these was from an ethnic minority background.” Colorintech (2019).

We're offering up to 8 young Bristol creatives the opportunity of a lifetime. You’ll learn how to stream live events into one of the world's most exciting new technologies, the Metaverse.

The successful applicants will take part in a 12 week programme, full of rich and intensive study, completely funded through the scholarship.

Apply through this link: Scholarship Application

Who are Condense?

Condense is on a mission to bring the world’s live events to the Metaverse. Their technology enables artists and performers to livestream events in real time as 3D video (volumetric video). The content is streamed into Unity and Unreal game engines, delivering completely new engaging experiences to people playing in online and console games, AR and VR. With Condense, the Metaverse is about to get real.

Who are LocalGlobe?

LocalGlobe is the early stage venture capital fund from Phoenix Court Group, investing at pre-seed and seed for more than two decades. Portfolio companies from LocalGlobe, and its sister break-out fund Latitude, have raised over $9.4bn of follow-on capital in the last 12 months, from some of the best investors globally, who share our conviction in these founders’ ability to build enduring businesses.

What will I learn?

Digital Graphics

3D modelling, photogrammetry and textures

Realtime VFX

Plugin integration, in game/ venue scaling and enhancing virtual worlds

Enriching virtual worlds

Interactions, spacial sound, player movement and networking basics

What will I get?

College accreditation and certificate

Hands-on experience with the latest technologies and techniques

Real world industry skills to support the next step in your career

Exposure to local employers

A potential career with Condense at the end of the 12 weeks

£1500 bursary (dependent on learner performance)

“Please apply regardless of your academic background or qualifications and don’t be discouraged if you don’t feel you fit all the criteria! It will be a great learning opportunity as you’ll get to work on some state of the art tech and, above all, it’ll be fun! The Condense team is really welcoming and everyone is there to help and make your time here as beneficial and exciting as possible. There is space for everyone who is passionate and interested in developing their technical skills.” Diana, Junior Software Engineer at Condense.

“You should apply for this scholarship because while everyone has a story to tell, not everyone has

the same opportunities in life. This is an incredible opportunity to carve out a career in engineering and metaverse content creation. It’s a 12 week fully-funded intensive course, so you will meet other people with similar interests and ambitions, and it could even lead to a permanent job with Condense.” James Tong, Head of People at Condense.

149 --> Solution Architect - DaaS & Managed Services
Lenovo
Eindhoven, North Brabant, Netherlands
Description And Requirements

Lenovo is seeking an experienced Device as a Service (DaaS) Solution Architect who will develop comprehensive, creative, and cost-effective services solutions for our customers within a Device as a Service model.

Your role will be to evaluate customer opportunities as presented in, RFPs/RFQs or engagements, from the Services Sales teams and use this information to develop solutions to meet customers’ requirements. Lenovo DaaS solutions may incorporate one or more lifecycle services including plan, configure, deploy, support, manage, and/or retire stages. You will collaborate with internal teams and Lenovo Services delivery partners, as well as travel to facilitate workshops with customers for scoping requirements.

Your other responsibilities include:

to partner across multiple organizations including, but not limited to, sales; finance; service delivery; customers, and business partners, and is expected to lead all elements of the services solution governance from the project kickoff; stakeholder coordination, and end solution strategy.
to contribute to customer presentations and briefings, provide input during deal qualification reviews, and prepare content for solution reviews with key stakeholders as required. Upon award, the DaaS Solution Architect is responsible for the development of an SOW contract with the customer as well as with any selected business partners, which includes negotiation with the partner and the customer to ensure that requirements are explicitly documented to mitigate risk.
to promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

Role Requirements:

5+ years of Contract Management, SOW’s, Business Development, Professional Services, Project Management and/or IT Services operations experience
Preference will be given to candidates with direct experience in Managed Services Industry focused on PC’s
Proven success in building solutions in the Managed Services industry
Proficiency in Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, MS Dynamics
Fluent in English Additional Preferred Qualifications
Experience with MS Dynamics, Salesforce & ServiceNow
Consumption-based sales experience in SaaS, DaaS, or Cloud Services
Global Account or Global Enterprise Account Sales experience with multiple stakeholders buy-in
A strategic mindset and sound business acumen are required, along with effective decision-making, contract negotiation and partner management skills

Travel estimated at 10%

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

150 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Malta (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/).

157 --> Augmented Reality Specialist
VidMob
New York, NY

Ready to bring everything they’ve got, to build with care and consideration and deliver truly Intelligent Creative.

Description

As an AR Specialist, you have the creative and technical experience to get your hands dirty and make incredible Augmented Reality experiences across a variety of client types and channels. You are a problem solver and a creative innovator, someone who seeks out solutions and is eager to advance their own skills and the expertise of those around you.

In this role, you will use your experience and passion to help us bring Augmented Reality into the mainstream for marketers. Similar to how video used to be perceived, today, AR is considered a costly, slow moving activation with a ton of technical moving parts. At VidMob, just as we have done with video, we are transforming AR to make it accessible and easy for any marketer.

The AR Specialist is expected to lead the effort towards building out our AR solution. The role provides tremendous opportunity for depth and breadth; for being both a maker of AR and developing scaled solutions. Your responsibilities will span across working directly with clients to ideate and execute what their dream AR experiences could look like; teaching talented and upcoming project managers the nuances of a request; and working directly with a talented freelance network of AR artists. This role is designed to allow the right person to make a huge impact, exponentially growing our business and pioneering this space in the industry.

Responsibilities
Ideate on and creative direct an AR experience
Work directly with clients to turn their ideas/briefs into AR executions
Scale and lead a project management team as an expert in AR
Provide training on ongoing evolution of AR opportunities across social platforms
Refine processes to allow AR experiences to be executed more effectively
Main POC for technical questions, including differences amongst social platforms
Unlock and grow the creative potential of a network of AR artists with varied skillsets and personalities
Identify and work with partners to solve the creation of 3D products and assets
Qualifications
Technical proficiency across Spark AR, Lens Studio, Effect House, including Meta Blueprint Certification
3+ years professional experience in a creating AR experiences across web and social platforms
Experience working with Fortune 500 brands and social platforms such as: Meta, Snap, TikTok, Google
Strong business proficiency, including the ability to work with diverse personality types
Strong organizational, verbal, written and presentation skills
Curiosity in how creative data could superpower AR creativity
Experience managing projects across cross functional teams
A high degree of flexibility & comfort with ambiguity within the AR/VR space
Implementation-focused, ready to roll up your sleeves and make an impact
Curiosity and knowledge of UNITY and Python development is a plus
Interest and prior knowledge of VR and Metaverse experience such as Horizon Worlds is a plus
About VidMob

VidMob is the world’s leading platform for Intelligent Creative that provides an end-to-end solution to help brands improve their marketing results by unifying creative and data.

VidMob is the only company in the world to receive a certified creative marketing partner badge from every major social and digital platform. A portion of every dollar VidMob receives is used to fund pro bono creative services for non-profits through its 501(c)(3) VidMob Gives. This year the company is included in AdAge's Best Places to Work 2022 and Forbes' list of America's Best Startup Employers 2022.

Learn more about VidMob at www.vidmob.com and VidMob Gives at vidmob.gives.

158 --> Game Developer (FT)
Goldentrust Group
North York, ON (On-site)
Goldentrust Group is looking for a Game Developer to join the team.

Job Detail

This is a full-time, in-person position in the office located in North York, Ontario
This is a leadership role that focuses on the company’s metaverse project, thus the ideal candidate should recognize the shortcomings of today’s metaverse games and want to create something different

Responsibilities

Overseeing the design and development of Goldentrust’s metaverse project.
Translating ideas from game design documents into efficient code.
Maintaining code and documentation.
Contributing to audio and visual design.
Assisting in animating game characters.

Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in a related field.
2+ years of experience in game development, preferably having taken a project through its full lifecycle.
Experience in crypto/blockchain gaming projects.
Proficiency in working with game engines and associated programming languages.
Experience working with graphic design or animation tools.
Knowledge of the latest gaming trends and technologies.
Experience working with city-building games is a plus.

About Goldentrust Group

Goldentrust Group is located in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. It was established in 2010 and so far, the company's total assets have reached hundreds of millions. Our investment tenet is not only to provide investors and partners with financial guarantees of safety, but also to create regulation, participation, win-win situations, and sustainable development to preserve and grow their assets. We provide our private equity investors with consistently strong returns that are significantly higher than what they can achieve in the public market. In order to achieve this goal, we have hired outstanding talents to provide unparalleled customer service to all clients and our flexible capital operation skills have also created an excellent return on investment for the majority of investors.

162 --> BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT (M/W/D)
DEPARTD
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (On-site)
DEPARTD ist eine „Creative Technologies“ und „Social Marketing“ Agentur in der DACH-Region. Wir arbeiten mit absoluten Top-Marken auf den relevanten Plattformen der Generation Z. TikTok, Instagram, YouTube und Snapchat bilden hierbei den Mittelpunkt unserer Arbeiten. Unser kreatives Team schafft plattformübergreifende Konzepte und authentische Inhalte. Neben Social Media Kampagnen, Werbefilmproduktionen & Influencer Aktivierungen steht vor allem das Thema Augmented Reality in unserem Fokus. Dort gehören wir durch unsere offizielle Partnerschaft mit Instagram/Facebook & Snapchat zu einer Handvoll Partner*innen weltweit und sind damit eine der führenden Agenturen auf diesem Gebiet. Durch diesen besonderen Status setzen wir viele Projekte auch direkt mit und für diese Social-Media Plattformen um.

Um unser Wachstum weiter zu fördern, brauchen wir Dich als Business Development Manager*in.

VERANTWORTLICHKEITEN
Du entwickelst und begleitest neue Geschäftsmodelle und Innovationsprojekte im Bereich Metaverse und Augmented Reality
Du erarbeitest und entwickelst eine nachhaltige Vertriebsstrategie und operationalisiert diese in deiner täglichen Arbeit
Du arbeitest direkt mit Ansprechpartner*innen der Social Media Plattformen TikTok, Meta und Snapchat
Du baust inhaltliches, wertvolles Fachwissen über die Vermarktung- und Medienlandschaft auf und wendest dieses fortlaufend an- Dabei coacht und begleitest du Deine Kolleg*innen durchgehend mit dem Ziel die Organisation konsequent weiterzuentwickeln
Dir gelingt es, die Zusammenarbeit und Kommunikation teamübergreifend in standardisierte Prozesse zu übersetzen und systemgestützte (CRM- & BI-Tools) sowie standardisierte Lösungen zu entwickeln - und in deiner täglichen Arbeit anzuwenden
Mit deiner Arbeit unterstützt du die Company ihre Vertriebsziele zu erreichen - Ebenso erstellst du Entscheidungsvorlagen und Handlungsempfehlungen für die Geschäftsführung

ANFORDERUNGEN
Du hast ein abgeschlossenes Studium in den Bereichen BWL, Marketing oder Kommunikation oder eine vergleichbare Ausbildung
Du hast eine sehr große Leidenschaft für Social Media (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube und Snapchat) und das Thema Metaverse
Du kannst souverän präsentieren und weißt, wie man eine Sales-Präsentation vorbereitet
Du hast ausgezeichnete Kommunikationsfähigkeiten in Deutsch und Englisch
Du hast erste Erfahrungen im Medien und Social Media Umfeld gesammelt
Gutes Verständnis für Zahlen
MS Office Skills: Powerpoint und Excel

WIR BIETEN:
Humorvolle und ambitionierte Startup Atmosphäre im Herzen Berlins
Ein dynamisches und talentiertes Team
Hohe Unabhängigkeit und Gestaltungsfreiheit
Wachstumschancen – deine Verantwortung wächst mit dem Wachstum des Unternehmens
Flache Hierarchien mit kurzen Kommunikationswegen und schnellen Entscheidungen
Erfahrenes Gründer- und Managementteam

Du erfüllst nicht alle Anforderungen? Dann überzeuge uns von anderen interessanten Fähigkeiten und Erfahrungen, die du mitbringst und die du bei uns einbringen möchtest.

Interesse?

Dann freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbungsunterlagen inkl. deiner Gehaltsvorstellung und deinem frühestmöglichem Eintrittsdatum.

163 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Germany (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/).

164 --> Leitende:r Softwareingenieur:in
Stier & Partner GmbH
Zug, Switzerland (Hybrid)
Werde Teil eines jungen motivierten Teams und entwickle dich mit uns weiter. Wir haben grosses vor und setzen auf web3 und Blockchain.

Für das junge Unternehmen indu4.0 AG suchen wir exklusiv eine:n Software Architect / Lead Software Engineer - Arbeitsort: Crypto Valley Zug.

Die indu4.0 AG entwickelt einen neuen B2B Marktplatz für die Industrie und nutzt dazu auch neuste Technologien wie Blockchain. Die B2B Plattform wird in der Cloud auf Firebase gehostet und wurde in JavaScript/TypeScript und React entwickelt.

Das erwartet dich bei indu4.0
Übernimm den Software Lead
Verantworte die Software Architektur
Entwickle selbst und arbeite eng mit unserem externen Softwarelieferanten zusammen
Treibe unnser Projekt im Bereich Krypto und Metaverse voran

Das bringst Du mit
Informatik Studium abgeschlossen
3-4 Jahre Erfahrung in der Software Entwicklung
Skalierbare und stabile Web Applikation aufbauen/weiterentwickeln
Kenntnisse im Bereich JavaScript/TypeScript und optimalerweise auch in React
Deutsch und Englisch

Dein Benefit
Freue dich auf ein Team, das voller Motivation das Produkt vorantreibt. Profitiere von Teamspirit und lasse dich von uns inspirieren.
Erlebe ein breites Aufgabenspektrum, sodass die Arbeitstage schneller vorbei gehen, als du dir vorstellen kannst.
Profitiere von einer guten Verkehrserschliessung, vielen guten Restaurants und tanke Energie mit einem Spaziergang im Wald oder am See.

Nicole Waser freut sich auf deine Kontaktaufnahme: nicole.waser@s-p.ch
