167 --> IT-Systemadministrator (x,w,m)
NeXR Technologies SE
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (On-site)
Das Department

Wir bei NeXR sind Unternehmer, Ingenieure und Kreative. Wir sind kundenorientiert, marktorientiert und überzeugt, dass innovative Konzepte schnelle Entscheidungen und klare Geschäftsmodelle erfordern. Wir lieben es, Herausforderungen anzunehmen und Lösungen zu entwickeln, die von Bedeutung sind. Wir entwickeln und betreuen alle Aspekte und Technologien für unsere Kunden, um das Metaverse zu betreten. Dazu gehören unsere eigenen Avatar-Scanner-Systeme zur exakten Vermessung und Virtualisierung von Menschen und Dingen. Wir schaffen XR-Erlebnisse, betreiben unser eigenes Motion-Capture-Studio und setzen AR- und VR-Technologien ein.

Als IT-Systemadministrator _(x/w/m)_ leisten Sie einen wichtigen Beitrag zum täglichen Erfolg unserer Unternehmensaktivitäten. Unsere hybride Infrastruktur wird Sie mit einer breiten Palette von Technologien vertraut machen. Wir unterhalten eine eigene physische Infrastruktur in unserem lokalen Rechenzentrum und die meisten Dienste sind unter Microsoft Hyper-V virtualisiert. Wir hosten auch einige Dienste in Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS und nutzen Office 365. Unsere Server und Clients laufen auf allen gängigen Betriebssystemen wie Microsoft Windows, Linux und MacOS.

Was Du bei uns machst
Bereitstellung von 1st- und 2nd-Level-Support für Endnutzer/innen sowie Unterstützung im Team bei 3rd-Level-Aufgaben.
Unterstützung der Benutzer/innen bei der Installation von Software sowie Funktionssicherstellung. Behebung von Verbindungs- oder Leistungsproblemen oder Anleitung zu IT-bezogenen Prozessen und Verfahren.
On- und Of-fboarding von Mitarbeiter/innen sowie Freelancern und externen Partner/innen.
Projekte eigenständig oder in einem Team-Setup vorantreiben. Die Projektrolle kann zwischen einem Mitwirkenden, Fach- oder Projektleiter variieren.
Dokumentation von Hard- und Software-Konfigurationen. Erstellen von User-Wissensartikeln sowie IT-Betriebsabläufen.

Damit punktest Du
Erfolgreich abgeschlossene Ausbildung/Studium zum Fachinformatiker.
1-3 Jahre Berufserfahrung.
Sehr gute IT-Kenntnisse und Bereitschaft, sich in neue Themen einzuarbeiten.
Gute Erfahrung mit Cloud-bezogener Software wie Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS und der Nutzung von Office 365.
Selbstständige, verantwortungsbewusste, zuverlässige und strukturierte Arbeitsweise.
Teamfähigkeit, Kommunikationsstärke, Organisationstalent und eine hohe Bereitschaft zur eigenverantwortlichen Bearbeitung von Themen.

Warum Du bei uns durchstarten solltest
Teil der NeXR-Family zu sein lohnt sich – Neben einem attraktiven Vergütungspaket besteht Entwicklungspotential in einem internationalen Unternehmen.
Unser Office kann richtig was! Es ist hoch modern, liegt im Herzen Berlins (Rocket Tower am Checkpoint Charlie), hat einen atemberaubenden Blick und es gibt eine Chill-Out-Area mit Spiele- & VR-Konsolen.
Wir sind ein hochmotiviertes Team mit flachen Hierarchien und schnellen Entscheidungen.
Flexible Arbeitsmodelle schaffen Dir Raum zum Gestalten.
Bei uns befindest Du Dich in einer inspirativen Umgebung und hast viel Freiraum für das Einbringen und Umsetzen Deiner eigenen Ideen.
Dank flexibler Arbeitszeiten kannst Du Deine Arbeit selbstständig gestalten.
Interessiert an mehr? – Bei uns gibt es die Möglichkeit zur Ausbildung in neuen Technologiefeldern und -Themen.
Der Klassiker, darf in keinem Start-Up fehlen: frisches Obst, Müsli und alle möglichen Getränke stehen täglich für Dich bereit.
Unvergessliche Momente und endlos Spaß versprechen Dir unsere legendären Team- & Company-Events.
Nicht nur Du bist willkommen, sondern auch Dein fellnasiger Vierbeiner.

Klingt spannend? Dann melde Dich!

Wenn Du unser Hightech-Unternehmen aktiv mitgestalten und Deine Fähigkeiten bei uns weiterentwickeln möchten, dann sende uns Deine Bewerbung noch heute per E-Mail an jobs@nexr-technologies.com oder direkt über den Bewerbungslink unter Angabe Deiner Gehaltsvorstellung und Deines frühestmöglichen Eintrittstermins. Wir freuen uns auf Deine spannende Bewerbung!

169 --> Stage - Consultant(e) Software Engineering
Avanade
Paris, Île-de-France, France
Job Description

Avanade France, des experts Microsoft et ses partenaires

6 Bureaux en France (Paris, Nantes, Bordeaux, Toulouse, Lyon et Clermont-Ferrand)

46% des entreprises du classement Global 500 sont clientes

Plus de 21 000 projets avec 4 000 clients depuis notre création

Certifié Top Employeur et Happy Trainees 2022.

Leader de la création et de la mise en œuvre de solutions dans l'écosystème Microsoft, l'innovation est placée au centre de tous nos projets.

En combinant les expertises de nos talents, notre accès privilégié à l'écosystème Microsoft et notre objectif de laisser un véritable impact humain, nous accompagnons nos clients dans leur transformation à grande ou à petite échelle.

Nous permettons à nos collaborateurs de se former tout au long de leur carrière sur les dernières technologies pour devenir de véritables expert(es) de l'innovation.

L’équipe et votre rôle

Dans le cadre de projets nationaux et/ou internationaux, rejoignez nos équipes de consultant(e)s et participez aux différentes phases d’un projet sur des applications métiers, mettant en œuvre les technologies Microsoft (.NET / .NET Core, Office 365 Services, Azure, Azure DevOps) et Full Stack (Angular, React, REST API).

Vous participerez à la réalisation de projets utilisant les méthodologies Agile, Safe ou Waterfall, pour des clients grands comptes.

Vos missions

En tant que stagiaire au sein de la Talent Community Software Engineering, vous serez amené(e) à :

Monter en compétences sur les technologies Microsoft.
Participer au développement d’assets qui pourront être réutilisés par d’autres collaborateurs Avanade.
Intervenir sur le développement d’applications métier et d’APIs REST.
Développer des tests unitaires et d’intégration.
Participer à la mise en œuvre de pipelines d’intégration et de déploiement continu.

Profil recherché

Vous êtes étudiant(e) de niveau Bac+5 en école d’ingénieur ou université. Vous êtes passionné et curieux de développement, de technologie - notamment de l’écosystème Microsoft - votre anglais est opérationnel. Vous désirez acquérir une expérience professionnelle enrichissante au sein d’une entreprise dynamique en forte évolution (20% de croissance annuelle moyenne depuis la création). Vous recherchez un stage de pré embauche.

Perspectives d’évolution et un équilibre vie pro/perso

Des points réguliers avec votre Career Advisor puis, en CDI 4 entretiens/an de suivi et d’évolution de carrière avec votre Career Advisor avec 6 étapes de carrière : Associate, Analyst, Consultant, Manager, Director, Executive.

Un engagement fort sur le bien-être avec la possibilité de faire jusqu’à 2 jours de télétravail/semaine avec une indemnité de télétravail et des RTT et en faveur de la diversité culturelle, l'égalité hommes-femmes et l'emploi des travailleurs en situation de handicap.

Des possibilités de formation certifiantes sur des environnements de test mis à disposition.

Un package complet

Remboursement de 50% du titre de transport

Tickets restaurant

Indemnité télétravail (jusqu’à 2 jours par semaine)

Processus de recrutement

Le processus de recrutement est transparent afin que vous puissiez découvrir rapidement si le poste est fait pour vous. Il se compose seulement de 3 étapes :

1 : Prise de contact avec un recruteur, pour répondre à vos premières questions concernant Avanade, les postes, et vous orienter au sein de notre organisation.

Tests anglais & français en ligne.

3 : Entretien technique avec un collaborateur Avanade, pour poser toutes vos questions sur les projets et les clients

En bonus : Un Escape Game virtuel pour nous découvrir encore plus !

Témoignage d'un(e) ancie(ne) stagiaire

Hello ! Je m’appelle Zoé, je travaille à Avanade depuis presque 1 an et demi maintenant. J’ai commencé en tant que stagiaire au sein de la Digital Factory le 1 er Mars 2021, dans le cadre de mon stage de fin d’études et ai poursuivi en CDI. Comme l’innovation et le champ de la recherche & du développement me tenaient à cœur, cette année j’ai eu l’opportunité de travailler à 40% en interne sur des sujets innovants et passionnants en intégrant le Tech Office. J’effectue donc deux activités en parallèle, à savoir ma mission chez le client (GRDF ?) et mes activités pour le Tech Office.

Quelles sont tes missions chez Avanade ?

Comme mentionné précédemment, j’exerce deux activités conjointement :

Chez mon client, j’ai développé un chatbot intégré dans Teams, en utilisant le Bot Framework SDK de Microsoft. L’objectif premier du bot est de répondre aux questions des collaborateurs sur les outils et services internes, et sur les outils de la suite Office 365, dans le cadre de la conduite du changement au sein de l’entreprise. Je travaille actuellement à le rendre plus « intelligent » en y incorporant des capacités cognitives de compréhension du langage – de l’IA – afin qu’il puisse gérer de multiple scénarios.
Au sein du Tech Office, j’ai eu l’occasion de travailler sur différents projets et d’explorer beaucoup de sujets innovants. J’ai commencé par travailler sur un démonstrateur centré autour de l’IoT industrielle et destiné à un salon auquel participe Avanade, appelé le SIDO. Le projet comporte différentes technologies telles que de « l’IA at Edge », de l’IoT, un digital twin, de la réalité mixte et virtuelle, de la robotique, du low-code, du traitement de data etc.

J’ai également aidé à la conception de l’Innovation Center dans les bureaux de Paris, en réfléchissant à l’offre destinée aux clients et aux collaborateurs d’Avanade, son format (les « Innovation Journey ») et son contenu (les démos, présentations etc.).

J’ai ensuite exploré le sujet du « Metaverse » en travaillant sur de la conception et de la modélisation 3D d’univers virtuels, pour finalement me focaliser sur les technologies de réalité étendue (AR, MR et VR) ainsi que la gestion de projet et d’équipe.

Qu’est-ce qui te plait dans tes missions ?

Ce qui me plait le plus c’est leur diversité, j’aime découvrir un nouveau sujet ou une nouvelle technologie. J’apprécie également la liberté et l’autonomie dont je dispose pour effectuer mes recherches et développer mes applications. Et évidemment, toutes ces expériences sont très enrichissantes tant sur le plan technique qu’interpersonnel.

Qu’est-ce qui te plait chez Avanade ?

Avoir l’opportunité de se former et de monter en compétence quel que soit son niveau est un vrai plus. J’ai également été touchée par la bienveillance et l’entraide entre les collaborateurs.

Comment as-tu découvert Avanade? Qu'est-ce qui t'as fait choisir Avanade?

J’ai découvert Avanade par l’entremise d’une amie de mon école d’ingénieur, qui été déjà en CDI lorsque je cherchais une entreprise pour effectuer mon stage de fin d’études. Ce qui m’a fait choisir Avanade c’est l’opportunité de formations, ainsi que les missions qu’on m’a présentées et sur lesquelles j’allais pouvoir intervenir.

Quelles ont été tes missions pendant le stage ?

Durant cette période j’ai également travaillé sur deux sujets en parallèle, le premier était le développement d’une double application mobile et bureau à l’aide de la PowerPlatform (technologie low-code/no-code), destinée à faciliter l’intégration et l’assimilation des connaissances acquises par les new joiners durant leurs onboarding, et prenant la forme d’un jeu en plusieurs parties. Lors de ce projet je suis passée par toutes les étapes du cycle de vie d’un projet, à savoir, l’analyse et le recueil des besoins, le POC, le chiffrage, l’écriture d’un backlog et la mise en place d’une méthodologie Agile, le développement, les tests, la mise en production et l’écriture d’une documentation.

Le deuxième projet était le développement d’une IA dans le cadre d’une application visant à apprendre la langue des signes en réalité mixte avec un casque HoloLens 2. Pour ce projet à caractère innovant, j’ai alterné entre phases de développement et recherche/lecture de papiers scientifiques.

Vous avez encore des doutes? Allez voir les avis de nos anciens stagiaires sur Happy Trainees (enquête anonyme).

Gardons contact !

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

170 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Victoria, BC (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

Description And Requirements

Lenovo is seeking an experienced Device as a Service (DaaS) Solution Architect who will develop comprehensive, creative, and cost-effective services solutions for our customers within a Device as a Service model.

Lenovo DaaS solutions may incorporate one or more lifecycle services including plan, configure, deploy, support, manage, and/or retire stages. You will collaborate with internal teams and Lenovo Services delivery partners, as well as travel to facilitate workshops with customers for scoping requirements.

Your other responsibilities include:

to partner across multiple organizations including, but not limited to, sales; finance; service delivery; customers, and business partners, and is expected to lead all elements of the services solution governance from the project kickoff; stakeholder coordination, and end solution strategy.
to contribute to customer presentations and briefings, provide input during deal qualification reviews, and prepare content for solution reviews with key stakeholders as required. Upon award, the DaaS Solution Architect is responsible for the development of an SOW contract with the customer as well as with any selected business partners, which includes negotiation with the partner and the customer to ensure that requirements are explicitly documented to mitigate risk.
to promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

Travel estimated at 10%

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

172 --> Gaming & A.I. Solutions Architect
Mattel, Inc.
El Segundo, CA (On-site)
CREATIVITY IS OUR SUPERPOWER. It’s our heritage and it’s also our future. Because we don’t just make toys. We create innovative products and experiences that inspire, entertain and develop children through play. Mattel is at its best when every member of our team feels respected, included, and heard—when everyone can show up as themselves and do their best work every day. We value and share an infinite range of ideas and voices that evolve and broaden our perspectives with a reach that extends into all our brands, partners, and suppliers.

The Opportunity

Do you want to work with the latest technology and the biggest companies creating products and content for the next generation of digital and connected products? Do you have experience in the game, 3D animation, or related industries with experience architecting asset pipelines, game services, A.I. content creation, XR and the metaverse, but are looking for a more favorable work/life balance at a company that will bring you right back to your childhood?

The Gaming and A.I. Architect will work as part of the Mattel Connected Product Architecture R&D Team to provide overall direction and guidance in the definition of Mattel’s current and future state of gaming, metaverse, XR and cognitive A.I. architecture. This includes developing high level designs, identifying solutions, vendor and product evaluations, assisting in strategy development and roadmaps for platforms, development of standards and best practices, and building prototypes to test the suitability of solutions, SDKs and APIs for the Mattel Connected Product Platform. The Gaming and A.I. Architect’s skills and knowledge must span multiple architecture domains, (A.I., for content generation, 3D and audio asset pipelines, AR/VR, metaverse, live ops and game as a service platforms)

What Your Impact Will Be

Design and oversight of project architecture to ensure appropriate solution and on time delivery
Design, develop, and oversee implementation of end-to-end integrated solutions
Ensure that proposed and existing solutions are aligned with CTO, Brand/Marketing, Design, MCPP, and GDPS goals and objectives
Provide architectural expertise, direction, and assistance to marketers, designers, brand manager, developers, vendors producers technical project managers software development teams
Ensure Project Team members are supported and receive clear directions on function and design of software systems
Responsible for the fundamental technology work of architecting/designing/building the core frameworks for our connected product platforms and end to end solutions, including building platform, security and performance components
Provides input into high-level design choices and informs technical standards, tools, and platforms and must have an understanding of systems engineering principles derived from experience
Collaborate with critical stakeholders to understand business needs, priority, and the quality of services to be created or enhanced.
Help define current and future state architecture & drive enhancements to meet future business needs
Responsible for discovering and identifying bottleneck gaps such as manual flows that can hinder the services or impact cycle time or cost and resolve them early during the solution, design & requirements stages
Drive research and standardization of platform components that can make up the building blocks from which Mattel will build connected products, applications and services
Consider the clients non-functional requirements such as security, scalability, resiliency, and performance in all solutions
May define and design functional, technical, performance, and reliability solutions in line with client inferred requirements
Analyze the current connected product environment to detect critical deficiencies and recommend solutions for improvement
Work with MCPP developers, project managers, and brand teams engage to align with methodology and realize the implementation of key future state initiatives
Participate in the brain storming and conceptual phases of identifying and solving connected product design challenges and initiatives, helping to formulate an architectural vision to drive delivery

What We’re Looking For

Bachelor's degree, preferably in a computer science/engineering, information technology or other related field plus more than 10 years of related experience; and/or equivalent combination of education and experience.
4+ years of experience in at least two related architecture disciplines (game asset pipelines, AR/VR, metaverse, cognitive A.I., A.I. content creation).
Proven record of shipping digital and/or physical+digital products
Proven record of grasping highly complex problems and turning them into actionable plans to deliver quick time-to-value
Preferably three or more years of experience in large, cross-functional teams influencing senior-level management and key stakeholders effectively across the organization and within complex contexts.
Demonstrated experience in high level systems design, and security architecture design and development.

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

Experience with building models and using in cloud A.I. platform such as Azure A.I, Google, etc. for generating content (audio, voices, 2D images, 3D GANS and for developing voiced and object detection solutions
Experience architecting with game as a services platform like Playfab, Nakama,
Experience with game development tools such as Unity, Unreal Engine
Architect on at least one cloud platform (Azure, AWS, Google Cloud)
Experience working with XR and metaverse
Experience with 3D Tools such as” Nvidia Omniverse, Creo, Maya, Instalod, Sketchfab, Reallusion
Ability to write test code for R&D spikes as needed (not for production)
Exceptional communication skills with the ability to develop and communicate the architecture decisions that inspire and motivate partners and aligns to the MCPP strategy.
Ability to instill confidence in the business and demonstrate the business value of IT.
Success in leveraging both traditional best practices, such as IT service management practices based on ITIL, as well as emerging methods like DevOps that are optimized for agility.

Don’t meet every single requirement? At Mattel we are dedicated to building a diverse and inclusive workplace, so if you’re excited about this role but your past experience doesn’t align perfectly with every qualification in the job description, we encourage you to apply anyway. Mattel is a leading global toy company and owner of one of the strongest catalogs of children’s and family entertainment franchises in the world. We create innovative products and experiences that inspire, entertain and develop children through play. We engage consumers through our portfolio of iconic brands, including Barbie, Hot Wheels, Fisher-Price, American Girl, Thomas & Friends, UNO and MEGA, as well as other popular intellectual properties that we own or license in partnership with global entertainment companies. Our offerings include film and television content, gaming, music and live events. We operate in 35 locations and our products are available in more than 150 countries in collaboration with the world’s leading retail and ecommerce companies. Since its founding in 1945, Mattel is proud to be a trusted partner in empowering children to explore the wonder of childhood and reach their full potential.

DAS ERWARTET DICH

Umsetzung von qualitativem Code und dessen Dokumentation

DAS BRINGST DU MIT

Du bist PHP-Entwickler mit Berufserfahrung und praktischen Programmierskills
Mehrere Jahre Berufserfahrung mit Laravel und idealerweise anderen web application frameworks
Eine schnelle Auffassungsgabe und eine selbstständige, lösungsorientierte Arbeitsweise
Hohe Einsatzbereitschaft und viel Teamgeist
Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse von Vorteil

WAS WIR BIETEN

Wunderschönes Office, sympathisches Team und regelmäßige Teamevents
Spezialisierungs- und Weiterbildungsmaßnahmen
Firmenwohnung mit nur 3 min Fußweg
Individuelle und umfangreiche Remote- und Homeoffice-Regelungen
Übernahme von Fahrtkosten oder Firmenfahrzeug möglich
Softdrinks- und Mateflatrate & Kaffeevollautomat
Verschiedene Arbeitszeitmodelle möglich (4-Tage-Woche, Teilzeit, etc.)
Familienfreundliches Arbeitsumfeld
Kinderbetreuungszuschuss, Altersvorsorge & Gesundheitsförderung möglich
Aktienoptionen (Beteiligung an unserem Erfolg) möglich

Bei uns herrscht eine lockere Arbeitsatmosphäre mit flachen Hierarchien, in der du als Individuum ernst genommen wirst. Du hast eine Idee? Raus damit! Du hältst dich lieber zurück und machst einfach deinen Job? Mach das! Bei uns fühlt sich jeder wohl. Werde Teil unseres Teams und hilf uns dabei, die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen! Aus einer Idee, Kreativität, Mut und Fleiß ist mittlerweile, dank eines genialen Teams, etwas Großes geworden. Wir haben zahlreiche Auszeichnungen erhalten und begeistern mit unserer Art zu Denken und unserer Technologie auch einige der bekanntesten Unternehmen Deutschlands.

Wir sind easy Access und Open Access und gleichzeitig Enterprise. Unser Working Space ist wie ein Zuhause, nur noch wohnlicher. Er ist wie ein Büro, nur noch produktiver. Er ist wie ein Atelier, nur noch kreativer. Du wirst es lieben.

Wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf deine Bewerbung!

--------------------------------------

174 --> Senior Back End Developer
Luxolis
Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
Founded in 2020 in Canada, Luxolis has made footprints all around the world and is still progressing to go even further. We are a global company with talents from France, Canada, India, South Korea, and more, and are here to make difference. We are more than just a company that makes revenue. We value the prosperity of people and communities, and have contributed and will further contribute to the development of society, culture, and technology.

We are currently building a state-of-the-art 3D web-based graphics system for digital twin solutions. The 3D graphics system is for end users to visualize and recreate photorealistic metaverse worlds.

As a senior backend developer, you will be responsible for the website development of 3D CAD-based collaborative platrofm.
Practice clean code for the 3D digital twin platform
Optimize the backend modules
Optimize data loading and visualization on WebGL
Enable the end users to be able to load an entire city on a web-based 3D graphics platform by engineering the sequence of data upload and resolution of the 3D model.
Calibrate scene and world coordinate systems to optimize the user experience
Add features for editing and analyzing 3D models

You are a self-motive, interpersonal and creative person who is willing to solve challenging problems. You enjoy working with other people internally and externally.
At least 5+ years of experience in software engineering
At least 5+ year of experience in Node JS and Python
A proven record of success
Fluent in English

--------------------------------------

175 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Saint John, NB (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here.

For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca.

If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778.

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here.

For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca.

If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778.

If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778.

188 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Sault Ste. Marie, ON (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here.

For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca.

If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778.

A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. 195 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
St John’s, NL (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. 200 --> Sharer
FAMILY FIT AND WELLNESS CENTER
France (Remote)
Tu souhaites découvrir ou faire partie d'un écosystème complet, d'un projet vraiment très intéressant et futuriste basé sur les nouvelles technologies comme le web3 et le blockchain.
Rejoins-moi, rejoins DT Socialize, une holding qui :
- détient plusieurs sociétés toutes spécialisées dans les nouvelles technologies et leur mission principale est de protéger nos données, notre vie privée.
- redistribue à ses membres une partie des bénéfices résultant de toutes ces sociétés.
Parmi ces sociétés, on retrouve :
- une application de messagerie avec des fonctionnalités bien plus poussées que messenger/whatsapp/zoom
- une banque
- le métaverse, un monde virtuel dans lequel on évolue avec un avatar. C'est tout simplement l'évolution du monde d'internet tel que nous le connaissons aujourd'hui, c'est l'avenir d'internet (le web3), tout comme le considèrent les grandes entreprises telles que google, Microsoft ou Facebook qui devient Meta.
Envie d'en savoir plus sur notre écosystème absolument prometteur, complet et stupéfiant ?
Envie de prendre part à cette révolution numérique ?
Imaginez si on avait eu l'opportunité d'investir il y a 30 ans dans des sociétés qui étaient au point de départ d'internet web2.
C'est ce que je vous propose aujourd'hui avec DT Socialize !!!

201 --> CMS Engineer - PHP / Typo3 (Thailand | m/w/x | Bangkok / Remote)
THIS IS! Digital Media Group
Bangkok, Bangkok City, Thailand (Remote)
At THISIS! DMG we are hungry for opportunities to improve the digital world.

As a service provider our clients benefit from our unique ability to think beyond technology and design to make their business more efficient. Our client relationships are based on our shared values of respect, thinking beyond, and responsiveness. While we see ourselves as experts in the digital field, we are always learning, always challenging our thinking, and always looking for the next big step to improve businesses. That’s why we believe that the perfect candidate will challenge the status quo on a daily base while bringing exciting projects to

life.

We are hungry for more – join us if your appetite is big enough.

As a CMS Engineer - PHP / Typo3, you will be responsible for designing and implementing new features and functionality, establishing and guiding the website's architecture, ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS.

Tasks

Your most important task is to help your team deliver good software projects and platforms that the whole team is proud of. That can include the following tasks
Develop custom content elements, extensions and themes in Typo3
Managing all technical aspects of Typo3 based websites
Develop and optimize websites, conduct website performance tests as well ensuring high quality code and execution
Working with project managers to discuss the desired website functionality and provide solutions
Work with various Typo3 extension and customize as per the needs
Suggest best practices, innovative ideas, and methods for attracting new clients and existing clients

Requirements
Excellent knowledge of PHP and developing websites with Typo3
5+ years experience coding custom extensions and content-elements for Typo3
Extensive knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Strong Front-End skills and fully capable of Back-End Development in Typo3
Excellent Logical reasoning

Benefits

Career & Continuing Education
Benefiting from success together: For compensation, we follow the principle of good pay for good performance. Our maxim is: Profit from success together. That's why performance-based compensation systems play a crucial role for us - even outside the upper management levels.
We support your further development: For on-the-job learning, we offer the DMG Academy, a mentoring program and advanced internal training.
Step by step to the top: Regular evaluation and employee appraisals

Individualized
Individualized working hours and working time models: You are free to choose when you work, around the 2 hour core hours. We offer part-time and full-time positions as well as flexible changes in between.
Individualized work locations: We support you in freely choosing your work location - you decide from where you work with us, worldwide.
Individualized benefits: Extended health insurance, also worldwide - support for private pension plans.
Individualized support for home/remote office

What we do?
The next big thing: We are doing today what customers will see as innovative tomorrow. Topics like NFTs, Sound Interfaces, LoRa, Metaverse and Metahuman are currently topics we are working on.
Our Groundwork: We implement the full range of digital projects for our clients - from CMS, PWAs and mobile apps to 3D animations and deployment structures.
Our style: We work on projects worldwide with teams of over 15 nationalities, our working language is English, we work on topics that move our clients forward and our people are good at finding the most efficient solution.

No matter who you are, where you come from, what you believe, or what you geek out about, we bring people together to make great work. That's what makes us THIS IS! Digital Media Group.

If you love development, you should join us!

203 --> PHP Developer (Thailand | m/w/x | Bangkok / Remote)
THIS IS! Digital Media Group
Bangkok, Bangkok City, Thailand (Remote)
At THISIS! DMG we are hungry for opportunities to improve the digital world.

As a service provider our clients benefit from our unique ability to think beyond technology and design to make their business more efficient. Our client relationships are based on our shared values of respect, thinking beyond, and responsiveness. While we see ourselves as experts in the digital field, we are always learning, always challenging our thinking, and always looking for the next big step to improve businesses. That’s why we believe that the perfect candidate will challenge the status quo on a daily base while bringing exciting projects to

life.

We are hungry for more – join us if your appetite is big enough.

As a PHP Developer, you will be responsible for customizing, building and deploying ERP, CRM, API and eCommerce platforms and integrate them with various input and output channels.

Tasks

Your most important task is to help your team deliver good software projects and platforms that the whole team is proud of. That can include the following tasks
Analyzing user requirements to inform application design
Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers
Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules
Build and enhance client ERP, CRM, and eCommerce solutions to match project specifications
API-based data integration development, and testing
Provide troubleshooting and root cause analysis for issues

Requirements
2+ years of PHP development experience; PHP is your strongest skill, but you also know the basics of front-end technologies
Experience in working with web-frameworks like laravel or symfony.
Ability to create database schemas that represent and support business processes
Experience with Pimcore is a strong bonus
Familiar with RESTful, JSON, HTML5, CSS and Javascript/Typescript
Experience in Agile software development methodology
Self-starter can work with minimal supervision
Perfect fit if you already know about Git, Continuous Delivery and DevOps
Good English in Speaking and Writing

Benefits

Career & Continuing Education
Benefiting from success together: For compensation, we follow the principle of good pay for good performance. Our maxim is: Profit from success together. That's why performance-based compensation systems play a crucial role for us - even outside the upper management levels.
We support your further development: For on-the-job learning, we offer the DMG Academy, a mentoring program and advanced internal training.
Step by step to the top: Regular evaluation and employee appraisals

Individualized
Individualized working hours and working time models: You are free to choose when you work, around the 2 hour core hours. We offer part-time and full-time positions as well as flexible changes in between.
Individualized work locations: We support you in freely choosing your work location - you decide from where you work with us, worldwide.
Individualized benefits: Extended health insurance, also worldwide - support for private pension plans.
Individualized support for home/remote office

What we do?
The next big thing: We are doing today what customers will see as innovative tomorrow. Topics like NFTs, Sound Interfaces, LoRa, Metaverse and Metahuman are currently topics we are working on.
Our Groundwork: We implement the full range of digital projects for our clients - from CMS, PWAs and mobile apps to 3D animations and deployment structures.
Our style: We work on projects worldwide with teams of over 15 nationalities, our working language is English, we work on topics that move our clients forward and our people are good at finding the most efficient solution.

No matter who you are, where you come from, what you believe, or what you geek out about, we bring people together to make great work. That's what makes us THIS IS! Digital Media Group.

If you love development, you should join us!

204 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Toronto, ON (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

208 --> DIGITAL KONZEPTER*IN (M/W/D)
DEPARTD
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (On-site)
DEPARTD ist eine der führenden Creative Technologies Agenturen in Deutschland mit besonderem Fokus auf Augmented Reality, TikTok und Social Campaigns. Unsere dynamischen, plattformübergreifenden Kampagnen für Tripple A Brands wie Kaufland, PlayStation, MINI, adidas und viele mehr bauen auf den neuesten Trends und Technologien und schaffen relevante Experiences im Metaverse und darüber hinaus. Mit offiziellen Partnerschaften zu Meta und Snapchat und einem engen Austausch mit TikTok, gehören wir außerdem zu einer Handvoll Agenturen weltweit und setzen viele unserer Projekte direkt mit und für diese Plattformen um.

__Du willst Marketing neu denken und relevante wie zielorientierte Inhalte mit Buzz-Potential gestalten? Dann bewirb dich jetzt und werde Teil der DEPARTD Crew!__

DEINE VERANTWORTLICHKEITEN
Entwicklung und Ausarbeitung ganzheitlicher Kreativ-Konzepte – Fokus auf plattformübergreifende Kampagnen, Werbespots und Livestreams
Konzeption von Influencer Kampagnen, TikTok Content und AR-Erlebnissen
Kreieren, schreiben und gestalten individueller Konzeptideen
Erstellung von Präsentationen und Texten inklusive der Vorstellung beim Kunden
Kontinuierliche Abstimmung mit dem Team zur inhaltlichen Qualitätskontrolle der Konzepte

UNSERE ANFORDERUNGEN
Du hast ein abgeschlossenes Studium (bzw. vergleichbare Ausbildung) im Bereich Journalistik, Marketing, Medienmanagement oder Kommunikation
Du hast eine große Leidenschaft für Social Media (Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Snapchat, Twitch, Facebook)
Du bist ein absoluter Teamplayer mit Herz und Humor.
Du bist kreativ, hast ein sehr gutes Sprachgefühl und kannst deine Ideen in lebendigen Texten und ersten Visualisierungen überzeugend zum Ausdruck bringen
Du hast sehr gute MS Office Kenntnisse und verfügst im Optimalfall über Grundkenntnisse im Umgang mit Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator
Du bringst ausgezeichnete Deutschkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift mit

WIR BIETEN:
Erfahrenes Gründer- und Managementteam
Start-up Atmosphäre mit einem starken Team, flexiblen Arbeitszeiten und flachen Hierarchien – ohne dabei die Work-Life-Balance aus den Augen zu verlieren
Mit unserem Sportangebot wollen wir dir einen Ausgleich ermöglichen und deine Gesundheit unterstützen
Du liebst die BVG? Wir haben einen ÖPNV Zuschuss für dich
28 Urlaubstage im Jahr
Du hast einen vierbeinigen Freund zu Hause? Wir freuen uns über Hunde im Büro
Das Freitag-Abend-Bier/Prosecco gehört zu jedem Wochenabschluss bei uns dazu

Du fühlst dich jetzt schon als Teil des Teams? Dann freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbungsunterlagen über den "Bewerben"-Button.

209 --> Cloud Full Stack Engineer - Augmented and Virtual reality (XR) (m/f/d)
Qualcomm
Salzburg, Salzburg, Austria (On-site)
Company

Qualcomm Austria RFFE GmbH

Job Area

Engineering Group, Engineering Group > Software Engineering

General Summary

At Qualcomm XR Labs Europe, we’re a passionate team of engineers who want to change the world through virtual and augmented reality products and technologies. We develop state-of-the-art computer vision, deep learning, and graphics solutions to deliver ultra-optimized, power-efficient software and hardware to enable the intelligent perception of the world around us. The Qualcomm XR Labs Europe is rapidly expanding and seeking innovators who will create the new digital world. We’re hiring at any of the XR Labs Europe locations in Austria, France, the Netherlands and Spain.

Qualcomm’s XR team is seeking a full-stack engineer to join a talented and innovative team developing the next generation of Augmented and Virtual reality (XR) technologies.

If you are a passionate full-stack engineer with infrastructure knowledge who wants to contribute to the next phase of our company’s growth and playing an active role in the Metaverse revolution sounds like an exciting opportunity, send us your application today.

Responsibilities We'll Trust You With
You are responsible for web application development and designing, implementing, and maintaining the server infrastructure.
Design and maintain the cloud infrastructure together with a professional team to ensure scalability, availability, and reliability.
Design and implement web applications that are running on your infrastructure design.
Optimize the infrastructure and applications for maximum performance and minimum latency.

Minimum Qualifications

Skills / Experience we'd love to see:
Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field
A passion for software development, cloud infrastructure, and aiming for a high-quality standard
3+ years of experience with AWS cloud infrastructure
3+ years of experience with programming languages such as Node.js, TypeScript, Python
Knowledge of HTML/JS/CSS
Experience with NoSQL databases such as MongoDB or DynamoDB
Experience with frameworks such as Angular, Vue, React

Preferred Qualifications
Cloud computing (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)
Infrastructure as code (AWS CDK, CloudFormation, Terraform)
Docker for virtualization
Serverless infrastructures (AWS Fargate, Lambda)

The company language is English, and you will work together with an international engineering team to identify our users’ needs and implement modern web applications. Therefore, communication skills and the ability to work in a team are key to success in this role.

What's An Offer

Apart from working in an open, relaxed and collaborative space, you will enjoy i.a.:
Salary, stock and performance related bonus
Employer-financed pension schemes
Employee Stock Purchase Program
Relocation and immigration support (if needed)
Mentor program for intensive induction and further training opportunities
Meal Voucher and subsidy for Public Transport (Austria)
Subsidies for physical and mental well-being, e.g. fitness center, sports clubs, ski tickets and much more
Hybrid working model
Modern and central office locations throughout Europe (incl. Salzburg, Vienna, Madrid, Amsterdam, London,...)

Learn More About Our XR Labs Europe

http://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2022/02/09/qualcomm-expands-investment-xr-and-metaverse-formation-xr-labs-europe-xr-rd
References to a particular number of years experience are for indicative purposes only. Applications from candidates with equivalent experience will be considered, provided that the candidate can demonstrate an ability to fulfill the principal duties of the role and possesses the required competencies.

Although this role has some expected minor physical activity, this should not deter otherwise qualified applicants from applying. If you are an individual with a physical or mental disability and need an accommodation during the application/hiring process, please call Qualcomm’s toll-free number found here for assistance. Qualcomm will provide reasonable accommodations, upon request, to support individuals with disabilities as part of our ongoing efforts to create an accessible workplace.

Qualcomm is an equal opportunity employer and supports workforce diversity.

To all Staffing and Recruiting Agencies: Our Careers Site is only for individuals seeking a job at Qualcomm. Staffing and recruiting agencies and individuals being represented by an agency are not authorized to use this site or to submit profiles, applications or resumes, and any such submissions will be considered unsolicited. Qualcomm does not accept unsolicited resumes or applications from agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Qualcomm employees or any other company location. Qualcomm is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/applications.

If you would like more information about this role, please contact Qualcomm Careers.

210 --> Media Trader Junior H/F
Hawk
Greater Paris Metropolitan Region (Hybrid)
L'entreprise


Hawk est une société technologique proposant des solutions omnicanales associant activations média innovantes et insights consommateurs.

Descriptif du poste

Construire de nouvelles relations avec les autres équipes (Paris, Montpellier, Londres…) et s’inscrire dans notre culture d’entreprise.



La liste des missions n’est pas exhaustive.

Tu nous rejoins !
