211 --> Afstudeerstage CRM | Exploring the world of Metaverse
Avanade
Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands
Job Description

Ben je klaar om dieper in de wereld van Metaverse te duiken en de mogelijkheden die deze wereld biedt te verkennen? We zijn op zoek naar een enthousiaste afstudeerder die onderzoek doet naar verbeteringen omtrent de Metaverse !

Afstudeeropdracht

Onlangs hebben grote techbedrijven als Microsoft, Meta, Intel en Roblox de handen ineengeslagen om een standaard voor virtuele realiteit te creëren. Deze digitale wereld - de Metaverse - laat tot nu toe veelbelovende resultaten zien. Veel bedrijven nemen het al in gebruik voor verschillende doeleinden , zoals Accenture en Avanade. Zii houden zich onder andere bezig met het onderzoeken van de ontwikkeling van Teams Avatars.

Bij Avanade zijn we geïnteresseerd in waar we aan moeten denken als we de Metaverse willen betreden voor onszelf en onze klanten. Tijdens de stage geven we je alle middelen die nodig zijn om de Metaverse te verkennen. Daarnaast bieden we je alle middelen die nodig zijn om manieren te bedenken voor Avanade om veel processen te moderniseren, zodat ze klaar zijn voor de cloud . Ben je graag met innovatie bezig en he b je een gaaf idee of voorstel voor een onderzoek binnen deze richting? Laat het ons horen en wij denken graag met je mee.

Dit zijn wij

Onze visie? ‘To advance the world through the power of people and Microsoft’. Elke dag zetten onze mensen zich in om met de nieuwste Microsoft-technologie onze klanten te helpen transformeren. Door de combinatie van een brede expertise van onze talentvolle mensen en een enorme passie voor Microsoft kunnen we onze klanten wereldwijd vooruit helpen op technologisch vlak en creëren we geweldige ervaringen & oplossingen.

Avanade is een internationaal IT-consultancybedrijf, waarbij mens en IT de krachten bundelen. Je zult jezelf herkennen in de 450 collega’s die rondlopen, maar ook zeker in de 40 andere stagiaires die jaarlijks stagelopen bij Avanade. We hebben veel passie voor en plezier in voor het werk dat we verrichten en hechten waarde aan een gezellige sfeer op de werkvloer. Met ontzettend veel talent voor Microsoft-technologie, is Avanade een unieke club waar veel ruimte is voor ontwikkeling en je onderdeel bent van een grote club professionals. Gezamenlijk met de andere stagiaires vorm je een enthousiaste groep & community binnen Avanade. Je kan meedoen aan veel leuke activiteiten zoals kennissessies tijdens de lunch, koffiemomenten met consultants en werkborrels! Daarnaast bieden we een aantal soft skilltrainingen speciaal voor de groep interns en mogelijkheid tot het behalen van een Microsoft certificaat!

Wij zoeken jou omdat…

Je een een WO-masterstudent bent op zoek naar een leerzame en uitdagende afstudeerstage per 1 februari 2023 op het gebied van CRM;
Je affiniteit hebt met IT-consultancy;
Je basiskennis hebt van CRM Dynamics 365 en kennis hebt van analytische tools;
Je communicatief vaardig bent in zowel Nederlands als Engels;
Je gemotiveerd bent om een goed afstudeeronderzoek op te zetten, je proactief en zelfstandig te werk gaat en je graag nieuwe mensen ontmoet!

Avanade biedt jou…

Een mooi en uitgebreid stageprogramma. Aan het eind van je stage ben je een aantal (soft) skills rijker, heb je een goed beeld van Avanade en heb je waardevolle connecties opgebouwd;
De mogelijkheid om samen te werken in een team van professionals;
Goede ondersteuning van een (technisch) stagebegeleider. Jouw stagebegeleider zal je zowel inhoudelijk als procesmatig ondersteunen;
Een stagevergoeding, laptop en een prachtig (sustainable) kantoor in Amsterdam-Zuid;
Budget voor het aanschaffen van een toetsenbord, muis en headset;
Mogelijkheid tot het behalen van een Microsoft certificaat op onze kosten;
Twee vakantiedagen per maand;
Veel gezelligheid; zo wordt er maandelijks door de Avanade NL Intern Committee een leuke activiteit georganiseerd!

Solliciteren?

Ben je enthousiast geworden en wil je graag met ons kennismaken? Solliciteer dan direct door je CV en motivatiebrief in te sturen via onze website. Let op: solliciteren kan alleen via de website, sollicitaties via de mail kunnen niet in behandeling worden genomen. Solliciteer voor woensdag 26 oktober!

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

--------------------------------------

Accenture France
Paris, Île-de-France, France (On-site)
Dans un souci d’accessibilité et de clarté, l’écriture inclusive n’est pas utilisée dans cette annonce. Les termes employés au masculin se réfèrent aussi bien au genre féminin que masculin.

Et si vous viviez l’expérience du changement ? Développer, imaginer, créer, digitaliser, accompagner, transformer : l’expérience du changement est stimulante et épanouissante.

Nous vous proposons de venir la vivre avec nous, en rejoignant un univers où le design de solutions rencontre la technologie de pointe. Faites bouger les lignes en gagnant en agilité et en créativité et en prenant place dans un large réseau d’experts international... Construisez une carrière agile dans un environnement de travail flexible. Rejoignez Accenture certifiée Great Place To Work, et venez imaginer, transformer et impacter positivement le monde. Be a change maker.

Au sein du Metaverse Continuum Business Group d'Accenture, nous contribuons à redéfinir ce qui est possible pour nos clients, pour nous-mêmes et pour le monde. Notre vision est fondée sur l'expérience humaine et nous considérons le Metaverse comme un continuum, un spectre de mondes, de réalités et de modèles commerciaux améliorés par le numérique.

En rejoignant notre équipe, vous ferez partie d'une communauté Accenture diversifiée, dynamique et mondiale, qui repousse sans cesse les limites de manière responsable et durable.

Vous travaillerez sur des projets significatifs et innovants qui changent radicalement la façon dont nos clients voient ce qui est possible, tout en vous engageant dans des initiatives transformationnelles alimentées par les dernières technologies Metaverse.

Apprenez-en plus sur les tendances que nous voyons façonner les entreprises et les industries dans Accenture Technology Vision 2022 .

En tant qu'Architecte blockchain, vos missions seront :

Incuber une nouvelle valeur commerciale pour nos clients dans le métaverse. Des systèmes multipartites (Blockchain, tokenisation, NFT) à la réalité étendue (XR) (réalité augmentée (AR), réalité virtuelle (VR) et réalité mixte), vous aiderez le client à se transformer grâce à la digitalisation par le cadrage et la mise en œuvre d’évaluations stratégiques et de solutions technologiques.

Vous ferez preuve d'une grande innovation et d'un leadership éclairé en matière d'architecture technologique, qui seront appliqués à de multiples clients dans le monde entier afin de créer un succès bien établi en matière de ventes et/ou de livraison.

Diriger la création d'offres et d'actifs nouveaux ou l'évolution d'offres et d'actifs existants, tout en évaluant la valeur que de nouvelles capacités pourraient libérer pour les organisations et les écosystèmes.

Articuler et expliquer la vision et la stratégie technologique d'Accenture aux clients les plus importants et les plus critiques d'Accenture dans le monde entier.

Aider les clients à passer rapidement et efficacement des phases de training et d'expérimentation à l’implémentation.

Concevoir et fournir des solutions dans le cadre de nos engagements clients les plus complexes sur le plan technique en donnant des conseils sur l'approche technologique, l'architecture et les éléments de risque des programmes informatiques complexes.

Soutenir le développement de la stratégie Metaverse d'Accenture et répondre aux éléments technologiques émergents sur le marché afin de modifier la façon dont les entreprises appliquent ces innovations.

Qualifications requises :

5+ ans d'expérience dans la conception, la livraison et l'évaluation de solutions d'architecture technique complexes.

3+ ans d'expérience avec une ou plusieurs plateformes blockchain, telles que R3 Corda, Hyperledger Fabric, DAML, Enterprise Ethereum, Hyperledger Indy/Aries performing :

Configuration de nœuds de réseaux distribués

Test et développement de contrats intelligents

la gestion des clés

Architecture et opérations de réseau.

5+ ans d'expérience dans un ou plusieurs des domaines suivants :

Développement de microservices dans Spring Boot ou Node.js (Express, Hapi, Koa, etc.).

Cadres pour l'intégration de services et le développement d'interfaces de programmation d'applications (API).

Conception de données et configuration de bases de données

Intégration et livraison continues (CI/CD)

Automatisation des tests fonctionnels et unitaires

Approvisionnement et configuration de l'infrastructure

Qualifications souhaitées:

Certification dans les technologies de registre distribués : Administrateur/Développeur Hyperledger Fabric, Développeur certifié R3 Corda, développeur certifié DAML.

Certification en architecture technologique. Exemples : TOGAF, AWS Solutions Architect Professional, Microsoft Certified Solutions Architect Expert, GCP Professional Cloud Architect.

Expérience de projet à travers toutes les phases d'un cycle de développement de logiciel typique (SDLC), de préférence avec des méthodes agiles comme Scrum, Kanban, SAFe.

Expérience dans la direction d'équipes géographiquement distribuées, en particulier d'équipes d'ingénierie offshore en Asie du Sud et en Asie-Pacifique.

En tant qu'Architecte Blockchain, vous rejoignez nos experts Technology pour exploiter la puissance du digital, stimuler l’innovation et améliorer le quotidien de nos clients. Conjuguez expertise business et connaissance des technologies de pointe pour aider nos clients à réinventer leur entreprise.

Accenture, c'est une communauté de plus de 700 000 talents et une mission commune réaliser la promesse technologique alliée à l’ingéniosité humaine.

Dans un monde en perpétuel changement, nous accélérons la transformation des plus grandes entreprises, de la stratégie à la réalisation des projets, à l’aide des technologies de demain et dynamisons leur croissance grâce à l'expertise multi-sectorielle de nos experts !

Vivez l’expérience du changement en rejoignant notre équipe, une équipe qui aspire à créer de la valeur pour ses clients et à faire toujours mieux pour ses talents

Envie d’en savoir plus sur le quotidien des collaborateurs Accenture ? Posez-leur directement vos questions.

Vivez l’expérience du changement ? Postulez dès maintenant.

214 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Bulgaria (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/).

215 --> Senior Engineer/ Engineer/ Engineer Associate (PI), Software Development (Frontend) (Ref: 2022/ARD/279/d/220719)
ASTRI - Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute
Hong Kong, Hong Kong SAR (On-site)
The Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (ASTRI) was founded by the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region in 2000 with the mission of enhancing Hong Kong’s competitiveness through applied research. ASTRI’s core R&D competence in various areas is grouped under four Technology Divisions: Communications Technologies, Trust and AI Technologies, Integrated Circuits and Systems, and IoT Sensing and AI Technologies.

It is applied across six core areas which are Smart City, Financial Technologies, Intelligent Manufacturing and Re-Industrialization, Digital Health, Application Specific Integrated Circuits, and Metaverse.

Over the years, ASTRI has nurtured a pool of research, I&T talents and received numerous international awards for its pioneering innovations as well as outstanding business and community contributions. To date, ASTRI has transferred over 800 technologies to the industries and been granted more than 900 patents in the Mainland, the US, and other countries.

To support our constant endeavour to position Hong Kong as a world-class smart city and an international hub of innovation and technology, we are seeking qualified professionals to fill the following position(s):

Reference #: 2022/ARD/279/d/220719

Job Responsibilities
Assist in ITF R&D project as assigned
Develop web-based applications

Requirements
Graduate with a Bachelor or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, Information Engineering or relevant disciplines, including non-local graduates from a local university of Hong Kong
Experience in programming using JavaScript(ES5/ES6/ES7)/TypeScript, and knowledge in HTML5/CSS3
Experience in modern Web development framework React/Angular/Vue/Node
Experience/knowledge in mobile app development is a plus
Live ASTRI values

Application
The appointment will be on renewable contract terms with a competitive salary and performance-linked variable pay. Fringe benefits include paid leave, medical and dental benefits, insurance coverage and contribution to MPF. The incumbent will normally work a five-day week.

For Application, please email careers@astri.org quoting the Ref. No. with an updated detailed resume. You are suggested NOT to include sensitive personal information such as HKID or passport number, photo, etc.

Position offer is subject to the applicant’s experience and academic qualification. The application will be open until the position is filled. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. ASTRI reserves the right not to fill the position.

ASTRI is an Equal Opportunities Employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used exclusively for recruitment only. For details, please refer to ASTRI Privacy Policy Statement., (https://www.astri.org/privacy/) in particular section 9.

216 --> Solution Architect - DaaS & Managed Services
Lenovo
Bratislava, Bratislava, Slovakia
Description And Requirements

Lenovo is seeking an experienced Device as a Service (DaaS) Solution Architect who will develop comprehensive, creative, and cost-effective services solutions for our customers within a Device as a Service model.

Your role will be to evaluate customer opportunities as presented in, RFPs/RFQs or engagements, from the Services Sales teams and use this information to develop solutions to meet customers’ requirements. Lenovo DaaS solutions may incorporate one or more lifecycle services including plan, configure, deploy, support, manage, and/or retire stages. You will collaborate with internal teams and Lenovo Services delivery partners, as well as travel to facilitate workshops with customers for scoping requirements.

Your other responsibilities include:

to partner across multiple organizations including, but not limited to, sales; finance; service delivery; customers, and business partners, and is expected to lead all elements of the services solution governance from the project kickoff; stakeholder coordination, and end solution strategy.
to contribute to customer presentations and briefings, provide input during deal qualification reviews, and prepare content for solution reviews with key stakeholders as required. Upon award, the DaaS Solution Architect is responsible for the development of an SOW contract with the customer as well as with any selected business partners, which includes negotiation with the partner and the customer to ensure that requirements are explicitly documented to mitigate risk.
to promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

Role Requirements:

5+ years of Contract Management, SOW’s, Business Development, Professional Services, Project Management and/or IT Services operations experience
Preference will be given to candidates with direct experience in Managed Services Industry focused on PC’s
Proven success in building solutions in the Managed Services industry
Proficiency in Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, MS Dynamics
Fluent in English Additional Preferred Qualifications
Experience with MS Dynamics, Salesforce & ServiceNow
Consumption-based sales experience in SaaS, DaaS, or Cloud Services
Global Account or Global Enterprise Account Sales experience with multiple stakeholders buy-in
A strategic mindset and sound business acumen are required, along with effective decision-making, contract negotiation and partner management skills

Travel estimated at 10%

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

Amsterdam - North Holland - Netherlands, * BASINGSTOKE - Hampshire - United Kingdom, * Bratislava - Bratislavský kraj - Slovakia, * Diegem - Brussels-Capital Region - Belgium, * EINDHOVEN - North Brabant - Netherlands, * Greenock - Renfrewshire - United Kingdom, * Holte - Zealand - Denmark, * Renfrew - Renfrewshire - United Kingdom, * Soeborg - Zealand - Denmark, * ZAVENTEM - Flemish Brabant - Belgium

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We provide the unique technology and services that enable this new form of cloud-based, live broadcast entertainment to be built on any of the top game engines and run on all major streaming platforms.

We believe viewers love live events, love communal experiences, and love when their participation matters. We believe the Metaverse is coming, and we’re already helping build its foundation.

We exist to power the next generation of these experiences — across gaming, sports and TV.

Our rapidly expanding workforce is composed of veterans from the video game and broader technology industries, with offices around the world. The Genvid team is extremely diverse, forward thinking, creative, and collaborative. We solve thorny problems quickly, reinvent the rules when necessary, and take pride in blazing new trails with major partners in the tech, social media, film and television, and pop culture sectors.

Our Solution:

Genvid Technologies is changing the face of the multi-billion-dollar livestreaming market through its proprietary technologies and related services, bringing real-time, interactive experiences to viewers of all kinds of broadcast content - even creating entirely new game-like experiences such as the recent Facebook Watch exclusive Rival Peak. With successive investment rounds in place, our well-funded company continues to grow quickly: we expect to triple in size over the next few years. Genvid’s clients include the biggest game publishers in the world, as well as video game engine creators, game consoles, streaming platforms, indie developers, Hollywood studios and other major IP holders.

Be part of the revolution of interactive broadcasting!

Full Stack Developer:

Our focus is on building solutions for our valued partners, including media companies, game publishers, game engine and console creators, streaming platforms, and independent game developers. In this high-impact role, you will work directly with our partners to understand their needs, propose solutions, create requirements, and deliver the next Genvid MILE. This position will be 100% remote; however, due to the tax status of Genvid, we are only able to hire remote employees who currently reside in the following locations: California, Washington, Texas, New York.

Projects you might work on during your first 6 months:

Some of the responsibilities you’ll find in this position as a member of a MILE team:

You’ll understand the architecture and implementation of the Genvid stack.
You’ll contribute in researching, analyzing, designing, building, scaling, and supporting the integration of our technology.
You’ll propose solutions for building our projects considering development, performance, and security best practices to integrate with third party tools and provide backend support.
You’ll work together with other frontend and full-stack developers to build interactive HTML, JavaScript, and CSS components for a new Genvid MILE.
You’ll create minigames, achievement systems, and UI overlays in React that integrate seamlessly with client products.
You’ll use appropriate methods and engineering best practices to deliver quality code, test and troubleshoot reported issues, and ensure bugs are swiftly addressed.
You’ll work within an agile development environment and think holistically with Technical Project Managers, Producers, and Software Managers.
You’ll have a voice in team improvement meetings, process iteration discussions, best practices definitions, and contribute to development design patterns in an effort to continuously improve our team and process.
You’ll collaborate with multiple external individuals including our external development partners, internal designers and creative directors, deployment team, live operations team, and QA.

Education & Experience:

Bachelor's Degree or equivalent industry experience
5+ years experience in web application development
Experience with JavaScript and/or Typescript, Node.js
Experience with a JavaScript library/framework such as React, Angular, or Vue
Expert level knowledge of a backend language such as Python, C#
Experience in NoSQL database design and management including schema, interface, and capacity scaling
Competent understanding and experience with cloud services, cloud infrastructure and implementation such as AWS, Azure, or GCE
Competent understanding of containerized environments and CI/CD automated deployment principles
Competent knowledge of network security principles
Experienced in technical writing, including functional specifications, software diagrams, and technical documentation
Keen attention to detail and delivering high-quality work
Ability to work as a member of a development team
Strong creative and analytical problem solving skills

This offer concerns an internship in both an international and fast-paced environment. Do not miss it out, or you will regret it! We are looking for your commitment during a 3-month-long program starting in October, but we’re happy to discuss organizational details with you.

At Demium we create, incubate, accelerate and invest in start-ups from scratch, enabling local entrepreneurs to create valuable and lasting companies. Individuals get support from us throughout their journey, from finding a co-founder to developing an idea into a verified business model and helping to secure seed investment.


Demium is divided into two departments: community and incubation. While Incubation is working day to day with the startups, helping them to set up their businesses and preparing for funding, the community department is in charge of everything that happens before, during and after Demium’s incubation programme.

As a Startup Community Assistant you will be responsible to assist the Head of Community in achieving his goals. Best duo ever in the making!

Be ready to learn a lot with us! Here are some of the tasks and responsibilities you will be helping us with, because you are the best:

Welcome our new entrepreneurs, co-organize with us onboarding events and introduce them to our communication channels.
Help us engage our community of startupers through “Founder’s coffee and lunch”, “Pitching Sessions”, etc.
Implement external events to attract new entrepreneurs and represent Demium among our partners (Universities, Coding Schools, Co-works, etc.)
Coordinate with Marketing team Warsaw’s strategy on social media, by preparing and documenting relevant content.
Have an eye on our PR initiatives and goals.
Contribute to Demium's culture, making our office much more than just tables and chairs!

Skills you will develop with us:

Public speaking! Soon you will present better than Steve Jobs.
Communication and acquisition strategy! Become the master of content creation.
Marketing and PR competencies! Let’s build together a campaign that will conquer the world!
Community and Culture Management! Sharing is caring, right?
Organizational skills! Ready to speak on the phone and typing at the same time?
Startup knowledge! Discover our secret sauce to find the one-billion dollar idea!
New technologies and innovation awareness! You do not know what the words metaverse or blockchain mean? No worries, just enjoy the ride with us.

About Demium
Demium is a talent investment company founded in Valencia in 2013 with the aim of supporting the best professionals and helping them to carry out successful projects, always with an eminently digital and technological component. In November 2020, Demium's asset management company started operating with a first €50M fund to invest in more than 75 early-stage startups per year (pre-seed/seed), becoming the most active venture capital fund in Spain. Startups such as Hannun, Voicemod, Swipcar, Citibox, Singularu or Landbot, among others have been created in the incubator. The company is present in four countries: Spain, Portugal, Poland, Ukraine and Czech Republic.

What makes us different
Our entrepreneurs don’t need a team, or an idea to join. We want talented, brave, and committed people from a range of backgrounds, or industry experts, with an epic determination to make things happen. Demium members can access our exceptional network of resources from anywhere in the world. We help budding business owners by supporting them through our programs but also investing in their startups through our exclusive partner fund.

Le projet est développé en collaboration avec les grands acteurs de la 3D temps réel, Unity, NVIDIA et Magic Leap et à la croisée du metaverse et de la plateforme de datavizualisation. Il a gagné plusieurs prix, a été présenté au CES sur le stand Unity et à la GTC 2022 de Nvidia.

Nos partenaires techniques externes et notamment Unity, Magic Leap, Meta ou ESRI.

232 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
New Zealand (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. 이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
게임 개발과 관련된 PM 경력 2년 이상
경력 기술서에 담당 업무에 대해 세부적으로 명시 필요
주요 협업툴(Jira / Confluence / Slack)에 대한 높은 이해도 및 활용 능력

Office, 협업툴 활용 능력

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
메타버스 장르에 대해 관심이 많고 지금도 플레이 중이신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 경력기술서
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

234 --> DevOps System Engineer (m/w/d)
rooom.com - Enterprise Metaverse Solutions
Leipzig, Saxony, Germany (On-site)
WARUM WIR?

Die rooom AG ist ein global agierendes Startup mit über 100 Mitarbeiter:innen in Jena, Leipzig, München und den USA. Unsere ExperienceCloud ist eine All-in-One-Plattform für das Erstellen, Verwalten und Veröffentlichen von beeindruckenden Erlebnissen in 2D, 3D, Augmented und Virtual Reality. Wir wurden mit über 20 Awards ausgezeichnet und arbeiten für internationale Unternehmen wie Porsche, Telekom, DHL, e.on und Vodafone. Werde Teil einer unglaublichen Erfolgsgeschichte und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft.

DAS ERWARTET DICH

Entwicklung und Betrieb einer nachhaltigen, sicheren und robusten Systemlandschaft und Infrastruktur für unsere cloudbasierten Softwarelösungen

Abgeschlossene Ausbildung zum Fachinformatiker für Anwendungsentwicklung

Firmenwohnung mit nur 3 min Fußweg zum Headquarter

Bei uns herrscht eine lockere Arbeitsatmosphäre mit flachen Hierarchien, in der du als Individuum ernst genommen wirst. Du hast eine Idee? Raus damit! Du hältst dich lieber zurück und machst einfach deinen Job? Mach das! Bei uns fühlt sich jeder wohl. Werde Teil unseres Teams und hilf uns dabei, die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen! Aus einer Idee, Kreativität, Mut und Fleiß ist mittlerweile, dank eines genialen Teams, etwas Großes geworden. Wir haben zahlreiche Auszeichnungen erhalten und begeistern mit unserer Art zu Denken und unserer Technologie auch einige der bekanntesten Unternehmen Deutschlands.

Wir sind easy Access und Open Access und gleichzeitig Enterprise. Unser Working Space ist wie ein Zuhause, nur noch wohnlicher. Er ist wie ein Büro, nur noch produktiver. Er ist wie ein Atelier, nur noch kreativer. Du wirst es lieben.

Wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf deine Bewerbung!

235 --> Stage - Optimisation du parcours consommateur digital par l’intelligence artificielle (H/F/X) - Mars 2023
Mars
Haguenau, Grand Est, France (On-site)
Mars global Service– 6 Mois à Haguenau (Proche Strasbourg)

Mars Internship Experience

Ta Gratification :

Bac+4 : 1200 €/brut / Bac +5 : 1350 €/brut

Ta mission :

La mission se déroule dans le cadre du département "Digital Demand" et de son équipe d'ingénierie web, logicielle et digital. Le département est central avec une couverture mondiale (hors Chine et Russie) pour l'entreprise et ses segments. Il a la responsabilité unique de la mise en place des capabilités techniques et numériques au service de nos marques en ligne et de la collaboration et efficacité des Associés du groupe. Cela se concrétise avec plus de 400 sites web au travers d'une quarantaine de pays, des centaines de portails et sites Intranet pour 80 000 de nos employés et des dizaines d'applications mobiles. Tout ces actifs numériques sont de plus en plus alimentés et augmentés par l'utilisation de millions de données consommateurs. Données qui vont également servir à terme à incuber les nouvelles expériences de nos marques dans notre évolution vers le Web3 (NFT, Metaverse, Tokens, Décentralisation..) dont nos incubons les technologies et principes.

L'équipe se compose de gestionnaire de services, produits (product managers) et projets, d'architectes de solutions et d'écosystème digital, d'analystes, développeurs et ingénieur logiciels, et d'experts métiers (analytique web, applications mobile, Web CMS...). Ses membres se situent en France, aux Etats-Unis, au Brésil ou encore en Inde.

La mission consiste à comprendre l'étendue et la nature des données et interactions de nos consommateurs, les objectifs et les scénarios de personnalisation de nos marques afin de construire un ou des modèles qui vont permettre une segmentation plus précise et efficace des consommateurs de nos marques. Ceci dans le but de rendre l'expérience plus pertinente dans les sites Web et dans d'autres canaux numériques (email, mobile, Web3, réseau sociaux...) où il existe des interactions avec nos consommateurs.

Ta Journée Type :

Une journée de cette mission sera un mélange d'interactions enrichissantes en personne ou virtuelles, et des temps de développement et de test technique.

Tu organiseras un point régulier (daily stand-up) de 15 minutes avec ton maitre de stage pour partager ton avancement et obtenir des directions sur des sujets bloquants
Tu développeras, entraineras et testeras des modèles d'apprentissages ou d'algorithmes, et travailleras à la collection et injection des données nécessaires,
Selon tes besoins tu initieras des discussion techniques et sessions de travail avec des experts en intelligence artificielle (machine learning) ou en développement Web travaillant sur les sites de nos marques (environnement Drupal / Acquia) ou sur leurs intégrations
Tu organiseras des sessions et entretiens avec les gestionnaires de platforme et produit qui contiennent nos données consommateurs. Ce sont des platformes de type CDP (TreasureData), CRM (Marketing Cloud) ou analytiques (Google Analytics). Ceci pour comprendre la signification des données collectés,
Tu rencontreras des chefs de marque, de catégorie ou de marché du marketing pour écouter leurs besoins, gagner en perspicacité et utiliser les approfondissements obtenus pour le succès de ta mission,
Tu rejoindras et participeras à des discussions ouvertes sur les dernières news du Web3 dans notre communauté mondiale de champions et selon ton intérêt et connaissances tu pourras faire partir d'initiatives blockchain / NFT. Ces discussions se déroulerons parfois dans le "metaverse" avec un casque de VR type Oculus Quest auquel tu auras accès,
Tu progresseras sur une formation en ligne en lien avec la mission (développement IA ou Web) sur une plateforme type Udacity,
Tu auras un projet parallèle à faire avancer en fonction de tes disponibilités. Par exemple un modèle d'apprentissage afin d'identifier les produits de nos marques et de la concurrence dans des photos grâce à l'utilisation de "machine learning" et de "computer vision".

Ton Profil :

Tu es en Master 2 ou dernière année d'écolé d'ingénieur ?

Tu connais le développement logiciel et / ou web et tu es intéressé par l'intelligence artificielle ?

Tu as déjà entendu parler de Web3, NFT et Metaverse ?

Tu es reconnu pour ta capacité à apprendre rapidement, ton esprit d'analyse, ton dynamisme, ta curiosité et tu aimes être à l'initiative ?

T'entretenir avec des directeurs du marketing de marque iconiques comme Snickers, M&M's, Pedigree ou Whiskas ne te fait pas peur ?

Tu es à l'aise en anglais en toute circonstance ?

Alors cette offre est sûrement faite pour toi ! Nous t'attendons.

Si oui, alors n'attends plus, nous avons hâte de te rencontrer!

--------------------------------------

236 --> Research Engineer - XR / Metaverse
Jaguar Land Rover
Warwickshire, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
REQ ID: 92482

JOB TITLE: Research Engineer - XR / Metaverse

SALARY: Competitive

POSTING END DATE: 31/10/2022

LOCATION: Warwickshire

We’re re-examining our vehicles and what a vehicle means in the emerging world of automation, connectedness, electrification and the shared economy. New ideas, new technology, and new approaches to mobility are our business. Join a team of next generation thinkers.

What To Expect

There now exists an exciting opportunity for a dynamic and enthusiastic Research Engineer, specifically in the area of eXtended Reality, Metaverse and Web 3.0, to develop, guide and deliver projects to support the “Digitalisation and Connectivity” theme. This will involve working on projects where eXtended Reality technologies could deliver amazing new capabilities for our customers/vehicles as well as exploring completely new opportunities that the Web 3.0 and Metaverse could enable.

The successful engineer will need to bring strong technical abilities to the team and work as part of an agile squad focussed on releasing the most value to the business/customer in an iterative manner. The outputs of the projects could range from desktop analysis, bench top demonstrations, full proof of concepts within a vehicle as appropriate and showcasing these to the stakeholders at all levels the company as required. An extremely high level of engineering capability will be required to ensure the concepts are well defined and realisable when taken forward to production.

This role will involve collaborative research both internally within the team, with our stakeholders across the business as well as with key leading UK universities and external partners.

What You’ll Be Responsible For

Delivery of relevant research into eXtended Reality, Web3.0 and Metaverse related technologies with a robust research approach with adherence to research processes
As part of a agile squad, develop implementation/activity plans to support the sprint/quarterly goals of the specific XR/Metaverse/Web3.0 project being tackled by the team
Resolve of key technical and strategic challenges by applying technical know-how to solve the goals of the project
Development of Proof-of-Concepts in house or with support from key suppliers/partners as appropriate
Ensuring robust, data led recording of findings, as well as adherence to relevant procedures
Support project roadmaps for the business kept updated with latest insights, ideas, technologies
Ensuring new and innovative ideas are captured as patents to maximise value to JLR
Support technical support / knowledge transfer on projects when handing over to mainstream engineering

What You’ll Need

Essential:
Strong Technical knowledge of 1 or more of:
eXtended Reality - hardware and/or software
3D Graphics/VR/Gaming Software Developmen(Unity, Unreal etc)/ Experience Design and creation
Web 3.0 technologies / Metaverse
Delivery of new customer features on in-vehicle architectures
eXtendered Reality User Experience research, design, definition, and validation
Ability to find resolutions to key technical issues within a team environment
Ability to write reports and communicate to technical and non-technical audience.
"Hacking" skills (finding software and hardware solutions for new problems)
Relevant degree (or equivalent experience) – E.g. Electronic, Electrical, Computing, Maths, Science or similar

Desirable:

Ability to form relevant and strong research questions and then breakdown into a set of logical tasks that will allow team to find and understand the answers as quickly as possible
Ability to understand and filter relevant, applicable, future technologies and topics
Previous experience in a Research role in engineering or automotive environment
Experience of Agile or equivalent research delivery process
Experience of Automotive telematics, connectivity (4G/5G) and on-board communication protocols (e.g. CAN, Ethernet etc)
Skilled in software development and good understanding of principals of software design
Embedded software and hardware design for automotive
A working knowledge of automotive electrical systems and development processes, such as those used at Jaguar Land Rover
Previous experience of working with Universities, Start-ups and Research partners

Personal Profile

Essential:

An individual with a customer first mind-set who is easy to do business with and makes people feel special
A curious and inquisitive attitude to solving Research challenges in novel ways.
Ability to work independently but always with a view to supporting the team and project goals
Proactive individual who can demonstrating tenacity, drive and perseverance with the ability to find solutions in a complex, and rapidly changing environment.
Excellent collaboration and interpersonal skills to achieve great outcomes for team and project.
Honest and open – always challenging self and proactive in continuous personal development
A resilient and enthusiastic who responds constructively to new ideas and inputs

Desirable:

A good communicator with the ability to convey complex ideas to a wide variety of stakeholders across the business
An individual with the capability to combine a short term, pragmatic focus with medium term planning
An individual with the ability to challenge existing thinking in a positive way whilst building credibility and trust through experience and personal style

SO WHY US?

Bring all this to the home of premium innovation, and you’ll find the opportunities to further your career with a world-class team, a discounted car purchase and lease scheme for you and your family, membership of a competitive pension plan and performance related bonus scheme. All this and more makes Jaguar Land Rover the perfect place to continue your journey.

This role may offer the opportunity for hybrid working where you can split your time between working from home and in the office. At Jaguar Land Rover, hybrid working is a voluntary, non-contractual arrangement providing employees with more choice and flexibility around how, when and where they work, if suitable for their role. Further details can be discussed with the Hiring Manager at interview stage.

Please be aware that we may close this vacancy for applications before the stated deadline if we receive a high volume of interest. We strongly advise you to submit your application as early as possible.

238 --> Senior Industry Analyst
Frost & Sullivan
San Antonio, TX (Remote)
An exciting opportunity has arisen for a Senior Industry Analyst professional based in the U.S. to play a key role in the growth of the global Mobile & Wireless communications research team. This position requires the candidate to help build our business practice by developing insightful strategic research, proactively supporting client engagements and some business development activities, and through involvement with team-building initiatives.

The Mobile & Wireless division of Frost & Sullivan provides organisations with up-to-date market intelligence that enables our clients to take advantage of the rapid pace of technology and business model evolution in the global 5G network services, infrastructure, applications, and IT solutions markets. We provide clients with differentiated market intelligence that delivers both vendor and end-user insights used by enterprises around the world to make educated business decisions.

Responsibilities

Focus on becoming the expert in the North American wireless communication services market, where you will develop strong understanding of the emerging opportunities for communication services providers to deliver 5G connectivity-based solutions across different industries. Essentially, you will think like a CSP and establish your reputation as the leading industry authority on wireless services business in North America.
You will work on producing strategic market studies highlighting industry trends, estimating the market potential (market sizing), and presenting detailed market forecasts. You will also identify industry best practices and outline the key success factors and unmet market needs.
In addition to working on strategic market research studies, you will also work on custom consulting assignments in your area of expertise.
You will collaborate with the Telecom services, IoT, Digital Media, Connected Work, Customer Experience, Cloud Services, AI/Data Centers and Metaverse teams in the ICT group to prepare compelling market insights on topics where a fundamental understanding of how different building blocks help move things forward in our connected societies is essential to deliver a 360-degree view of the industry opportunities.

Production Tasks

Activities Required For Production Include But Are Not Limited To

Complete all activities required to produce deliverables according to project deadlines.

Define individual industry sector; identify market segments within industry sector
Identify key market participants in specified industry and establish contacts within each participating agency
Lead client meetings to collect project information; lead interviews contacts to collect data used for deliverables
Identify and quantify impacts of market drivers, restraints, and challenges over a pre-determined period
Analyze quantitative market information using mathematical and statistical functions
Perform market forecast and trend analysis; draw conclusions about market activity from analysis
Prepare written compilation of market analysis, in both comprehensive and truncated formats
Identify growth opportunities and benchmark competitive environment
Express market strategies and trends in both written and oral contexts
Present research findings publicly via digital platforms, in person, and in writing
Identify Best Practices and successful growth strategies of market participants
Give public presentations/webinars on assigned industry topics
Lead Growth Consulting (GC) projects
Lead Fulfillment of Brand & Demand Services (BDS) related to sector coverage
Facilitate Growth Workshops/GSDs
Addresses client inquiries in a professional and timely manner
Provide direct support to sales teams by attending sales calls when requested, providing requested research materials to sales members, and initiating frequent communications with designated sales team members
Expand personal brand and thought leadership credentials by contributing regular blogs, fielding media inquiries, participating in speaking engagements, and attending industry events
Contribute to training materials, support F&S research training initiatives

Relation to other positions

Work as a part of program, within a practice, with specific sector coverage
Regular interactions with program director and colleagues in same program; collaborate frequently with colleagues in other programs/practices; actively participate on strategic review committees (SRCs)
Communicate frequently with sales team members regarding client inquiries, production status, and sales of deliverables
Cooperate with Client Value Enhancement representatives to improve client satisfaction and renewed sales, by attending client events, and communicating client important information resulting from client interactions
Interaction with assigned Corporate Communications and marketing representatives to coordinate publications, press quotes, presentations, and any other public presentation (oral and written)

Qualifications

The successful candidate will have an educational background in business, market research, economics, journalism, or technology with an enthusiastic curiosity about the critical role of wireless technology and solutions in consumer and enterprise segments. A proactive, methodical, and innovative – thinking outside the box – working practice is essential, with the ability to deliver accurate, high impact results in a fast-paced team-focused environment.

Essential

5-7 years of work experience in Tech companies, Telecom operators, market research firms or consulting firms
A foundational understanding of consulting/research/investigative journalism methodologies and business modelling (primary/secondary research, coherent story development)
Familiarity with the overall wireless ecosystem, including next-generation wireless networking and IT technologies, mobile applications, service provider business models, spectrum issues, distribution models, and pricing strategies
Strong intellectual curiosity, an aptitude for understanding new and old technologies and business models, and the ability to see new trends or emerging structures
Strong analytical/data modelling skills (including forecasting)
Ability to work independently while meeting project deadlines and following corporate procedures
Ability to network to create new vendor relationships and to proactively manage ongoing relationships to stay relevant to them
Solid communication skills (written and oral), confident enough to present your work to a group of peers or a client and defend your analysis in a calm and professional manner
A team player who views team collaboration as an important path to professional development
Must be able to work within a team environment, geographically distributed, as well as autonomously

Benefits

Annual base salary plus a performance-based bonus compensation plan
Flexible work schedule options available
Business casual dress attire
International travel to analyst focused events
Early exposure to leading CSPs and wireless industry technology vendor executives

Why Frost & Sullivan is important to your career enhancement:

Learn to leverages visionary innovation to address the global challenges of collapse, disruption, and transformation

You will be part of a winning, global team that fosters team work and an Olympic spirit while enhancing your communication and people skills

240 --> ブロックチェーンエンジニア／R&Dコンサルティング・システム開発
（株）シーエーシー
Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
【企業名】 株式会社シーエーシー 【職種名】 ブロックチェーンエンジニア／R&Dコンサルティング・システム開発 【仕事内容(概要)】 ブロックチェーンエンジニア／R&Dコンサルティング・システム開発 【具体的な仕事内容】 大手金融機関・大手事業者を中心とした顧客の課題解決支援を行う当社のブロックチェーンエンジニアとして、ブロックチェーン技術を用いた研究開発／顧客システム開発／自社プロダクト開発をお任せします。 ■職務の詳細： （1）顧客業務（金融、産業）におけるブロックチェーンシステムコンサルティング・研究開発 （2）ブロックチェーンを用いた自社製品のDApps開発、Web3.0研究開発[NFT/SBT, SSI/DID/VC, DAO, Metaverse] ■職務の特徴： ・配属当初は自社のブロックチェーンアプリ開発（Java／JavaScript他）のプロジェクトへのアサイン。

その後は、顧客業務のブロックチェーン案件（※）、及び、自社アプリに関するWeb3.0研究開発へ適宜アサイン予定。

※案件事例：STO(Security Token Offering)、Stable Coin、SCM、InsureTechシステムの研究開発 ・配属先となるブロックチェーン推進グループは10数名のブロックチェーン専任チーム （ブロックチェーン開発初心者～複数のブロックチェーン案件での経験を持つ有識者・アーキテクト） ＜CACのブロックチェーン分野への取り組み、トピックス＞ ・「Corda」初の国内商用システム開発に協力 ・ブロックチェーン／スマートコントラクト(Hyperledger系、Ethereum系等)を用いた複数案件でのシステム開発を推進 ・教育機関におけるブロックチェーン教育と活用を支援 https://www.cac.co.jp/trends/trend20.html ＜CACが自社開発・提案しているプロダクト＞ ・エンゲージメントトークンプラットフォーム「KOUKA」 https://www.cac.co.jp/product/kouka/ ★社内トークン付与・ピアボーナス支給！ ・準天頂衛星システムみちびきを活用したブロックチェーンによる配達員保険システム https://www.cac.co.jp/news/topics_210902.html 【対象となる方(概要)】 学歴不問 【対象となる方(詳細)】 ＜応募資格/応募条件＞ ■必須条件： Webアプリケーション業務開発経験3年以上（Java／JavaScript） ■歓迎条件： ・エンタープライズ向けブロックチェーン開発経験（HyperledgerFabric／Enterprise Ethereum／Corda） ※ブロックチェーンに留まらず他のDX要素を活かせるエンジニア（データサイエンティスト、IoT技術者など）やビジネス推進者も歓迎します。（実績により、応募資格は不問） 【勤務地】 ＜勤務地詳細＞ 本社 住所：東京都中央区日本橋箱崎町24-1

勤務地最寄駅：東京メトロ半蔵門線／水天宮前駅 受動喫煙対策：屋内全面禁煙 【アクセス】 ＜勤務地補足＞ 配属された部署、プロジェクトにより客先常駐（東京近郊）の可能性もございます。 ＜転勤＞ 当面なし 転勤は当面想定していません。 ＜在宅勤務・リモートワーク＞ 相談可 ＜オンライン面接＞ 可 【住所設定】 本社／東京都中央区日本橋箱崎町24-1 [最寄り駅]水天宮前駅 【勤務時間】 ＜労働時間区分＞ フレックスタイム制（フルフレックス） 休憩時間：60分（12:00～13:00） 時間外労働有無：有 ＜標準的な勤務時間帯＞ 9:00～17:30 【就業時間補足】 ＜その他就業時間補足＞ ※No残業Day（毎週水曜日）※コアタイム無し、1日の最小の就業時間3時間45分 【雇用形態】 正社員 【期間】 ＜雇用形態補足＞ 期間の定め：無 ＜試用期間＞ 3ヶ月 【給与】 ＜予定年収＞ 500万円～800万円 ＜賃金形態＞ 月給制 ＜賃金内訳＞ 月額（基本給）：257,000円～ 固定残業手当/月：75,000円～（固定残業時間35時間0分/月） 超過した時間外労働の残業手当は追加支給 ＜月給＞ 332,000円～（一律手当を含む） ＜昇給有無＞ 有 ＜残業手当＞ 有 ＜給与補足＞ ※給与詳細は、経験・スキルに応じて決定します。 ■昇給：年1回（4月）

■賞与：年3回（6月・12月・3月） 記載金額は選考を通じて上下する可能性があります。 月給(月額)は固定手当を含みます。 【待遇・福利厚生 各種制度】 通勤手当、健康保険、厚生年金保険、雇用保険、労災保険、厚生年金基金、退職金制度 ＜各手当・制度補足＞ 通勤手当：交通費全額支給 社会保険：各種社会保険を完備 厚生年金基金：補足事項なし 退職金制度：補足事項なし ＜定年＞ 60歳 ＜教育制度・資格補助補足＞ ■階層別研修、ビジネス研修、役職者研修、メンター制度、キャリア面談、技術クラスタ活動、e-Learning、OJT ■資格取得奨励金制度 ＜その他補足＞ ■企業年金基金、社員持株制度、慶弔見舞金、財形貯蓄、持株会 ■提携保養所（神奈川／箱根、千葉／浦安、長野／軽井沢など）、契約リゾート ■社内サークル、ビジネスカジュアル（通年） ■定期健康診断、団体生命保険、団体長期障害所得補償保険、メンタルヘルス相談 ■祝い金（結婚3万円、出産1万円） ■産前産後・育児休業、介護休業（育休・産休の取得率・復帰率100％） ■在宅勤務（テレワーク※一部導入）、社内公認資格（報奨金）制度 【休日・休暇 その他】 完全週休2日制（休日は土日祝日） 年間有給休暇13日～40日（下限日数は、入社半年経過後の付与日数となります） 年間休日日数124日 夏季休暇（3日間）、年末年始（12/30～1/4）、有給休暇（取得率63.0%）、慶弔休暇、特別休暇（結婚休暇5日間、出産休暇2日間）、連続休暇9日間（年末年始、GW以外で） 【事業概要】 ■事業内容： システム構築サービス、システム運用管理サービス、BPO／BTOサービス ■事業の特徴： 企業の情報化戦略・計画に関するコンサルティングからシステムの設計・構築・導入・運用管理・保守まで、情報システムに関する一貫したサービスを提供しています。また、ITを活用し、企業のビジネスプロセスを遂行するBPO／BTOサービスを提供しています。 【郵便番号】 1030015 【所在地】 東京都中央区日本橋箱崎町24-1 【設立年 補足】 2014年4月 【従業員数】 1,069名 【市場】 非上場 【資本金】 400百万円 【売上高】 26,817百万円 【平均年齢】 43.4歳 【HPリンク先】 http://www.cac.co.jp/ 【応募方法】

241 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Spain (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/).

243 --> Character and Metaverse Producer
Dimension Studio
London, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
Job Title: Character and Metaverse Producer

Location: Wimbledon, London (hybrid)

Salary: £45k - £60k

Benefits: Cycle-to-work scheme, private healthcare, 25 days, bank holiday plus your birthday off, plenty of flexibility, parental packages, sabbatical after 5 years of service, fun socials, and more!

About Dimension

Dimension provides revolutionary volumetric and real-time production studios for the creation of next generation Virtual Production, Digital Humans, and XR content, VFX and games. As a Character and Metaverse Producer, you will be based in our London production studio, but we also have another production studio in Newcastle, and mobile production stages that operate worldwide, helping us achieve our goal of shaping the future of virtual entertainment.

Our recent productions include: Coldplay x BTS ‘My Universe’, Sam Smith ‘Diamonds’, Balenciaga 'Afterworld’, Sky Sport ‘The Hundred’, Madonna at The Billboard Music Awards, Bullet Train, Disney ‘Pinocchio’, Sky Scope for Sky Sports, the War of the Worlds Immersive Experience, and Britannia VR. As a Character and Metaverse Producer you will be taking part in new amazing projects like these!

The Character and Metaverse Producer with VFX or games experience will join our team of 90 curious and creative minds and will be involved in the virtual production and VFX work we do with some of the world's most exciting brands, media and entertainment companies. We offer a competitive salary and a range of other benefits including flexible hours, as well as unrivalled access to on set experience. We encourage applications from people of diverse backgrounds.

Character And Metaverse Producer Role Summary

Dimension is looking for a Character and Metaverse Producer to join the production team, and help us deliver industry leading digital humans, VR experiences, and Web 3 content. Utilising our 3 capture studios for volumetric video and avatar, and working with our growing team of character artists, you’ll be leading projects for some of the world's most respected brands and entertainment studios, creating characters that span mixed reality performances, immersive experiences, metaverse content, and film and TV. This is a truly exciting role sitting within our current team of 3 producers, a PC, and a Production Assistant, reporting directly into the Senior Producer and Head of Production.

Responsibilities For The Character And Metaverse Producer

Create pitch documentation, to include budgets, Schedules, and SOW’s.
Manage multiple projects from pre-production to delivery, ensuring production pipelines are carried out effectively on all projects.
An in depth technical understanding of our character pipelines (training on specifics to be provided).
Hold sprint planning and sprint review sessions.
Run dailies with artists and animators, tracking progress throughout the life of your projects.
Ensure projects are well documented and offer visibility across the team of artists and management.
Working closely with the On Set Services team to ensure capture days run smoothly.
Track resources against budget.
Creation of cost reports.
Manage and interface with clients and partners.
Communicate and mitigate any project risks or issues with the Senior Producer and other appropriate team members.
Effectively manage project-based staffing needs and budget plans.
Ensure the high quality standards and expectations of the Dimension studio are met across all projects.

Desired Skills and Experience
Requirements For The Character And Metaverse Producer

This position will require you to manage the production process through pitching, data capture, to final delivery. You’ll ideally have on set experience, have proven experience managing clients through complex productions, and be familiar with industry standard processes around animation, avatars, and 3D assets, within either the games or VFX industry.

Solid experience communicating with artists, programmers and other team members.
Excellent leadership, organisational and problem solving skills.
Ability to work strategically across multiple deliveries.
You are highly self-motivated and collaborative.
You are constantly striving to learn and improve your skills.

Desirable Experience For The Character And Metaverse Producer

5yrs experience as a Producer within post production VFX or gaming.
Proven experience putting pitch docs together.
A good understanding of 3D pipelines (preferably for the creation of digital humans), and 3D file formats.
On set experience.
Experience within a post production or gaming production environment.
Knowledge of animation pipelines including mo-cap.

If you have worked as a Producer in production or post production VFX or gaming, and this sounds like you, please click apply! If you are not sure, feel free to contact us on hr@dimensionstudio.co and we will do our best to help.
