244 --> Visual Localization Co-op
Nokia
New Providence, NJ (On-site)
Position: Visual Localization Co-op

Duration: 3 months+

Date: Jan 3rd to May 26th,2023

Location: Flexible (Onsite/ Hybrid/ Virtual)

Come create the technology that helps the world act together

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work.

The team you'll be part of

Bell Labs

Nokia Bell Labs is the world-renowned research arm of Nokia, having invented many of the foundational technologies that underpin information and communications networks and all digital devices and systems. This research has produced nine Nobel Prizes, five Turing Awards and numerous other awards.

Education Recommendations

Currently a candidate for Master’s/PhD degree in Aeronautical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics, Systems Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Embedded systems, Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field with an accredited school in US.

What You Will Learn And Contribute To

A core service for the Industrial Metaverse is pose estimation, in which the location and orientation of physical objects such as robots, people, tools, walls are determined with respect to the environment’s reference frame. We are interested in developing vision-based techniques for robust object pose estimation in dynamic environments to enable applications such as autonomous robot/drone navigation and 3D physical modeling. Our collaborative work process combines algorithm development, system-level design, and hands-on experimentation to develop end-to-end prototypes that operate robustly in the real world.

As part of our team, you will:
Perform research and design algorithms for vision-based object pose estimation and associated applications.
Implement and optimize algorithms in Python or C/C++ code
Characterize the performance of algorithms in real-world industrial environments using cameras mounted on robots and drones.
Collaborate with a wider team of engineers to integrate and refine solutions.

What Is Nokia Looking For From Me

You have:
Practical experience programming in Python (preferred), C/C++ or Matlab.
Expert experience in computer vision and related applications such as structure-from-motion, visual-inertial odometry, and visual simultaneous localization and mapping.
Experience with machine learning techniques related to computer vision such as semantic segmentation, object detection and classification.
Strong mathematical background with ability to learn and apply new technical concepts.
Desire to collaborate with a globally disperse team and possessing excellent interpersonal and communication skills.
Demonstrated ability to drive, influence, and implement new ideas.

It would be nice if you also had:
Familiarity with adjacent technologies such as wireless networking and communications, cybersecurity, 3D gaming engines, and user interface design.

Why we're awesome

Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered.

Company Culture: We believe our people are our greatest asset and we aim to foster a fun, challenging, positive, and inclusive work environment. We offer 1-on-1 mentorship, learning and development opportunities, global impact and interaction, and flexible work/life balance.

Meaningful Co-op Term: During your co-op term, you will have the opportunity to test out the latest technologies and work on innovative projects that could leave a global impact. You get to use skills learned in the classroom and apply it to real work situations while gaining professional hands-on experience.

Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality:
One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere
Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg
Workplace Pride Global Benchmark
LGBT+ equality & best place to work by HRC Foundation

At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people.

Nokia’s employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect.

As a federal contractor & pursuant to Presidential Exec. Order 14042, Nokia mandates for all employees a COVID-19 vaccination or an approved religious or medical accommodation.

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

See you this Spring 2023

We're proudly Rainbow Tick certified and champion diversity of thought, perspective, and background. We offer a friendly and open environment with leading flexible working practices that help people maintain a personal and professional balance that works for them and their whānau.

Ko tō tūranga – your role
As we reimagine how technology connects us, a fundamental element is the endpoints/devices we interact with. This no longer just means a tablet, laptop, or mobile, but more immersive experiences through our meeting spaces, or within the metaverse through VR and AR.


The Endpoint Specialist role predominantly works alongside our account teams to bring specialized endpoint consulting skills to maximize revenue opportunities by providing customer-facing in-depth business expertise and guidance.

Ability to take ownership of deal closure, present, demonstrate, document, and provide thought leadership and stakeholder management in large or complex solution sales.
Presales and technical architecture for a wide range of Microsoft services including Microsoft 365, Intune, Microsoft Endpoint Manager, and Windows 10, Microsoft Teams.
Practical experience in consulting, implementation, integration, and migration of customer legacy environments to the Cloud is also essential for this role. The role requires an ability to be the interface between relationship-building and their chosen technologies.
Ability to manage and modify client expectations and resolve conflict.
Knowledge of authentication mechanisms and how they are used by devices or contractors for secure onboarding of devices.

Nā mātou te rourou – what you’ll get
Vodafone is leading the way by ensuring you can have a truly balanced life. Most roles allow flexibility to work from home and flex your hours to ensure you have time for those priorities outside of work.
A fully subsidized Southern Cross Regular Care policy, which usually covers 80% of health expenses up to the policy limit, to provide health insurance cover for you and your family.
4% KiwiSaver employer contributions, an extra 1% more than the statutory minimum. You choose how to save for your Retirement either via KiwiSaver(KS) or SuperCash (superannuation allowance as a cash allowance paid with your salary). You can change between these at any time.
Laptop, unlimited data plan, market-leading cell phone for business or personal use
Discounts on Vodafone products, services, and much more!

At Vodafone, we have a clear purpose to unlock the magic of technology to create an awesome Aotearoa. We’ve got Heart, showing up as our best selves in every situation. We have the Grit to deliver a radically better world for our customers. We embrace the Freedom to shape the future, creating a more progressive, more inclusive Aotearoa”

You will be specifically involved in the development of digital and information technologies, infrastructure and services. The role holder identify and research technologies, approaches and perform experiments and demonstrations to prove the concept, technology and value of cloud native computing within the Air Labs environment before readying them for adoption for production and scale. Technology areas will include, but not be limited to cloud compute infrastructure, containerisation, cyber security, AI and ML, big data, IoT, digital twins, systems integration, real-time and stream analytics, XR and the metaverse. The role holder and will work with other parts of the IM&T Function and operation to ensure there is a clear technology strategy and direction created and communicated, with specific alignment into Capability Planning, Architecture, Engineering and Service Management, also with Group CTO and CIO Offices.

249 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Romania (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

251 --> IP Analyst (Hybrid/Remote)
Utopia Music
London, England, United Kingdom (Hybrid)
WELCOME TO UTOPIA

Music is incredible. It can excite hundreds, and unite thousands. But as an industry, it has been slow, complicated, and disparate. While the tech world has moved into the future, the music industry continues to be shaped by inefficient systems of the past. At Utopia we believe there is a better way. Which is why today we are setting out to transform the entire industry; creating new revenue streams, consolidating the data and decluttering the admin. Unlocking the industry’s full potential by unifying it all in one truly holistic space. Some might call that a Utopia.

Funnily enough, so do we. Welcome to Utopia. Where music lives.

WHAT UTOPIANS DO

The open secret is that the music industry is struggling with the very basics of music accounting: What was played, when and where? Who should get paid and how much?
Utopia Music is bridging the data gap by connecting global consumption, accurate metadata, and fast payments to an industry-wide trust platform. Our goal is to unlock creative value and enable Fair Pay For Every Play to make a better world for Music. The solutions we offer do not threaten to usurp the role of industry incumbents - it is about bringing transparency in the industry and supporting efficient royalty collection for all.

THE ROLE

As IP Analyst, you will work on the first line, advising on all matters relating to IP landscaping and provide regular IP reports to different business and functions. As a key member of the BA – Intellectual Property team you will be a cornerstone in achieving Utopia’s objective to Gain the Trust of the Industry, and will collaborate closely with our Strategy and Business Units.
You will be a key player, a strategic business partner providing IP searches and analysis to enable effective and informed decision making within Utopia Group.

You will collaborate closely with our inventor’s community to develop a first class WW IP portfolio, and with our Business Analysts to provide insights on dynamic market changes within the competition and other insights that positively impact business decisions and strategy, by ensuring all competitive IP intelligence is available and easily accessible to key customers, partners and other stakeholders.

RESPONSIBILITIES

In this position, you will be primarily accountable for consistently and effectively:

Developing and delivering regular analysed IP data, insights and reports, including competitor IP landscapes, threat assessments, strength positioning, etc.
Conducting IP landscape evaluations to identify trends in a technology field, deliver IP competitive intelligence, identify potential new research areas, licensing and acquisition opportunities
Preparing search reports and IP landscaping analysis and share with key stakeholders adapting the content to the audience
Acting in providing support to develop and maintain a first class World Wide IP Portfolio
Provide technical research and analysis with respect to patentability, validity, freedom-to-operate, infringement, monitoring of the competitive landscape in different technological areas
Prepare search strategies to identify relevant patent and scientific literature in a given technology domain, and subsequent analysis
Identify and report innovations in a specific technology domain through analysis of patent, product, and academic literature
Provide support in assisting inventors with invention disclosure forms, refining/pivoting inventions if/when needed
Assisting Business Units with innovation capture
Review and provide technical analysis related to patent applications search reports.

REQUIREMENTS

At least 3 years in similar roles with competitive intelligence and IP search - with advanced degree required in Electrical/Data Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field
Patent/IP Agent/Scientific /Business Analyst - experience in search and patent literature
Experience with patent related databases and proven experience in the patent searcher field is preferable
Technical background/knowledge in data and databases, signal processing, music industry, gaming industry, new technologies (blockchain, metaverse, Big Data management, etc.)
Proficient in MS Office including Word, Excel and PowerPoint
Fluent in English, additional languages are a plus!
Experience leading actionable and cross-functional strategic workshops.

WHAT WE OFFER
Great atmosphere - we live, love & breathe music & tech!
Working in an impact oriented team and inclusive company culture.
An experienced team to learn from, with proven track records in multiple startups and big tech companies.
Our flexible remote policy provides Utopians the freedom to work either from one of our inspiring offices or from home.
We celebrate being an international and multicultural company.
Competitive benefits; packages depend on location. You’ll be given more details on this during the interview process.
We are recruiting across the following of our European locations for this role (UK, Sweden, Switzerland, Finland, Spain, Germany) and can therefore only move forward with applications from those already based in these locations and with eligibility to work in the country you are based in.

THE HIRING PROCESS
You send us your CV in English
We invite you for an introductory video call with the Talent Acquisition team to get to know you better and share more about us
We invite you for a video interview with our head of IP and Licensing
We kindly ask that you complete a assignment at home to be presented and discussed during a final interview with the team.
UTOPIANS

As we want to bring transparency, trust, and clarity to the music industry we serve, we know a change comes from within. Utopia is a transparent, trust-based organization striving to have clarity in thinking and doing what we set out to do.

We execute urgently and innovate to grow faster. We ship things that make a difference today, so we can make them better tomorrow. We embrace fairness and are all accountable.

Strictly diverse and inclusive. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We celebrate our diverse backgrounds and we welcome everyone who identifies with the above to apply. Welcome to Utopia - Where Music Lives!

We’re eager to meet You! :)

EnergyLab

Nuestro empresa se dedica al desarrollo de herramientas y soluciones digitales para las empresas, a fin de facilitar sus procesos de transición energética, gestión de residuos e integración del cambio climático en sus procesos. Somos un grupo joven, comprometido y responsable, que buscamos entregar soluciones dinámicas, ágiles y de rápida implementación.

Funciones del cargo

Mejora de las funcionalidades existentes y desarrollo de nuevas funcionalidades para los distintos sistemas y soluciones desarrollados por EnergyLab, ligados al monitoreo de la huella de carbono, huella hídrica, gestión de residuos y trazabilidad digital de distintos tipos de activos ambientales (bonos de carbono, certificados de energía renovables, hidrógeno verde, certificados blancos, azules, etc.).

Funciones

Desarrollo de aplicaciones web para el despliegue de gráficos y paneles de administración, a partir de información obtenida desde bases de datos SQL, Metaverse y otros.
Desarrollo de workers para el procesamiento periódico de información.
Integración con otras aplicaciones mediante web APIs.
Desarrollo de web APIs.
Web scraping.
Documentación de funcionalidades existentes.
Mantención del sistema y soporte a usuarios.

Requerimientos del cargo

Tecnologías Utilizadas Que Esperamos Que Sepas

C# ASP .NET 6, siguiendo el patrón MVC.
Bases de datos SQL (entre otras).
JavaScript (JQuery, AlpineJS).
CSS (Bootstrap 4, sass).

Opcionales

Contratos inteligentes en solidity
Diversos frameworks de PHP

Condiciones

Gran oportunidad para vincular tecnología con la transición energética y ecológica, además de vincularse con soluciones tecnológicas ligadas a internet de las cosas (IoTs), blockchain e inteligencia artificial.

255 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Russia (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/).

Coordinates with BI to leverage qualitative and quantitative data to optimize, iterate, and tune features and content that they are responsible for.
Jumps into problem spaces to help create quick solutions or support existing development projects.

Ability to reference mechanics, controls, and other elements from other F2P games.
Proven record of creative problem solving; knows how to take a concept from other games and translate it into a solution for your project.
Must be data literate and understand how KPIs translate into design solutions.
Strong knowledge of retention, engagement, monetization, and how to design for different player segments.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to pitch complex ideas to a non-design audience and get buy-in.
Takes accountability and ownership of designs from start to finish.
Problem solver, results-oriented, self-motivated and disciplined.
Able to multi-task like a pro.
Ability to take direction and feedback

Description And Requirements

Lenovo is seeking an experienced Device as a Service (DaaS) Solution Architect who will develop comprehensive, creative, and cost-effective services solutions for our customers within a Device as a Service model.

Your role will be to evaluate customer opportunities as presented in, RFPs/RFQs or engagements, from the Services Sales teams and use this information to develop solutions to meet customers’ requirements. Lenovo DaaS solutions may incorporate one or more lifecycle services including plan, configure, deploy, support, manage, and/or retire stages. You will collaborate with internal teams and Lenovo Services delivery partners, as well as travel to facilitate workshops with customers for scoping requirements.

Your other responsibilities include:

to partner across multiple organizations including, but not limited to, sales; finance; service delivery; customers, and business partners, and is expected to lead all elements of the services solution governance from the project kickoff; stakeholder coordination, and end solution strategy.
to contribute to customer presentations and briefings, provide input during deal qualification reviews, and prepare content for solution reviews with key stakeholders as required. Upon award, the DaaS Solution Architect is responsible for the development of an SOW contract with the customer as well as with any selected business partners, which includes negotiation with the partner and the customer to ensure that requirements are explicitly documented to mitigate risk.
to promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

Travel estimated at 10%

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

Roles and Responsibilities: *
As a Unity engineer, you will develop Unity features, develop APIs, and implement SDKs. You will add new assets (e.g. avatars, avatar motions, digital apparels, light effects, and fireworks). You will improve the app performance on slow wifi connections, spatial sound for voice chat, joystick responses, camera movement/angle, zoom in/out, friend requests, community chat and post, and address book.

You will also help optimize our tools, pipelines, shaders, texture resolutions, reflection probe, lightmaps, and artworks for our virtual concerts in the most efficient and effective way possible. You will do the build in Unity and test in multiple devices and environment to further optimize our user experience in different environment and devices.

262 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] Game System Design (2년 이상)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

콘텐츠 크리에이터나 브랜드 및 IP 홀더들이 쉽고 자유로운 샌드박스 툴을 이용해 콘텐츠를 제작, 이용자들은 다양한 콘텐츠를 향유하고 거래 및 소유할 수 있는 신규 메타버스 프로젝트

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
기반 시스템 및 컨텐츠 시스템 디자인
툴을 활용한 프로토 타입 제작
유관부서 커뮤니케이션

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
게임 및 IT 서비스에 대한 개발 경험
시스템 분석 및 설계능력
원활한 커뮤니케이션 능력

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
메타버스 플랫폼에 대한 이해
툴을 활용한 게임 등의 컨텐츠 제작 경험
최신 트렌드에 대한 지속적인 관심

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

BE BOLD, LEARN AND WIN! 크래프톤의 성장과 도전의 스토리를 알아가고 싶다면?

▶ 크래프톤 제작 스튜디오 ▶ 크래프톤 게임

▶ 크래프톤 비전 & 핵심가치 ▶ 크래프톤 라이프 & 복리후생

▶ 크래프톤 공식 유튜브 채널 ▶ 배틀그라운드 공식 유튜브 채널

▶ 크래프톤 인스타그램 ▶ 크래프톤 블로그

263 --> Evaluation de la plateforme Nvidia Omniverse couplée à Unity 3D H/F
CEA
Palaiseau, Île-de-France, France (On-site)
Le LSI développe des briques de simulation physique interactive regroupées au sein du moteur physique XDE. Ces briques permettent la simulation de robots, de machines complexes, de mannequins numériques, et sont utilisées dans des buts de conception des postes de travail, de formation en réalité virtuelle et d'évaluation des postes.

Le moteur physique XDE est basé sur une architecture client - serveur lui permettant de communiquer avec des processus extérieurs, comme des contrôleurs de robots, des automates ou des périphériques de capture de mouvements. XDE est également exposé dans la plateforme Unity3D pour la mise en place de démonstrateurs complexes en réalité virtuelle et en réalité mixte.

Depuis quelques années, les simulations collaboratives en réalité virtuelle deviennent de plus en plus courantes, avec de multiples acteurs et le développement de nouvelles technologies autour du metaverse et des avatars. Notamment, la plateforme Omniverse de Nvidia est de plus en plus mise en avant pour prôner l'interopérabilité de différents applicatifs et le développement du metaverse.

Le but du stage sera dans un premier temps de prendre en main et d'évaluer la plateforme Omniverse de Nvidia. Le stage devra ensuite utiliser et évaluer le connecteur Unity 3D pour Omniverse. Enfin, le stage devra évaluer la possibilité d'intégration du moteur XDE au sein de la plateforme Omniverse et proposer un premier prototype d'implémentation.

Le stage comporte une phase de bibliographie, une phase de prise en main des outils du laboratoire, une phase d'évaluation et une phase d’implémentation d'un prototype.

Moyens / Méthodes / Logiciels

Simulation numérique, Réalité virtuelle, Langage C++/C#, Plateforme Unity 3D, Omniverse

Profil du candidat

Ingénieur, Master 2

Localisation du poste

Site

Saclay

Localisation du poste

France, Ile-de-France, Essonne (91)

Ville

Palaiseau

Critères candidat

Diplôme préparé

Bac+5 - Master 2

Possibilité de poursuite en thèse

Oui

Demandeur

Disponibilité du poste

02/01/2023

265 --> Lecturer in Visualisation
King's College London
Tottenham, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
As part of its strategic development, the Department of Informatics is seeking applications from candidates for the position of Lecturer in Visualization for AI and Data Science, starting in January 2023, or as soon as possible thereafter.

The successful applicant for this post is a computer scientist who will undertake research in the area of Visualization for AI and Data Science. They will be assigned to teach on modules on postgraduate and undergraduate degree programmes offered by the Department of Informatics, and will be expected to supervise both undergraduate and postgraduate projects.

The Department seeks to broaden and deepen its current strengths in this area, so all candidates engaged in research and teaching that add to the expertise of the existing members of the Department will be considered favourably. Topics of interest in Visualization for AI and Data Science include, but are not limited to: human data interfaces and human AI interfaces (HDI and HAI), the Metaverse, Digital Twins, 3D graphics and advanced rendering, the application of interactive AR/VR hardware, psychophysics of human perception and cognition and interdisciplinary visualization methods including urban informatics visualization.

The successful candidate will be given the opportunity to join the most relevant group, will be expected to contribute to the departmental hubs, and contribute to the Centre for Doctoral Training in Safe and Trusted Artificial Intelligence. Research collaboration across research groups, departmental hubs and with other Departments in the Faculty and across the College is strongly encouraged.

Our staff and students come from all over the world, and the Department is proud of its friendly and inclusive culture. Diversity is positively encouraged with a number of family-friendly policies, including the operation of a core hours policy, the right to apply for flexible working and support for staff returning from periods of extended absence, for example maternity leave. The Department of Informatics is committed to ensuring an inclusive interview process and will reimburse up to £250 towards any additional care costs (for a dependent child or adult) incurred as a result of attending an interview for this position.

Applicants must have a PhD in a relevant area, an excellent publication record, and the ability to attract research funding. It is essential that applicants have the enthusiasm and commitment required to contribute to the further development of the research standing of the Department of Informatics, and to make a full contribution to teaching and administrative activities.

For further information about the Department of Informatics at King’s, please see https://nms.kcl.ac.uk/luc.moreau/informatics/overview.pdf.

We provide the unique technology and services that enable this new form of cloud-based, live broadcast entertainment to be built on any of the top game engines and run on all major streaming platforms.

We believe viewers love live events, love communal experiences, and love when their participation matters. We believe the Metaverse is coming, and we’re already helping build its foundation.

We exist to power the next generation of these experiences — across gaming, sports and TV.

Our rapidly expanding workforce is composed of veterans from the video game and broader technology industries, with offices around the world. The Genvid team is extremely diverse, forward thinking, creative, and collaborative. We solve thorny problems quickly, reinvent the rules when necessary, and take pride in blazing new trails with major partners in the tech, social media, film and television, and pop culture sectors.

Our Solution:

Genvid Technologies is changing the face of the multi-billion-dollar livestreaming market through its proprietary technologies and related services, bringing real-time, interactive experiences to viewers of all kinds of broadcast content - even creating entirely new game-like experiences such as the recent Facebook Watch exclusive Rival Peak. With successive investment rounds in place, our well-funded company continues to grow quickly: we expect to triple in size over the next few years. Genvid’s clients include the biggest game publishers in the world, as well as video game engine creators, game consoles, streaming platforms, indie developers, Hollywood studios and other major IP holders.

Be part of the revolution of interactive broadcasting!

Full Stack Developer:

We are looking for a seasoned full-stack developer with an interest in building the next generation of gaming. Our focus is on building solutions for our valued partners, including media companies, game publishers, game engine and console creators, streaming platforms, and independent game developers. In this high-impact role, you will work directly with our partners to understand their needs, propose solutions, create requirements, and deliver the next Genvid MILE. This position will be 100% remote; however, due to the tax status of Genvid, we are only able to hire remote employees who currently reside in the following locations: California, Washington, Texas, New York.

Projects you might work on during your first 6 months:

Our first MILE featuring a globally renowned world and characters, The Walking Dead: Last Mile , releasing this summer.
Our super social iteration of the world’s most popular arcade classic, Pac-Man Community with over 4 million players already and counting.
One or more of the four other MILEs currently in our pipeline – each featuring a well established franchise from film, TV, comic books or video games.

Some of the responsibilities you’ll find in this position as a member of a MILE team:

You’ll understand the architecture and implementation of the Genvid stack.
You’ll contribute in researching, analyzing, designing, building, scaling, and supporting the integration of our technology.
You’ll propose solutions for building our projects considering development, performance, and security best practices to integrate with third party tools and provide backend support.
You’ll work together with other frontend and full-stack developers to build interactive HTML, JavaScript, and CSS components for a new Genvid MILE.
You’ll create minigames, achievement systems, and UI overlays in React that integrate seamlessly with client products.
You’ll use appropriate methods and engineering best practices to deliver quality code, test and troubleshoot reported issues, and ensure bugs are swiftly addressed.
You’ll work within an agile development environment and think holistically with Technical Project Managers, Producers, and Software Managers.
You’ll have a voice in team improvement meetings, process iteration discussions, best practices definitions, and contribute to development design patterns in an effort to continuously improve our team and process.
You’ll collaborate with multiple external individuals including our external development partners, internal designers and creative directors, deployment team, live operations team, and QA.

Education & Experience:

Bachelor's Degree or equivalent industry experience
5+ years experience in web application development
Experience with JavaScript and/or Typescript, Node.js
Experience with a JavaScript library/framework such as React, Angular, or Vue
Expert level knowledge of a backend language such as Python, C#
Experience in NoSQL database design and management including schema, interface, and capacity scaling
Competent understanding and experience with cloud services, cloud infrastructure and implementation such as AWS, Azure, or GCE
Competent understanding of containerized environments and CI/CD automated deployment principles
Competent knowledge of network security principles
Experienced in technical writing, including functional specifications, software diagrams, and technical documentation
Keen attention to detail and delivering high-quality work
Ability to work as a member of a development team
Strong creative and analytical problem solving skills

271 --> Cloud Developer
Atlas Copco
Antwerp, Flemish Region, Belgium (On-site)
The Role

Do you like to program cloud native applications?

Atlas Copco CT is a worldwide producer of compressed air solutions: compressors, dryers, gas generators, ….

A lot of these machines are today connected such that we receive a continuous stream of data about their running parameters and conditions.

Based on engineering knowledge and data analysis we are creating models to mimics the machines and determine which components need maintenance and when. To operationalize these models, we are investing in a cloud native architecture.

We need your help to write the services to run in this environment.

Do you like to collaborate with data scientists and engineers?

At Atlas Copco engineers and data scientist work together to build mathematical and statistical models to simulate how machines work and components degrade.

These “digital twins” help us to improve machine design and maintenance. After creation, these models need to be deployed on large scale with high reliability.

Within the cloud native development team your focus will be on developing, deploying and maintain programs to execute predictive maintenance.

Do you want to grow with us in the exciting new world of the industrial metaverse? Together we will be building up our infrastructure and deepen our competences to explore new possibilities.

If you like to work in a modern cloud set-up within an international context as well as enjoy being part of a small, enthusiastic team, we encourage you to apply.

What we expect of you?

Hard Skills
Software engineering experience in designing and developing software in C#, .Net Core & .Net Freamework, Azure, MVC, Asp.net Core/ WebAPI.
Understanding and experience in designing, implementing and deploying cloud enabled solutions on Microsoft Azure platforms using Azure Technologies (App Services, Azure Function, Azure SQL, etc.)
Experience with RESTful Web Services, Services Oriented architectures (SOA), Domain Driven Design (DDD) (HUGE Plus!)
A good knowledge of English is a must
The ideal candidate has a university degree in information technology (IT)
Soft Skills
You are result oriented and quality focused, both in terms of deliveries and processes
You work in an international environment and you will be communicating with our internal stakeholders
You can work independently towards the achievement of your goals
You are motivated in improving the way we do things
Strong analytical, problem solving and organizational skills
What you can expect from us?

Atlas Copco is a Swedish company. The Swedish human culture still runs through the veins of our 38,000 employees in more than 90 countries.

It has a strong family feeling with a warm respect for every individual and we strive for strong diversity. We also invest heavily in our customers, in the environment, ... but first and foremost in our own people.

In this way, we provide a stimulating environment in which you can develop your competencies daily. Moreover, our family work atmosphere gives you the flexibility to find an optimal balance between work and private life.

Would you like to get to know us? We hope to see you soon!

Start a journey towards something greater

At Atlas Copco we believe in challenging the status quo, always looking for a better way. Our caring culture and leading-edge technology enable us to innovate for a sustainable future. With us you become part of a global community of passionate people making a tangible impact on people’s lives.

We offer a wide range of interesting job roles and many opportunities to grow. This is where it begins – Join us at the Home of Industrial Ideas.

Du kannst auf eine grosse Anzahl an Leads aufbauen und generierst selber neue Leads.
Du entwickelst eigenverantwortlich Vertriebsaktivitäten und übernimmst den ganzen Verkaufsprozess über die Angebotserstellung, Verhandlung bis zum Vertragsabschluss.
Du präsentierst unsere weltweit einzigartige Lösung überzeugend auf Roadshows, Fachmessen und Seminaren.
Du erkennst und erschliesst aufgrund deiner Markt- und Wettbewerbsbeobachtungen neue Potenziale und arbeitest proaktiv mit externen und internen Partnern zusammen.
Mittelfristig baust du ein schlagkräftiges Verkaufsteam Deutschland auf.

Das macht dich zum idealen Kandidaten
Du hast schon B2B Vertriebserfahrung in einem Start-up und dabei überdurchschnittliche Erfolge erzielt.
Du interessierst dich fürs Metaverse, begeisterst dich für modernste Technologien und hast vielleicht auch schon Kontakt mit der virtuellen Realität gehabt.
Du bist reisefreudig, kontaktstark und eloquent in Wort und Schrift.
Du bist ein Organisationstalent und besitzt eine gesunde Portion Selbstbewusstsein.
Es motiviert dich, mit einem revolutionären Produkt Gutes für deine Kunden, die Gesellschaft und die Umwelt zu leisten.
Erfahrungen und Netzwerke in der Architektur-, Bau- und Immobilienbranche erleichtern deinen Einstieg.

Unsere Werte & was du sonst noch erwarten kannst
Fair - Wir haben Spass, bei dem, was wir tun. Wir haben ein gutes Gewissen, bei dem, was wir getan haben. Denn wir entscheiden konsequent, fair und unvoreingenommen aufgrund bestem Wissen und Erfahrung. Wir sind fair gegenüber allen Stakeholdern und der Umwelt im Gesamten. Wir sind nachhaltig, weil es unser Geschäftsmodell zulässt und den ökologischen Fussabdruck für alle Beteiligten reduziert.
Authentisch - HEGIAS ist authentisch, weil wir offen und ehrlich über jedes Thema reden können, welches uns auf dem Herzen liegt. Wir pflegen eine direkte und transparente Informationspolitik. Wir sind unvoreingenommen und offen gegenüber allen Menschen. Wir begegnen allen mit Respekt, egal welcher Herkunft, Hautfarbe, Geschlecht, Alter und Position.
Schweizerisch weltoffen - Wir denken strukturiert und erledigen unsere Arbeit präzis, mit Liebe zum Detail. Wir bleiben dabei gestalterisch flexibel und lassen schöpferische Freiheiten zu. Wir sind eine Willensgemeinschaft und handeln zielorientiert und bleiben dennoch stets offen für neue Wege.
Geschichte schreiben - Du hast die Chance, die Erfolgsgeschichte eines Top-Start-ups mitzuschreiben und das Unternehmen massgeblich mitzuprägen.
Weiterbildung - Neben vielen Möglichkeiten der Weiterbildung tauchst du ein in die virtuelle Realität und arbeitest schon bald mit Technologien der Zukunft, von denen andere noch träumen.

Wer braucht deine Verstärkung?
HEGIAS ist ein stark wachsendes, dynamisches Start-up mit derzeit rund 30 Mitarbeitenden, mit Sitz in Zürich und Lugano. Unsere in-house entwickelte Software – HEGIAS VR – ist die weltweit erste cloud-/browserbasierte Lösung für die Visualisierung und Kommunikation mit Virtual Reality in der Planungs-, Bau- und Immobilienbranche. Immobilien können zu jedem Zeitpunkt der Planungs- und Bauphase in der virtuellen Welt von mehreren Personen, ortsunabhängig begangen und besprochen sowie materialisiert und möbliert werden. HEGIAS VR reduziert damit Missverständnisse in der Kommunikation mit dem Bauherrn und allen Anspruchsgruppen, unterstützt den Planungs-, Verkaufs- und Vermietungsprozess von Immobilien wie auch von Einrichtungskonzepten.

--------------------------------------

273 --> Junior Consultant Industrial IoT (d/w/m)
Detecon International 
Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany (On-site)
Das Digital Innovation, Research & Engineering Center ist die umsetzungs-orientierte Innovations- und Digitalisierungseinheit der Detecon International GmbH. Als Innovation Hub stehen wir für die Entwicklung innovativer, zukunftssicherer Lösungen, die für unsere Kunden spürbaren Mehrwert und Wertschöpfung erzielen.

Wir sind Menschen mit Leidenschaft für die Bereiche Co-Innovation, Analytical Intelligence, Industrial IoT und Cyber Security und bilden gemeinsam das Digital Innovation, Research & Engineering Center Team und freuen uns immer über Mitstreiter*Innen die unsere Leidenschaft teilen und mit uns kundenzentrische Innovations- und Digitalisierungsprojekte vorantreiben wollen.

Wir glauben, dass Product & Service Lifecycle Management der nächsten Generation im Ökosystem, kunden-zentrisch, KI-basiert und agil stattfindet. Mit unserem Digital Engineering-Ansatz für Cyber-physische Systeme basierend auf Digital Twins, Digital Threads und Metaverse-Umgebungen sowie für Integrations- und Plattformlösungen unterstützen wir unsere Kunden dabei, den ganzheitlichen Informationsfluss entlang der Produktwertschöpfungskette zu gewährleisten und innovative Use Cases und Funktionalitäten umzusetzen.

Was dich erwartet
Du unterstützt kommerzielle- und Forschungsprojekte zu neuen Technologien und IIoT-Lösungen
Du entwirfst, gemeinsam mit deinem Team, kreative Lösungen, um unseren Kund*innen dabei zu helfen, Ihre Daten Informationen zu verarbeiten sowie einen Business Impact zu generieren
Du erweiterst Deine Expertise in den Bereichen IIoT, Digital Twin, Metaverse, etc. und teilst Dein Wissen mit internen und externen Stakeholdern
Dich erwarten spannende Herausforderungen und Projekte in verschiedenen Branchen, z. B. Manufacturing, Automotive, Smart Cities und viele weitere
Du hilfst mit deinen kreativen & innovativen Ideen dabei, das Portfolio des Digital Engineering Center weiterzuentwickeln

Was wir uns wünschen
Erfolgreicher akademischer Abschluss (MINT bevorzugt)
Erste berufliche Erfahrungen durch relevante Praktika mit IIoT-Fokus
Von Vorteil sind erste Berührungspunkte im Bereich PLM sowie relevanten IoT-Kommunikations-Standards (OPC UA, MQTT)
Erfahrungen im Bau von Demonstratoren, Showcases und Prototypen
Sehr gutes analytisches Denkvermögen, Kreativität, Kommunikationsfähigkeit sowie hohe Kundenorientierung, Teamfähigkeit, Reisebereitschaft und Hands-on-Mentalität
Fähigkeit technische Konzepte einem nicht technisch versierten Publikum nahezubringen
Verhandlungssicher in Deutsch und Englisch

Was wir dir bieten
30+ Urlaubstage
Arbeiten im Home-Office
Echte Analytics / AI-Probleme in Mittelstand bis Großkonzern
Arbeiten in hochmotivierten, innovativen und interdisziplinären Teams
Eine wertschätzende Kultur eingebettet in eine hoch innovative NewWork-Arbeitsumgebung
Steile Lernkurve dank flacher Organisationsstrukturen und exzellenter Trainings- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten
Die Freiheit sich selber Beratungsfeldern zuzuordnen, eigene Themen zu entwickeln und zu treiben
Bestmögliche Vernetzung durch unser Young Consultant Netzwerk und die Betreuung durch Buddy oder Mentor
Corporate Benefits: voller Zugriff auf Sonderkonditionen der Dienstleistungen der Deutschen Telekom AG

Haben wir dein Interesse geweckt?

Dann freuen wir uns darauf, dich kennen zu lernen und deine Bewerbungsunterlagen (CV, Zeugnisse, Gehaltswunsch und mögliches Eintrittsdatum) zu erhalten.

Du hast noch Fragen oder suchst fachspezifische Informationen zur Stelle? Komm gerne jederzeit auf mich zu!
Bei uns sind Bewerbungen aller Menschen willkommen – auch mit Schwerbehinderung, die sich für unsere Aufgaben begeistern und Lust darauf haben, uns mit ihrem Talent weiterzubringen. Das allein zählt und nicht das Alter oder Geschlecht, die Herkunft, Religion oder körperliche Eigenschaften.

274 --> Metaverse Senior Manager
Accenture
Shenzhen, Guangdong, China (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022 (https://www.accenture.com/us-en/insights/technology/technology-trends-2022) .

The Work

You’ll Often Be

Incubating new business value for our clients in the Metaverse. From Multiparty Systems (Blockchain, Tokenization, NFTs) to Extended Reality (Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), and Mixed Reality), you will help clients transform through technology by shaping, leading, and implementing strategic assessments and technology solutions.

Advising our clients on all things Metaverse. From identifying key risks and considerations to identifying and measuring the business value, you will be the trusted advisor for our clients’ C-Suite.

Serving our clients on their innovation journey. Starting with eliminating the market noise, to concepting, to making it real. You will then formulate the approach and deliver measurable business value.

Pioneering the Metaverse by advancing the use of its many building blocks: Multiparty Systems & Blockchain, Extended Reality, Digital Identity, Hardware (AR/VR Goggles & Lenses), Software (Gaming Platforms & Virtual Worlds), etc.

Scanning the Metaverse ecosystem to identify and build relationships with differentiating partners and/or solutions to bring to our clients.

Fortifying Accenture’s Metaverse practice and market position by creating content and taking part in professional forums, both internal and external.

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Required Qualifications
3+ years of relevant experience in virtual reality, mixed reality and other related fields.
5+ years’ demonstrated experience with effective written / spoken communication in English
5+ years’ project management, including coordinating internal and external resources including ecosystem partners, and effectively promoting promote consensus and cooperation among teams and stakeholders
3+ years’ demonstrated experience articulating the value of virtual reality, such as through developing industry POVs and articulate them in an inspiring fashion in front of C-level executives with great story-telling skill.
2+ years’ demonstrated experience implementing basic virtual reality- related projects, with an understanding of user experience
Preferred Qualifications
5+ years of client-facing work experience
Those with virtual reality landing projects are preferred.
Familiar with solution delivery process, tools, and staffing for metaverse or related solutions
Able to conduct medium and long-term business trips

276 --> Senior Streaming Engineer - Volumetric Video
IMVERSE
Greater Rennes Metropolitan Area (Hybrid)
IMVERSE.com, a multi-award winning international company at the forefront of streaming holograms, VR, AR, and metaverse is looking for a Senior Volumetric Video Streaming Software Engineer.

As a Senior Volumetric Video Engineer at IMVERSE France, specialized on streaming, you will acquire a deep understanding of our Volumetric Video pipeline and representation formats, to further develop our current streaming architecture and implement our next streaming, compression, latency, and quality solutions.

You are a natural leader and excellent developer on this domain, with core expertise focused on streaming. You will be supported by the senior management to lead, research, innovate, and implement solutions. In time, you will be leading the collaboration with external partners on volumetric video streaming.

Location: This role is an on-site or hybrid role. Someone based in Rennes is ideal, however, we are open to receiving applications from candidates who are based remote in France, with occasional travel to our offices in Rennes (France) and Morges (Switzerland).

Required Skills:

Proficient in writing C and C++
Deep knowledge of streaming tools (i.e. WebRTC, Mpeg4 compression, server configuration, broadcasting setup, etc.) GPU and CPU encoding/decoding
Able to build a streaming architecture, creation, distribution, rendering, including compression
Successful track record of contributing to streaming solution(s)

Bonus Skills:

Participation in standardization committees (i.e. MPEG, HEVC, etc.)
Previous successful streaming technical lead experience
Experience with Unity3D and Unreal engines

Key Responsibilities:

Designing and implementing our new streaming pipeline
Delivering optimised solutions for the core product within the agreed upon timelines
Once ready, lead the external collaboration for streaming

In the next 6 - 12 months you will:

Thoroughly study our pipelines
Animate the streaming brick: meeting, report, leading
Design and enhance our streaming pipeline
Implement a streaming for 1 to 1 and 1 to N. Followed by focusing on N to N streaming
Optimise the bandwidth, latency, quality for the product
Contribute to patent(s) (if applicable)

277 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Australia (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found (https://consensys.net/careers/best-practices-to-avoid-recruitment-fraud/).

United States (Remote)
Gamium is a Web3 and Metaverse technology company with the vision to lead the change in Human Interactions and the mission to connect Real Humans.

With these goals in mind, Gamium is building the first Decentralized Social Metaverse and the Digital Identity of humans, which includes building different innovative products using blockchain technology and token standards.

Gamium brings hyperrealism to the metaverse, allowing humans to build their Digital Identity and enjoy mindblowing environments. Also, create and evolve their Avatar profile, exchange NFTs, use a decentralized chat, get a job in the metaverse, enjoy immersive experiences, own and customize virtual lands, and socialize & earn in Gamium's 3D World.

To work closely with Product Owners to implement data pools and services.
To be a source of knowledge and guidance to other members of the development pool.

Develop new data pools and enhance existing ones
Be one of our gurus on data acquisition and transformation

Thinking within substantially diversified, established procedures, standards and precedents; generally supervised.

Subject to managerial control and review of results.

Experience in writing tests, both code and data with a strong desire to champion those standards.
Experience with a number of differing data storage solutions, SQL and NoSQL databases, data warehouses, data lakes etc.

Expert in python libraries such as Pandas, Numpy and Tensorflow or Pytorch
Knowledge of asynchronous task libraries, such as Celery.

Full grasp of git
Very good understanding of blockchain technology, including the Ethereum blockchain and smart contracts

Analytical skills
Problem solving skills

Our team loves supporting Veterans and working together to execute our mission! 100% of all contributions go directly to programmatic support. Be a part of the impact.

What You'll Work On
Ongoing marketing strategy support for 10-15 hours over the course of 4 weeks
Support may include: defining your marketing goals, determining the right marketing channels, messaging your program, branding, or defining your target audience
Note: We devised this project to connect nonprofits and volunteers for more flexible, more immediate impact. We strongly suggest you start with 4 weeks and decide from there if you'd like to continue working.
Additional Details
We are hosting our first Metaverse in December and want a marketing strategy for this event to attract participants willing to donate, individual donors to sponsor Veterans, and sponsors.

285 --> PhD Deep interactive control of virtual character's motion based on separating identity, motion and style
InterDigital, Inc.
Rennes, Brittany, France
About InterDigital

InterDigital develops fundamental wireless technologies that are at the core of mobile devices, networks, and services worldwide. We solve many of the industry's most critical and complex technical challenges, providing solutions for more efficient broadband networks and a richer multimedia experience years ahead of market deployment. InterDigital has strategic relationships with many of the world's leading wireless companies. Founded in 1972, InterDigital is listed on NASDAQ and is included in the S&P SmallCap 600 Index.

PhD topic: Deep interactive control of virtual character's motion based on separating identity, motion and style

Competencies

computer animation, deep learning

Description

Character animation has a large set of potential applications, in videogames, movie industry, sports, rehabilitation, ergonomics, training, etc. Most of the available tools to animate virtual humans consist in specifying angular trajectories for each joint of a skeleton. The surface mesh of the character is then computed accordingly, using so-called skinning algorithms. However, being able to capture and reproduce the expressivity of a human motion is difficult, as it involves several subtle parameters, some of them being lost when modeling human performance as joint angles: angles, contacts on the body surface, velocity profiles, accelerations, distance or coordination between body parts, etc. With the development of robust body shape reconstruction based on cheap sensors, such as RGB cameras or depth sensors,directly manipulating the visible surface of the character has become a very active field of research.

With the growing interest in persistent shared virtual worlds, such as the MetaVerse immersive social network, specific problems for character animation raised. Indeed, in these environments, the users are represented by avatars with different shape and morphology. The character animation platform should consequently be able to adapt the motion of the user to this different shape (retargetting problem), or adapt the identity of the avatar to make the user be recognizable by his/her friends, or change the style of the motion to convey a given emotion or adapt to the expecting behavior of the avatar. For example, a Hulk avatar is expecting to move with a specific style, but should also mimic the performance of the user. This PhD topic will investigate deep-learning methods to solve this retargeting problem while controlling the style.

Location: Rennes, France - On Site

InterDigital is an equal employment opportunity employer. InterDigital will not engage in or tolerate unlawful discrimination with regard to any employment decision, policy or practice based on a person’s sex, gender, pregnancy (including childbirth, breastfeeding and related medical conditions), age, race, color, religion, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, military status, veteran status, mental or physical disability, medical condition, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other factor protected by applicable federal, state or local law. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, recruiting, hiring, compensation, benefits, training, assignments, evaluations, coaching, promotion, discipline, discharge and layoff.

______________________________________________________________________________________________________

À propos d'InterDigital

InterDigital développe des technologies sans fil fondamentales qui sont au cœur des appareils mobiles, des réseaux et des services dans le monde entier. Nous résolvons bon nombre des défis techniques les plus critiques et les plus complexes de l'industrie, en proposant des solutions pour des réseaux à large bande plus efficaces et une expérience multimédia plus riche, et ce des années avant le déploiement sur le marché. InterDigital entretient des relations stratégiques avec plusieurs des plus grandes entreprises de services sans fil au monde. Fondée en 1972, InterDigital est cotée au NASDAQ et fait partie de l'indice S&P SmallCap 600.

Sujet de thèse : Contrôle interactif approfondi du mouvement du personnage virtuel basé sur la séparation de l'identité, du mouvement et du style

Compétences

Animation par ordinateur, apprentissage profond (deep learning)

Description

L'animation de personnages a un large éventail d'applications potentielles, dans les jeux vidéo, l'industrie cinématographique, le sport, la rééducation, l'ergonomie, la formation, etc. La plupart des outils disponibles pour animer des humains virtuels consiste à spécifier des trajectoires angulaires pour chaque articulation d'un squelette. Le maillage de la surface du personnage est ensuite calculé en conséquence, à l'aide d'algorithmes dits de « skinning ». Cependant, il est difficile de capturer et de reproduire l'expressivité d'un mouvement humain, car elle fait intervenir plusieurs paramètres subtils, dont certains sont perdus lors de la modélisation des performances humaines comme les angles des articulations : angles, contacts sur la surface du corps, profils de vitesse, accélérations, distance ou coordination entre les parties du corps, etc. Avec le développement d'une reconstruction robuste de la forme du corps basée sur des capteurs bon marché, tels que des caméras RVB ou des capteurs de profondeur, la manipulation directe de la surface visible du personnage est devenue un domaine de recherche très actif.

Avec l'intérêt croissant pour les mondes virtuels persistants et partagés, tels que le réseau social immersif MetaVerse, des problèmes spécifiques à l'animation de personnages se sont posés. En effet, dans ces environnements, les utilisateurs sont représentés par des avatars aux formes et morphologies différentes. La plateforme d'animation de personnages doit donc pouvoir adapter le mouvement de l'utilisateur à cette forme différente (problème de reciblage), ou adapter l'identité de l'avatar pour que l'utilisateur soit reconnaissable par ses amis, ou changer le style du mouvement pour transmettre une émotion donnée ou s'adapter au comportement attendu de l'avatar. Par exemple, on attend d'un avatar de Hulk qu'il se déplace avec un style spécifique, mais il doit aussi imiter la performance de l'utilisateur. Ce sujet de thèse étudiera les méthodes d'apprentissage profond pour résoudre ce problème de reciblage tout en contrôlant le style.

Lieu : Rennes, France - Sur place

InterDigital est un employeur offrant l'égalité des chances en matière d'emploi. InterDigital s'interdit de toute discrimination illégale et ne tolère aucune décision, politique ou pratique prise en matière d'emploi basée sur le sexe, le genre, la grossesse (y compris l'accouchement, l'allaitement et l'état de santé), l'âge, la race, la couleur, la religion, la croyance, l'origine nationale, l'ascendance, la citoyenneté, le statut militaire, le statut de vétéran, le handicap mental ou physique, l'état de santé, les informations génétiques, l'orientation sexuelle, l'identité ou l'expression de genre, ou tout autre facteur protégé par la loi fédérale, nationale ou locale applicable. Cette politique s'applique à toutes les conditions d'emploi, y compris, de façon non limitative, au recrutement, à l'embauche, à la rémunération, aux avantages sociaux, à la formation, aux affectations, aux évaluations, au coaching, à la promotion, à la discipline, au licenciement et à la mise à pied.

--------------------------------------

W.I.R.E.D est un clone virtuel de l'Europe afin offrant à nos clients la possibilité de voyager, dans le temps et l'espace, de l’échelle européenne jusqu’à l’interieur des bâtiments, grâce aux meilleures données métiers du marché.

Le projet est développé en collaboration avec les grands acteurs de la 3D temps réel, Unity, NVIDIA et Magic Leap et à la croisée du metaverse et de la plateforme de datavizualisation. Il a gagné plusieurs prix, a été présenté au CES sur le stand Unity et à la GTC 2022 de Nvidia.

Les équipes de production de WIRED, incubées à Bivwak ! (Hub de transformation de BNP Paribas).

Nos partenaires techniques externes et notamment Unity, Magic Leap, Meta ou ESRI.

Apports du poste et évolution

Wir wurden mit über 20 Awards ausgezeichnet und arbeiten für internationale Unternehmen wie Porsche, Telekom, DHL, e.on und Vodafone. Werde Teil einer unglaublichen Erfolgsgeschichte und gestalte mit uns die Zukunft des Metaverse.
