Beteiligung an unserem Erfolg mit Mitarbeiteraktien möglich

Bei uns herrscht eine lockere Arbeitsatmosphäre mit flachen Hierarchien, in der du als Individuum ernst genommen wirst. Du hast eine Idee? Raus damit! Du hältst dich lieber zurück und machst einfach deinen Job? Mach das! Bei uns fühlt sich jeder wohl. Werde Teil unseres Teams und hilf uns dabei, die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen! Aus einer Idee, Kreativität, Mut und Fleiß ist mittlerweile, dank eines genialen Teams, etwas Großes geworden. Wir haben zahlreiche Auszeichnungen erhalten und begeistern mit unserer Art zu Denken und unserer Technologie auch einige der bekanntesten Unternehmen Deutschlands.

Wir sind easy Access und Open Access und gleichzeitig Enterprise. Unser Working Space ist wie ein Zuhause, nur noch wohnlicher. Er ist wie ein Büro, nur noch produktiver. Er ist wie ein Atelier, nur noch kreativer. Du wirst es lieben.

Wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf deine Bewerbung!

290 --> Dual Master: Junior Service Owner (f/m/d) Virtual Events Platform
SAPHIR Deutschland GmbH

Kennziffer: LR220923/11570

Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

크래프톤의 신규 메타버스 프로젝트를 개발하고 있습니다.

자유로운 창작을 지원하는 샌드박스 툴과 생동감있는 메타버스 3D 월드를 제작하고 글로벌 유저들에게 즐거움과 새로운 경험을 선사할 계획입니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
메타버스 3D World내의 UI 레이아웃 구성 및 디자인
아이콘 등 그래픽 애셋 제작

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
그래픽 디자인 관련 전공자 및 이에 준한 이론 지식을 보유하신 분
UI/UX에 대한 이해를 바탕으로 한 디자인 능력
2년 이상의 관련 경력
원활한 커뮤니케이션 능력

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
UMG 혹은 Unreal Engine Blueprint 사용 경험
UI/UX 업무 프로세스에 대한 이해

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(필수)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

292 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Kingston, ON (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. Metasoccer is the first soccer metaverse where professional soccer teams, guilds, and all individuals can create their own virtual team, manage the financial and sports strategy, compete in official leagues to gain revenue, and all of this with an experience that you’d come to expect from manager titles.

Just imagine what we can achieve during the next 3 months with your help! We would love you to be a part of our journey. Join us to shape the future of gaming!

Our proposal

All our games are developed using Scrum/LeSS, we take it quite seriously so you can expect the usual flow of: Refinement, Planning, Daily meetings and Retro.

Our Frontend stack looks like:

React (Nextjs) with hooks
Zustand + immer for the storage
Typescript
Tailwindcss

At some point, we will add React Native to the mix.

It can be a perfect match if you meet...

Understand the various trade-offs in the front-end
Deep understanding of Javascript ecosystem (Vue, Angular experience)
Comfortable working with CSS and friends
Has shipped high-quality b2c applications in a fast-paced environment
Takes ownership of tasks
Fluent communication skills in English
Passion for writing clean and testable code
Can manage their own work environment (Docker, Git, ...)
Be acquainted with TDD

We do not ask for a fixed amount of experience in years, but we do require the candidates to consider themselves senior, as we mentioned before, deep knowledge of JS and the entire ecosystem is required.

Full remote position
You can expect the usual flexibility that comes with it

Flat hierarchy company, working side by side with everybody (CTO, Leads, CEO...)
Transparency
Competitive Salary in your country of residence
Bonding Activities - We get together once every few months (usually in Barcelona)

L'entreprise

Hawk est une société technologique proposant des solutions omnicanales associant activations média innovantes et insights consommateurs.

Par le biais de leur plateforme d’achat propriétaire, ils proposent à leurs clients (agences média et annonceurs) d’orchestrer et d’optimiser leurs campagnes marketing à travers tous les écrans (desktop, mobile, tablette, panneaux d’affichage numériques, télévisions connectées) et en activant tous les formats publicitaires (display, vidéo, audio, in-game ads et metaverse) 🔥

Descriptif du poste


Dans un contexte de forte croissance, nous souhaitons renforcer notre équipe parisienne avec un(e) stagiaire Media Trader H/F rattaché(e) à Sarah, Head of FR Ad Operations.

Tes missions seront notamment :

Elaborer avec l'équipe commerciale les recommandations clients
Récupérer les éléments de campagnes auprès des clients (créations et URLs)
Etablir le plan de taggage permettant la mesure des performances
Programmer les campagnes sur la plateforme d'enchères
Suivre les performances, optimiser les budgets média en fonction des KPIs de l'annonceur
Construire et communiquer aux clients les reportings de campagne

La liste des missions n’est pas exhaustive.

Ce stage est fait pour toi si …

Tu as une appétence pour l'environnement AdTech
Tu prépares un Master avec une spécialisation Digitale, Publicité ...
Tu parles anglais
Tu es orienté chiffres et tu comprends les enjeux des clients
Tu souhaites toujours en apprendre plus et te dépasser
L'esprit d'équipe est très important pour toi ! Tu as un esprit de solidarité et aime soutenir les autres tout en apprenant davantage grâce à eux !

Déroulement des entretiens


1. Entretien avec Nadia, Talent Acquisition Specialist
2. Entretien avec Sarah, Head of Adops et Quentin, VP of Adops
3. Tu nous rejoins !

Pour profiter des supers restos autour de nos bureaux (ou chez toi !)

Pour profiter des tarifs préférentiels pour des salles de sport etc.

💻 We aim for Innovation
Dans un secteur en perpétuelle évolution, nous veillons à toujours mieux répondre aux attentes de nos clients.

298 --> Discord Community Lead in a Metaverse Project
Crypto Recruit 
Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
The Discord Community Lead will act as the voice of the game team to the players while representing the voice of the players to the game team.

The Discord Community Lead will act as the voice of the game team to the players while representing the voice of the players to the game team. They will engage players in conversations on forums and social channels and will support the creation of community content such as FAQs, live streams, and guides. We are looking for a creative and passionate Discord Community Lead, comfortable with online communities and social media, with excellent communication skills, and with the ability to thrive in a highly dynamic environment.

Job Responsibilities

Lead the development and execution of community engagement programs, created compelling content for community channels, and monitored the forums Author community and social daily publishing including maintenance of the brand community and social programming calendar for global use Partner with the studio team to create social messaging on owned and operated channelsPropose multi-region engagement initiatives to support major Brand milestones Closely collaborate with Content Marketing team and studio leads to create community and social channel strategy, content calendars and set up KPIs to measure success Closely collaborate with Content Marketing team to measure, monitor, and report on specific program performance and longer-term trends as well as other industries related to community influencer effortsConsolidate and report on worldwide community trends, topics, and sentiment Monitor existing and emerging community channels and ambassador programs Collaborate with the team to create developer diaries and execute streaming programs for Twitch, YouTube, and Mixer (potentially others)

Qualifications

Minimum of 1+ years experience in community and social media management Knowledge of brand communications, social, and gaming ecosystems is required Demonstrated analytical skills tracking community and social metrics for O&O (owned- and- operated station) channels Experience with community moderation in Discord, Reddit, and other community platforms Excellent oral, written, and interpersonal communication skills including the ability to effectively communicate with multiple departments and all levels of the organization Excellent organizational skills including the ability to effectively manage time and prioritization of tasks Passionate gamer with deep knowledge of the industry, particularly RPG’sExperience in NFT's is a plus

299 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
Japan (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. 창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
메타버스 프로젝트 내부 사용 툴 개발
메타버스 프로젝트 런처 개발
서버 운영 관련 툴 개발

전산학 관련 이해 혹은 관련 분야 전공자
한국어로 원활한 의사소통이 가능하신 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
Golang을 활용한 개발 경험
클라우드 플랫폼(Azure, AWS, GCP 등) 친화적으로 설계된 서비스 개발 경험
Docker, Kubernetes 활용 경험
React / Angular를 활용한 개발 경험
Electron을 활용한 개발 경험

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 직무 테스트 (Technical Fit Test) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

Job Description

Avanade France, des experts Microsoft et ses partenaires

6 Bureaux en France (Paris, Nantes, Bordeaux, Toulouse, Lyon et Clermont-Ferrand)

46% des entreprises du classement Global 500 sont clientes

Leader de la création et de la mise en œuvre de solutions dans l'écosystème Microsoft, l'innovation est placée au centre de tous nos projets.

Nous permettons à nos collaborateurs de se former tout au long de leur carrière sur les dernières technologies pour devenir de véritables expert(es) de l'innovation.

L’équipe et votre rôle

Dans le cadre de projets nationaux et/ou internationaux, rejoignez nos équipes de consultant(e)s et participez aux différentes phases d’un projet sur des applications métiers, mettant en œuvre les technologies Microsoft (.NET / .NET Core, Office 365 Services, Azure, Azure DevOps) et Full Stack (Angular, React, REST API).

Vous participerez à la réalisation de projets utilisant les méthodologies Agile, Safe ou Waterfall, pour des clients grands comptes.

Vos missions

En tant que stagiaire au sein de la Talent Community Software Engineering, vous serez amené(e) à :

Monter en compétences sur les technologies Microsoft.
Participer au développement d’assets qui pourront être réutilisés par d’autres collaborateurs Avanade.
Intervenir sur le développement d’applications métier et d’APIs REST.
Développer des tests unitaires et d’intégration.
Participer à la mise en œuvre de pipelines d’intégration et de déploiement continu.

Profil recherché

Vous êtes étudiant(e) de niveau Bac+5 en école d’ingénieur ou université. Vous êtes passionné et curieux de développement, de technologie - notamment de l’écosystème Microsoft - votre anglais est opérationnel. Vous désirez acquérir une expérience professionnelle enrichissante au sein d’une entreprise dynamique en forte évolution (20% de croissance annuelle moyenne depuis la création). Vous recherchez un stage de pré embauche.

Perspectives d’évolution et un équilibre vie pro/perso

Des points réguliers avec votre Career Advisor puis, en CDI 4 entretiens/an de suivi et d’évolution de carrière avec votre Career Advisor avec 6 étapes de carrière : Associate, Analyst, Consultant, Manager, Director, Executive.

Un engagement fort sur le bien-être avec la possibilité de faire jusqu’à 2 jours de télétravail/semaine avec une indemnité de télétravail et des RTT et en faveur de la diversité culturelle, l'égalité hommes-femmes et l'emploi des travailleurs en situation de handicap.

Des possibilités de formation certifiantes sur des environnements de test mis à disposition.

Un package complet

Remboursement de 50% du titre de transport

Tickets restaurant

Indemnité télétravail (jusqu’à 2 jours par semaine)

Processus de recrutement

Le processus de recrutement est transparent afin que vous puissiez découvrir rapidement si le poste est fait pour vous. Il se compose seulement de 3 étapes :

1 : Prise de contact avec un recruteur, pour répondre à vos premières questions concernant Avanade, les postes, et vous orienter au sein de notre organisation.

Tests anglais & français en ligne.

3 : Entretien technique avec un collaborateur Avanade, pour poser toutes vos questions sur les projets et les clients

En bonus : Un Escape Game virtuel pour nous découvrir encore plus !

Témoignage d'un(e) ancie(ne) stagiaire

Hello ! Je m’appelle Zoé, je travaille à Avanade depuis presque 1 an et demi maintenant. J’ai commencé en tant que stagiaire au sein de la Digital Factory le 1 er Mars 2021, dans le cadre de mon stage de fin d’études et ai poursuivi en CDI. Comme l’innovation et le champ de la recherche & du développement me tenaient à cœur, cette année j’ai eu l’opportunité de travailler à 40% en interne sur des sujets innovants et passionnants en intégrant le Tech Office. J’effectue donc deux activités en parallèle, à savoir ma mission chez le client (GRDF ?) et mes activités pour le Tech Office.

Quelles sont tes missions chez Avanade ?

Comme mentionné précédemment, j’exerce deux activités conjointement :

Chez mon client, j’ai développé un chatbot intégré dans Teams, en utilisant le Bot Framework SDK de Microsoft. L’objectif premier du bot est de répondre aux questions des collaborateurs sur les outils et services internes, et sur les outils de la suite Office 365, dans le cadre de la conduite du changement au sein de l’entreprise. Je travaille actuellement à le rendre plus « intelligent » en y incorporant des capacités cognitives de compréhension du langage – de l’IA – afin qu’il puisse gérer de multiple scénarios.
Au sein du Tech Office, j’ai eu l’occasion de travailler sur différents projets et d’explorer beaucoup de sujets innovants. J’ai commencé par travailler sur un démonstrateur centré autour de l’IoT industrielle et destiné à un salon auquel participe Avanade, appelé le SIDO. Le projet comporte différentes technologies telles que de « l’IA at Edge », de l’IoT, un digital twin, de la réalité mixte et virtuelle, de la robotique, du low-code, du traitement de data etc.

J’ai également aidé à la conception de l’Innovation Center dans les bureaux de Paris, en réfléchissant à l’offre destinée aux clients et aux collaborateurs d’Avanade, son format (les « Innovation Journey ») et son contenu (les démos, présentations etc.).

J’ai ensuite exploré le sujet du « Metaverse » en travaillant sur de la conception et de la modélisation 3D d’univers virtuels, pour finalement me focaliser sur les technologies de réalité étendue (AR, MR et VR) ainsi que la gestion de projet et d’équipe.

Qu’est-ce qui te plait dans tes missions ?

Ce qui me plait le plus c’est leur diversité, j’aime découvrir un nouveau sujet ou une nouvelle technologie. J’apprécie également la liberté et l’autonomie dont je dispose pour effectuer mes recherches et développer mes applications. Et évidemment, toutes ces expériences sont très enrichissantes tant sur le plan technique qu’interpersonnel.

Qu’est-ce qui te plait chez Avanade ?

Avoir l’opportunité de se former et de monter en compétence quel que soit son niveau est un vrai plus. J’ai également été touchée par la bienveillance et l’entraide entre les collaborateurs.

Comment as-tu découvert Avanade? Qu'est-ce qui t'as fait choisir Avanade?

J’ai découvert Avanade par l’entremise d’une amie de mon école d’ingénieur, qui été déjà en CDI lorsque je cherchais une entreprise pour effectuer mon stage de fin d’études. Ce qui m’a fait choisir Avanade c’est l’opportunité de formations, ainsi que les missions qu’on m’a présentées et sur lesquelles j’allais pouvoir intervenir.

Quelles ont été tes missions pendant le stage ?

Durant cette période j’ai également travaillé sur deux sujets en parallèle, le premier était le développement d’une double application mobile et bureau à l’aide de la PowerPlatform (technologie low-code/no-code), destinée à faciliter l’intégration et l’assimilation des connaissances acquises par les new joiners durant leurs onboarding, et prenant la forme d’un jeu en plusieurs parties. Lors de ce projet je suis passée par toutes les étapes du cycle de vie d’un projet, à savoir, l’analyse et le recueil des besoins, le POC, le chiffrage, l’écriture d’un backlog et la mise en place d’une méthodologie Agile, le développement, les tests, la mise en production et l’écriture d’une documentation.

Le deuxième projet était le développement d’une IA dans le cadre d’une application visant à apprendre la langue des signes en réalité mixte avec un casque HoloLens 2. Pour ce projet à caractère innovant, j’ai alterné entre phases de développement et recherche/lecture de papiers scientifiques.

Vous avez encore des doutes? Allez voir les avis de nos anciens stagiaires sur Happy Trainees (enquête anonyme).

Gardons contact !

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

307 --> Office Operations (m/w/d) (Geringfügig) at dryven
join.com
St Pölten, Lower Austria, Austria (On-site)
Wir könnten jetzt eine Menge Services auflisten, die beschreiben, was wir von dryven tun. Und sagen, dass wir jung und dynamisch und so sind. Aber dann wäre diese Stellenbeschreibung genauso ersetzbar wie die 30 Stellen, die du dir bisher angesehen hast. In einem Satz: dryven ist ein 10-köpfiges Unternehmen im Herzen St. Pöltens, welches auf datengetriebenes Marketing und digitale Lösungen spezialisiert ist.

Aufgaben

Quickfacts
5 bis 10 Wochenstunden
St. Pölten
ab sofort
Organisierte und strukturierte Arbeitsweise mit einem hohen Maß an Eigenverantwortung
Durchführen von Besichtigungen mit Kund_innen bzw. Mitgliedschaftsinteressent_innen
On- und Offboarding der Mitglieder
persönliche Betreuung der Mitglieder und Ansprechpartner vor Ort
tägliche Betreuung des laufenden Betriebs im Büro:
Herstellen von Ordnung & Sauberkeit (die Reinigung selbst wird durch eine andere Person durchgeführt)
Verteilen der Post und Annahme von Paketen
Lager und Inventur
Nachfüllen von Snacks & Getränken im Lounge-Bereich

Qualifikation

Du bist
gut organisiert
strukturiert
verlässlich
flexibel

Du hast
eine Arbeitsweise, die von Eigeninitiative und Struktur geprägt ist
Spaß daran, selbstständig zu arbeiten
ein selbstbewusstes und höfliches Auftreten
gute Deutschkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

Benefits

Regelmäßige Teamtage

Nicht nur während der Arbeit, auch in unserer Freizeit unternehmen wir gemeinsame Ausflüge oder frönen dem Feierabend mit einem wohlverdienten Feierabend-Bier, -Wein, -Softdrink oder -Wasser (es gibt Beweisfotos). Auf rein freiwilliger Basis – niemand wird gezwungen, seine wertvolle Freizeit mit coolen Menschen wie uns zu verbringen.

Ein junges dynamisches Team

Wir könnten jetzt schreiben, dass wir ein junges und dynamisches Team sind, aber dieser Satz hat inzwischen einen ziemlichen Bart . Was wir auf jeden Fall statistisch belegen können: Unser Altersmedian liegt bei 26 Jahren. Aber das bedeutet nicht, dass er so bleiben muss.

Alle für eine/n und eine/r für alle

Anders als in riesigen Unternehmen kümmern wir uns umeinander und finden eine Lösung, wenn du etwas benötigst. Die Teamgröße und Zusammenarbeit mit unserem strategischen Partner lässt aber auch Karriereaufstiege und Schnuppern in neue Bereiche zu. Best of both worlds!

Eigenes Arbeitsgerät

Bei dryven machst du das, was du am besten kannst - und mit dem passenden von uns zur Verfügung gestelltem Werkzeug (in dem Fall ein Laptop) kreiert es sich gleich noch besser.

Lässiges Büro

Anno dazumal gestartet ohne Klo und Wasserhahn, haben wir uns rasch hochgearbeitet: Heute sind wir in einem schicken Büro am Europaplatz zuhause - modern, hell, klimatisiert, inklusive Lift und und tüchtiger Kaffee-Maschine.

Free Coffee

Aja, und Tee haben wir auch. Und Kakao. Und Säfte. Und Soda. Und Kekse. Und die obligatorische Obstschale sowieso.

Ausgezeichnete öffentliche Anbindung

Unser Büro befindet sich direkt in der St. Pöltner Innenstadt, nur wenige Gehminuten vom Bahnhof entfernt.

Am Puls der Zeit

Wir begleiten viele Projekte im Bereich disruptiver Technologien: Sei es Crypto, Metaverse, AI, VR... bei uns bist du somit stets up to date, wenn es um neue technologische Trends geht.

Den O-Ton setzen

Tief in der DNA von dryven verwurzelt ist der nicht zu leugnende Drang, großzügig zu lachen.

Kein All-In-Vertrag

No words needed.

Lebenslauf? Motivationsschreiben? Nicht nötig! Lass uns doch einfach kurz plaudern, um zu sehen, ob wir zusammenpassen. Wir freuen uns auf deine Kontaktaufnahme!

Chancengleichheit und selbstbestimmte Teilhabe Schwerbehinderter und Gleichgestellter sowie eine respektvolle Zusammenarbeit sind innerhalb des DB Konzerns fest verankerte Grundsätze. Deshalb werden schwerbehinderte Bewerber bei gleicher Eignung bevorzugt berücksichtigt.

315 --> 3D Graphics Artist

Send InMail
Our 3D Graphic Artist needs to help bring creativity, branding, and impact to our video and production projects. Taking direction from the Digital Producer and Creative Lead, the 3DGA works hand-in-hand with the larger Creative Team to help bring client and agency work to life.
The 3DGA will create 3D solutions and motion graphics, from concept to completion, in a wide range of graphic applications including video, social media, mobile platforms, AR, VR, Metaverse and emerging media. These design solutions being produced will uphold and amplify the creative ideas, brand identity, and product communication design across multiple clients and communication channels.
Besides being insanely talented, they need to be good human-beings. Unselfish. Collaborative. Respectful. Responsible. Self-sufficient. Ego-free. And committed to the work, the Team, and the clients.

Technologies
o Autodesk Maya
o Adobe Illustrator
o Adobe Photoshop
o Adobe InDesign
o Animate
o After Effects
o Mudbox
o Arnold Render
o Substance is a plus

Bonus Points / Not Required
o Experience creating HTML 5 banners/online display, working with Google Web Designer and DoubleClick
o Knowing ES6
o Experience with PHP, Linux or MySQL
o Landing page design

316 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
North Bay, ON (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. For more information about Inclusion, Diversity & Equity in Recruitment, please click here.

For general recruitment-related inquiries, please contact the HR Delivery Centre at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca.

If you have a question about accessible employment at KPMG, or to begin a confidential conversation about your individual accessibility or accommodation needs through the recruitment process, we encourage you to contact us at cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca or phone 416-777-8002 or toll free 1-888-466-4778.

KPMG Canada
St John’s, NL (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. 5+ years in technology business development

Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level

Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients

318 --> Assistant Community Manager
Gamium
United States (Remote)
Gamium is a Web3 and Metaverse technology company with the vision to lead the change in Human Interactions and the mission to connect Real Humans.

With these goals in mind, Gamium is building the first Decentralized Social Metaverse and the Digital Identity of humans, which includes building different innovative products using blockchain technology and token standards.

Gamium brings hyperrealism to the metaverse, allowing humans to build their Digital Identity and enjoy mindblowing environments. Also, create and evolve their Avatar profile, exchange NFTs, use a decentralized chat, get a job in the metaverse, enjoy immersive experiences, own and customize virtual lands, and socialize & earn in Gamium's 3D World.

Are you passionate about challenges and delving into the latest cutting-edge trends in web3, blockchain, crypto, metaverse, and the most Techie positions? Are you looking to boost your growth in a company that is creating the future?

If your answer is yes, then GAMIUM is your next challenge!

What will your contribution in this role be?
Build brand awareness and help Gamium be more present on the internet.
Respond to our community promptly so that our community feels listened.
Track and report events on different social networks.
Help to provide engaging text, image, and video content for all social media and marketing activities in order to increase brand image.
Take part of the Marketing team and share ideas and best practices.
Build relationships with our community and influencers.
Stay up to date with digital technology trends.

Key Accountabilities
Participate in the content creation and brainstorm and share content ideas for Social Media posts, and Product Marketing Campaigns such as Gamium App and different applications.
Perform research on current benchmark trends, ways of communicating our message effectively, and best infographics that better suit our audience preferences.
Respond to our community’s questions and comments quickly, and professionally through official social media channels like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube and Medium.
Encourage user debate with recently published content, and reply to comments engaging interactions.
Attract existing customers and new members to join our community.
Network with other community managers outside of the organization, to stay current with the latest industry developments.
Track the performance of posts, monitoring engagement levels to assist the SMM to take better decisions.
Gather customer feedback & present it to the social media manager.
Give support to our KOLs and Influencers to help us develop Marketing campaigns.
Build relationships with bloggers and influencers active within our sector.
Assist the marketing team in organizing both online, and offline events for active community members.

Framework, Boundaries of Work, Authority & Decision Making
Our community developer will report directly to the social media leader, most of the interactions will be previously accorded and validated by his superior, but we are going to require a minimum level of authority to answer and reply effectively to social media comments and interactions.

Minimum Qualifications
Preferably a bachelor's degree on Marketing & Communications.
Native or almost native written/verbal communication abilities in English.

Minimum Experience
+2 years of experience working in a Marketing / Social Media department.
Having worked for a company with an App-oriented product will be positively considered.
Experience in engaging within crypto community channels like twitter, discord, telegram, etc.

Hard Skills
Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
Passionate about the cryptocurrency and blockchain fields with a strong interest in CeFi, DeFi, Metaverse and NFTs. You love to constantly learn and keep abreast of trends and developments in the industry.
Knowledge and understanding of tools related to social networks such as Instagram, Twitter, Tiktok, Youtube, Facebook, Medium to better engage our community.
Remote work self-discipline and work ethics
Understanding of crypto system, culture, memes and latest trends

Soft Skills
An ambitious and motivated person that looks forward to the future in the organization and shows a willingness to scale and develop a career in Gamium.
A hard-working person who works together toward the same mission feels.
A quality-oriented person that ensures that Gamium provides top-notch actions in everything we do.
Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines
A keen eye for aesthetics and details
Good sense of humor to engage our community

Salary Range
US$ 15000 - 30000 per year (depends upon candidate´s experience and knowledge)

Our Vision 👀: To lead the change in Human Interactions.

Our Mission 🎯: Connecting Real Humans through technology.

Our Core Values 🌝:

Hard work: "Dreams don't work unless you do (work hard)"

Teamwork: Gamium's team works together toward the same mission

Passion: We love what we do

Quality: Gamium's products are top-notch

Community-driven: the #GMMARMY & Gamium DAO are key to the development of Gamium

authentic.network
Chemnitz, Saxony, Germany (On-site)
Zur Verstärkung unseres internationalen Vertriebsteams suchen wir zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt in Voll- oder Teilzeit Dich als motivierten Business Developer/in (m/w/d).

Aufgaben
Du entwickelst pro-aktiv eine Vertriebsstrategie und akquirierst darauf basierend neue Projekte und Kunden für unsere Pipeline.
Du kombinierst unser Produkt mit Deiner Kreativität und löst damit auf innovative Art und Weise die Probleme von und mit unserer Kunden.
Einmal akquiriert, kümmerst Du Dich um die Umsetzung und Implementierung des Projektes beim Kunden - vom Vertrag bis zum “go-live”.
Deine Erfahrungen aus den Kundenprojekten gibts Du an die Mitarbeiter in der Entwicklung weiter, um unser Produkt ständig weiterzuentwickeln.
Du vertrittst authentic network sicher und souverän nach außen in Telefonaten, Videokonferenzen und persönlich bei Kunden oder auf Messen/Events.

Qualifikation
Du hast Deine kaufmännische technische Ausbildung oder wirtschaftlich/ ingenieurtechnisches Studium erfolgreich abgeschlossen und hast 3+ Jahre Berufserfahrung im Business Development, Vertrieb oder Projektmanagement.
Deine Erfahrung hast Du idealerweise in den Branchen ITK, Print/Publishing, Brand Protection/Packaging oder ähnlichem gemacht.
Du trittst souverän beim Kunden auf und weist ihn mit Deiner Lösung zu begeistern. Du hast Spaß an Kommunikation und kannst Dich präzise in Wort und Schrift im Deutschen wie Englischen ausdrücken.
Du kannst Dich auch mal durchsetzen, wenn z.B. Projekte drohen zu versanden.
Du bist begeistert von Themen wie digitaler Transformation, Web 3.0 und Metaverse.
Du arbeitest pro-aktiv, eigenständig und zuverlässig und hast eine positive Grundeinstellung was Dich zum Teamplayer macht.
Du bringst gute Kenntnisse in den gängigen Office/CRM Anwendungen mit.

Benefits
Ein hochmotiviertes, innovatives und wachsendes Team mit einem sinnstiftenden und spannenden Produkt.
Verantwortungsvolle, abwechslungsreiche und herausfordernde Aufgaben mit einer agilen Arbeitsweise.
Wir sind per Du und haben kurze Entscheidungswege auf Basis flacher Hierarchien mit einem offenen und familiären Arbeitsklima.
Flexoffice, von überall aus arbeiten, im Homeoffice, mobil oder im zentral gelegenen Arbeitsplatz in Chemnitz, der gut mit ÖPNV / Auto erreichbar ist.
Einen grandioses Headquarter mit Blick über Chemnitz von der eigenen Büroterrasse aus.
28 Tage Urlaub

Wir freuen uns darauf Dich kennenzulernen!

320 --> Unreal Developer (f/m/d)
welevel studios
Munich, Bavaria, Germany
Your mission

In our team, developers take care of inventory, multiplayer, building system, skills, combat, procedural world building etc. They prototype new gameplay elements and integrate them with the other team members.

Your profile

Your skills

Worked at least on one game before (in unreal)
Minimum intermediate C++ skills
Good knowledge of replication and how to work event-driven
Having a basic understanding of Gameplay Ability System (GAS)
Using categories and comments to structure your code
Our team is based on supporting and embracing each other, being a team-player is a must
Basic knowledge of Version-Control-System (Git)
Knowing AI is a bonus

Why us?

As a developer, you want to work with the latest technologies and not doing the 1 millions pay-to-win mobile game. We are using already Nanite, Lumen, Enhanced Input System, Modular Gameplay Features, Gameplay Ability System, Event-driven with Gameplay Tags and much more. Our world is also procedurally generated, so as all villages and quests in the game.

Attractive working environment: central location, motivated, open and international colleagues
Creative, varied and exciting tasks
Attractive and fair compensation
Working with the latest and most innovative technology
Community activities with the team
Free drinks and food
Entrepreneurship and pioneering spirit of a start-up company
Creative participation in a young and dynamic team with flat hierarchy structures and short information and decision paths

We are creating next-gen AAA games like SolidRiver as part of our metaverse. Player and asset creators are welcome to bring in easily new content with our modular marketplace and also trade it. We therefore create an open environment that everyone can build on. Our office is based in Munich and we are working with developers remotely all over the world in different time zones. We aim to start relationships with our future employees while they are still in university and want to be part of their personal and professional development. It is important to us that our team is intrinsically motivated, passionate and loves to accomplish the daily challenges that occur building a next-gen game.

321 --> #AGGP Graduate Digital Workplace transformation leader (M/F)
Airbus
Toulouse, Occitanie, France (Hybrid)
Job Description

Start date: 02 October 2023

Every year we look for university graduates from around the world to join Airbus. We need people with the aspiration, enthusiasm and the talent to help us move forward and to change the world and deliver our vision to pioneer sustainable aerospace for a safe and united world.

When you begin your career with us, we accelerate your development through our Airbus Global Graduate Experience. You are part of a 2 year programme where you develop your professional skills, build your networks, locally and internationally, and gain a unique perspective on the world of Airbus. You are part of a global community, so we bring you together once a year for a global graduate conference where you meet your peers, hear from our leaders and learn from the best.

We are hiring the graduates we need to fill the critical roles for our future.

By the end of the programme, our aim is that you are ready to progress, having already demonstrated your value. You will have developed your skills in an area that is strategically important for Airbus, you will know about the Airbus business, the opportunities, challenges and needs, and you will have learned more about yourself, and what makes you great.

Above all you will have the opportunity to do your best work in an industry that is literally reshaping how we live in our world.

If you are ready to join and be part of this journey please apply below.

What You Will Be Doing

You will be on a development pathway to prepare you to be a Digital transformation leader within the Airbus Digital Workplace team.

Digital Workplace (DW) was established to be an enabler of Digital Transformation across Airbus. Its primary focus is to: provide employees with simple, intuitive and easy to use workplace tools and services; enable employees to create and collaborate from anywhere at any time; enable continuous optimisation of work experience and productivity underpinned by fit-for-purpose security.

Digital Workplace consists of the following core elements: Devices and Services, Employee Collaboration, Industrial and Specialist Devices, Workplace Support, User Adoption and Operational Performance.

Your mission should you choose to accept it, will involve you in the following:

Project management
Digitalization projects such as deployment of new applications (Metaverse…) or new devices (Chromebook, Mac…)
Merge & acquisition projects by setting up the full Airbus workplace in a new locations
Development of Digital Workplace team in Airbus India
IT Service Delivery management based on ITIL best practices
Information System architecture expertise
You will have the opportunity to benefit from the latest technologies deployed within Airbus and you will participate in the definition and implementation of the future employee workplace (Google Workspace alpha testing, Modern device management…).
You will learn in a multicultural environment and have the possibility to discover our team in Europe as well as in India through your development journey.

What We Look For

To be a successful applicant to the Airbus Global Graduate Programme, you will need to demonstrate;

Educated to a degree level or equivalent within a relevant field of study
Maximum of three years relevant work experience
Strong verbal and written communication in our business language (English)
A desire to work in a collaborative team environment, focused on driving future innovation
The ability to be self aware and a wish to be in the driving seat of your development.

Degree Type

What you will need to apply

Engineering degree or Master Degree

Specific Experience Or Interests

Advanced level of English
French knowledge will be an added advantage
Proficient oral and written communication skills to interface with external parties (e.g., other businesses
Customer centric mindset to understand client’s needs, support them with constructive advice and activities while developing good relationships
Specific experience or interests in IT projects and operation management to organize and monitor office tasks and processes so that work progresses more efficiently.

Please ensure that a cover letter detailing motivations and suitability for this position is included in your application.

Please note, we love your interest in working for Airbus but we do ask that you make only one application to the Airbus Global Graduate Programme. We encourage you to take time to decide which of our exciting opportunities is right for you and then submit an application that best represents you, your skills and experience in connection with the role you have selected.

Please let us know if you need us to make any adjustments for the selection process – you can share this with the Recruitment Business Partner who gets in touch if you are invited to interview. Examples of this may include (but is not exclusive to) accessible facilities; auxiliary aids; room layout etc. Any information disclosed will be treated in the strictest confidence.

Please note that depending on the number of applicants the posting can be taken offline earlier. If you are interested we would advise you to apply as soon as possible.

The entry level salary for 2022 was 36.900 EUR (per year). Salaries are subject to change after the negotiations with social partners.

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth.

Company

AIRBUS SAS

Contract Type

Graduate Programme (UK)

Experience Level

Entry Level / Débutant / Anfänger / Recién titulado

Job Family

Information Mgmt and Digital Technology

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.

Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

Airbus is, and always has been, committed to equal opportunities for all. As such, we will never ask for any type of monetary exchange in the frame of a recruitment process. Any impersonation of Airbus to do so should be reported to emsom@airbus.com.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

322 --> Business Development/Sales Manager - New Markets (x/w/m)
NeXR Technologies SE
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (On-site)
The Department

We at NeXR Technologies are entrepreneurs, engineers, and creatives. We are client centric, market driven and convinced that innovative concepts need fast decisions and clear business models. We love to take on the challenges and develop solutions that matter. We develop and cater all aspects and technologies for our clients to enter the Metaverse. This includes our own avatar scanner systems for the exact measurement and virtualization of people and things. We create XR experiences, run our own motion capture studio and engage AR, VR technologies.

As a _Business Development/Sales Manager - New Markets_ (x/w/m)__ your contributions are essential for the success of our market activities. If you are truly passionate about our products & our clients, describe yourself as a market driven, then we would love to meet you.

You believe in the benefits of our solutions and will do everything so that our products will successfully meet our client's needs, then it is the time to talk.

What You’ll Do
Undertake market research to identify and report on current market trends and opportunities to obtain better brand recognition and financial growth.
Undertake outreach campaigns in collaboration with relevant internal and external partners including researching and building lead lists and handling first contact. This includes the set-up and management of industry specific sales initiatives and teams to create the highest quality outreach.
Be the single point of contact for clients in terms of all business development matters such as onboarding, project definition, team set-up, project proposals and deal closure.
Help in the implementation of sales processes to streamline workflows, increase business, and ensure fast response times to client enquiries.
Help in resolving roadblocks that prevent deals from progressing through the sales pipeline.
Ensure that marketing collateral used as part of the sales process is always up to date.
Produce necessary information sheets and templates as required in order to improve work-flows and inter departmental processes.

Why you are the right one
5+ years in similar role. Experience in gaming or music production is a plus.
Administrative/operational experience.
You are confident undertaking cold-outreach activities.
Expertise in client relation and project management.
Excellent verbal and written English. German is a plus.

Why you should join us
Being part of the NeXR-family pays off – besides an attractive remuneration you’ll have development prospects in an international company
Our office is superb! It is super modern, centrally located in the heart of the city (Rocket Tower at Checkpoint Charlie), has a breathtaking panorama view on Berlin and there is a chill-out-area with games- & VR-consoles
We are a highly motivated team with a flat hierarchy and fast decision-making
Flexible working models leave room for creativity
Our work environment is highly inspiring and there is lots of space for participation and realization of your own ideas
Thanks to flexible working hours you are autonomous and self-dependent in your work
Keen to learn more? We offer opportunities for training in new technologies
Must not be missing in Start-Ups – fresh fruit, muesli, and a huge variety of drinks are always available
You will collect never-to-be-forgotten moments and have heaps of fun at our legendary team- & company events
Your four-legged friend is welcome in the office

Sounds great? Get in touch!

If you would like to play an active role in shaping our high-tech company and develop your skills with us, then send us your application today by e-mail to jobs@nexr-technologies.com or use "apply now"-button below stating your salary expectations and earliest starting date. We look forward to receiving your exciting application!__

323 --> Business Development Associate
Nethermind
London, England, United Kingdom (Remote)
What are we all about?

We are a team of world class builders and researchers with expertise across several domains: Ethereum Protocol Engineering, Layer-2, Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Miner Extractable Value (MEV), Smart Contract Development, Security Auditing and Formal Verification.

Working to solve some of the most challenging problems in the blockchain space, we frequently collaborate with renowned companies, such as Ethereum Foundation, StarkWare, Gnosis Chain, Aave, Flashbots, xDai, Open Zeppelin, Forta Protocol, Energy Web, POA Network and many more.

We actively contribute to Ethereum core development, EIP's and network upgrades together with the Ethereum Foundation, and other client teams.

Today, there are nearly 200 of us working remotely from over 45+ countries.

You can view all our open positions here: https://jobs.nethermind.io/

The role:

We're hiring for a Business Development Associate who's ready to join a rapidly-growing organization, work independently without oversight, and help the company grow. This is an amazing career opportunity to help accelerate our growth, and pursue your own hunger and ideas within a remote-first, and rapidly-growing company.

Responsibilities:
Conduct market research and identify potential clients.
Collect and maintain client information within a CRM.
Help create new growth strategies, improve existing ones, and explore the endless possibilities for growth.
Giving sales presentations to a range of prospective clients.
Cultivate strong relationships with new clients, while maintaining existing client relationships
Assist with drafting business plans, sales pitches, presentations, reference material, and other documents as required.
Coordinate with other team members and departments to optimize the sales effort.

Requirements:
Ability to work independently and remotely in a globally-distributed team without oversight.
Proactive approach to work and hunger for pursuing own ideas.
Exceptional at building relationships across the business.
Proven experience of working to tight deadlines within a dynamic environment.

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 직무 테스트 (Technical Fit Test) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

327 --> Metaverse Tech Lead | Tech Acceleration | CDI | H/F
PwC

Job Description & Summary
Metaverse Tech Lead



Nous recherchons une personne curieuse et collaborative pour rejoindre notre équipe Tech Acceleration sur le sujet du Metaverse (NFT, VR, AR, plateformes) au sein de PwC.



Constituée pour servir l'un des piliers stratégiques de "The New Equation", l'équipe Emerging Tech Acceleration a pour objectif de :
comprendre l'impact des technologies émergentes sur l’organisation, les offres et les business models des entreprises
accélerer l'appropriation de ces nouvelles technologies par l'ensemble des collaborateurs de la firme
apporter sa vision dans la stratégie tech de nos clients
tirer parti de ces technologies pour transformer le mode de travail et le delivery de nos collaborateurs
faire rayonner notre savoir faire technologique et expertise sur le marché



Ce que vous pouvez attendre de la mission:

Dans votre rôle, vous serez responsable de la réalisation d'un large éventail de projets, allant d'expériences simples à complexes de réalité augmentée, réalité virtuelle, drop NFT et plus largement autour des Metaverse (création d’expérience dans The Sandbox ou Decentraland). Vous serez responsable de la création et du suivi des calendriers, de la négociation des finances, de l'identification et de la gestion des risques afin de respecter les priorités du projet.


Cela implique de travailler en étroite collaboration avec les experts locaux et mondiaux du Metaverse (plus de 1300) au sein de PwC et avec ses partenaires. Vous devrez être en mesure de comprendre et d'expliquer les aspects clés de la technologie aux parties prenantes de haut niveau tant interne PwC que pour nos clients clés (y compris en effectuant des démonstrations) afin qu'elles aient une meilleure compréhension de la technologie et de son potentiel pour résoudre les problèmes complexes. Dans ce cadre, vous devrez également être capable de développer une compréhension rapide des services et des propositions des clients liés au Metaverse.





Ce que nous pouvons attendre de vous :

Nous recherchons une personne, ayant de préférence au moins quelques années d'expérience professionnelle, qui soit aussi enthousiaste que nous à l'égard du Metaverse :
capable d'initier des dirigeants d'entreprise aux technologies Metaverse.
capable de communiquer clairement avec les autres
désireux de se tenir au courant des nouveaux produits, idées et applications du métavers.
capable de penser par lui-même et de résoudre rapidement les problèmes.



En outre, pour bien remplir ce rôle, vous devrez :
être multitâches, hiérarchiser les activités et respecter des délais serrés
faire face à un environnement en évolution rapide
réfléchir de manière créative à la façon de relever de nouveaux défis
Utiliser des technologies de collaboration comme la suite de produits Google (Docs, Sheets, Slides, etc.) et/ou Microsoft
communiquer régulièrement entre les parties prenantes et l'équipe centrale de Metaverse pour s'assurer que les progrès sont visibles et discutés.
Voyager au moins 2 fois par an à l'étranger.



Profil :
Issu d’une école d’ingénieur de préférence ou d’une école multimédia
Capacité à développer est un plus
Maîtrise de Unity et/ou Unreal Engine indispensable
Capacité à concevoir (architecture, mécanique, look & feel) des expériences 3D nécessaire

328 --> Support - Product Support Lead
InGame Recruitment Ltd
United Kingdom (Remote)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
The Platform

My client is building the world's first fully decentralized, Ethereum blockchain-based virtual world, built, governed, and owned by its users. It's a truly unique ecosystem with its own decentralized autonomous organization, currency, marketplace, and system of property - and it's growing fast!

New creations are added daily by creators who use proprietary developer tools to make games, puzzles, scenes, and artworks - whatever their imaginations allow. Via their personal avatars, users attend live music events, conferences, exhibitions, dance parties, and other experiences every day of the year.

What began as a proof-of-concept for assigning ownership of digital real estate to users of a blockchain is now an immersive, ever-expanding, and richly detailed metaverse, where anything is possible.

The Challenge

My client is currently looking for a Product Support Lead to join their Player Support & Moderation team. Responsibilities will include managing my client's 2nd line player support team and providing an enhanced level of support and escalation management for outsourced support teams. This role is also responsible for communicating product updates/briefs, insight reporting, and sharing information and trends with our product teams. This role is also responsible for assessing data, reporting, and change management within our support team. My client is looking for someone who is enthusiastic about providing great support, thrives in fast-moving environments, has strong communication skills, and is data focused in order to manage and improve our support KPIs.

In this role you will work with various internal teams and outsource service providers, communicating across multiple locations throughout the world.

This challenging role brings a unique opportunity to have a fundamental impact on our player experience and contribute to shaping a new and dedicated player support team.

Responsibilities
Create and manage our product support team that provides 2nd line support to our 1st line support agents & moderators (outsourced).
Regularly meet with our product, content, and creative teams to understand upcoming changes and releases and brief/train our 1st line support teams.
Provide incident management support and communications for platform issues and outages and provide our product teams with actionable data & insights.
Manage complex user escalations and interface with other teams to resolve issues
Contribute to team and wider OKRs to implement and project-manage processes that improve our efficiency and improve our player support offering.
Compile regular KPI/performance reporting for escalations and incident management.
Review support data to uncover trends, identify improvement opportunities and recommend improvements for our processes and tools.
Participate in player support quality calibration sessions to identify training opportunities and upskill our support teams wherever possible.
Qualifications
People management experience with small teams of 2 to 5 people
Experience working in a similar role within player support/customer service previously and comfortable with traditional and emerging support channels
Working knowledge of incident management processes and communicating complex information within a technical environment. Eg. tech, crypto, gaming
Experienced working with outsourced service providers and service delivery
Strong project management and process improvement skills
Analytical with the ability to identify trends and provide actionable recommendations
Excellent communication skills and experience collaborating with other teams
Strong understanding of support service principles and user-centric
Good organization and time management skills
Willingness to go that extra mile to support the wider team and our users
Perks
Fully remote team with flexible working hours.
29 annual PTOs.
Long-term incentive of tokens, vested across a 4-year period.
Additional tokens linked to performance reviews every semester.
Brand new equipment for remote work, including laptop, monitor, and chair.

329 --> Stage - Mise en place du tableau de bord mondial des données analytiques Web (H/F/X) - Février 2023
Mars
Haguenau, Grand Est, France (On-site)
Mars global Service– 6 Mois à Haguenau (Proche Strasbourg)

Mars Internship Experience

Ta Gratification :

Bac+4 : 1200 €/brut / Bac +5 : 1350 €/brut

Ta mission :

La mission se déroule dans le cadre du département "Digital Demand" et de son équipe d'ingénierie web, logicielle et digital. Le département est central avec une couverture mondiale (hors Chine et Russie) pour l'entreprise et ses segments. Il a la responsabilité unique de la mise en place des capabilités techniques et numériques au service de nos marques en ligne et de la collaboration et efficacité des Associés du groupe. Cela se concrétise avec plus de 400 sites web au travers d'une quarantaine de pays, des centaines de portails et sites Intranet pour 80 000 de nos employés et des dizaines d'applications mobiles. Tout ces actifs numériques sont de plus en plus alimentés et augmentés par l'utilisation de millions de données consommateurs. Données qui vont également servir à terme à incuber les nouvelles expériences de nos marques dans notre évolution vers le Web3 (NFT, Metaverse, Tokens, Décentralisation..) dont nos incubons les technologies et principes.

L'équipe se compose de gestionnaire de services, produits (product managers) et projets, d'architectes de solutions et d'écosystème digital, d'analystes, développeurs et ingénieur logiciels, et d'experts métiers (analytique web, applications mobile, Web CMS...). Ses membres se situent en France, aux Etats-Unis, au Brésil ou encore en Inde.

La mission consiste à mettre en place un tableau de bord global du traffic et des interactions de nos consommateurs couvrant plus de 300 sites de marque (B2C) ou de vente directe (D2C) avec l'outil Google Data Studio. Ceci afin de comprendre quelles sont les expériences consommateurs qui nous permettent d'atteindre nos objectifs business et celles qui doivent être améliorés en fonction des connaissances que nous pouvons déduire. Cela se fera en lien et en prenant en compte les besoins des représentants de nos marchés et des marques au travers des segments de Mars, en collaboration et avec le support de notre "Web Analytics Lead". Au delà du tableau de bord, la mission aménera à mettre en place les processus long terme pour en assurer sa pérennité et maintenance, et surtout des activités de conduite de changement et d'adoption (méthodologie ADKAR) afin d'encourager son adoption au travers des marches et des équipes de marques et donc de maximiser son utilisation et bénéfices indirects.

Ta Journée Type :

Une journée de cette mission sera un mélange d'interactions enrichissantes en personne ou virtuelles, et des temps de développement et de test du tableau de bord.

Tu organiseras un point régulier (daily stand-up) de 15 minutes avec ton maitre de stage pour partager ton avancement et obtenir des directions sur des sujets bloquants
Tu travailleras à la mise en place du tableau de bord en utilisant Google Data Studio
Selon tes besoins tu initieras des discussion techniques et sessions de travail avec des experts en développement Web travaillant sur les sites de nos marques (environnement Drupal / Acquia) ou sur leurs intégrations,
Tu organiseras des sessions et entretiens avec les gestionnaires de notre plateforme d’analytiques (Google Analytics). Ceci pour comprendre la signification des données collectés et comment les utiliser au mieux,
Tu rencontreras des chefs de marque, de catégorie ou de marché du marketing pour écouter leurs besoins, gagner en perspicacité et utiliser les approfondissements obtenus pour le succès de ta mission,
Tu rejoindras et participeras à des discussions ouvertes sur les dernières news du Web3 dans notre communauté mondiale de champions et selon ton intérêt et connaissances tu pourras faire partir d'initiatives blockchain / NFT. Ces discussions se déroulerons parfois dans le "metaverse" avec un casque de VR type Oculus Quest auquel tu auras accès,
Tu progresseras sur une ou plusieurs formations en ligne en lien avec la mission (Google Analytics, Google Data Studio, données consommateurs, analytiques Web…) sur une plateforme type Udacity,
Tu auras un projet parallèle innovant (Web3) ou comme concept à faire avancer en fonction de tes disponibilités.

Ton Profil :

Tu es en bac+3 (license pro/bachelor) à bac+5 (Master 1 our 2, école ingé) en technologies de l'information/numérique ou en marketing et communication ?

Tu as une première expérience (projet étudiant, stage) et connaissance d'un outil d'analytiques Web (par exemple Google Analytics, Matomo ou Simple Analytics..)

Tu as une sensibilité et des connaissances sur les bonnes pratiques de l'expérience utilisateur (UX) dans le Web ?

Tu as déjà entendu parler de Web3, NFT et Metaverse ?

Tu es reconnu pour ta capacité à apprendre rapidement, ton esprit d'analyse, ton dynamisme, ta curiosité et tu aimes être à l'initiative ?

T'entretenir avec des directeurs du marketing de marque iconiques comme Snickers, M&M's, Pedigree ou Whiskas ne te fait pas peur ?

Tu es à l'aise en anglais en toutes circonstances ?

Si oui, alors n'attends plus, nous avons hâte de te rencontrer!

--------------------------------------

330 --> Product Manager, Blockchain - Metaverse Project
Crypto Recruit 
Sydney, New South Wales, Australia (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Work with the product team to help shape the product strategy and roadmap to solve real customer problems in one of the fastest-growing industry.

The company is an Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solution, built to bring digital assets, NFTs, and blockchain gaming to life. Our mission is to empower digital asset ownership for people and businesses. If you get excited by the thought of joining a highly experienced, fast-paced global team that is building the future, this role may be for you.

As a Blockchain Product Manager, you'll report to the Head of Product and lead a cross-functional team in building world-class blockchain infrastructures for gamers and game developers. You will closely collaborate with other product managers, UI/UX designers, marketers, data analysts, and the leadership team and lead the product team through market research, product discovery, product delivery, and continuous iterations to drive business impact for the blockchain product suite.

Requirements

Work with the product team to help shape the product strategy and roadmap to solve real customer problems in one of the fastest-growing industry
Conduct qualitative and qualitative research with partners and developers to understand their needs and desires
Utilize data-driven insights to constantly improve the product
Gather requirements from relevant stakeholders (e.g. sales, marketing, customer support, legal, and finance)
Set team goals and guide the team to ensure these OKRs are achieved
Required Qualifications:

You have a technical background in Computer Science or previous 3+ years of experience working as a developer or involved in building APIs and developer tools
You have experience in driving business & product impact as part of a product team
You have the ability to combine data, UX design, and technology to solve difficult customer problems and deliver world-class solutions to users
You are someone with strong adaptability and a keen learner
