Meta Lion Ventures là Quỹ đầu tư cho các dự án công nghệ và phần mềm dựa trên nền tảng Blockchain ứng dụng Layer 1 (Ethereum, Solana, Polkadot, Binance & các L1s …) trong các giai đoạn phát triển (Set-up, IDO/IGO/INO, Launching, Generate Users…). Quỹ Meta Lion Ventures giúp các dự án phát triển và hỗ trợ truyền thông đa kênh (Twitter, Discord, Telegram, Google …), ứng dụng đa lĩnh vực (Metaverse, Defi, Gamefi, Web3, …) với đa thị trường khác nhau (US, UK, AU, Korea, Russia, Brazil …). Tính đến tháng 9/2022, cộng đồng Blockchain của quỹ đã đạt mốc hơn 10.000 thành viên trên Linkedin, 42.000 trên Twitter và hơn 53.000 thành viên trên Telegram.

Trong Nhiệm Kỳ Của Mình, Hoạt Động Chính Của Đại Sứ Được Chọn Là Lập Kế Hoạch Và Triển Khai Những Phương Án Tiếp Cận, Kết Nối Meta Lion Với Các Dự Án, Doanh Nghiệp Blockchain

Precision mobile charging systems,
Dynamic low-light color imaging with QIS,
Hierarchical edge-cloud privacy-preserved DL training,
DL training with synthetic biology and silicon combo,
In-switch network computing,
Normalization of differential privacy.
Generate patents, open-source contributions, papers, etc., in the above technical areas.

Crafting intuitive user interactions for both novice and experienced users

Writing well-documented, reusable code in C++, C#, or other languages as necessary

Diagnosing, documenting, and fixing bugs reported by testers and users

Using industry standard source control and issue tracking systems (Git, Jira, Trello, etc.)

Participating in project planning and team code reviews

Keeping up with the latest trends and advancements in augmented and virtual reality

Creativity in finding solutions to abstract design problems, particularly with respect to translating real-world concepts and interactions into VR
Capacity to prioritize tasks through self-directed time management and organization
UI/UX ability and experience a plus
Nice to have: general familiarity with industry-standard 3D graphics software such as 3DS Max, Maya, Substance, etc.

Relish working with software, network, cloud, and systems engineers to solve problems across all tiers of the stack
Help your peers succeed as much as you can

Everyone brings different experiences, perspective, knowledge and skills that makes each one of us brilliant. You don't have to meet all the requirements and experiences on this job advert to apply for and be successful in this role.

--------------------------------------

340 --> Rust Blockchain Developer
Metaverse Game Studios, Inc.
Russia (Remote)
Requirements
Who You Are
Prior Blockchain Experience is a must
• You are a code wizard who loves to design abstract technical solutions and implement them.
• You are relentlessly curious and love to tinker in new technologies. You pick them up fast and believe in pushing quick, iterative prototypes like any lean startup.
• You closely follow the blockchain and defi space and are intellectually fueled by the innovations in that space.
• You are used to being an individual contributor.
Required Background/Skills
• You have 2+ years of professional software development experience (a shipped product to end users is a plus)
• A good understanding of object-oriented programming and modern methodologies is a must.
• You are comfortable with Rust.
• You are capable of creating at least simple front ends for interacting with your Solana apps.
• You have a working understanding of the blockchain and cryptocurrency space and smart contract systems, specifically Solana.
Fully remote company - Work Anywhere!

341 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Sudbury, ON (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

Funded by many of the world's top VC funds and executives from Snap, Dapper Labs, Voodoo, and more.

They are in search of an experienced Backend Software Engineer to join the team and help them scale from tens of thousands to 1m+ active users.

The Stack:
TypeScript, Nest.js, AWS, Node.JS.

Requirements:
3+ years developing production TypeScript code
Confident knowledge of Node.js programming and Nest.js framework
Understanding and practical experience of Domain-driven design
Experience working with high availability, large-scale distributed infrastructures
Experience in building scalable applications with a large user base

The role:
Make sure our infrastructure is scalable and observable
Add the monetisation logic and backend
Scale our referral system
Build out our social functions (news feed, following, etc.)
Build out 3D export pipelines on the backend
Interact with the team for refinement sessions and planning meetings

348 --> Praktikant Metaverse Lab - The Garage (m/w/d) in Hamburg
Deloitte
Hamburg, Hamburg, Germany (On-site)
Du machst den Unterschied. Ob im Business Audit & Assurance, Risk Advisory, Tax & Legal, Financial Advisory oder Consulting: Wir bei Deloitte unterstützen unsere weltweiten Mandanten dabei, sich kontinuierlich weiterzuentwickeln. Entdecke ein vielfältiges Arbeitsumfeld, das ständig in Bewegung ist und immer um ein Zentrum kreist: dich und dein Know-how. What impact will you make?

Du willst im Bereich Consulting – The Garage Trends aus Technologie und Sozioökonomie analysieren und digitale Transformationsmodelle entwickeln? Unser Team nutzt dazu die neusten Technologien sowie Methoden aus Design Thinking, Design Sprints, Lean Startup und Agile.Sichere unseren gemeinsamen Erfolg und mach mit uns den Unterschied: als Praktikant The Garage (m/w/d).

Standorte: Düsseldorf, Berlin, Frankfurt (Main), Hamburg, Köln, München und Stuttgart.

Dein Impact:

Als Praktikant The Garage (m/w/d) im Metaverse Lab unterstützt du das Team bei Recherchen und der konkreten Entwicklung digitaler Assets. Außerdem gehören Tätigkeiten im Bereich des internationalen Community Managements zu deinen Aufgaben.

Vorbereitung und Durchführung : Unterstütze das Team in innovativen Metaverse-Projekten sowohl auf strategischer als auch auf funktionaler und operativer Ebene.
Präsentationen : Setze deine konzeptionellen Fähigkeiten sowohl bei der Vorbereitung von internen und externen Präsentationen als auch bei der Erarbeitung von Studien und Angeboten mit Fokus auf Metaverse, Extended Reality, NFTs, etc. ein.
Konzeptionalisierung : Mit dem Team entwickelst du reale Anwendungsfälle für Kunden, z. B. im Aufbau einer virtuellen Workshop-Umgebung und der Konzeptionierung neue Kollaborationsformate innerhalb dieser virtuellen Welten.
Recherchearbeit: Du führst Markt-Recherchen und Beobachtungen sowohl bzgl. aktueller Technologien (Software, Hardware) als auch bzgl. aktueller Marktteilnehmer wie Startups durch.
Projektmanagement : Arbeite eng mit dem lokalen Team des Deloitte Metaverse Lab und mit internationalen Kolleg:innen der globalen Metaverse Community zusammen und setze Projekte im internationalen Kontext um.

Dein Skillset:

Erfolgreiches Studium in (Wirtschafts-)Informatik, (Wirtschafts-)Ingenieurwesen, Betriebs- & Volkswirtschaftslehre, oder in einem anderen relevanten Studiengang
Starkes Interesse an den Themen Metaverse, Digital Assets (Blockchain, Crypto, NFTs, etc.) und an der ambitionierten Zusammenarbeit im Management Consulting-Umfeld
Überzeugendes Engagement , Offenheit, Kreativität und Spaß an neuen Themen
Analytisches und strukturiertes Denkvermögen zur Lösung komplexer Kundenanfragen
Reisebereitschaf t sowie herausragende Kommunikationsfähigkeiten auf Deutsch und Englisch

Deine Chance:

Echte Verantwortung für eigene Aufgabenpakete innerhalb unserer Projekte, die du selbständig bearbeitest
Persönliche:r Mentor:in in deinem Team, der/die dir mit Rat und Tat zur Seite steht und dich mit umfassenden Know-how unterstützt
Ein chancenreiches und internationales Umfeld, das dir einmalige Einblicke in die Arbeit des weltweit größten Prüfungs- und Beratungsunternehmens bietet
Work-Life-Balance in einem innovativen Unternehmensumfeld, das dir Gesundheitstage, Mitarbeiter:innen-Events und vieles mehr bietet
Bereichsübergreifendes Networking im Deloitte Student Network mit exklusiven Vorträgen und regelmäßigem Austausch beim Praktikant:innen-Stammtisch

Deine Verfügbarkeit:

Als Praktikant:in bist du ab sofort idealerweise für einen Zeitraum von sechs Monaten verfügbar.

Bist du bereit? Mach mit uns den Unterschied!

Unser Recruiting-Team freut sich auf deine Bewerbungsunterlagen (CV sowie Abitur-, Hochschul- und Arbeitszeugnisse) über unser Online-Formular. Ein Anschreiben ist nicht notwendig.

Gleiche Chancen für alle: Wir freuen uns über Bewerbungen von Menschen, die so vielfältig sind wie wir – unabhängig von Alter, Behinderung, ethnischer Herkunft und Nationalität, Geschlecht, Religion, sexueller Orientierung oder sozialer Herkunft. Noch Fragen? Alle Infos zu unserem Bewerbungsprozess findest du in unseren Bewerbungs-FAQs.

Ab sofort.

Technologie von und für Menschen – damit geht alles. Als Teil von Vodafone unterstützen wir Dich bei einer Karriere, die sich auszahlt. In jeder Hinsicht. Sie beginnt mit Dir. Sie beginnt jetzt.

What You Will Do

Your most important task is to help your team deliver good software projects and platforms that the whole team is proud of. That can include the following tasks
Establish and evolve formal QA processes, ensuring that the team is using industry-accepted best practices

Als digital creative ben je continue bezig met het uitwerken van digitale creatieve concepten en het verkennen van nieuwe mogelijkheden. Je inspireert Deloitte collega’s en weet klanten te verrassen met creatieve, digitale oplossingen. bedenken, creëren en implementeren van innovatieve (technische) ontwerpoplossingen die bijdrage aan de visuele ontwikkeling van de organisatie en onze klanten;
adviseren van klanten en collega’s op het gebied van visuele communicatie en nieuwe technologieën;
uitwerken van visuele concepten in samenwerking met het creatieve team;
verbeteren van zakelijke communicatie door innovatie in te zetten.

26 vakantiedagen per jaar bij een fulltime dienstverband en de mogelijkheid om extra dagen in te kopen.
Ruil 3 nationale feestdagen voor 3 niet-nationale feestdagen. Als je wilt.
Een goede mobiliteitsregeling: de keuze uit verschillende opties zoals een leaseauto, reizen met het OV, een cash budget of een combinatie daarvan.
Een laptop en iPhone. Ook voor privégebruik.
Een tijd-voor-tijdregeling. Gebruik de tijd die je op het ene moment meer maakt op momenten die er voor jou toe doen.
Een pensioenregeling waarbij je eigen bijdrage slechts 2% is. Voor later.
Mogelijkheid om deel te nemen aan de collectieve ziektekostenregeling.
Fiscaal voordelige zaken. Denk aan bedrijfsfitness, het aanschaffen van een fiets tegen bruto salaris of de mogelijkheid om een fiets te leasen.
De mogelijkheid om gebruik te maken van 55 uur oppasdienst per kalenderjaar, als jouw kind 12 jaar of jonger is.

Zes weken volledig betaald geboorteverlof voor traditionele huishoudens en regenbooggezinnen.

355 --> Assistant(e) Chef de Projet Digital
Shiseido
Paris, Île-de-France, France (On-site)
STAGE ASSISTANT CHEF DE PROJET DIGITAL

SHISEIDO GROUP EMEA

6 mois à partir du 1er janvier 2023

Reconnue comme la première entreprise de cosmétiques fondée au Japon, et aujourd’hui classée au 5ème rang mondial des groupes de beauté, Shiseido incarne l’excellence absolue dans le domaine des soins, du maquillage et des parfums. L’entreprise a été fondée en 1872 et fête ses 150 ans en 2022.

Concevant des produits toujours plus innovants et modernes, les marques du Groupe sont aujourd’hui distribuées dans plus de 120 pays et régions. Shiseido emploie environ 42 000 collaborateurs de près de 100 nationalités et a généré un chiffre d’affaires de 8,2 milliards d’euros en 2021.

Guidés par la mission « Beauty Innovations for a Better World », les collaborateurs de Shiseido sont animés par des valeurs qui illustrent son héritage unique : « People First », « Diversity », « Art & Science », « Japanese », « Uncompromising Quality » et « Omotenashi ».

Shiseido EMEA, basé à Paris, couvre les activités mondiales des marques de parfum Issey Miyake, Narciso Rodriguez, Serge Lutens, Shiseido Fragrances, et Zadig&Voltaire et de la marque de soin Ulé; ainsi que les activités et la distribution régionales de plusieurs marques du Groupe : Clé de Peau Beauté, Drunk Elephant, NARS, Shiseido Ginza Tokyo et Tory Burch.

Rattaché(e) à l’équipe E-business régionale EMEA, vous travaillerez au quotidien dans un environnement international, sur les différentes marques du groupe et sur les 3 axes (Parfums, Soins, Maquillage). Vous accompagnerez les chefs de projet E-retail & le manager d’équipe dans leurs actions et aurez une vision globale des stratégies marketing et commerciale.

Vos Missions
Lancements produits & opérations commerciales en ligne: préparation des kits de lancement digitaux de nos nouveautés ou temps forts commerciaux. (assets PDP, landing pages, newsletters, mécaniques cadeau contre achat, échantillonnage, contenus réseaux sociaux…).
Accompagnement marchés EMEA : consolidation, création et délivrance des besoins en assets e-retail.
Suivi de projets digitaux négociés avec les retailers Européens (Sephora, Zalando, Douglas, ASWatson…)
Suivi de projets créatifs en collaboration avec agences externes ou équipes internes (création assets 3D, landing pages, newsletters, CRM, contenus éducatifs, outils digitaux de diagnostic, animations metaverse…).
Contrôle image de marque: audit de nos visibilités en ligne pour garantir le respect de notre image de marque chez l’ensemble de nos partenaires.
Aide à la préparation de présentations internes ou clients
Analyses marchés & benchmark concurrence sur temps forts du digital et de la beauté.
Reporting commerciaux : suivi des plans d’animations européens sur chaque marque, suivi sell out EMEA (par marque, par pays, par client…)
Distribution : évaluation et contrôle de l’intégration de nos toutes les marques du groupe au niveau régional sur de nouveaux sites de vente, garantissant que les normes légales sont respectées.
Contacts Réguliers
Filiales Shiseido Group zone EMEA (équipes digitales, commerciales et marketing EMEA + Global)
Equipes Marketing opérationnel EMEA
Equipes Marketing développement (US & France)
Retailers Européens (Category managers, E-trade managers, Social Media managers, CRM managers…)
Agences externes
Vous intégrez une équipe collaborative à taille humaine, appliquant l’approche du test&learn, avec un bon esprit d’équipe.

Nous recherchons une personne curieuse, dynamique, avec un sens de l’organisation hors pair. Elle devra avoir une appétence pour le secteur des cosmétiques et du digital, aimant suivre les dernières tendances en ligne.

Une bonne maitrise de l’anglais est indispensable (parlé - écrit).

Job Description

The Sandbox are searching for a Level Designer to work on their UGC virtual world.

This pioneering studio has created its own virtual world where players can build, own and monetize their own 3D gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain. As a Level Designer, you'll be creating levels for the UGC virtual world under the supervision of the Founders and the Project Manager. You will be responsible for delivering levels made with the Game Makers and helping creators with their projects.

Success in this role requires a team player who will enjoy the creative challenge of exploring the limits of the studio's Game Maker and is happy to evolve alongside the constraints of the tooling environment.

You Role And Responsibilities Will Include...

Du weißt, wie man aus Daten gute Geschichten strickt? Dann werde jetzt Teil unseres Digital Content Teams!

Wer sind wir und was machen wir den ganzen Tag?

Wir sind ein bunter Haufen kreativer Menschen mit der gemeinsamen Leidenschaft für Technologie und Kommunikation. Als globales Team mit Standorten in z.B. Sydney, New York, Paris, Frankfurt und München sind wir stets am Puls der Zeit und gestalten gemeinsam mit unseren Kund*innen die Zukunft. Als Tech-Kommunikationsagentur arbeiten wir seit über 20 Jahren mit den innovativsten Tech-Brands wie u.a. Meta, LinkedIn, Amazon oder Citrix zusammen. Dabei schaffen wir Aufmerksamkeit und Netzwerke für die Technologien der Zukunft.

Kommunikation ist das Herzstück unserer Aktivitäten und das Instrument mit dem wir unserer Kund*innen, Geschäftspartner*innen sowie Kolleg*innen jeden Tag aufs Neue begeistern. Dabei achten wir auf Transparenz und agieren als Berater*innen, um gemeinsam das beste Resultat zu erzielen. Der Mut, kalkulierte Risiken einzugehen, gepaart mit dem Willen, jedes Projekt zum Erfolg zu führen, lässt uns für unsere Kund*innen echte Success-Stories entwerfen. Wir arbeiten im Team und mit Hilfe von Feedback kreieren wir Chancen für persönliches Wachstum und sind bereit für die Herausforderungen von morgen.

Wer bist du und was wirst du hier machen?

Als Data & Digital Specialist (w/m/d) verlängerst du unsere kreativen Kampagnen in den digitalen Raum. Du analysierst Daten und bereitest sie routiniert auf – egal ob performance-orientiert (=Dashboards) oder storyline-orientiert (=PowerPoint Slides und ähnliche Formate). Gemeinsam mit Fachexpert*innen aus unterschiedlichsten Bereichen entwickelst und verwirklichst du Digital-Marketing-Kampagnen, wobei du dich einerseits um den Performance-Part kümmerst, andererseits aber auch in den gesamten kreativen Prozess von Anfang an eingebunden bist. In deiner Rolle bist du ein wichtiger Stützpfeiler für unser wachsendes Angebot im Bereich B2B Marketing Services.

Mit deiner Expertise unterstützt du Kolleg*innen aus unterschiedlichen Ländern, Büros und Kundenteams. Dabei ist ein hohes Maß an Eigenständigkeit und Proaktivität gefragt – mach dich bemerkbar und lass uns an deinen Gedanken teilhaben. Das gilt auch, wenn es darum geht, als Unternehmen zu wachsen. Du hast eine Idee für ein neues Produkt? Du weißt, wie ein Prozess schneller und effizienter ablaufen könnte? Lass uns drüber sprechen.

Wichtig ist auch zu wissen, dass du dich bei Hotwire sehr viel mit Zukunftstechnologien beschäftigen wirst. Denn unsere Kund*innen revolutionieren die Elektromobilität, bauen das Metaverse oder schaffen die technischen Grundlagen für die hybride Arbeitswelt von morgen. Wir helfen ihnen, die richtigen Geschichten rund um diese Technologien zu erzählen.

Deine Aufgaben im Detail?
Erstellung und Pflege von Marketing-Dashboards mit Echtzeit-Daten, Anbindung von APIs, Datenbereinigung und -umwandlung, Qualitätssicherung
Entwicklung, Umsetzung und Optimierung von Digital-Marketing-Kampagnen mit Fokus auf Performance Marketing und Lead Generierung
Bereitstellung von Analysen und strategischen Insights mithilfe verschiedener Tools und Datenquellen sowie in Zusammenarbeit mit externen Dienstleister*innen
Entwicklung neuer Lösungen zur Aggregation und Visualisierung von Daten

Was du im Rucksack hast?
Du bist in den Bereichen Digital Marketing und/oder Data Analytics zu Hause
Du verstehst die Grundspielarten des Performance Marketings und/oder hast Lust, dich in diesem Bereich umfassend weiterzubilden
Die zielgruppengerechte Aufbereitung von Daten ist genau dein Ding – du kannst große Datenmengen so aufbereiten, dass am Ende jeder die Botschaft versteht
Du beherrschst mindestens eine der folgenden Plattformen für Datenvisualisierung: Google Data Studio, Tableau, PowerBI
Teamgeist und eine hohe Bereitschaft dich selbst und uns zu entwickeln, zeichnen dich aus
Du verfügst über sehr gute Englischkenntnisse, damit du mit Kund*innen und Teammitglieder*innen in einem internationalen Umfeld problemlos kommunizieren kannst

Was erwartet dich hier?
Eine Arbeitsumgebung, in der du einfach du sein und deine beste Arbeit leisten kannst, egal ob du laut oder leise oder irgendwas dazwischen bist – bei uns musst du dich nicht verbiegen
Umfassende Weiterentwicklungsmöglichkeiten, denn du sollst bei uns wachsen können
Thoughtful Working – arbeite wo und wie es dir am besten passt, Flexibilität ist für uns mehr als nur ein Lippenbekenntnis
GOHotwire! – Besuche deine Hotwire-Kolleg*innen in Paris, New York, San Francisco, Sydney oder anderswo und lass dich von neuen Eindrücken inspirieren
Bootcamp – das Highlight unseres Jahres, wenn alle Hotwire-Mitarbeiter*innen weltweit für drei Tage an einem Ort zusammenkommen, diese Party willst du nicht verpassen
Sabbatical – alle vier Jahre schicken wir dich in eine bezahlte Pause, damit du mal richtig abschalten oder lang gehegte Träume erfüllen kannst
Und natürlich die besten Teammitglieder, die man sich nur wünschen kann (gut, wir sind da vielleicht ein bisschen parteiisch)

Wir freuen uns auf dich und deine Kurzbewerbung bestehend aus deinem Lebenslauf und allem, was du uns sonst noch wissen lassen möchtest.

Diversität und Chancengleichheit liegt uns am Herzen. Daher freuen wir uns besonders über Bewerbungen schwerbehinderter und ihnen gleichgestellter behinderter Menschen.

Brinc is a global venture firm that combines accelerators, funds, and a worldwide network to drive the success of entrepreneurs building the defining companies of tomorrow. Through active engagement with startups that contribute positively to humankind and the planet, we seek investment opportunities with the objective to enhance long-term value creation, generate attractive financial returns and drive societal, environmental, and technological innovation.

To date, we have invested in and supported the growth of more than 200 startups that demonstrably contribute to the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), solving global challenges across Food & Water Security, Healthcare, Climate Change, Urbanization, Connectivity, Transportation and Financial Inclusion. The interview process

Brinc is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status, nor any other basis prohibited by law. Brinc’s interview process is objective, where all candidates complete a Bryq assessment, a 20-minute online bias-free assessment that enables applicant screening only against job and company requirements. STAGE ASSISTANT CHEF DE PROJET DIGITAL

SHISEIDO GROUP EMEA

6 mois à partir du 1er janvier 2023

Reconnue comme la première entreprise de cosmétiques fondée au Japon, et aujourd’hui classée au 5ème rang mondial des groupes de beauté, Shiseido incarne l’excellence absolue dans le domaine des soins, du maquillage et des parfums. L’entreprise a été fondée en 1872 et fête ses 150 ans en 2022.

Concevant des produits toujours plus innovants et modernes, les marques du Groupe sont aujourd’hui distribuées dans plus de 120 pays et régions. Shiseido emploie environ 42 000 collaborateurs de près de 100 nationalités et a généré un chiffre d’affaires de 8,2 milliards d’euros en 2021.

Guidés par la mission « Beauty Innovations for a Better World », les collaborateurs de Shiseido sont animés par des valeurs qui illustrent son héritage unique : « People First », « Diversity », « Art & Science », « Japanese », « Uncompromising Quality » et « Omotenashi ».

Shiseido EMEA, basé à Paris, couvre les activités mondiales des marques de parfum Issey Miyake, Narciso Rodriguez, Serge Lutens, Shiseido Fragrances, et Zadig&Voltaire et de la marque de soin Ulé; ainsi que les activités et la distribution régionales de plusieurs marques du Groupe : Clé de Peau Beauté, Drunk Elephant, NARS, Shiseido Ginza Tokyo et Tory Burch.

Rattaché(e) à l’équipe E-business régionale EMEA, vous travaillerez au quotidien dans un environnement international, sur les différentes marques du groupe et sur les 3 axes (Parfums, Soins, Maquillage). Lancements produits & opérations commerciales en ligne: préparation des kits de lancement digitaux de nos nouveautés ou temps forts commerciaux. (assets PDP, landing pages, newsletters, mécaniques cadeau contre achat, échantillonnage, contenus réseaux sociaux…).

Suivi de projets créatifs en collaboration avec agences externes ou équipes internes (création assets 3D, landing pages, newsletters, CRM, contenus éducatifs, outils digitaux de diagnostic, animations metaverse…).
Contrôle image de marque: audit de nos visibilités en ligne pour garantir le respect de notre image de marque chez l’ensemble de nos partenaires.
Aide à la préparation de présentations internes ou clients
Analyses marchés & benchmark concurrence sur temps forts du digital et de la beauté.
Reporting commerciaux : suivi des plans d’animations européens sur chaque marque, suivi sell out EMEA (par marque, par pays, par client…)
Distribution : évaluation et contrôle de l’intégration de nos toutes les marques du groupe au niveau régional sur de nouveaux sites de vente, garantissant que les normes légales sont respectées.
Contacts Réguliers
Filiales Shiseido Group zone EMEA (équipes digitales, commerciales et marketing EMEA + Global)

Equipes Marketing développement (US & France)

Agences externes

Nous recherchons une personne curieuse, dynamique, avec un sens de l’organisation hors pair. Elle devra avoir une appétence pour le secteur des cosmétiques et du digital, aimant suivre les dernières tendances en ligne.

Une bonne maitrise de l’anglais est indispensable (parlé - écrit).

Individualized
Individualized working hours and working time models: You are free to choose when you work, around the 2 hour core hours. We offer part-time and full-time positions as well as flexible changes in between.
Individualized work locations: We support you in freely choosing your work location - you decide from where you work with us, worldwide.
Individualized benefits: Extended health insurance, also worldwide - support for private pension plans.
Individualized support for home/remote office

What we do?
The next big thing: We are doing today what customers will see as innovative tomorrow. Topics like NFTs, Sound Interfaces, LoRa, Metaverse and Metahuman are currently topics we are working on.
Our Groundwork: We implement the full range of digital projects for our clients - from CMS, PWAs and mobile apps to 3D animations and deployment structures.
Our style: We work on projects worldwide with teams of over 15 nationalities, our working language is English, we work on topics that move our clients forward and our people are good at finding the most efficient solution.

No matter who you are, where you come from, what you believe, or what you geek out about, we bring people together to make great work. That's what makes us THIS IS! Digital Media Group.

If you love development, you should join us!

371 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] Frontend Engineer (2년 이상)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

Migaloo는 블록체인을 활용하는 창작자 중심의 메타버스를 개발하는 프로젝트입니다. 더 자유로운 창작 활동과 새로운 플랫폼이 만나, 지금껏 없던 새로운 경험과 즐거움이 탄생할 거라 믿습니다. PUBG를 만든 크래프톤이 제페토를 만든 네이버 제트와 힘을 합쳐 세상을 놀라게 할 새로운 도전을 하고 있습니다.

Project Migaloo에 대해 좀 더 자세히 알고 싶으시다면 아래 링크의 내용을 확인해주세요!
Project Migaloo 소개 페이지: https://careers.migaloo.io/

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
메타버스 유저들이 이용할 통합 웹 프로덕트의 프론트엔드를 초기 단계부터 설계하고 개발하는 업무를 진행합니다.
유저들이 애셋을 자유롭게 거래할 수 있는 Marketplace, 창작자의 창작활동을 지원하는 Creator Center, 유저들의 자유로운 의견이 모이는 Community 등 다양한 시스템의 UI를 개발합니다.
개발 과정에서 발생하는 여러 가지 트레이드오프에 대해 깊게 고민하며, 주어진 환경에서 최적의 선택으로 최고의 제품을 만들기 위해 끊임없이 노력합니다.
개인과 팀 그리고 비즈니스가 같은 목표를 향해 가고 있는지 함께 고민하며 나아갑니다.

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
알고리즘 및 자료구조에 대한 기본적인 이해가 있으신 분
하나의 프로덕트에 대해 오너쉽을 가지고 1년 이상 개발해보신 분
주도적으로 문제를 정의하고 집요하게 파고들어 해결한 경험이 있으신 분
새로운 지식을 습득하고 동료들에게 공유하며 함께 성장하는 것에 보람을 느끼시는 분
다양한 직군의 사람들과 상호 원활한 커뮤니케이션을 통해 최선의 결과를 찾아내실 수 있으신 분
React와 Typescript를 자신 있게 사용하실 수 있는 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
웹 기반 서비스를 처음부터 개발해 런칭한 경험이 있으신 분
Redux, React Query 등을 활용해 복잡한 상태 관리를 처리한 경험이 있으신 분
디자인 시스템을 활용한 UI 개발 경험이 있으신 분
SSR (Server-side rendering) 개발 경험이 있으신 분
웹 페이지에서 3D 렌더링 경험이 있으신 분
오픈소스 활동 경험이 있으신 분
블록체인 분야에 대한 관심이 있으신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 직무 테스트 (Technical Fit Test) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

392 --> Pre Sales Architect - Infura
ConsenSys
China (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. ConsenSys
Hong Kong, Hong Kong SAR (Remote)
Our mission is to unlock the collaborative power of communities by making Web3 universally easy to use, access, and build on

Working with ConsenSys puts you at the forefront of an evolving paradigm, transforming our society for the better. We fundamentally believe blockchain is the next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society.

Blockchain tech is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler and we’re far from reaching our full potential. You’ll get to work on the tools, infrastructure, and apps that scale these platforms to billions of users.

You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers, and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.

About DevU Sales

The DevU Sales team is focussed on driving repeatable sales for Infura and our developer products. Working with our executive team, marketing, product and services team, we drive the adoption of Infura in many core market segments (Defi / DAOs / Wallets, NFTs / Metaverse / Gaming, and Enterprise, financial services and Web2 companies) as well as through strategic partners, incubators, VCs, ISVs and system integrators. Complementing our field sales team is the Presales Architect team, playing an instrumental in helping our prospects and customers achieve their success with our products.

What You Do

As a Pre-Sales Architect (Infura, Developers Tools & Infrastructure), you support product sale efforts by advising customers on ways to integrate Infura and other developer products with their tech stack.

While the role is not a sales quota-carrying role currently, the acquisition and retention of Infura customers are some of its main OKRs (objectives & key results).

Day-to-day, you participate in discovery and sales calls with Web3 companies, blockchain application builders, DeFi protocols and NFT platforms in order to articulate the benefits of the Infura product suite and identify ways to integrate these products into the customers' workflows.

Once a customer need has been identified, you drive the technical sales cycle with a high degree of autonomy, organizing technical workshops with customer stakeholders, delivering technical architectures and diagrams, demos, estimating the time and cost of integration steps, working with professional services and partners as needed, and delivering customer-ready technical proposals summarizing your findings and recommendations. You work closely with the Infura product team in order to understand how the current features and API endpoints, and product roadmap, may be relevant to the customer’s needs and drive feature requirements feedback.

You continuously learn about Ethereum technology, DeFi protocols, NFT innovations, DAOs and Wallets and ConsenSys product features, in order to be regarded as a world-class expert on decentralized application infrastructure on public blockchain networks.

The role is global in scope (Americas, EMEA, APAC). It mostly involves remote work, but occasional travel up to 30% of the time to attend customer meetings, conferences or hackathons may be involved.

Skills & Experience

Software engineer experience + at least 3+ years as solution architect / tech lead role at a tech company.
Experience in SaaS/ IaaS/ PaaS or API based products
Experience in creating technical and solutions architecture for simple and complex business problems
Experience in creating quick prototypes and demos for customers
Passionate about Ethereum/Web3 technologies and excellent knowledge of various L1/L2 Networks, NFTs, DeFi, Smart Contracts, etc
Hands-on experience of modern application architecture from conception, design, technology evaluation, pilot program, sizing, implementation, maintenance, and support.
Excellent customer-facing and communication skills (demos, workshops, public speaking, discussions with C-level and with developers)
Experienced in gathering, understanding and rationalizing customer business requirements.
Strong emotional intelligence and ability to work collaboratively with multiple stakeholders on multiple opportunities in a fast pace environment
Should be comfortable working as an independent contributor and as part of a team
Solutions Architect certification with any one of the cloud providers (AWS, Azure or Google) is a nice to have

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic-but-fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway, detailing your relevant transferable skills in your cover letter. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

410 --> ARKit Developer
Curie
Seattle, WA (Remote)
About Curie

Virtual showrooms save lives and the environment. We believe the Metaverse is a more sustainable way to support e-commerce, and we're looking for smart, driven people to help us populate the Metaverse.

Curie is a Seattle-based startup focused on supplying the growing need for 3D, from retail to online experiences, by creating AI-powered tools at the forefront of technology to generate 3D assets.

Work in a remote-work environment with room for autonomy and self-direction. You are self-motivated, work at the forefront of AI-powered tools, and have a passion for high-quality experiences of the future.

Description

This project is to help define and implement an extension to our company’s existing API system to allow our customer’s iOS applications to pull our 3D objects (hosted via Cloud Front). This link needs to track usage of the 3D object (number of views) and trigger actions (i.e. report usage to date, stop serving objects if budget targets are exceeded, ensure there is a ‘poster’ image for each 3D object, etc).

The developer who succeeds in this project will be able to certify that the links we provide to our customers are easy for them to implement, load our 3D objects quickly and certify that the iOS AR experience (via ARKit) will be excellent for the end-users.

Requirements
Proven experience working with ARKit inside native iOS applications utilizing Swift
Experience working with APIs, specifically Object Capture API, familiarization with sending authorization tokens, and pulling data
Familiarity in Computer Vision, 3D Reconstruction, Photogrammetry
Knowledge in any of the following AR tools: AR in Unity, AR in Unreal

Founded in 2016, Varjo now operates in over 40 countries worldwide with 170+ employees in offices in Helsinki, Oslo, and Washington D.C. And the resolution revolution has only just begun.

Our in-house R&D team produces virtual and mixed reality hardware, software, and services that are now a symbol of the highest quality across the industry. Varjo’s VR and XR solutions are already being used to train astronauts at Boeing, design vehicles at Aston Martin, and for virtually all professional use cases across the world’s leading companies. Since recently, we’ve also been setting new standards for prosumers looking for true-to-life virtual simulations. Next, we are about to bring to life our vision for the metaverse of the future. The programmable world that once existed only behind our screens will merge with our physical surroundings, and it will forever change the choreography of our everyday life.

We are offering you an exciting position where you can see into the future and play your part in shaping Varjo’s commercial efforts.

Job Description

An exciting opportunity is now available for a Solution Engineer, within the Varjo team for EMEA & APAC. The purpose of this role is to bring technical hands-on VR expertise to assist the sales team so that we can directly support our customers with solution development and deployment. The Solution Engineer will bring their extensive expertise in the most popular 3D engines such as Unity or Unreal Engine, and/or 3D designs tools such as Autodesk VRED and CATIA etc as well as sector specific VR/XR tools, combining that with their knowledge of Varjo solutions so that the customer gets the best result. This enables Varjo to support our customers as we grow from successful initial proof of concepts through to large scale enterprise deployments.

This role will work directly with qualified end customers to help them solve real problems, and in regular close contact with both R&D and Customer Support teams. The Solutions Engineer is ideally placed to drive the productive flow of information and feedback in all directions. They are comfortable in both customer-facing and detailed internal engineering conversations and can operate on their own or as part of a wider team working with strategic customer accounts.

As a Varjo team-member, you will be part of a growth company culture with minimal bureaucracy and maximum opportunity to take charge of your work. Varjo culture values willingness to learn, work and grow with the best colleagues in an international business environment. High ambition, passion, caring for each other, trust and respect are key characteristics of how Varjo people work and win business in the global markets.

Responsibilities

The key responsibilities of the Solutions Engineer can be summarized as follows:

Serves as the technical bridge between Varjo engineering and EMEA & APAC customers / strategic partners, as well as being the bridge between customers and the Varjo customer support team on challenging support cases.
Supports sales and business development with technical depth in finding solutions for customer needs and requirements.
Joins sales team members on calls, helps answer questions and supports deep discovery.
Serve as the bridge between Varjo’s software partnership team and the customer, helping the customer to make most use of Varjo-specific functionality in each software
Take detailed feedback from customers (issues, as well as feature requests), structure it and bring it up with the right people in the organization
Helps customers to directly go from a concept of XR usage into detailed level understanding of how their needs can be solved. Helps the customer to scope the technical requirements required to create a successful solution, including software integration, game engines and hardware compatibility.
Works with customers & partners on Varjo hardware / software integrations to develop effective proof of concepts.
For strategic customers/partners, consults and helps provide guidance around wider application and program deployments.
Proactively addresses more complex support tickets to ensure customer satisfaction and create favourable conditions to further grow the Varjo business.

The key KPIs for the role are seen to be in the following areas

Successful deployment of Varjo technology to solve customer problems.
Growth in existing accounts by expanding deployment and perceived business benefits
Successful migration of customers from VR to XR usage
Successful resolution of Support cases and increased customer satisfaction.

Requirements

You will ideally also have hands-on experience working with VR and/or AR hardware
Experience working in 3D software’s such as VRED, CATIA, 3DS is also beneficial.
Comfortable working in customer facing roles.

Outstanding team player who is motivated in helping the team to reach their goals.
Excellent presenter with native-level business English language skills.
Interest and experience in working with international customers and teams
MBA/MSc level educational degree.

Next steps

Fantastic opportunity reshape the future of computing by taking part in creating the new state-of-the-art in virtual and mixed reality experiences.

414 --> FTR Senior Threat Researcher (Forward Looking Threat Research) [Web3 Focus]
Trend Micro Europe
Cork, County Cork, Ireland (Remote)
Discover Trend
Trend Micro, a global cybersecurity leader, helps make the world safe for exchanging digital information. Fueled by decades of security expertise, global threat research, and continuous innovation, Trend Micro's cybersecurity platform protects hundreds of thousands of organizations and millions of individuals across clouds, networks, devices, and endpoints. As a leader in cloud and enterprise cybersecurity, the platform delivers a powerful range of advanced threat defense techniques optimized for environments like AWS, Microsoft, and Google, and central visibility for better, faster detection and response. With 7,000 employees across 65 countries, Trend Micro enables organizations to simplify and secure their connected world. For additional information, visit www.trendmicro.com

Discover You
At Trend, we are always looking for top talent. We hire capability 1st, and you will work with the best. When you join us, you have direct access to any level, and freedom to make an impact and influence. With Trend Micro, you drive your own development. You are recognised for your passion to succeed, and can be the best part of yourself here.

This role - This is a Global Role therefore it can be based anywhere!

Trend Micro’s Forward Looking Threat Research team (FTR) is a global team of Senior Researchers tasked with scouting the the likely future risks in security by researching what:
• Cybercriminals are working on today (Underground and Deepweb, Targeted Attacks / APT and Malware research)
• How the users / victims are using the web (Social Networks, New emerging services, etc)
• What technologies are available now and in the future (e.g. IOT, Web3 / Metaverse, Spread of Mobile OS, Blockchain)

This FTR researcher role will be responsible for focusing on the threats that will affect emerging Web3 technologies, in particular on Blockchain based attacks on Smart Contracts, DeFi and the upcoming systems that will be built on top of them. They will also be expected to look into higher layers of the emerging Web such as Metaverse security concerns.

This role will not be purely focused on the technologies involved, but also combine this by looking at real world attacks that we would expect to see coming from financially motivated criminals and espionage focused targeted attacks / APT in this new web paradigm. The ideal candidate will both have a good understanding of todays cybercrime threat landscape, but also a passion for the underlying technologies of Web3 – and be able to develop research on where we expect new user behavior, technology and criminal business models to evolve to in the period of 1-3 years.

The FTR researcher is also responsible for researching local matters – such as unique user behaviors, crimes or emerging technologies in certain countries. They will be expected to interface with government agencies, law enforcement, ISPs, CERTs, universities and other research groups for research, disclosure, and knowledge sharing.

This position requires the researcher to represent Trend Micro in external conferences, either as an attendee or as a speaker.
As the team is globally distributed the successful candidate must be willing to travel for global meetings and conferences.

Some of FTR externally published work can be found at:
http://us.trendmicro.com/us/trendwatch/research-and-analysis/white-papers-and-articles/index.html

Desired Experiences & Skills:
Bachelor’s degree or Higher strongly preferred, or strong self taught and proven skillset.
In-depth knowledge in Blockchain Technologies and tools for security analysis in this space
Good knowledge in DeFi security, product landscape and current attacks
Good knowledge in Smart Contract Security and current attacks (especially Ethereum)
Hands on experience in smart contract vulnerability exploitation
Familiar with on the ongoing discussions on Web3 / Metaverse
Good knowledge of the current Threat Landscape
Proven Research oriented mindset
General Programming ability (e.g. Python, Rust, Go, Bash)
Fast learner
Able to work in a multi-cultural group
Self-motivated and able to work unsupervised
Very good communication skills
Must be fluent in English, both spoken and written

Champion and foster a culture of innovation at all levels of the organization

Strong programming skills in Python, Java or other programming languages
A strong academic publishing record is strongly preferred
Excellent written & interpersonal communication skills and the ability to communicate complex concepts
Be curious, embrace uncertainty and be comfortable with failure while exploring with new ideas
Commitment and adherence to the highest ethical standards

Position Summary

Unlimited Reality – XR Architect

Deloitte US | Deloitte Consulting LLP

The Team Unlimited Reality

The Metaverse is enabled by the convergence of XR, 5G, AI, Cloud, and Web3 technologies. This allows the creation of immersive and interactive spatial environments linking the physical and virtual worlds, and potentially powered by their own native digital economies. Deloitte’s Unlimited Reality practice advises clients and builds Metaverse solutions, focused on Unlimited Reality or Metaverse experiences , Virtual Goods and Commerce , Augmented Work and Learning , Enterprise Simulation , and Trust and Resilience .

Job Description

Want to build new value with digital technology and turn your ideas into human impact? So do we!

There’s one in every group—the person who dreams big and has the motivation to bring their ideas to life, even as others might roll their eyes and prefer to play it safe. Are you that person? Because we are building teams of people like that to help our clients unlock the power they need now and own what’s next.

At Avanade Advisory, we are breaking apart the traditional process of setting strategies and goals first, then finding technologies to achieve them. In the digital age, there’s no time for that linear process. We partner with clients to accelerate value from digital innovation by being ambitious, imaginative – and fast. We believe big and deliver personally. We relentlessly challenge, encourage, and support our clients and each other.

Want the agility and energy of a start-up, backed by the resources of Accenture, Microsoft and the Center for Information Systems Research at MIT Sloan School of Management? Ultimately, we’re not just making business better. We’re making life better for our clients and their customers.

If that sounds like you, you sound good to us! Find your next opportunity at Avanade Advisory.

423 --> Editor De Vídeo
This is Odd
Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Empieza una nueva era en comunicación. Llegan los Alfa con fuerza y las marcas y las agencias todavía no saben qué hacer con los Z (pero nosotros sí, y con los Alfa, también). WE WANT YOU en nuestro equipo para ayudarnos a crear el mejor contenido, reventar métricas y ser reconocidos por la frescura de nuestro contenido. QUIÉNES SOMOS Y QUÉ HACEMOSSomos una agencia de estrategia y contenido con el objetivo de crear el mejor contenido para marcas que buscan ser referentes en comunicación para las generaciones más jóvenes (Z y Alfa). ESTRATEGIA: investigamos el target y nos rompemos el coco para definir los mensajes con los que van a conectar.CONTENIDO: estamos siempre atentos a los últimos formatos y canales (TikTok, Instagram, BeReal, YT, TW…) y generamos el contenido que el target busca en cada una de ellos. Tenemos partners metaverse-ready. EJECUCIÓN: diseño gráfico, video, foto, eventos, spots…MEDICIÓN: estamos encima de los datos para medir, medir y medir. Vamos a resultados y aplicamos learnings semana a semana para que las métricas solo suban. JOB DESCRIPTION Buscamos a un/a video editor junior que domine de nuevos lenguajes, tenga miles de referentes del mundo online y tenga la capacidad para generar narrativas a través de clips de video. Alguien que tenga experiencia editando video para creadores de contenido (youtubers, tiktokers…) Buscamos a gente brillante con ganas de comerse el mundo, muchísima actitud y con espíritu líder. Serás el/la responsable de editar todos los videos de la agencia para todos los canales (Youtube, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter…). REQUISITOS Control de los formatos de contenido digital: queremos que sepas lo nuevo y lo viejo. Tienes claro por qué los vídeos se viralizan y cómo intentar aplicar esto a tu contenido.Conocimiento del contenido y el ecosistema de: Instagram, TikTok, Youtube, Twitch y cualquier plataforma nueva.Dominio de Adobe Premiere y todo tipo de apps de edición de video, capacidad para crear content como un auténtico influencer. Editor de video nato: serías finalista en un proceso de selección para ser editor de Ibai Llanos. Conocimiento de todas las redes sociales, saber editar con sus herramientas nativas, transiciones, filtros, efectos y capacidad de aprendizaje rápido para aquellas redes que están por venir. Actitud, actitud, actitud: buscamos gente con espíritu líder, buen rollo y mucha proactividad y motivación. Extra Point: Conocimiento del resto de programas del pack Adobe: Indesign, Photoshop, Illustrator y Adobe After Effects, y punto para Gryffindor si tienes control en edición de color con programas como Da Vinci, o sabes animar modelos 3D con Blender o Cinema 4D.Gran habilidad narrativa: deberás ser capaz de elegir los momentos clave de los brutos y montar piezas dinámicas que cuenten una historia. Ser rápido/a. Muy mucho. Trabajar en equipo: es cliché pero va en serio, queremos que sepas delegar y que puedas generar un ambiente de trabajo eficiente con tus juniors y seniors. Actitud, actitud, actitud. Sí, otra vez porque es importante. QUÉ OFRECEMOSTrabajar con grandes cuentas como Wallapop, Mango, Marriott, MWC…Espacio para desarrollar tu carrera: estamos en pleno crecimiento y tenemos constantes oportunidades. Flexibilidad horaria, teletrabajo (aunque necesitamos verte en nuestras ofis en Barcelona). CONTACTO ******

424 --> Internship - Development of a benchmarking tool for Dynamic Mesh Coding
Nokia
Antwerp, Flemish Region, Belgium (On-site)
Come create the technology that helps the world act together

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work.

The team you'll be part of

Nokia Technologies is licensing Nokia intellectual property, including patents, technologies, and the Nokia brand, building on Nokia’s continued innovation and decades of R&D leadership in technologies deployed in virtually all connected devices used today. Come join us and make an impact!

You will join the Immersive and Video Systems team, which has a proven record of inventing multimedia systems, Video and 3D coding technologies, and of enriching Nokia’s product and IPR portfolios.

What You Will Learn And Contribute To

We are looking for a passionate last year Master Student who is autonomous, fluent in software development using Python, and who is interested in learning about 3D applications and associated content.

Are you passionate about solving problems?

As part of our team, you will:
acquire knowledge on 3D Dynamic Meshes, their use and applications to future XR applications and the metaverse
obtain insights on Video-based coding of dynamic meshes (V-DMC) technology and its current standardization at MPEG
focus on the development in Python of a portable and extendable benchmarking tool for available V-DMC encoding and decoding software
devise and document a suitable architecture for this benchmarking tool that will be reviewed and improved with the team
perform simulations with the implemented tool and present the results to a wider Immersive Video and Systems audience

Your Skills And Experience

You are:
An enrolled Master student in engineering (electrical, applied physics, photonics), computer science, applied mathematics, or physics
Available for a duration of 6 weeks
Fluent in English
Fluent with Python
Familiar with C/C++, Bash scripts

It would be nice if you also had:
Some knowledge of CMake and Makefiles
An affinity for or experience with 3D content (meshes, point clouds, 3D video)

What We Offer

Nokia offers flexible and hybrid working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered.

Due to its central location near Antwerp Central station, our office is very easy to access by public transport and close to the center of a bustling city.

Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality:

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

425 --> Technical Artist
Insight Global
United States (Remote)
Duration: 12-18 month contract + extensions/opportunity for conversion
Location: 100% remote
Title: Senior Technical Artist
Company: Confidential, please apply for details
W2

Desired Skills and Experience
3-5 years of experience with facilitating 3D assets and pipelines.
3-5 years’ experience using 3D asset tools and engines to create realistic, interactive AR/VR experiences (Unity, Reality Capture, Blender, Houdini, Photoshop, etc.).
Real-time experience – these techniques are interactive and intersect with the project
3-5 years’ experience in facilitating team progress and driving strategic project execution, preferably via 2+ years of work in project management and/or production (driving pipelines, goals, budgets, schedules, contracts, etc.)
Energetic about global collaboration on a flexible schedule (some days as early as 8 AM Pacific Time).
Plusses
Optimization: making things work under constraints
Not a VFX/consult with tons of memory budget and space, spend a lot of time thinking about how to make the memory as small as possible
Experience as a software engineer
Good artistic background – hand modeling, 3D art
Experience with 3D mesh reconstruction tools (such as Reality Capture) is a strong plus and work with such platforms will be required.
Day-to-Day

The Technical Artist drives our 3D asset pipeline for the Global Historical Archive (GHA). GHA enables people to defy distance and engage with heritage sites around the world in VR, on the web, and on other Metaverse channels. The teammate will work with global teammates to create and digitize assets for global sites, optimize and deploy assets onto Metaverse channels, and improve our pipeline over time. The work will be a mix of hands-on development and team facilitation. As a hands-on contributor, the teammate will develop and optimize assets such as site scans, 3D models, and more. As a facilitator, the teammate will collaboratively set and drive key results in our pipeline while also being a lead contributor to partnerships and strategic initiatives.

This is a seasonal part-time opportunity where you will work approximately 16-20 hours per week.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

High School Diploma or equivalent

Professional demeanor

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS :

The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

While performing the duties of this job, the employee is required to:

BDS Connected Solutions offers a complete suite of Connected Commerce solutions that blend Advocacy, Training, Retail, Virtual, Experiential, and Digital environments to influence the modern buyer, regardless of where they are on their shopping journey. Since 1985, BDS has been inspired by innovation; as we continue to evolve as a trendsetter in today’s disruptive market, we enable our clients to do the same. 427 --> Ingénieur(e) Système embarqué
engIT
Greater Nice Metropolitan Area (Hybrid)
Descriptif du poste
Dans le cadre du développement de nos activités « Embedded SW » à Sophia Antipolis (Côte d’Azur), nous recherchons un(e) Ingénieur(e) Linux embarqué Yocto/Android.
QUI SOMMES-NOUS ?

engIT est l'une des plus belles success story de ces 5 dernières années dans l’univers de l’innovation IT et de l’IT services (croissance annuelle moyenne de +30%, avec en ligne de mire 400 collaborateurs et +40M€ de chiffre d'affaires pour 2025).

Notre savoir-faire et nos expertises se retrouvent dans l’accompagnement et le conseil en transformation digitale, l’ingénierie logicielle des systèmes d’information (architecture, web, applicatif) et des systèmes embarqués, la blockchain, la data engineering, l’IoT, l’infrastructure (Ops, Système, Cloud, Réseaux) et la sécurisation des SI.

CE QUE NOUS POUVONS ACCOMPLIR ENSEMBLE ?

Sur notre site de Sophia Antipolis, les équipes engIT accompagnent des acteurs économiques privés et publics dans leurs grands projets de transformation digitale et innovation IT (ex : développement de systèmes embarqués pour les voitures connectées, développement de nouvelles applications de gestion des flux data, intégration du metaverse dans leur écosystème, déploiement de la réalité augmentée, migration vers le cloud).

En rejoignant notre pôle d’expertise « Embedded SW » en tant que Spécialiste Linux embarqué vous serez amené(e) à :
Concevoir et développer des logiciels embarqués pour les appareils électroniques grand public et Objets connectés.
Vous engager dans toutes les phases du cycle de vie du développement du produit, depuis les premiers choix de conception jusqu'au flashage du logiciel du produit en usine, et les solutions de mise à jour over-the-air (OTA) sécurisées.
Collaborer avec les communautés Open Source pertinentes y compris en upstream.
Adapter les logiciels embarqués aux nouveaux SoC, cartes et produits customs en se concentrant principalement sur u-boot, Linux, Yocto et Android.
Travailler en environnement international avec des équipes multisites et des clients distants.


QUI ÊTES VOUS ?

Vous êtes diplômé(e) Ingénieur Informatique (Bac+5 :)
Vous avez au moins 1 an d'expérience dans le développement de logiciels embarqués.
Vous avez déjà eu une expérience dans le développement et le débogage de noyaux Linux sur des plateformes matérielles embarquées / IoT.
Le langage C est votre préféré et vous imaginez mal travailler en environnement Windows.
Votre niveau d'anglais vous permet de vous exprimer aussi bien à l’oral qu’à l’écrit en environnement professionnel.
Vous souhaitez contribuer à des projets innovants et porteurs comme les transports de demain (Véhicules Autonomes : Electriques à Hydrogène, la MedTech, la PropTech, la TravelTech) … Vous recherchez un écosystème qui bouge, une culture d’entreprise collaborative assumée ?

Poste basé sur la côte d’azur à Sophia Antipolis première technopole européenne (à proximité de Nice, Cannes & Monaco).

L’ENVIRONNEMENT TECHNIQUE ET FONCTIONNEL DANS LEQUEL VOUS EVOLUEREZ :

Maîtrise du C, shell et Python
Connaissances de bootloaders embarqués (u-boot, coreboot), du boot sécurisé Arm Trusted Firmware (ATF) et de Trusted Execution Environment (TEE)
Expérience de la construction, l'intégration et la personnalisation Linux via buildroot, Yocto
Expérience avec le développement et la personnalisation de HAL Android
Expérience avec des solutions de mise à jour over-the-air (OTA) sécurisées
Contributions existantes à des projets Open Source pour les systèmes embarqués

VOS AVANTAGES A NOUS REJOINDRE :

Une rémunération évolutive selon profil, à partir de 40 000 euros bruts annuel.
Un contexte international, 80 nationalités qui travaillent à Sophia-Antipolis.
Une situation géographique privilégiée, située au cœur de Sophia-Antipolis, avec de nombreux événements et activités dans la région (activités sportives, Jeux (Olympiques ;) de Sophia, Afterwork, MeetUp pro, Conférences).
Des Tickets Restaurants d’une valeur de 9,50 €.
Une Mutuelle d’entreprise performante.
Un accès à l'engIT’lab pour développer ses propres projets d’innovation.
Un accompagnement dynamique dans la montée de vos compétences en intégrant l’engIT'university (organisme de formation engIT).
Démarrage possible entre début septembre et novembre 2022.
Contrat CDI (freelance possible)
Hybride (2jrs sur site, 3jrs remote).

432 --> DevOps Engineer
ICEO - Venture Builder
Poland (Remote)
O nas
ICEO od ponad 10 lat tworzy od podstaw innowacyjne start-upy, w obszarze blockchain, fintech i big-data. Jesteśmy Venture Builder'em, z doświadczeniem w budowie firm, które odnoszą sukcesy na rynku. O naszych projektach pisali między innymi Forbes czy Newsweek.
Praca w ICEO to możliwość współpracy z zespołem profesjonalistów oraz ciągłego podnoszenia kwalifikacji poprzez wewnętrzny system szkoleń. Dołączając do nas, bierzesz aktywny udział w tworzeniu i rozwijaniu nowych firm.
O projekcie
W związku z ciągłym rozwojem firmy poszukujemy pracownika na stanowisko DevOps, który dołączy do zespołu tworzącego Norion.
Norion jest start-upem, zbudowanym od podstaw przez zespół ICEO. To innowacyjna organizacja, w której pomagamy przedsiębiorcom wejść do świata blockchain i Web3. Naszymi klientami są firmy z rynku tradycyjnego oraz inne start-upy blockchain'owe, które chcą wytworzyć i upublicznić własny token. Norion dostarcza indywidualnych narzędzi do emisji i obsługi tokenów cyfrowych. Oprócz technologii posiadamy, gotowe rozwiązania prawne i dostęp do inwestorów oraz aniołów biznesu, dzięki czemu kompleksowo wspieramy przedsiębiorców i umożliwiamy im postawienie pierwszych kroków w świecie Web3, DeFi oraz Metaverse.
Metodologia
Pracujemy w metodyce Kanban.
Codzienne odbywają się daily projektowe oraz spotkania o formacie loży, których celem jest wymiana wiedzy pomiędzy członkami różnych projektów.
Komunikacja: Slack, Discord
Zarządzanie pracą: Jira
Dokumentacja: Confluence
Infrastruktura: Docker, Kubernetes, Microservices, GCP
Do Twoich obowiązków będzie należeć:
praca z programistami w zakresie organizacji praktyk CI/CD z wykorzystaniem Bitbucketowych Pipelineów oraz bieżące wsparcie przy wytwarzaniu oprogramowania,
tworzenie dokumentacji z realizowanych rozwiązań,
badanie nowych rozwiązań dostępnych na rynku i ich ewentualne wdrażanie,
budowanie i utrzymywanie narzędzi służących do automatyzacji procesu wytwarzania oprogramowania we wszystkich jego fazach,
dbanie o zachowanie odpowiedniego balansu między wysokim poziomem bezpieczeństwa a wygodą i elastycznością pracy zespołu,
tworzenie, utrzymanie i rozwijanie infrastruktury deweloperskiej, stagingowej i produkcyjnej, opartej na klastrze Kubernetesa.
Czego będziemy od Ciebie oczekiwać:
znajomości przynajmniej jednego języka programowania/skryptowego: Bash, Python, GoLang,
znajomości systemu konteneryzacji Docker,
praktycznej znajomości oraz doświadczenia z Linuxem na poziomie administrowania (Debian/Ubuntu),
znajomości systemów CI/CD oraz kontroli wersji: Bitbucket Pipelines, Git,
znajomości platformy Kubernetes oraz Helm,
znajomości tematyki HA oraz narzędzi open source do realizacji HA,
umiejętności posługiwania się narzędziem do automatyzacji infrastruktury: Terraform,
znajomości: Kafka, Redis, Nginx, Apache HTTP Server, OpenVPN,
wiedzy o sposobie funkcjonowania oraz doświadczenia w posługiwaniu się PostgreSQL, oraz MySQL w zakresie:
wykonywania podstawowych zapytań,
tworzenia kont,
przydzielania uprawnień,
tworzenia kopii zapasowych,
migracji danych,
rozwiązywania problemów z wydajnością,
znajomości zagadnień z zakresu sieci LAN/WAN, Firewall, serwerów proxy i Load Balancerów, popularnych protokołów sieciowych: HTTP(s), DNS, SSH, TCP/IP oraz usług sieciowych REST,
praktycznej znajomości praktyk związanych ze skalowalnością i wysoką wydajnością systemów z doświadczeniem w systemach produkcyjnych,
znajomości języka angielskiego pozwalającej na swobodne posługiwanie się dokumentacją.
Mile widziane:
znajomość narzędzi metryk: Grafana, Prometheus, Thanos,

znajomość narzędzi do logowania: Kibana, FluentD, Elasticsearch,

doświadczenie z OVH w zakresie: LoadBalancing, publiczna chmura, VM,
doświadczenie z technologiami i narzędziami: Cassandra, Spark, Solr, Jenkins.

nawet 26 płatnych dni urlopowych w przypadku umowy B2B
możliwość zatrudnienia w oparciu o UoP,

This role requires a high level of ownership over the product code and working closely with the team.

You'll also be working with the creative and product teams to plan new features and prioritize problems and opportunities.

In order to set you up for success, we provide everything you need within our dynamic and employee centric company structure.

Full responsibility and ownership of your work - you're making time travel possible!

You review pull requests & contribute to the growth of the team
You work closely and communicate openly with engineers, designers and management team
You proactively train yourself to remain at the forefront of augmented reality development
You are part of a developer team and able to mentor new developers
You build something that people really want

Requirements
You gained 5+ years experience in development with high-level languages
You developed 3+ years with Unity or a similar game engine, with multiple shipped products
You show an implicit understanding of real-time performance
You ideally have shader knowledge
You are a super open and a friendly person
You solve problems until they are done.

Benefits

Overview

This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. What You Will Do

This is a remote/hybrid position.

We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The Work

You’ll often be:

Incubating new business value for our clients in the Metaverse. From Multiparty Systems (Blockchain, Tokenization, NFTs) to Extended Reality (Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), and Mixed Reality), you will help client transform through technology by sharping, leading, and implementing strategic assessments and technology solutions

Delivering significant innovation and thought leadership in software engineering and technology architecture that will be applied across multiple clients globally to create established success in sales and/or delivery

Supporting the creation of new or evolving existing offerings and assets, while evaluating the value that new capabilities could unlock for organizations and ecosystems

Helping clients move through the education and experimentation phases on to production and value quickly and effectively

Building and delivering solutions at our most technically complex client engagements by advising on the technology approach, architecture, and complex IT program risk elements

Supporting the development of Accenture's Metaverse strategy and response to emerging technology components in the market and shifting how businesses apply those innovations

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.
