1+ years’ experience designing, delivering, and assessing complex technical architecture solutions

Rationalize the current Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle portfolio, identify gaps/overlaps and make recommendations on the future of all existing products
Prioritize offering development and create roadmaps for driving to a complete portfolio vision – may include bundling existing products into solutions as part of the portfolio
Create clear portfolio vision that can be utilized by marketing to create sales and customer-facing documentation
Function as the input for strategic and offering ideas coming from the geography sales teams to drive a centralized offering development process with services offering development team.
Drive alignment with Segments, other Offer Towers and sales on Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Service portfolio vision and strategy
Ensure Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Services portfolio is cohesive with the corporate strategy and other offerings being created outside of the portfolio
Be the internal & external lead SME for Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Managed Services Portfolio

Position Requirements:

We're looking to add talented individuals who are self-motivated and desire boundless opportunities, to join us. Come share in the discoveries that are forged from our shared achievements at Lenovo as we drive the next generation in technology.

Minimum Requirements:

5+ years of Managed Services product experience – sales/marketing and channel experience a plus
3+ years of portfolio management, product development or similar experience
Strong knowledge of Managed Services business & market landscape
Strong executive presence & leadership skills
High level of communication & presentation skills
Strong business & financial acumen
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
A collaborative approach to meeting business objectives and ability to influence at all levels of matrixed organizations
Experience working with global teams and conducting business internationally

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

455 --> Web3 Fullstack Engineer
Vision One
Paris, Île-de-France, France (Remote)
About The Company

Over the last few years, cryptos and blockchain technologies have introduced a new paradigm (just like the Internet did 25 years ago!). Yet, it is still recent and most of the tools that exist on the market today are only suitable for individuals, not businesses.

So We Created This Company.

Our mission is to support future generations of entrepreneurs, businesses, and organizations (DAOs, Web3, NFTs, Metaverse) in their growth by creating their financial backbone.

We offer an all-in-one app for web3 companies to manage their cryptos daily with cashflow monitoring and reporting tools and the possibility to make payments using cryptos (salaries, invoices, etc) or make exchanges in both crypto and fiat currencies.

We're a team of happy and passionate crypto-dreamers, convinced that crypto is shaping the world of tomorrow, with backing from world-class US and European investors including Sequoia Capital (Google, Stripe, Youtube, Paypal’s first investor), Y Combinator and eFounders.

💫 What's so special about engineering Us?

We are engineering is working at the cutting edge of FinTech, Blockchain, and Web3 technologies with incredible challenges ahead, that includes supporting multiple blockchain networks, integrating with financial and banking third-party APIs, and transitioning parts of our stack to NodeJS.

You will be part of a small development team at an early-stage startup in a fast-moving industry with a focus on delivery speed, high work standards, and team spirit!

Our engineering principles?
Customer-obsession: Our #1 priority is to support our users, listen and commit to them to build a strong product they can trust to navigate through the crypto uncharted territories.
Pragmatism: Blockchain is a fast-moving environment. We embrace change and navigate this world in the most realistic and practical way possible.
Ownership: We trust by default, value initiatives, and encourage open communication. Every team member is responsible for leading, delivering, and reporting features end-to-end.

🎯What You’ll Do

As a Software Engineer, you will work with our Product and Design team to define the outcomes and success metrics for the next features prioritized in the roadmap. You will own the build from front-to-back and start-to-finish, designing with security and quality in a timely manner to continuously push to deliver value to our users.

More concretely, you will have the opportunity to work and leave your mark on existing and new functionalities across the application:
Integrate, via our Banking partner, a Business USD account, plugged to crypto exchange to allow organizations to swap between USD and Cryptos
Participate in the constant improvement of our analytics layer, gathering more on-chain and off-chain data across multiple Blockchain and services.
Expand our payment system to Layer2 and alternative Layer1 and integrate selected DeFi protocols into the app
Ensure every component can scale over time

Requirements

🧑🏽‍💻 👩🏻‍💻What You Need
Based in Europe (+/- CET 2 hrs)
2+ years of experience as a full-stack engineer in the crypto or fintech space within an early-stage startup
Experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and acquainted with ClojureScript & re-frame, our frontend framework (or strong willingness to learn)
Ability to turn business and product ideas into engineering solutions
Experience shipping fast, high-quality products and features
Ability to improvise, lead and develop creative solutions when common approaches fail.
Strong value of pragmatism over idealism in times of uncertainty.
Proactivity and ability to own and deliver epics in autonomy
Strong appetite and drive to go the extra mile

🤩 Nice to haves
Experience with the framework NestJS
Passionate about all things blockchain, crypto, and DeFi
Previous remote experience

Benefits
Private Health Insurance
Pension Plan
Paid Time Off
Work From Home
Training & Development

456 --> Duales Studium Wirtschaftsingenieurwesen - Elektrotechnik (m/w/d) 2023
ABB
Lüdenscheid, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany (On-site)
Machen Sie den nächsten Karriereschritt bei ABB: Treiben Sie in einem globalen Team die Transformation von Gesellschaft und Industrie in eine produktivere und nachhaltigere Zukunft voran. Bei ABB fördern wir Vielfalt und Inklusion in allen Bereichen – ob Alter, Geschlecht, Sexualität, Ethnie, ob mit oder ohne Behinderung. Gemeinsam treten wir für individuelle Unterschiede ein – sowohl jeder für sich als auch zusammen. Du interessierst Dich für das Zusammenspiel von technischen und wirtschaftlichen Faktoren, für Mathematik und Naturwissenschaften und beschäftigst Dich gerne mit komplexen Fragestellungen? Du kannst gut mit anderen zusammenarbeiten und bist fit im Umgang mit Computern? Du suchst ein Studium, in dem Du neben dem Erwerb der theoretischen Grundlagen auch schon Praxiserfahrung sammeln kannst? Du möchtest bei einem führenden globalen Technologie-Unternehmen studieren und spannende Aufgabengebiete kennenlernen? Du möchtest später an Aufgaben und Projekten für eine produktivere und nachhaltigere Zukunft von Gesellschaft und Industrie arbeiten? Dann ist das duale Studium Wirtschaftsingenieurwesen mit der Studienrichtung Elektrotechnik bei ABB in Kooperation mit der DHBW Mannheim genau das Richtige für Dich!

ABB Smart Buildings digitalisiert Gewerbe-, Industrie- und Wohngebäude für höchsten Komfort, Effizienz, Sicherheit und Schutz - und steigert die Lebensqualität in Gebäuden der Zukunft durch sichere, intelligente und nachhaltige Elektrifizierungslösungen, Dienstleistungen und Produkte.

Ihr Verantwortungsbereich

Was wir Dir im Studium und danach bieten:
Das Duale Studium zum Bachelor of Engineering findet im dreimonatigen Wechsel von Theorie- und Praxisphasen statt und dauert 3 Jahre.
Deine theoretische Ausbildung erfolgt an der Dualen Hochschule Baden-Württemberg in Mannheim. Deine Einstellung erfolgt bei der Busch-Jaeger Elektro GmbH in Lüdenscheid, einem Unternehmen des ABB Konzerns. Am Standort wird ein breites Spektrum an Elektrifizierungsprodukten entwickelt, produziert und vermarktet - von Schaltern und Steckdosen, über Türkommunikations-Systeme bis hin zur Gebäudeautomation in Smart Home und Smart Building. Hier wirst Du auch die meisten Deiner Praxisphasen absolvieren – je nach Themenschwerpunkten ggf. auch an einem der über 30 anderen ABB-Standorte in Deutschland. Du startest am 01. August mit einem zweimonatigen Vorpraktikum bei ABB, in dem Dir wichtiges Know-How für Dein erfolgreiches Studium vermittelt wird und Du auch Deine Kommilitonen und ABB-Ansprechpartner kennenlernen wirst.
Das Studium an der Dualen Hochschule beginnt am 01. Oktober. Hier erwirbst Du in kleinen Gruppen die mathematischen, naturwissenschaftlichen und informationstechnischen Grundlagen sowie das technische und ökonomische Fachwissen.
Spätere Einsatzfelder für Wirtschaftsingenieure bei ABB sind u.a. im Produktmarketing, im Einkauf, in der Projektabwicklung, im Produktmanagement oder im technischen Vertrieb angesiedelt. Der Schwerpunkt liegt hier bei der Digitalisierung, dem Marketing und der Kundenkommunikation.
Du fragst Dich: Wie sieht das Marketing der Zukunft aus?
Das Studium des Wirtschaftsingenieurwesens ist eine gute Basis für Deine zukünftige Weiterentwicklung in der Fach-, Projekt- oder Führungslaufbahn.

Ihr Hintergrund

Was Du mitbringst:
Die allgemeine oder fachgebundene Hochschulreife oder die Fachhochschulreife (mit Zusatzprüfung an der DHBW) mit guten Abschlüssen in den mathematisch-naturwissenschaftlichen und technischen Fächern sowie in Englisch und Deutsch sind die optimale Voraussetzung für ein erfolgreiches Studium.
Du hast Spaß an technischen Themen, vertiefst Dich gerne in kniffelige Fragestellungen, bist digital affin und arbeitest Dich schnell in neue Softwareprogramme ein.
Du bist neugierig (Try and Error), lebst agiles Arbeiten, übernimmst Verantwortung, setzt Dich engagiert für Deine Ziele ein und erarbeitest Lösungen mit viel Eigeninitiative und Selbständigkeit.
Wenn Du zusätzlich über Durchhaltevermögen und Team- und Kommunikationsfähigkeit verfügst, sind wir der perfekte Ausbildungspartner für Dich.
Du interessierst dich für die Potenziale des Metaverse? Welche Chancen bietet das Metaverse, für ein Unternehmen aus der Industrie? Gestalte mit uns die Zukunft!

Mehr über uns

Was wir Dir sonst noch bieten: Während Deines Dualen Studiums hast Du einen DHBW Studienvertrag mit ABB. Du erhältst eine monatliche Vergütung und weitere Zusatzleistungen. Als Ansprechpartner hast Du ein Team, das Dich in Deinem Studium berät und unterstützt. Durch verschiedene Events bist Du von Anfang an eng mit anderen Studierenden, Auszubildenden und ABB Kollegen vernetzt. Neben dem Studium kannst Du Dich durch mehrere Zusatzmodule technisch, sprachlich und persönlich weiter qualifizieren. Das Studium und die Zusammenarbeit bei ABB sind weltoffen, kollegial und auf Augenhöhe. Haben wir Dein Interesse geweckt? Dann bewirb Dich noch heute bei uns: über den roten Button „Jetzt bewerben“ kommst Du direkt zum Bewerber-Login. Wir freuen uns auf Deine vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen (Motivationsbrief, CV, Zeugnisse)! Bitte gib in Deinem Anschreiben an, welche Standorte und Vertiefungsrichtung Du bevorzugst. Für Fragen steht Dir das Team des ABB Training Center in Heidelberg gerne zur Verfügung: E-Mail: ausbildung-abb@de.abb.com Telefon: +49 (0) 6221 701 1488 Erfahre mehr über die Ausbildung bei ABB unter: www.abb.de/ausbildungsblog www.facebook.com/ABBDeutschland

461 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] Technical Art (경력 무관)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

NFT Metaverse Dept 소속의 Art Team은 크래프톤에서 글로벌 시장 타겟으로 새롭게 준비 중인 NFT 메타버스 프로젝트의 아트를 담당하는 부서입니다.

Art Team은 하이퀄리티 비주얼 제작 능력과 각종 글로벌 프로젝트 라이브 서비스 경험으로 다양한 플랫폼의 최적화 기술력과 효율적인 그래픽 구현 능력을 갖춘 아티스트로 구성되어있습니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
엔지니어-아티스트 간 원활한 커뮤니케이션 지원
마스터 머티리얼의 제작
아트 제작 파이프라인 최적화 방안과 자동화 기술 지원
최적화와 품질 사이에서 최적의 결과를 낼 수 있도록 가이드
개발 중 발생하는 Tech-art 이슈 해결 및 관리
기술문서의 제작 및 관리

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
게임 렌더링 파이프라인에 대한 깊은 이해
게임 최적화에 대한 경험과 실무경험
마스터 머티리얼 제작 경험
블루프린트 기능 제작 경험
언리얼 엔진에 대한 이해와 경험
기술문서 및 튜토리얼 제작 능력
커뮤니케이션 능력

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
게임 아트 (모델링, 배경, 애니메이션, 이펙트 등) 1개 분야 3년 이상의 실무 경력
언리얼 엔진을 이용한 모바일 게임 개발 경험
모바일 프로젝트에서 최적화 실무 경험
아티스트가 사용할 수 있는 간단한 스크립트 툴 제작 경험
게임 오픈 및 상용화 경험

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(필수)
자기소개서 필수 질문
개인이 생각하는 가장 큰 성취는 무엇이었나요?
TA 로서 일하게 된 계기(TA 로 일하고 싶은 이유)는 무엇이었나요?
TA 로서 일함에 있어서 가장 중요한 것은 무엇이라고 생각하시나요?
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

BE BOLD, LEARN AND WIN! 크래프톤의 성장과 도전의 스토리를 알아가고 싶다면?

▶ 크래프톤 제작 스튜디오 ▶ 크래프톤 게임

▶ 크래프톤 비전 & 핵심가치 ▶ 크래프톤 라이프 & 복리후생

▶ 크래프톤 공식 유튜브 채널 ▶ 배틀그라운드 공식 유튜브 채널

▶ 크래프톤 인스타그램 ▶ 크래프톤 블로그

462 --> Unity / Unreal Developer – Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Jena, Thuringia, Germany
Hast du Lust, mit Extended Reality (XR) die Industrie zu revolutionieren, indem du XR-Projekte für verschiedene Plattformen im engen Austausch mit der Designabteilung und dem Projektmanagement programmierst? Weißt du, was hinter Begriffen wie Immersive Learning, Connected Worker, Immersive Marketing und XR Collaboration steckt? Das ist genau dein Ding?

Dann lebe deine Leidenschaft in einer Position, die dich ins ambitionierte Team von Liquid Studio führt, das Teil von Accenture Technology Innovation ist und Unternehmen bei der Einführung neuer Technologien, Skillsets und Arbeitsweisen behilflich ist. Unser Ziel und das unserer mehr als 300 XR-Expert:innen weltweit: das Nischendasein von XR zu beenden, den Markt anzuführen und die Industrie mit ausgereifter XR-Technologie zu stärken – mit eindrucksvollen End-to-End-XR-Dienstleistungen, von der Konzeption bis zur Systemintegration.

Das erwartet dich

Du nutzt dein Gespür für die neusten Extended-Reality-Trends, um im ersten Schritt Prototypen und MVPs (Minimum Viable Products) zu entwickeln.

Dazu erstellst du die entsprechenden technischen Konzepte und Software-Architekturen.

Ein Schwerpunkt deiner Tätigkeit wird die Umsetzung von Gameedesign-Konzepten für die Industrie sein.

Klar, dass wir außerdem auf deine Ideen bei der kreativen Mitgestaltung unserer Produkte zählen.

Nicht zuletzt lieferst du wertvollen Input zur Optimierung und Weiterentwicklung bestehender Applikationen und Basistechnologien.

Darauf freuen wir uns

Idealerweise ein Studium der Informatik oder Mathematik, alternativ ein Studium mit anderem Schwerpunkt oder gleichwertige Praxis

Sehr gute Kenntnisse in Unreal, Unity3D, C# und C++ mit entsprechendem Programmierhintergrund, gerne mit Fokus auf Mobile Games oder objektorientierte Programmierung bzw. auf ressourcenoptimierte Entwicklung und Verbesserung (im Hinblick auf ein flüssigeres Spielerlebnis)

Erfahrung im Umgang mit umfangreichen Codebases, die durch die Arbeit mehrerer Programmierer:innen über mehrere Monate hinweg entstehen

Und persönlich? Bist du in der Lage, komplexe Projekte optimal zu strukturieren und umzusetzen, dich schnell in neue Situationen hineinzudenken und auch in heißen Phasen cool zu bleiben.

Dein Kontakt

Du hast Fragen? Dann wende dich an unser Recruiting Team per E-Mail an recruiting_germany@accenture.com oder telefonisch unter 00800 45045045.

465 --> Full-time game creator (planner/designer/PG/debugger, etc.)
（株）コンフィデンス
Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
As a game creator, you will be responsible for:

If you are inexperienced or have a little blank space, you can start as an assistant!

■Planner/Director

Creation of game plans and specifications, level design, map design, scenario creation, script/production creation, KPI analysis, progress management, creation of in-game announcements, etc.

★Inexperienced people can start as an assistant!

■ PM/progress management

Project and budget management, external negotiations, progress management of production schedule, etc.

■ Designer (2D/3D)

"2D design" such as UI/UX, item/background/banner/illustration creation, "3D design" such as modeling, motion, and effects, web design, coding, video production, etc.

■ Programmer

Game client development (Unity, Unreal Engine, etc.), infrastructure related to game companies (networks, servers), HTML5 games and in-house tool development related to game operation, etc.

■ Debugger

Creation of checklists (test specifications), outsourcing management, test implementation, defect reporting, member management, policy formulation, etc.

■Customer support

Respond to inquiries from users, propose improvement measures, create manuals, etc.

■ Translation

Translating dialogues, explanations, packages, etc. for games for overseas users

★Make use of language skills such as Chinese, English, and Korean.

■ Marketer

SNS operation, campaign planning - execution - verification, game advertisement operation, planning and implementation of various promotions (live distribution, blog operation), etc.

★ Popular boy cartoon app game

★Famous RPG series games for smartphones

★ Monster breeding puzzle game

★ Idol training rhythm game
e-sports, AR / VR, live distribution, metaverse,

There are also projects using the latest technologies such as NFT and blockchain

■ Benefits

Full social insurance

■ Qualifications

【Qualification requirements】

No educational background

■Some practical experience in the game, web, entertainment, or animation industry

∟No matter what type of job you have! Those who have no experience in the game industry are also welcome.

★Employment form and blank of previous job are not a question!

Many people who worked as part-time workers, contract employees, temporary employees, etc. are active! No blank!

★No matter how many years of experience you have!

Many of our employees have less than a year of experience in the game industry.

~If any of the following apply to you, please contact us even if you have no experience in the game industry~

□ System development experience in the IT industry (including in-house SE)

□ Practical experience in animation production

□ Web design experience

□Experienced in planning and managing real events, BtoC services, and planning and managing entertainment content

□Professional gamer (professional level gamer/those who have won competitions)

□ Was active as a distributor on distribution apps and platforms such as YouTube

□ Experienced Intern Training At a Game Company

[Skills that can be used]

・Photoshop

・Illustrator

・Spine

・Sprite Studio

・Live2D

・Unity

・After Effects

466 --> Foundation Administrator
Non-Fungible Labs
Los Angeles Metropolitan Area (On-site)
The Futureverse Foundation is a new initiative created to ensure everyone has access to an open and inclusive Metaverse, while ensuring we improve the world around us from both a social and environmental perspective. Our mission is to invest in underrepresented artists, creatives, and communities in order to build more diverse, equitable, and inclusive spaces — in both the metaverse and real world. Our activities include funding social and environmental causes, ensuring artists from all cultures have access to the education, training and technology required to contribute to the Metaverse and connecting artists and communities on a global scale.

Check out The Futureverse here: https://www.futureverse.xyz/.

The Futureverse Foundation is a registered charitable foundation in New Zealand and is a part of the FLUF World Ecosystem, designed to help some of the world’s leading metaverse creation communities improve the world around them.

Prior to the formation of the foundation, Non-Fungible Labs and the broader FLUF World ecosystem community have donated over $2M in funds to various causes, including Sustainable Coastlines, Auckland City Mission and Ukraine.

The Futureverse Foundation is looking for a Foundation Administrator to operate out of our new Los Angeles based office. As Foundation Administrator, you will enjoy working within a small, entrepreneurial environment that is mission-driven, results-focused and community oriented. You will ideally have the ability to exercise good judgment in a variety of situations, have strong written and verbal communication, administrative, and organisational skills. In this role, you will have the ability to work independently on projects, from conception to completion, and must be able to handle a wide variety of activities and confidential matters with discretion.

As Foundation Administrator, you would exhibit a pleasant and welcoming demeanour both in person, online and on the telephone. Some evening and weekend work hours will be required at various times throughout the year, particularly when supporting The Foundation’s events.

This role has significant growth opportunities for the right candidate. As responsibilities evolve to meet the future needs and goals of the Foundation, this role could develop into a significant supervisory position.

Key responsibilities include:
Coordination with The Futureverse Foundation team to take on administrative and clerical functions
Office management of our new LA based hub; maintaining office supplies and equipment, office mailings, scheduling and organising materials for meetings
Gain understanding of existing fundraising and database software programs and participate in planning the implementation of new systems to proactively meet the Foundation’s increase in size and reach
Attend Staff and Board meetings and, with respect to the latter, prepare board materials and board books, keep minutes, and follow through on oversight of action items
Assist in processing incoming cheques and payment, drafting spreadsheets, and matching gifts online
General database entry and maintenance
Participation in discussions of upgrades and purchasing options
Supervision of volunteers and third party activities
Coordinate with the Communications Team and communicate with the community, updating them on upcoming events, closing the loop on fundraising activity and informing them of the impact the foundation has
Assist with fundraising events and communications
Assist the Founder and trustees in connection with major donor relationships
Participate in strategic planning and implementation
Respond to third party grant inquiries and general questions about the Foundation and participate in audit processes
Establish and run Futureverse Foundation social media

Requirements
Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience.
Administrative experience supporting C-level executives.
Excellent organizational, time management and communication skills.
Thorough knowledge of MS Office, excel, Google docs, sheets etc. and other database application and media web platforms.
Experience with digital marketing.
Experience with Salesforce or Hubspot a plus.
Non-profit experience would be a big advantage.

Benefits
An exceptionally talented, diverse and experienced team.
A fun and rewarding workplace culture.
Competitive salary with potential for bonuses, benefits and token allocations.
Real work-life balance.
Plenty of opportunity to grow.
Great variety and exciting international projects.
A chance to engage with global leaders in gaming, blockchain companies, leading web3 investors and renowned media and entertainment brands.
A rare opportunity to be part of our vision for an open and inclusive metaverse.

470 --> Decentralized Identity Consultant (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany
We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The Work

You’ll often be:

Developing global Digital Identity & Biometrics technical assets (technical architecture blueprints, demos, technology & standards outlook)

Researching latest technology trends and standards to develop a detailed POV’s

Supporting the development of technical training assets to train local teams and enable Digital Identity & Biometrics engagement delivery

Developing and updating Digital Identity & Biometrics technology policies, standards, solution patents, and global reference architectures

Contributing to Digital Identity & Biometrics teams’ written/oral sales opportunities, business development, and proposals

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Required Qualifications

3+ years’ experience leveraging emerging technologies to deliver large scale transformations for clients

Demonstrated experience with Digital/Decentralized Identity initiatives

Awareness of the Digital / Decentralized Identity use cases and enterprise value

Knowledge of processes, tools, or technologies related to Decentralized/Blockchain Identity technology architectures

Demonstrated experience explaining how an offering and service provides value and addresses industry and business challenges

Preferred Qualifications

Experience designing high level technical architectures

Proficiency communicating new and complex scenarios and solutions to varying audiences ranging from business process leads to C-suite executives

Understanding of Biometrics, Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), and service sales and delivery lifecycle

Demonstrated experience facilitating discussions through storytelling and a strong management presence

471 --> ANIMATORE 3D
Ricercamy Srl
Udine, Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy (On-site)
Ricercamy.com, innovativa società di Ricerca e Selezione del Personale all’avanguardia per metodologia e infrastruttura tecnologica, è alla ricerca di:

ANIMATORE 3D

Per nostro cliente OVER, prima piattaforma blockchain italiana all’avanguardia che fonde mondo fisico e virtuale attraverso la realtà aumentata, siamo alla ricerca di un Animatore 3D.

OVER sta costruendo il primo metaverso aperto in realtà aumentata (AR). Annunciando una nuova alba per il settore Metaverse, OVER consente agli utenti di creare esperienze geolocalizzate uniche che colmano il divario tra il nostro mondo fisico e quello digitale. Utilizzando la migliore tecnologia di mappatura 3D community-driven, OVER offre agli utenti e ai costruttori l'opportunità di possedere immobili nel metaverso AR, mappare le loro aree locali per guadagnare OVR Tokens ed esplorare il Web3 come mai prima d'ora.

Mansioni Principali

Ottima conoscenza delle tecniche di animazione 3D
Attenzione ai dettagli stilistici per la produzione di ogni singolo progetto
Capacità di identificare scene e sequenze chiave per la produzione
Ottima capacità di trasformare gli storyboard in sequenze animate
Padronanza della gestione di file, librerie di animazione e degli aggiornamenti delle documentazioni e delle procedure
Capacità di integrare il suono nell’animazione 3D e sincronizzare i dialoghi

Competenze Richieste

Almeno 2 anni di esperienza lavorativa in questo ambito
Spiccate capacità creative e doti artistiche
Familiarità con le tecniche di animazione 3D
Portfolio personale per un’attenta visione e valutazione dei progetti completi

Si Offre

Inserimento in un nuovo contesto in forte crescita
Possibilità di crescita professionale grazie all’uso di tecnologie di ultima generazione
Salario commisurato all’esperienza
Sede di Lavoro: Udine

I colloqui avverranno a partire dal 29 agosto per motivi di chiusura aziendale estiva.

La ricerca è rivolta a candidati qualificati, indipendentemente da razza, religione, sesso, età, stato civile, nazionalità, orientamento sessuale, stato di cittadinanza o disabilità.

472 --> Metaverse Blockchain Software Engineer (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Munich, Bavaria, Germany
We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The Work

You’ll often be:

Incubating new business value for our clients in the Metaverse. From Multiparty Systems (Blockchain, Tokenization, NFTs) to Extended Reality (Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), and Mixed Reality), you will help client transform through technology by sharping, leading, and implementing strategic assessments and technology solutions

Delivering significant innovation and thought leadership in software engineering and technology architecture that will be applied across multiple clients globally to create established success in sales and/or delivery

Supporting the creation of new or evolving existing offerings and assets, while evaluating the value that new capabilities could unlock for organizations and ecosystems

Helping clients move through the education and experimentation phases on to production and value quickly and effectively

Building and delivering solutions at our most technically complex client engagements by advising on the technology approach, architecture, and complex IT program risk elements

Supporting the development of Accenture's Metaverse strategy and response to emerging technology components in the market and shifting how businesses apply those innovations

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Required Qualifications

1+ years’ experience designing, delivering, and assessing complex technical architecture solutions

Training or hands on experience with one or more blockchain platforms, such as R3 Corda, Hyperledger Fabric, DAML, Enterprise Ethereum, Hyperledger Indy/Aries performing:

Distributed network node configuration

Smart contract testing and development

Key management

Network architecture and operations.

1+ years’ of professional working experience in one or more of the following: Java, Python, JavaScript

Preferred Qualifications

Certified in technology architecture. Examples: TOGAF, AWS Solutions Architect Professional, Microsoft Certified Solutions Architect Expert, GCP Professional Cloud Architect

Project experience through all phases of a typical software development lifecycle (SDLC), preferably with agile methods like Scrum, Kanban, SAFe

Understanding of technical architecture concepts and methods, preferably with project experience in a technical architect capacity

474 --> Unity / Unreal Developer – Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Essen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany
Hast du Lust, mit Extended Reality (XR) die Industrie zu revolutionieren, indem du XR-Projekte für verschiedene Plattformen im engen Austausch mit der Designabteilung und dem Projektmanagement programmierst? Weißt du, was hinter Begriffen wie Immersive Learning, Connected Worker, Immersive Marketing und XR Collaboration steckt? Das ist genau dein Ding?

Dann lebe deine Leidenschaft in einer Position, die dich ins ambitionierte Team von Liquid Studio führt, das Teil von Accenture Technology Innovation ist und Unternehmen bei der Einführung neuer Technologien, Skillsets und Arbeitsweisen behilflich ist. Unser Ziel und das unserer mehr als 300 XR-Expert:innen weltweit: das Nischendasein von XR zu beenden, den Markt anzuführen und die Industrie mit ausgereifter XR-Technologie zu stärken – mit eindrucksvollen End-to-End-XR-Dienstleistungen, von der Konzeption bis zur Systemintegration.

Das erwartet dich

Du nutzt dein Gespür für die neusten Extended-Reality-Trends, um im ersten Schritt Prototypen und MVPs (Minimum Viable Products) zu entwickeln.

Dazu erstellst du die entsprechenden technischen Konzepte und Software-Architekturen.

Ein Schwerpunkt deiner Tätigkeit wird die Umsetzung von Gameedesign-Konzepten für die Industrie sein.

Klar, dass wir außerdem auf deine Ideen bei der kreativen Mitgestaltung unserer Produkte zählen.

Nicht zuletzt lieferst du wertvollen Input zur Optimierung und Weiterentwicklung bestehender Applikationen und Basistechnologien.

Darauf freuen wir uns

Idealerweise ein Studium der Informatik oder Mathematik, alternativ ein Studium mit anderem Schwerpunkt oder gleichwertige Praxis

Sehr gute Kenntnisse in Unreal, Unity3D, C# und C++ mit entsprechendem Programmierhintergrund, gerne mit Fokus auf Mobile Games oder objektorientierte Programmierung bzw. auf ressourcenoptimierte Entwicklung und Verbesserung (im Hinblick auf ein flüssigeres Spielerlebnis)

Erfahrung im Umgang mit umfangreichen Codebases, die durch die Arbeit mehrerer Programmierer:innen über mehrere Monate hinweg entstehen

Und persönlich? Bist du in der Lage, komplexe Projekte optimal zu strukturieren und umzusetzen, dich schnell in neue Situationen hineinzudenken und auch in heißen Phasen cool zu bleiben.

Dein Kontakt

Du hast Fragen? Dann wende dich an unser Recruiting Team per E-Mail an recruiting_germany@accenture.com oder telefonisch unter 00800 45045045.

480 --> Softwareentwickler C++ / Unreal Engine
viality AG
Dortmund, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany (Hybrid)
WIR SUCHEN:
Softwareentwickler C++ / Unreal Engine (m/w/d)

Die Zukunft erschaffen – bei viality
Teaser: Gesucht wird ein (erfahrener) Unreal Entwickler mit C++ Kenntnissen zur langfristigen Unterstützung des viality Teams bei der Entwicklung von z.B. VR-Schulungs- und Simulationsanwendungen für B2C und B2A Kunden.

Über viality
Die viality AG wurde 2009 aus der Hochschule in Dortmund ausgegründet und hat sich seitdem zu einem der führenden Anbieter Deutschlands für Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Digital Twin und Metaverse Lösungen entwickelt. Dabei stehen vor allem Kunden aus Automotive und Industrie im Fokus, sowie Akteure des Handels und der öffentlichen Hand.
Innovation und Interdisziplinarität werden bei uns groß geschrieben. Denn nur durch das richtige Zusammenspiel von Entwicklern, Designern, Artists, Ingenieuren und Beratern können mehrwertstiftende Lösungen geschaffen werden, die für den Menschen funktionieren. Daher vereinen wir die klassischen Fähigkeiten eines Technologieunternehmens mit den Skills einer Konzept-Agentur und begleiten den Kunden auf Wunsch von der ersten Idee bis zum Go-Live.

Unsere Unternehmenskultur
Schon vor Corona waren flexibles Arbeiten z.B. durch Home Office oder flache Hierarchien bei uns alltäglich. Wir leben New Work. Doch manchmal erfordern Projekte auch die Tätigkeit vor Ort – entweder beim Kunden oder im viality Studio in Dortmund. Die Präsenz wird belohnt mit dem Zugang zu Spitzen-Hardware, freundlichen Kolleginnen und Kollegen und allen anderen für den Projekterfolg hilfreichen Kleinigkeiten.
Zudem leben wir Innovation. Unsere Arbeit ist geprägt von der ständigen Suche nach dem technisch machbaren. Oft erforschen wir neuste Ansätze und Technologien in Forschungsprojekten und übersetzen diese Erkenntnisse in mehrwertstiftende Angebote für die Wirtschaft. Entsprechend vereint uns alle die Neugier und Begeisterung für die Themen rund um VR, AR, Digital Twin, Metaverse. Daraus resultieren stets verschiedenste Projekte.

Aufgabenbereiche
Als (Senior) Unreal Developer (m/w/d) unterstützt du das Entwickler Team mit deiner Expertise rund um die Unreal Engine und C++ und bist für die Umsetzung und Erweiterung von Virtual Reality Schulungs- und Simulations-Anwendungen mit dieser Engine verantwortlich. Oftmals spielt die Anbindung von Sensorik oder individuellen Eingabegeräten dabei eine Rolle. Ziel ist es nutzerfreundliche und fehlerfreie Anwendungen zu schaffen und diese stets zu erweitern.
Neben der technischen Expertise in Soft- und Hardware sind auch Social Skills von hoher Bedeutung: Konzeptionell mitdenken, Technologien und Trends verständlich machen oder auch mal den Kunden mit beraten – dies sind alltägliche Aufgaben. Zudem freuen wir uns, wenn du dem viality Team neue Wege und Möglichkeiten aufzeigst und unsere Neugier stillst. 🙂

Dein Profil
(Abgeschlossenes) Studium der Informatik
Erfahrung im Coden mit C++
Erfahrung im Umgang mit der Unreal Engine
Englischkenntnisse wünschenswert
Gefühl für UI / UX wünschenswert
Erfahrung mit CryEngine / Unity von Vorteil
Erfahrung mit VR Entwicklung von Vorteil

Was wir bieten
Spannende, anspruchsvolle und abwechslungsreiche Tätigkeiten
Ein junges, dynamisches Team
Flexible Arbeitszeitgestaltung
Home Office möglich
Firmenhardware zur Privatnutzung
Team-Events
30 Tage Urlaub

Du findest dich wieder? Jetzt Bewerben!
Wenn du dich in dieser Job-Beschreibung wiederfindest, dich die Themen reizen, unsere Unternehmenskultur anspricht und du die geforderten Skills mitbringst freuen wir uns auf deine Bewerbung! Fragen? Gern einfach anrufen! 🙂

Unser Recruiter Martin Dieck freut sich auf dich!
Mail: jobs@viality.de
Betreff: Bewerbung Softwareentwickler C++ / Unreal Engine

Mobil: +4917657908946

Note: We devised this project to connect nonprofits and volunteers for more flexible, more immediate impact. We strongly suggest you start with 4 weeks and decide from there if you'd like to continue working.
Additional Details
We are hosting our first Metaverse in December and want a marketing strategy for this event to attract participants willing to donate, individual donors to sponsor Veterans, and sponsors.

Your Experience
Experience working in/with marketing strategy in a professional capacity

10-15 hours over 4 weeks

483 --> Metaverse Blockchain Software Engineer
Accenture Southeast Asia
Singapore, Singapore (On-site)
We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The Work

You’ll often be:

Incubating new business value for our clients in the Metaverse. From Multiparty Systems (Blockchain, Tokenization, NFTs) to Extended Reality (Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), and Mixed Reality), you will help client transform through technology by sharping, leading, and implementing strategic assessments and technology solutions

Delivering significant innovation and thought leadership in software engineering and technology architecture that will be applied across multiple clients globally to create established success in sales and/or delivery

Supporting the creation of new or evolving existing offerings and assets, while evaluating the value that new capabilities could unlock for organizations and ecosystems

Helping clients move through the education and experimentation phases on to production and value quickly and effectively

Building and delivering solutions at our most technically complex client engagements by advising on the technology approach, architecture, and complex IT program risk elements

Supporting the development of Accenture's Metaverse strategy and response to emerging technology components in the market and shifting how businesses apply those innovations

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Qualifications

Required Qualifications

1+ years’ experience designing, delivering, and assessing complex technical architecture solutions

Training or hands on experience with one or more blockchain platforms, such as R3 Corda, Hyperledger Fabric, DAML, Enterprise Ethereum, Hyperledger Indy/Aries performing:

Distributed network node configuration

Smart contract testing and development

Key management

Network architecture and operations.

1+ years’ of professional working experience in one or more of the following: Java, Python, JavaScript

Preferred Qualifications

Certified in technology architecture. Examples: TOGAF, AWS Solutions Architect Professional, Microsoft Certified Solutions Architect Expert, GCP Professional Cloud Architect

Project experience through all phases of a typical software development lifecycle (SDLC), preferably with agile methods like Scrum, Kanban, SAFe

Understanding of technical architecture concepts and methods, preferably with project experience in a technical architect capacity

489 --> Scientist; AR/VR/Game Technology
Signify
Eindhoven, North Brabant, Netherlands
We’re looking for a Scientist AR/VR/Gaming Technology to join our IoT research team in Eindhoven.

Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.

As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!

Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.

As a Scientist AR/VR/Gaming Technology you’ll be responsible for researching innovative ways to apply state of the art AR/VR and Gaming Technology to Signify’s IoT products and systems. For example: to better experience our products in sales interactions, to facilitate lighting design, to find new ways to interact with and control our products and systems, or to improve our internal product development process with virtual prototyping.

What You’ll Do
Research opportunities for Signify in the emerging Metaverse concept. Regularly scout, keep track of, evaluate, and leverage disruptive technologies in this field.
Explore and prototype new AR/VR/Gaming Technology that drive the roadmap of Signify’s IoT systems, both in the consumer domain (e.g., Philips Hue and Wiz) and professional domain (e.g. Interact).
Develop software on various platforms for the purpose of technology/architecture/use case validation and demonstration. Software platforms in scope are embedded devices (lights, sensors/camera’s), mobile phones, gateways as well as cloud environments.
Work with peers in multi-disciplinary teams to brainstorm / ideate and generate Intellectual Property
Your Qualifications
A passion for AR/VR technology, Gaming and the Metaverse concept
Msc or Phd in Computer Science, Game and Media Technology or related field
1-3 years of (agile) software development experience, using Python, C/C++, Java, JavaScript
Creative, innovative, self-driven, and enjoying technically challenging and ambiguous problems
Experience with Gaming/Graphics technology is a pre (openGL, Unity, Unreal)
Experience with mobile frameworks is a pre (iOS, ARKit, ARCore, Reality Kit)
What You’ll Get In Return…

We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences.

See #SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees!

490 --> Innovation Product Lead - Web3
Telefónica
Madrid, Community of Madrid, Spain
Area Description

Connectivity & Business Innovation area is part of Telefonica’s Global Innovation Unit.

We have the objective of defining and developing new connectivity-based products and services, to strengthen Telefónica's position in digitalization, based on new waves of technology innovation.

Products in our portfolio target strategic core areas for Telefonica. These products are managed as internal startups with a dedicated team that covers the end to end of the initial product cycles (Service design, Business and Development), from initial ideation stages to operational delivery with a dedicated business area.

MISSION

We are a highly motivated multidisciplinary team, with startup mentality and a complete focus on solving real customer problems using technology. Hands on. We build “things” to learn tech and realize business potential.

As part of the team, the candidate will build and define innovation over products and services, based on the implementation of the new wave of technology coming from the Web3: (1) driving decentralized network technologies, (2) building solutions with blockchain technologies or (3) exploiting Metaverse environments where Telefonica can add a differential value with our connectivity and b2b platforms.

Specifically, the candidate will help create and develop a web3 roadmap for Telefonica, focusing on identifying the right business opportunities, defining requirements for their prioritization, and driving development with the technical teams.

Main Duties & Responsibilities
Lead on product management delivery pipelines
Define business and technical strategy for web3 related products or services with a clear value and unfair advantage for Telefonica
Conduct technical value chain analysis to identify the right opportunities for Telefonica
Establish prioritization strategy for our products based on market & technology analysis
Define business models & build business cases to drive projects
Prepare materials to present to C-level inside Telefonica and towards clients
Drive business development to sign strategic partners to complement our value proposition
Stakeholder management – Reporting, communicating and influencing other areas of Telefonica, generating the necessary support documentation (presentations, reports, dashboards, etc.)

Education Required

Preferably MSc/BSc degree in Computer Science, Telecommunication Engineering, Industrial Engineering or related technical field

TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE And SKILLS
SPECIFIC. Web3 related experience and know-how will be valued:
Knowhow on the use of blockchain technologies (protocols & web3 stacks);
Familiarized with Tokenomics;
Having taken part in web3 DAOs
Being a user of the web3

GENERAL: A mix of the following experience and capabilities will be valued:
Managing product delivery pipelines
Financial and business modelling
Manage uncertainty and can navigate the unknown
Implements and manages agile way of working
Resilient, not always everything ends as expected!
Driven, self-motivated, results oriented.

Professional Experience
+3 years experience in Product Management or Strategy & Management Consulting roles is required.
Some specific web3 related experience and knowhow will be highly valued, such as:
Having taken part on web3 product development related ventures, at tech or business levels
Mining technologies
Experience in gaming or streaming platforms - familiarized with Unity, Unreal or any other engine.
Connectivity technologies enabling web3 & metaverse services
Experience working with Startup environments will also be positively valued

LANGUAGES

Fluent in Spanish and English

If you join Telefónica

You join almost 100 years of history, you join a team of 106 nationalities present in more tan 35 countries. You join a team that works to connect people wherever they are. We are leading the digital revolution with the enthusiasm of the first day in all our businesses, creating the best digital ecosystem for our clients: network, IoT, cloud, security, innovation etc. Here, at Telefónica you count with everything you need to be the best you. We need people like you that wants to take this challenge of creating the Telefónica of tomorrow.

Telefonica is committed to the new working ways. Under our proposition “Disconnect to Reconnect” we have applied the Digital Disconnection.

#WeAreInclusive

We strongly believe diverse and inclusive teams become more innovative and they achieve improved results. Telefonica aims to promote and guarantee a place for everyone, just the way we are: gender, age range, sexual orientation and/or identity, culture, creed, disability or any other personal condition.

491 --> Metaverse Studio Operations Lead
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work:

The Studio Operations Lead will be responsible for making sure the studio team can have everything that they need to perform at their best. This includes overseeing the budget, procuring tools related to agile development with the production team, validating the pipeline with the studio head and the production team, procuring tools and software for the 3D artist and development teams. Once the teams are up and running, you’ll manage the metrics of the studio and make sure everything is running efficiently.

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 5 years of experience in an operational role managing financials preferably within a creative studio, the gaming industry, immersive media, narrative design, or location-based entertainment space.

Minimum 2 years’ experience overseeing and managing a significant studio budget

Bonus points if you have

Strong understanding of production environment within a studio that produces interactive content

Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel

Knowledge of 3D art, programming, and other skills related to game development or production

Experience leading and motivating a creative team to produce their best work

Ability to manage financial expectations and timelines with clients and to be able to manage workloads across the studios

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

--------------------------------------

492 --> Metaverse Studio Operations Lead
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work:

The Studio Operations Lead will be responsible for making sure the studio team can have everything that they need to perform at their best. This includes overseeing the budget, procuring tools related to agile development with the production team, validating the pipeline with the studio head and the production team, procuring tools and software for the 3D artist and development teams. Once the teams are up and running, you’ll manage the metrics of the studio and make sure everything is running efficiently.

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 5 years of experience in an operational role managing financials preferably within a creative studio, the gaming industry, immersive media, narrative design, or location-based entertainment space.

Minimum 2 years’ experience overseeing and managing a significant studio budget

Bonus points if you have

Strong understanding of production environment within a studio that produces interactive content

Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel

Knowledge of 3D art, programming, and other skills related to game development or production

Experience leading and motivating a creative team to produce their best work

Ability to manage financial expectations and timelines with clients and to be able to manage workloads across the studios

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.
