541 --> Projektmanagerin (Kultur & Software)
ZAUBAR
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (On-site)
Das geht an alle, die etwas bewegen wollen.

Wir erfinden eine neue Art von urbaner Erfahrung: immersive Erkundungen, die durch ortsbezogene Augmented Reality angetrieben werden und sozial, unterhaltsam und bedeutungsvoll sind. Bei ZAUBAR bringen wir das Metaverse auf die Straße!

Zurzeit arbeiten wir mit einigen der interessantesten Kultureinrichtungen Deutschlands, Luxusmarken und Hotels, Medienhäusern und Reiseveranstaltern zusammen, um immersive Touren Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen. Unsere Spezialität sind Zeitreiseerlebnisse.

Bald ermöglichen wir es jedem, diese Erlebnisse mit der ZAUBAR-Creator-Plattform zu erstellen, zu teilen und zu monetarisieren.

Die Gründer und das Team haben einen fundierten Hintergrund in KI, Geschichte und Journalismus.

Wir suchen erfahrene Projektmanager, Projektmanagerinnen und solche, die sich dorthin entwickeln wollen!

Du arbeitst mit den Kreativ- und Produktteams zusammen, um neue Funktionen zu planen und Probleme und Möglichkeiten zu priorisieren. Diese kommunizierst du mit unseren Kunden.

Damit du erfolgreich sein kannst, bieten wir dir alles, was du innerhalb unserer dynamischen und mitarbeiterorientierten Unternehmensstruktur benötigst.

Volle Verantwortung und Eigenverantwortung für Ihre Arbeit - Du machst Zeitreisen möglich!

Tasks
Du arbeitest eng mit Design, Technik, Projektmanagement sowie Interessengruppen und Partnern bei der Umsetzung der Produkt-Roadmap zusammen
Du entwickelst unsere Plattform und Kunden-Lösungen im Rahmen einer Release-Planung unter Berücksichtigung von Anforderungen, Ideen, Datenanalysen und Maintenance-Zyklen ständig weiter
Du qualifiziert und formulierst Projekt- und Supporttickets und übersetzt deren Anforderungen als Aufgaben für das Projektteam
Du managst den gesamten Projektprozess - von der Angebotserstellung über die vollständige Umsetzung bis zur Abnahme durch den Kunden
Du kontrollierst und rechnest Budgets in Absprache ab
Wöchentliche und monatliche Erstellung von Projektleistungsberichten
Identifizierung von Nutzerbedürfnissen und Erkennung von Möglichkeiten zur Entwicklung von Funktionen, die das Engagement und die Kundenbindung verbessern und die Nutzerbasis vergrößern
Du führst Recherchen und Befragungen durch, um ein umfassendes Verständnis der Bedürfnisse und Verhaltensweisen unserer Nutzer zu erlangen, und hilfst dabei, neue Produkt- und Geschäftsmöglichkeiten zu identifizieren und zu verfeinern
Herstellen einer effizienten und produktiven Arbeitsatmosphäre in deinen Projekten
Verantwortung für die Organisation, Moderation und Dokumentation von Meetings sowie deren Meetingkultur
Definition und Einhaltung von KPIs in deinen Projekten in Abstimmung mit dem Team
Releaseplanung und Dokumentation sowie die Organisation von den dazugehörigen Release-Parties
Vorbereitende Buchhaltung & Office Management
-> Unterstützung bei bei Buchhaltung für öffentliche Förderungen
-> Bestellungen, Einkäufe für das Büro
-> Terminierungen

Requirements
Wir fordern nicht “bitte sei max. 25 Jahre alt und bring 10 Jahre Berufserfahrung mit”, aber du musst für unsere Vision und das Alltägliche brennen und den Willen haben, stets dazuzulernen
Du willst gemeinsam mit uns wachsen, hast Spaß daran, dich in umfängliche Aufgaben einzuarbeiten und hast das Potential, eines Tages eine Führungsposition zu übernehmen
Ausgeprägte Kommunikations- und Projektmanagementfähigkeiten
Fähigkeit, mit interdisziplinären Teams zusammenzuarbeiten und sie für die Erreichung ihrer Ziele zu begeistern
Ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten und die Fähigkeit, Daten zu nutzen, um fundierte Funktionsentwürfe und Entscheidungen zu treffen
Du musst gerne selbständig arbeiten, teamfähig und engagiert sein
Du sprichst fließend deutsch und englisch

Benefits
Büro im tollen Schöneberg in Berlin
Flache Hierarchie
Wir sponsoren dir ein Swapfiets
Beteiligung
Team Events (VR, AR Schnitzeljagden, Meetups, Fahrradtouren, Parties)
Flexible Arbeitszeiten
Kaffee, Tee und Snack-Flatrate im Büro

Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung!

543 --> Stage - Community manager at Colibrity Agency
join.com
Paris, Île-de-France, France (Remote)
L’agence digitale Colibrity recherche deux stagiaires afin de soutenir les équipes en charge des

différentes tâches. Vous serez intégré dans une équipe jeune, dynamique et compétente qui

vous apprendra à accomplir vos missions mais aussi à maîtriser l’art de l’humour. Qu’est-ce

que serait une bonne équipe sans une bonne ambiance ?

Nous travaillons dans quatre domaines différents, à savoir L’Animation 2D/3D,

NFT/Métaverse, SMM (Social Media & Marketing), Développement IT. Chacune de ces

branches sont étroitement liées et vous serez amené à les découvrir et à y apprendre la base

des connaissances nécessaires à un bon échange interne.

Vos missions
Développer une stratégie de communication en collaboration avec la direction commerciale ou marketing
Fixer les objectifs et suivre les résultats des différentes actions ou campagnes
Analyser les résultats des actions de communication et leur impact commercial
Publier quotidiennement sur les comptes Instagram, Facebook, Tiktok, Twitter, Pinterest des clients de l’agence- Réaliser des reporting hebdomadaire sur l’évolution du reach, de l’engagement, la taille de notre communauté et analyser l’impact des nouvelles actions pour définir des axes d’amélioration
Assurer une veille importante sur le marché, la concurrence, les tendances consommateurs selon les pays, la presse et la publicité
Réaliser et actualiser : écrits pour les posts, les stories , fiches produits, catalogues, films, dossiers presse, campagne publicitaire, newsletters etc.
Faire diffuser les messages, alimenter le réseau en supports (connaissance de Photoshop serait un plus)
Participer à d'autres aspects de la communication dans le domaine commercial, technique et social, dans les situations de crise et avec les services concernés
Participation aux appels d’offre
Recherche d’influenceurs- Surveiller l’e-réputation
Gestion des réseaux sociaux de l’agence et des clients
Marketing d’automation, newsletter- Veille concurrentielle
Création des supports de communication
Développement des produits au sein de l’agence
Cette liste de mission est amenée à évoluer pendant le stage

Vos compétences
Formation Bac+2, une première expérience serait un plus- Maîtrise et connaissance des réseaux sociaux (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Tiktok, Pinterest...)
Capacité rédactionnelle et sens de la communication : rédiger, relayer et transmettre des messages simples avec authenticité (et sans fautes d'orthographe)
La connaissance de Photoshop afin de créer des contenus visuels serait un plus
Capacités d'analyse et de synthèse
Force de proposition pour faire évoluer le contenu
Polyvalent.e, , , autonome, dynamique et audacieuse, et
Tu as un véritable sens créatif, un sens aiguisé du détail et du rapport texte/image
Passionné.e de social media, tu prends plaisir à créer de l’engagement- Une sensibilité à l’univers artistique et digital est un plus

Langue
Français : parlé, écrit
Anglais : parlé, écrit

Durée : 6 mois

de votre formation et de l’acquis des compétences que vous développerez au sein de l’entreprise

547 --> Metaverse Blockchain Software Engineer (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Hamburg, Hamburg, Germany
We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The Work

You’ll often be:

Incubating new business value for our clients in the Metaverse. From Multiparty Systems (Blockchain, Tokenization, NFTs) to Extended Reality (Augmented Reality (AR), Virtual Reality (VR), and Mixed Reality), you will help client transform through technology by sharping, leading, and implementing strategic assessments and technology solutions

Delivering significant innovation and thought leadership in software engineering and technology architecture that will be applied across multiple clients globally to create established success in sales and/or delivery

Supporting the creation of new or evolving existing offerings and assets, while evaluating the value that new capabilities could unlock for organizations and ecosystems

Helping clients move through the education and experimentation phases on to production and value quickly and effectively

Building and delivering solutions at our most technically complex client engagements by advising on the technology approach, architecture, and complex IT program risk elements

Supporting the development of Accenture's Metaverse strategy and response to emerging technology components in the market and shifting how businesses apply those innovations

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Required Qualifications

1+ years’ experience designing, delivering, and assessing complex technical architecture solutions

Training or hands on experience with one or more blockchain platforms, such as R3 Corda, Hyperledger Fabric, DAML, Enterprise Ethereum, Hyperledger Indy/Aries performing:

Distributed network node configuration

Smart contract testing and development

Key management

Network architecture and operations.

1+ years’ of professional working experience in one or more of the following: Java, Python, JavaScript

Preferred Qualifications

Certified in technology architecture. Examples: TOGAF, AWS Solutions Architect Professional, Microsoft Certified Solutions Architect Expert, GCP Professional Cloud Architect

Project experience through all phases of a typical software development lifecycle (SDLC), preferably with agile methods like Scrum, Kanban, SAFe

Understanding of technical architecture concepts and methods, preferably with project experience in a technical architect capacity

551 --> WebGL Unity Client Engineer [Remote]
Braintrust
San Francisco, CA (Remote)
ABOUT US:

Braintrust is the only network that gives in-demand talent all the freedom of freelance with all the benefits, community and stability of a full-time role. As the first decentralized talent network, our revolutionary Web3 model ensures the community that relies on Braintrust to find work are the same people who own and build it through the blockchain token, BTRST. So unlike other marketplaces that take 20% to 50% of talent earnings, Braintrust allows talent to keep 100% of earnings and to vote on key changes to improve the network. Braintrust is working to change the way freelance works – for good.
JOB TYPE: Freelance, Contract Position (no agencies/C2C - see notes below)
LOCATION: Remote - United States only
HOURLY RANGE: Our client is looking to pay $75 – $120/hr
ESTIMATED DURATION: 40h/week - Long-term

THE OPPORTUNITY

Our client is looking for a passionate top-class Unity engineer who can help bring their vision into reality. If you know all the details of how Unity works, believe 3D rendering technology will play a critical role in the metaverse experience in the next decade, and want to seize the opportunity of building what could possibly become one of the largest crypto-centric metaverse platforms in the world, they look forward to hearing from you!

What they look for in you:
7+ years developing in Unity and 3+ years developing in Unity WebGL
Clear understanding of how to optimize Unity WebGL applications
Good knowledge of how backend systems work and how client and server should be designed from an anti-abuse perspective
Extensive experience shipping consumer-facing applications
Meticulousness in the code you produce, including how you measure success of each commit
Excellent communication skills that enable you explain what your code change means to both technical and non-technical audiences
Passion in building an open metaverse platform that onboards millions of web2 users to web3!

Bonus point if:
You are comfortable with web programming (HTML, CSS, Javascript, etc).
You’re familiar with the crypto ecosystem (DeFi, NFTs, identity, staking, or more).
You've worked in a startup environment.
You speak and write in Korean.

What you will be doing:

Work closely with CTO, VP of Engineering, designers, game producers, and engineers to implement our open world metaverse experiences.

Develop social interaction capabilities in the metaverse by integrating chat SDK integrations as well as implementing avatar-to-avatar interactions.

Integrate blockchain smart contracts in the metaverse to enable item purchase experience and more.

Collaborate closely with in-house game developers to implement world game logic.

Interact with UX designers to help implement user-facing avatar, item, and land customization tools.

Participate in art quality discussions and advise artistic fidelity feasibility.

Partner with SRE to ensure smooth deployment of WebGL-based Unity applications in production.

Define general Unity client development processes along with other engineers.

Research and prototype new and upcoming metaverse technologies.

Apply Now!

#PL-BT

ABOUT THE HIRING PROCESS:

Qualified candidates will be invited to do a screening interview with the Braintrust staff. We will answer your questions about the project, and our platform. If we determine it is the right fit for both parties, we'll invite you to join the platform and create a profile to apply directly for this project.

C2C Candidates: This role is not available to C2C candidates working with an agency. If you are a professional contractor who has created an LLC/corp around their consulting practice, this is well aligned with Braintrust and we’d welcome your application.

Braintrust values the multitude of talents and perspectives that a diverse workforce brings. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, religion, age, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, or protected veteran status.

553 --> Metaverse Studio Operations Lead
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work:

The Studio Operations Lead will be responsible for making sure the studio team can have everything that they need to perform at their best. This includes overseeing the budget, procuring tools related to agile development with the production team, validating the pipeline with the studio head and the production team, procuring tools and software for the 3D artist and development teams. Once the teams are up and running, you’ll manage the metrics of the studio and make sure everything is running efficiently.

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 5 years of experience in an operational role managing financials preferably within a creative studio, the gaming industry, immersive media, narrative design, or location-based entertainment space.

Minimum 2 years’ experience overseeing and managing a significant studio budget

Bonus points if you have

Strong understanding of production environment within a studio that produces interactive content

Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel

Knowledge of 3D art, programming, and other skills related to game development or production

Experience leading and motivating a creative team to produce their best work

Ability to manage financial expectations and timelines with clients and to be able to manage workloads across the studios

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

557 --> Analyst Programmer / Senior Programmer
AsiaPay
Hong Kong, Hong Kong SAR (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Founded in 2000, AsiaPay, a premier electronic payment solution and technology vendor and payment service provider, strives to bring advanced, secured, integrated, and cost-effective electronic payment processing solutions and services to banks and e-businesses in the worldwide market, covering international credit card, debit card, bank acccount/net banking, wallet, over-the-counters and other prepaid card payments.

AsiaPay is an accredited payment processor and payment gateway solution vendor for banks, certified IPSP for merchants, certified international 3-D Secure vendor for Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and JCB.

AsiaPay offers its variety of award-winning payment solutions that are multi-currency, multi-lingual, multi-card, and multi-channel together with its advanced fraud detection and management solutions.

Headquartered in Hong Kong, AsiaPay offers its professional e-payment solution consultancy and quality local service support across 13 countries.

To cope with our accelerated business expansion in Asia, we cordially invite high calibre candidates for the following dynamic position.

Responsibilities
Participate in development, testing, and implementation of fintech applications and SYSTEMS
Develop POC for new products and solutions
Liaise with internal colleagues on application requirement gatherings
Provide application and enhancement support to internal users
Support product and solution pre-sales and post-sales activities and follow up customer technical enquiries
Requirements:
Higher Diploma or above in Computer Science, IT or equivalent
At least 1-2 years of experience in Java programming
Knowledge in Java Servlet / ReactJS / other web or blockchain application related technologies
Passionate about cutting-edge technologies in fintech, digital commerce, payment, metaverse areas
Knowledge and experience in online payment, fintech application or ecommerce system is a plus
Good communication skills and good command of both written and spoken English
Less experienced will be considered as Senior Programmer
We offer remuneration to the right person with fast track career development opportunities and fringe benefits. Interested parties please apply withdetailed resume, current and expected salary.

Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purpose only. Applicants who are not contacted within 4 weeks should consider their applications unsuccessful and will be filed for opportunities in future.

559 --> Research and Curation Intern
Iterate.ai 
San Jose, CA
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Iterate.ai is an AI-centric innovation platform that leverages low-code to develop Enterprise applications for global clients. We build solutions that incorporate AI, IoT, startups, big data, and blockchain. We are looking for a technology research intern to join our curation and strategy team.

This research position involves tracking and assessing the latest technology and leading business impact trends:
Metaverse, DEI, supply chain logistics software, composable ecommerce, image recognition, etc.
We have a database of 17m startups, patents, and news trends, all being actively cataloged and curated.
The research intern will be expected to take a topic, research the database along with outside sources, and produce preliminary reports on technology groupings, trends, and potential impacts for our clients.
Experience in research and writing with excellence is needed, and exposure to technology is a plus, but not required. Upon completion, interns will have a stronger understanding of the technology marketplace, stronger writing skills (editorial feedback will be clear), and the intern will be well-positioned for joining a startup-- likely a startup they researched and spoke with directly during the course of preparing a report.
Internships can be as brief as 6 weeks or as long as 1 year. We’re interested in a cultural fit as well as technological and writing skills.Iterate.ai is based in Denver and San Jose, but we’re all remote. If you haven't checked out our solutions yet, go to iterate.ai and learn more about our 50+ Iterators around the globe and what they are doing.

561 --> Live Ops Technical Designer
Soul Assembly
Royal Leamington Spa, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Soul Assembly is a brand new games developer currently consisting of 35+ employees, working on some of the most high profile and most downloaded titles in the XR space today, from our lovely offices in the centre of Leamington Spa. Joining the team now will give you the opportunity to be a part of a growing team exploring the exciting new opportunities that XR and the metaverse offer.

THE ROLE

We're looking for a technical designer to help us grow and support our current and future library of VR titles. You'll work closely with the Live Ops team, Lead Designer, Level Designers, and other disciplines to design and implement fun and engaging gameplay, while also keeping an eye on future updates and new features to be added after launch. If you're experienced with Unity and have a passion for combat, traversal, and other supporting action adventure game systems with a penchant for improvement and fun new ideas, you'll be a superb fit for the team.

Responsibilities
Work with project leads and stakeholders to prototype, build, and iterate on the moment to moment gameplay for new and current projects
Design and implement core combat systems, including weapons and other abilities
Design and implement supporting systems, including health, damage, aim assist, and control responsiveness
Design and implement level layouts and game modes to build upon current gameplay mechanics to further grow and improve our content offering
Collaborate daily with a cross-discipline team to create a fun and compelling experience
Conduct playtests and encourage honest feedback
Document feedback on your work and suggest improvements
Required Skills
Unity editor experience
An understanding of ranged and melee combat, meta game systems and level design
A passion for action adventure games
Effective cross discipline communicator
A keen eye for detail and quality
Good knowledge of current market trends
Comprehensive knowledge of relevant documentation software
Be an ambassador for your features, and the work of the entire department
Nice To Have Skills
A working knowledge of Source Tree
Experience designing and implementing core gameplay systems in an action
WHY APPLY TO SOUL ASSEMBLY?

We'll Give You The Opportunity To

Joining the team now will give you the opportunity to be a part of a growing team going from strength to strength.
A relaxed, friendly and progressive work environment.
25 days annual leave
Help define the studio culture and values
Contribute your input and ideas to our games and to all areas of our business
Be involved in defining studio processes and working practices.
In addition, we will :
Pay a competitive salary, negotiable based on experience
Provide regular activities such as pub, cinema nights and team-building events
Commit to adding additional benefits as we grow
Relocation package for non-UK residents

563 --> Metaverse Studio Operations Lead
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work:

The Studio Operations Lead will be responsible for making sure the studio team can have everything that they need to perform at their best. This includes overseeing the budget, procuring tools related to agile development with the production team, validating the pipeline with the studio head and the production team, procuring tools and software for the 3D artist and development teams. Once the teams are up and running, you’ll manage the metrics of the studio and make sure everything is running efficiently.

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 5 years of experience in an operational role managing financials preferably within a creative studio, the gaming industry, immersive media, narrative design, or location-based entertainment space.

Minimum 2 years’ experience overseeing and managing a significant studio budget

Bonus points if you have

Strong understanding of production environment within a studio that produces interactive content

Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel

Knowledge of 3D art, programming, and other skills related to game development or production

Experience leading and motivating a creative team to produce their best work

Ability to manage financial expectations and timelines with clients and to be able to manage workloads across the studios

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

565 --> 产品经理
FreeBeat
Shanghai, Shanghai, China (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
该职位来源于猎聘 岗位职责： 1. C端产品市场分析，针对市场需求规划产品，编写产品需求文档，交付技术开发； 2. 与研发团队协作，确保产品开发的项目进度，按时、按质交付产品； 3. 发现与汇总产品需求，持续优化、改进产品； 4. 推动产品运营，通过运营数据分析和调整产品设计，达成产品目标； 5. 组织用户测试，收集用户反馈； 6. Do whatever you think is necessary to improve our products bring value to our customers. 岗位要求： 1. 本科及以上学历，专业不限； 2. 有较强的英文听说读写能力； 3. 有互联网或ToC硬件产品相关工作经验，有网站或APP开发经历优先； 4. 喜欢探索前沿科技，有玩乐+极客精神； 5. 有AR/VR，NFT，Metaverse、智能汽车座舱、智能硬件、推荐算法、音乐解析算法等相关经验或想法有优先； 6. 有自驱力，有好奇心，善于学习，勇于创新，工作严谨，责任心强，有良好的团队合作意识，善于沟通，能承受一定工作压力.

566 --> Metaverse Studio Operations Lead
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work:

The Studio Operations Lead will be responsible for making sure the studio team can have everything that they need to perform at their best. This includes overseeing the budget, procuring tools related to agile development with the production team, validating the pipeline with the studio head and the production team, procuring tools and software for the 3D artist and development teams. Once the teams are up and running, you’ll manage the metrics of the studio and make sure everything is running efficiently.

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 5 years of experience in an operational role managing financials preferably within a creative studio, the gaming industry, immersive media, narrative design, or location-based entertainment space.

Minimum 2 years’ experience overseeing and managing a significant studio budget

Bonus points if you have

Strong understanding of production environment within a studio that produces interactive content

Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel

Knowledge of 3D art, programming, and other skills related to game development or production

Experience leading and motivating a creative team to produce their best work

Ability to manage financial expectations and timelines with clients and to be able to manage workloads across the studios

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

567 --> XR Account Manager
Blend Media - Explore XR and the metaverse
London, England, United Kingdom
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Blend Media is a leading light in delivering all types of Immersive Content and XR Solutions. Comprising the world’s largest premium 360/VR video library and a dedicated XR agency, Blend Media works with some of the world’s leading brands.

We genuinely care about people and value kindness in our everyday interactions. You’ll be able to be yourself, feel valued and supported, learn and grow no matter how experienced you are.

This is a great opportunity to join an innovative business that delivers ambitious solutions, connecting creative and technology professionals and helping people imagine and create the world’s best AR, VR, 3D and Metaverse content experiences.

We’re a small company best suited to individuals who want to make their mark in the XR world, as well as contributing to, and sharing in the company’s commercial success.

What will you be doing?
Taking the initiative on a wide range of client account, marketing and administrative projects and tasks, including:
Collaborating with creators, agencies and solution providers to pitch/deliver creative concepts
Engaging with our creator community
Manage XR projects from conception to completion
Account management of existing clients and projects
Identifying trends in XR, staying abreast of the latest technological advances in this sector, evangelising about the benefits and use cases of XR
Creating and delivering professional sales presentations to partner organisations
Working with the company's marketing agency to facilitate the marketing plan
Administrative projects and support
What are the skills required?
A self-starter who enjoys working in a fast-paced environment in an exciting growing industry
Enthusiastically pro-active with a can-do attitude and willingness to take on all types of projects and tasks
Passionately curious, with knowledge of XR highly desirable
Min 2 years experience in a comparable role
Strong administrative and project management skills
Excellent presentation and client relationship skills
Growth mindset and desire to learn and succeed.
Where is the job located?

We are a fully remote company. We all work from home, video-call daily, and meet in person from time to time in London.

What benefits do you offer?
Option to work a 4 day week.
Competitive salary
Stock Options so that we all do well if the company is successful
Standard UK pension
25 days of holiday each year, rising to 27 days after 1 year of service
Salary - up to 40K
We’re committed to being inclusive and diverse. We do not discriminate based on gender, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, civil or family status, age, disability, or race.

How To Apply

If this sounds like you, get in touch with us by sending your CV to work@blend.media

569 --> *Adobe Content and Commerce - Practice Leader*
Accenture Australia
Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
This role is to create a practice across JAPAC, MEA and LatAm for Adobe Content and Commerce to provide varying levels support for Market Units based on maturity. It is to be a community builder that can raise the level of every market to the highest standards. It is an innovator’s role that looks at new technologies, platforms and experience to push the capabilities of what is possible. While technical strength is important, imagination and innovation are critical to help our clients deliver delightful experiences.

Build the Growth Markets Adobe Content and Commerce Practice that includes:

Content Management build operate and run for multiple environments and experiences.

Commerce platform that integrates with multiple technologies and is part of a total omnichannel go to market.

Content operations including brands as publishers and synthetic photography.

Forms design, development and scaling as part of broader eco-systems and integration platforms including workflow and e-signatures. Work closely with the Communications and Design capabilities to ensure deals and deliveries are about end experiences and not just the technology.

Develop the processes, operating procedures and development programs that will allow the practice to scale including the creation of development studios and resources from multiple parts of Accenture.

Help solution and architect all large and complex deals, while being the SME and leading the pitch for the technology solution.

Create assets that can be used to position and originate opportunities for the practices’ offerings (to different parts of Accenture and to clients)

Desired Experience:

At least 10 years in the digital technology space with an understanding of digital marketing, digital advertising and customer experience.

Built, grown and developed teams that have delivered work that has delivered complex projects in content and commerce platforms.

Worked on multiple channels and technologies beyond websites and pushed the boundaries to new experiences such as chat, voice, AR/VR.

Solution architected and pitched complex, multi-platform solutions to technical and non-technical audiences.

Played an SME or supporting role for colleagues in both sales and delivery in multiple geographies.

Hands on knowledge of the Adobe Experience Cloud stack (and ideally it’s competitors).

A successful applicant will be:

Curious problem solver, especially in technology, content, commerce and customer experiences.

Explainer and simplifier – able to make the complex understandable.

Up to date with the latest technologies and channels, including experimenting with the Metaverse.

Adaptable to multiple cultures – working with people in different roles around the world.

Empathetic with genuine interest in the client outcomes and the best interest of the team.

We Are:

Accenture Song accelerates growth and value for our clients through sustained customer relevance. Our capabilities span ideation to execution: growth, product and experience design; technology and experience platforms; creative, media and marketing strategy; and campaign, content and channel orchestration. With strong client relationships and deep industry expertise, we help our clients operate at the speed of life through the unlimited potential of imagination, technology and intelligence. Visit us at: www.accenture.com/song

We Look For :

If you are an expert at developing business, we want to meet you. If you relish delivering business, we want to meet you! If you love innovating and building industry leading digital solutions, we want to meet you!! There is never a typical day at Accenture Song, that’s why people love it here. The opportunities to make a difference while working on exciting client initiatives are limitless in this ever-changing space. Your role will require you to directly work with the client to bring ideas and innovation for customer relationships, digital marketing, ecommerce, and omni-channel solutions. You will also be accountable for helping to drive new ideas with the client and working with the practice specific teams to ensure client value and ability to execute are front and centre.

About Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

At Accenture, our philosophy is anchored in recognising that our people are multi-dimensional. We take an intersectional human approach to create a work environment where all people feel like they can bring their authentic selves to work, every day.

We believe that equality drives innovation. Our commitment to accelerating equality starts at the top with our board and CEO and extends across every part of the company. This comes to life when our people own the equality agenda, making it part of their jobs – every decision, every day – and feel free to speak up and to act.

We do not tolerate discrimination because of differences, such as age, ability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity or expression, religion, or sexual orientation. We want a workplace that is inclusive and diverse to that end we are setting bold goals and taking comprehensive action. To achieve these goals, we collect information that allows us to track the effectiveness of our Inclusion and Diversity programs.

Learn how Accenture protects your personal data and know your rights in relation to your personal data. Read more about our Privacy Statement.

570 --> Volunteer: Flexible Marketing Strategy Support for SAVI - Strategic Alliance Veteran Integration
Catchafire
Kansas City, MO (Remote)
Help SAVI - Strategic Alliance Veteran Integration with critical marketing strategy needs over the course of 4 weeks, in areas like finding the right marketing channels, brand messaging or audience targeting.

Our Mission

SAVI helps Veterans navigate the complexities and frustrations of transitioning to civilian life by providing benefits education, custom support and more as part of a suite of proprietary programs.

Fun Fact About Us
Our team loves supporting Veterans and working together to execute our mission! 100% of all contributions go directly to programmatic support. Be a part of the impact.

What You'll Work On
Ongoing marketing strategy support for 10-15 hours over the course of 4 weeks
Support may include: defining your marketing goals, determining the right marketing channels, messaging your program, branding, or defining your target audience
Note: We devised this project to connect nonprofits and volunteers for more flexible, more immediate impact. We strongly suggest you start with 4 weeks and decide from there if you'd like to continue working.
Additional Details
We are hosting our first Metaverse in December and want a marketing strategy for this event to attract participants willing to donate, individual donors to sponsor Veterans, and sponsors.

Your Skills
Digital Marketing
Marketing
Your Experience
Experience working in/with marketing strategy in a professional capacity
Your Availability
Works remotely from anywhere
10-15 hours over 4 weeks
Why You'll Love Volunteering With Us
Enhance your skills while supporting a cause you care about
Gain samples of work & references to add to your portfolio
Directly impact a community organization on the ground
Work remotely & create your own schedule
Catchafire is committed to helping nonprofits affected by COVID-19 who need virtual volunteers now more than ever. Take a look at the projects we have available to see how you can help.

This volunteer opportunity was originally posted on Catchafire, an online tool that connects nonprofits & social enterprises with passionate professionals who want to donate their skills, pro bono. All Catchafire volunteer opportunities are well scoped, flexible, and include access to support from Catchafire's team of Nonprofit Advisors.

573 --> Game Engine Automation Engineer - Contract
Roblox
San Mateo, CA (On-site)
Every day, tens of millions of people from around the world come to Roblox to play, learn, work, and socialize in immersive digital experiences created by the community. Our vision is to build a platform that enables shared experiences among billions of users. This is what’s known as the metaverse: a persistent space where anyone can do just about anything they can imagine, from anywhere in the world and on any device. Join us and you’ll usher in a new category of human interaction while solving exceptional challenges that you won’t find anywhere else.

As a Game Engine Automation Engineer, you will develop tools, tests, and test frameworks for the Roblox engine. In addition to working with our QA teams to write Luau-based automated tests for gameplay and engine features, you will partner with engineering teams to improve tools and frameworks to enable developers to write their own tests as features are developed.

You Are
Experienced in development on the Roblox engine
Proficient in Luau
A graduate from a Computer Science or a related university program
Able to break down ambiguous or high-level goals and implement solutions end-to-end
You Will
Develop Luau-based automated tests for Roblox engine features
Work closely with QA and engineering teams to improve tools and frameworks to enable developers to write their own tests as features are developed
You’ll Love
Industry-leading compensation package
Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverage
A rewarding 401k program
Flexible vacation policy
Roflex - Flexible and supportive work policy
Roblox Admin badge for your avatar
At Roblox HQ:
Free catered lunches five times a week and several fully stocked kitchens with unlimited snacks
Onsite fitness center and fitness program credit
Annual CalTrain Go Pass

574 --> Bell Labs - Metaverse Researcher
Nokia
Budapest, Budapest, Hungary (Hybrid)
Come create the technology that helps the world act together

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work.

The team you'll be part of

The AI Semantic Reasoning and Understanding (AI-SR&U) team creates ground-breaking research in various areas of spatial computing, namely visual localization, semantic segmentation and scene understanding for industrial environments, with the long term mandate to put together the enablers of an industrial metaverse with a strong emphasis on intertwining the physical with the digital. We are part of the AI Research Lab with an established record of ground-breaking research into problems of direct industrial and scientific impact.

Nokia Bell Labs is the world-renowned research arm of Nokia, having invented many of the foundational technologies that underpin information and communications networks and all digital devices and systems. This research has produced nine Nobel Prizes, five Turing Awards and numerous other awards.

What You Will Learn And Contribute To

We are looking for researchers able to advance the state of the art in technologies for the industrial metaverse and put them into use in the context of building industrial metaverses.

Successful candidates are able to build and scale prototypes using technologies ranging from
computer vision algorithms for 3D computational photography to neural rendering
scene reconstruction to computational imaging
visual-inertial odometry, state estimation, sensor fusion, mapping and localization to natural language processing, language grounding and interaction technologies

In your work, you will focus on key aspects of these technologies, create research papers, patent applications and research prototypes. In addition, you will broadly cooperate with Bell Labs researchers from our lab and other research labs, working on distinct aspects of the metaverse to advance the state of the art in research, with development teams on taking your prototypes to the next level of maturity and towards productization. You will also collaborate with architects and technical leads from our business units.

Your Skills And Experience

You would be a great fit for this role if you had:
PhD degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Mathematics, or a related field (e.g., Computer Vision, Natural Language Processing)
Strong research record in top conferences/journals dealing with technologies relevant for the metaverse
Background in data science, experience in developing AI/ML applications
Experience with software development with one or more general programming languages (e.g., Java, C/C++, C#, Python, JavaScript, or Go)

It would be nice if you also had:
Excellent written communication skills, and excellent verbal skills, possibly manifested through videos of your talks (from conferences, seminars, TED talks, keynote speeches, interviews or any other types of public videos of you as a technical person/researcher)
Innate curiosity to continuously learn, deepen and widen your skills and propensity to relentlessly follow the state of the art in your field of research
Strong self-motivation to continuously innovate
Proven record of coding skills in technologies relevant for the metaverse, materialized in either a Github (or other) account, with a healthy mix and number of meaningful contributions, or authorship of papers with code etc

What We Offer

Nokia offers flexible and working schemes, continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered

Joining Nokia Hungary will make you eligible for the following additional benefits:
Flexible working hours - the core time is between 9:30 and 15:30
Flexible fringe benefit system (cafeteria)
Laptop and mobile phone (with SIM card)
Company car or cash allowance
Yearly performance bonus
Risk, life, and accident insurance
On-site doctor with various preventive services and health screening programs

Personal Support Service (PSS) – free access to confidential and professional support and guidance on a range of emotional, practical and work-life topics
E-learning platforms such as NokiaEDU, Harvard ManageMentor, LinkedIn Learning etc. at your disposal for certified technical training and personal development
Everyday Excellence – Employee Recognition Program (awards can be redeemed via our online store)

• Experience in Event Sales and Audience Development is preferred but not essential.

578 --> Modern Workplace Pre-sales Architect
Avanade
Edinburgh, Scotland, United Kingdom
About Us

Job Description

Want to create value with digital and turn your ideas into human impact? So do we.

At Avanade our vision is to be the leading innovator in Workplace Experience by 2023, creating impactful and motivational Employee and Customer Experiences through the power of the Microsoft ecosystem.

We help clients to re-imagine their Workplace Experience (WX) encompassing technology, employee experience and business operations to remove cultural barriers, unlock new sources of value and drive sustainable growth.

By joining Avanade’s Modern Workplace community, you will have a fantastic opportunity to operate at the forefront of technology, with access to global clients, on challenging and exciting projects.

We are a diverse team, and we are proud of our culture that welcomes every individual. In our team you will find talented and passionate technologists, with a collaborative, positive can-do attitude.

If you are the type of person who thrives on constantly learning and challenging yourself with a genuine desire to do your best, then you could be successful here. Our promise is to invest in you and help give you the platform for continuous learning and career development.

About the Role:

Avanade’s Modern Workplace Solution Area is responsible for making our Workplace vision a reality through three focused offerings:

Workplace Platform Modernization – modernizing and extend the workplace technology ecosystem to protect against attacks, supporting new ways of working and drive increased business value.
Workplace Value Realization – releasing business value through reimagined culture and employee experience, transforming business operations by reconfiguring how work gets done.
Workplace Managed Services – managing and continuously evolving the workplace technology ecosystem to support new ways of working and deliver increased business value.

Sales and solutioning for these offerings is also supported by a centre of excellence (COE) team that works with global, area (Europe) and regional (UK) offering, sales and delivery leads.

To further grow our portfolio of services and revenues, we are expanding our Workplace applications pre-sales expertise within the UK Modern Workplace Value Realisation team by hiring a Workplace Collaborative Applications Architect/Subject Matter Expert (SME).

We are looking for a Workplace Collaborative Applications Architect who is experienced in designing, solutioning and selling solutions that covers any combination of enterprise workflow, automation, AI, IoT and Augmented Reality leveraging Microsoft Office 365, Viva, Power Platform and Azure technologies.

You bring valuable experience working with clients in a consulting environment, with solid technical architecture and delivery management experience.
You are an experienced trusted advisor at the CIO / Senior IT Stakeholder level working within teams to undertake rapid assessments to define technology roadmaps and strategies.
You have worked with clients and internal teams in a technical pre-sales capacity supporting sales development and proposal response teams with insights, solution approach, technical architecture, estimation and delivery practices.
You have directly managed Technical Delivery activities, Delivery Teams and supervised the work of teams of Technical SME’s, providing technical guidance and leadership to achieve objectives.

Responsibilities:

Helping clients realise meaningful business growth through workplace transformation, you will work with account teams to shape, sell and coordinate the delivery of propositions that address client challenges in the areas of workplace strategy, workplace transformation, business operations optimisation and reimagined employee experience.

You will also have the chance to:

Understand business drivers, agree the optimum approach, and develop pragmatic, deliverable and sustainable Workplace solutions and roadmaps that allows clients to address their business needs and leverage the best value out of their Microsoft investments.
Provide subject matter expertise in relation to workplace applications for front line workers in our priority industry segments, alongside workflow management redesign and automation solutions to help optimize front and back-office business processes.
Contribute to the development and evolution of future focused workplace and organisation transformation propositions and solutions.
Support the selling and implementation of workplace experience propositions in response to market demand and digital trends.
Assist senior team members with sales efforts including development of client proposals and pitch mechanics. Delivering sales presentations to clients and responding to RFPs.
Lead client engagements as a Technical Delivery Lead, responsible for the successful delivery of O365 and Power Platform solutions.
Coordinate with and leverage offshore resources.

Your skills:

Significant experience architecting and supporting sales of application-focused workplace solutions spanning underlying cloud infrastructure, low-code/no-code-platforms, rich-client applications as well as employee experience and business improvement.
Workplace applications strategy, lifecycle organization, governance and operations knowledge underpinned by Microsoft Office 365 and Power Platform.
Sales and/or end to end solutioning accountability and track record for a pipeline of $1M+ digital transformation deals with demonstrable innovation and value creation.
Solution design, integration, implementation/ transition to managed services including lifecycle management, applications factory (scaled application development and/or application in-take), service management and ideally experience optimization.
Expertise in developing solutions for information workers by building informationarchitecture as well as leveraging enterprise workflow and business process automation tools.
Knowledge of front line/customer facing worker applications for at least one of the following industry segments (Banking, Insurance, Retail, Manufacturing, Energy, Health Services Provision, Public Sector and Utilities).
Experience of Agile Methodologies within Software Development.
Appreciation of Microsoft’s industry Clouds and the Metaverse topic.
Experience of working within a matrixed business spanning consulting and technology services and onshore/nearshore/offshore delivery centres.
Experience in supporting the development, implementation, and deployment of innovative go-to-market strategies (supporting sales and marketing initiatives) across large scale services-based opportunities.

'Avanade UK is a proud signatory of the Tech Talent Charter ’

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

581 --> Digital Identity Architect & Consultant (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany
Dezentrale-/Blockchain-Identity-Technologie, Self-Sovereign Identity sowie eIDAS & European DI Infrastructure sind Themen, die zu deinen Skills passen? Dann passt du perfekt zu Accenture: Wir sind ein internationales Beratungs- und Technologieunternehmen, digitales Innovationszentrum und zukunftsweisende Kreativagentur in einem. Unser global agierendes Team arbeitet nicht nur daran, die Grundsteine für die digitale Welt der Zukunft zu legen, sondern entwickelt gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden digitale Identitätslösungen, die von allen Bürger:innen genutzt werden. Unsere Lösungen bilden die Basis für voll digitale Prozesse bei Bürgerämtern, bis hin zur Identifizierung und Authentifizierung von Nutzer:innen im Metaverse. Dazu arbeiten wir mit verschiedenen öffentlichen Institutionen, als auch zahlreichen Kunden aus der Wirtschaft zusammen.

Das erwartet dich

Du berätst unsere nationalen sowie internationalen Kunden technisch wie fachlich zu digitalen Identitätslösungen – auch auf Basis der Blockchain-Technologie.

Ob Personalausweis, Führerschein oder Zeugnis: Du trägst dazu bei, sichere und vor allem nutzerfreundliche Identitätslösungen zu definieren und zu implementieren.

Zu diesem Zweck entwickelst du auch das technische Lösungsdesign, inklusive der Architektur für die jeweiligen Identitätslösungen (Wallet-Apps und Backend).

Mit deinen akkuraten Prozessanalysen gestaltest du Prozesse für die Ausstellung, als auch Verifizierung digitaler Identitäten.

Und bei technischen Code Reviews kooperierst du eng mit unseren Entwicklerteams, die du mit klugen Vorschlägen und wichtigen Insights bereicherst.

Darauf freuen wir uns

Abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftsinformatik, Informatik, des Wirtschaftsingenieurwesens oder vergleichbar

Erste Berufserfahrung (1+ Jahre) im Bereich der digitalen Identitäten (Beratung, Entwicklung etc.)

Gutes Verständnis der Konzepte Self-Sovereign Identity, IAM, Blockchain und Smart Contracts

Überblick über Entwicklungen auf EU-Ebene zur eIDAS Verordnung

Praxis in IT-Architektur, der Unternehmensberatung sowie grundlegende Programmierkenntnisse

Idealerweise Know-how in Digital-/Self-Sovereign-Identity-Frameworks, wie Hyperledger Indy/Aries sowie fließendes Englisch und Deutsch

Deine Vorteile bei Accenture

Du als Mensch bist uns wichtig. Das wirst du täglich spüren und erleben. Denn unsere Arbeitswelt ist auf dich ausgerichtet und bietet dir die umfassenden Benefits eines großen, verantwortungsvollen Arbeitgebers. Dein zukünftiges Team schätzt vor allem

flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle, mobiles Arbeiten und die Option, in Teilzeit und/oder im Homeoffice zu arbeiten

umfassende Trainingsangebote, Fort- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten

interessante Karriereoptionen

unser globales Team und die direkte Einbindung, auch auf globaler Ebene

unsere Arbeitskultur, die Diversität & Inklusion fördert
