Teilzeit mit Potenzial nach oben, auch Freelance-Modell möglich, Bregenz (oder remote).

Andere gehen bloß arbeiten. Wir glauben, dass die Arbeit Spaß machen muss, dass man täglich etwas Neues dazu lernen kann und mit spannenden, lustigen und motivierten Menschen gemeinsam Herausforderungen bewältigen darf. Wir alle wollen dasselbe: unseren Kunden helfen, online zu wachsen und dabei selber zu wachsen. Willst du das auch? Komm mit auf die Reise – wir versprechen, es wird spannend.

AUFGABEN

• Als Schnittstelle zwischen Team und Kunden fungieren
• Im Sales-Prozess unterstützen – Koordination von Texterstellungen

ANFORDERUNGEN

• Du hast ein Studium aus den Bereichen Germanistik/Sprachwissenschaft, Marketing/Kommunikation/Medien, BWL/Wirtschaftswissenschaften, Informatik abgeschlossen, stehst kurz vor dem Abschluss oder hast eine vergleichbare Ausbildung
• Du hast ein gutes Sprachgefühl und eine ausgezeichnete Grammatik und Rechtschreibung
• Das Arbeiten im Team und die Kommunikation mit Kunden machen Dir Spaß
• Du bist strukturiert, zuverlässig, sorgfältig, belastbar und kommunizierst, intern wie extern, in souveräner und professioneller Art
• Im Idealfall hattest Du bereits erste Berührungspunkte mit SEO oder anderen Online-Marketing-Disziplinen

WIR BIETEN

„Deine persönliche Success Roadmap“
zusammen mit dir erstellen wir ein Dokument, das der Weg zu deinen Zielen innerhalb von unserem Team klarlegt.

„Wachstum in einer jungen Agentur mit großen Zielen“
Blockchain, NFTs, Metaverse, Web3 – wir sind eine der ersten Agenturen im DACH Raum, die bereits jetzt die Zukunft sieht und für unsere Kunden aufbaut. Und wir haben erst angefangen.

„Von den besten lernen“
in dem, was wir tun, sind wir in der Top-Liga. Es macht einfach Spaß, mit Top-Leuten und den neuesten Technologien zu arbeiten, weil man jeden Tag dazu lernen kann und selber besser werden.

„Aufstieg ist gefördert“
Jeder soll so schnell wie möglich aufsteigen. Er muss nur die Hand heben und sagen „Ich will diese Position.“ Wenn er sich beweist, kann er sie bekommen.

„Flexibilität in der Arbeit“
jeder hat seine Talente – wir wollen deine entdecken und dich dort fördern. Dann fühlt sich Arbeit nicht mehr als Arbeit an.

„Die Welt sehen“
zweimal im Jahr machen wir Co-working an irgendeinem schönen Fleck der Welt. Wir haben auch Partner-Agenturen, die man besuchen und dort eine Weile arbeiten kann.

„Tolles Team und Kultur“
wir passen aufeinander auf, helfen einander und sind für einander da. Deine Skills sind unwichtig, wenn du menschlich nicht in so einem Team arbeiten möchtest.

„Free-vacation policy“
du kannst dir so viel freinehmen, wie du möchtest. Solange deine Arbeit on-time und gut gemacht wird und dein Team gerne mit dir arbeitet, ist es für uns 100% in Ordnung.

„Geld und Anerkennung“
jeder bekommt seinen Lohn. Dazu kommt noch ein Bonus, wenn unsere Ziele erreicht werden. Wir loben sehr gerne und oft. Wir sagen offen, wenn etwas nicht passt. Ehrlich und transparent.

Du hältst dich lieber zurück und machst einfach deinen Job? Mach das! Bei uns fühlt sich jeder wohl. Werde Teil unseres Teams und hilf uns dabei, die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen! Aus einer Idee, Kreativität, Mut und Fleiß ist mittlerweile, dank eines genialen Teams, etwas Großes geworden. Wir haben zahlreiche Auszeichnungen erhalten und begeistern mit unserer Art zu Denken und unserer Technologie auch einige der bekanntesten Unternehmen Deutschlands.

Wir sind easy Access und Open Access und gleichzeitig Enterprise. Unser Working Space ist wie ein Zuhause, nur noch wohnlicher. Er ist wie ein Büro, nur noch produktiver. Er ist wie ein Atelier, nur noch kreativer. Du wirst es lieben.

Wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf deine Bewerbung!

To be eligible for this position, the client requires full Covid-19 vaccination

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS :

The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

While performing the duties of this job, the employee is required to:

Regularly sit, stand, walk, bend over, grasp, talk and/or hear, and drive
Occasionally carry and lift office supplies up to 20 lbs.
Continuous hand/eye coordination and fine manipulation

BDS Connected Solutions. Since 1985, BDS has been inspired by innovation; as we continue to evolve as a trendsetter in today’s disruptive market, we enable our clients to do the same. Job Description

Want to build new value with digital technology and turn your ideas into human impact? So do we!

There’s one in every group—the person who dreams big and has the motivation to bring their ideas to life, even as others might roll their eyes and prefer to play it safe. Are you that person? Because we are building teams of people like that to help our clients unlock the power they need now and own what’s next.

At Avanade Advisory, we are breaking apart the traditional process of setting strategies and goals first, then finding technologies to achieve them. In the digital age, there’s no time for that linear process. We partner with clients to accelerate value from digital innovation by being ambitious, imaginative – and fast. We believe big and deliver personally. We relentlessly challenge, encourage, and support our clients and each other.

Want the agility and energy of a start-up, backed by the resources of Accenture, Microsoft and the Center for Information Systems Research at MIT Sloan School of Management? Here you will find a team of people who thrive on turning ideas and innovations into breakthrough results for leading organizations around the globe. Ultimately, we’re not just making business better. We’re making life better for our clients and their customers.

If that sounds like you, you sound good to us! Find your next opportunity at Avanade Advisory.

Overview :

Avanade is looking for a Digital Enterprise Advisory Lead to expand the impact of our advisory practice across European regions ( UK&I, ASG, France, Netherlands and the Nordics ) . You will enable and drive the growth of our Digital Enterprise Advisory practices in our priority regions across all aspects of practice growth including shaping our market points of view and client propositions, helping to attract and retain great talent, embedding progressive learning and development, and of course leading by example through your contribution in building relationships and delivering great outcomes for our clients .

Th is role can be based anywhere in Europ e and you will be working closely with priority local clients as well as supporting other regions across Europe . Manage and lead the delivery of a broad range of strateg ic advisory engagements to support clients through their modernisation, transformation, and innovation journeys

Balance your strong analytical and inter-personal skills including storytelling, facilitation, problem solving, negotiation , etc. to deliver client outcomes

Get involved in high priority pursuits and sales opportunities, including development of winning proposals, coaching bid teams, and embedding a continuous learning and improvement framework with ongoing focus on improving win rates
Actively develop and maintain senior client relationships and networks by being relevant, innovative, and consistent

Market / Practice Impact : working with the Europe Advisory Lead to define, prioritise and scale Advisory growth. Collaborating w ith regional Advisory teams in each country to activate this growth, accelerate maturity , and scale out of our regional practices. As part of the role , you will:

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

654 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] iOS Programmer (2년 이상)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

NFT Metaverse Dept 소속의 Client 팀은 크래프톤에서 글로벌 시장 타겟으로 새롭게 준비 중인 NFT 메타버스 프로젝트의 클라이언트를 개발하는 부서입니다.

최적화, 자동화, 퀄리티업의 목표를 가지고 글로벌 멀티플랫폼 프로젝트의 라이브 서비스 경험을 바탕으로 역량을 갖춘 함께 일하고 싶은 소프트웨어 엔지니어들로 구성되어있습니다. .

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
Objective-C/Swift를 사용하여, iOS 플랫폼에 최적화 된 앱을 개발합니다.
Android 프로그래머와 협업하여 더 나은 서비스를 위한 새로운 기술 도입, 구조 개선, 성능 최적화 등의 업무를 합니다.
C++ 프로그래머와 협업하여 Unreal Engine 5로 제작한 컨텐츠가 밍글링된 앱을 개발합니다.
Apple App Store와 같은 iOS 앱 ESD에 앱을 배포하고 관리합니다.

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
Objective-C/Swift를 사용한 2년 이상의 앱 개발 경력이 있거나 그에 준하는 역량을 갖추신 분
iOS/Android 환경에서의 UI/UX에 전반적인 이해를 갖추신 분
iOS 앱 개발에서 해야할 것(Do)과 하지 말아야 할 것(Don't)에 대한 정의가 있으신 분
MVVM 패턴 등 종속성을 최소화하는 프로그래밍 방법에 대한 이해가 있으신 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
신규 앱을 런칭하고 운영해본 경험이 있으신 분
다른 직군의 동료에게 기술에 대해 쉽게 설명할 수 있고 같이 협업할 수 있는 능력을 갖추신 분
게임과 같은 그래픽 기반 인터렉티브 컨텐츠를 즐기시는 분
XCode Instruments를 사용해 분석 및 최적화를 해본 경험이 있으신 분
WWDC를 챙겨보거나 Github Contributor 경험이 있으신 분
전산학(컴퓨터과학) 전공하신 분
protobuf, gRPC 사용 경험이 있으신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

Denn wir wissen, was Verbraucher wollen - und warum sie es wollen. In unseren 15 Büros auf der ganzen Welt begleiten über 1200 Mitarbeitende unsere Kunden bei ihrem Wachstum. Und auch wir wollen wachsen: Um unsere Expansionspläne für den deutschen Markt in die Tat umzusetzen, suchen wir dich!

Du hast Lust unser Team im Medienhafen Düsseldorf zu verstärken und die Zukunft von Mintel in Deutschland mitzugestalten? Dann bewirb dich jetzt schnell und unkompliziert mit deinem Lebenslauf.

Konkret suchen wir einen verbraucherorientierten Research Analysten, der über den Consumer Technology sowie den Media Sektor (Smartwatches und Wearable Technology, Verbraucher und das Metaverse, Einstellungen gegenüber aufstrebenden Technologien, Social Media: Interaktion mit Marken oder Streaming Video) schreibt. Der Fokus liegt hierbei auf Reports für und über den deutschen Markt, wobei die gelegentliche Präsentation von Trends gegenüber Kunden auch zu dieser Position gehört.

Idealerweise hast du bereits Erfahrung darin, Daten aus der Verbraucher- und Trendforschung zu analysieren und in Erkenntnisse zu übersetzen. Diese Erfahrung kannst du sowohl auf Kundenseite oder aber bei einem Forschungs- bzw. Marketingstrategie-Unternehmen gesammelt haben.

Ein modern ausgestattetes Büro (Design Offices) mit diversen Meeting Spaces, Rückzugsorten für konzentriertes Arbeiten und einer Dachterrasse
Das Sind Deine Aufgaben
Verfassen von erkenntnisreichen Inhalten über Branchenthemen und –trends, die einen Einfluss auf die Unternehmensstrategie, Marktentwicklung, Innovation sowie das Verbraucherverhalten haben können. Dies ist die Hauptaufgabe in der Rolle als Research Analyst und du wirst bis zu 90% deiner Tätigkeit dem Schreiben von Reports widmen
Nutzung einer breiten Palette an Forschungsinstrumenten, darunter Primär- und Sekundärquellen sowie quantitative und qualitative Verbraucherforschung zur Veröffentlichung von Inhalten auf monatlicher Basis
Festlegung von Zielen für die Verbraucherforschung und Konzeption von Vebraucherumfragen zur Erreichung dieser Ziele
Inspiration und Information unserer Kunden mithilfe von Präsentationen, Webinaren und auf Konferenzen sowie Messen

Unterstützung der Sales Teams bei Pitches mit unseren Kunden
Unterstützung der PR- und Marketingteams, um die Expertise von Mintel nach extern zu vermitteln
Teilnahme an Brainstorming-Meetings und Unterstützung aller Teams im gesamten Unternehmen
Coaching und Mentoring von anderen Teammitgliedern
Das Wünschen Wir Uns Von Dir
Mindestens 3 Jahre Erfahrung im Bereich Verbraucherforschung und Trends
Ausgezeichnete Schreib- und Präsentationsfähigkeiten in Deutsch sowie Englisch
Ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten
Kreativität und die Fähigkeit schnell zu denken sowie selbstständig zu arbeiten
Eine Leidenschaft für das Verstehen von Trends, welche das Verhalten von Menschen bzw. Verbrauchern beeinflussen
Flexibilität und Reisebereitschaft für regelmäßige Besuche des HQ in London
Es ist von Vorteil, wenn du bereits Erfahrungen im Research und der Analyse von Verbrauchermärkten hast - wir glauben aber, dass es viele Möglichkeiten gibt, das nötige Know-How zu erlernen und Skills zu entwickeln - und wir lieben diverse Erfahrungen. Solltest du also nicht alle aufgelisteten Anforderungen erfüllen, aber glauben, dass dieser Job genau der richtige für dich ist - wir würden dich gerne kennenlernen!

people with commercial acumen, technical experience and enthusiasm to work with companies across the globe

667 --> Software Engineer - Network Nervous System
DFINITY
San Francisco Bay Area (Hybrid)
The Internet Computer is the fastest and only infinitely scalable general-purpose blockchain — incubated and launched by the DFINITY Foundation in May 2021. A team of over 200 world renowned cryptographers, distributed systems engineers, and programming language experts have taken on the massive technological challenge of building, maintaining, and continuously improving a ‘world computer’ powerful enough to host Web3 dapps, DeFi, games, NFTs, social media, and metaverse projects.

DFINITY was founded in 2016 by entrepreneur and crypto theoretician, Dominic Williams, and attracted interest and financial contributions from early members of the Ethereum community. Later, top-tier institutions such as Andreessen Horowitz, Polychain Capital, and SV Angel backed the Internet Computer in a collective effort to help build out Web3.
We’re seeking a Distributed Systems Implementation and Operation expert, responsible for working on the Network Nervous System (NNS) - The Brain of the Internet Computer. This will be a key role, building the intelligent, decentralized and autonomous system that controls the Internet Computer.

Responsibilities:

Implement secure, decentralized governance systems to manage the Internet Computer
Collaborate with other development and research teams in providing decentralized governance for various components of the Internet Computer and building proofs of the security of the system
Contribute to the token system that will power the Internet Computer.
Help design endpoints that will allow for efficient operation of the Internet Computer.
Embed the NNS with intelligence, enabling it to automate smart decisions like evicting malicious nodes or coordinate automated responses to DOS attacks.
Build a system for autonomous programs to be able to run on the Internet Computer, powering decentralized autonomous apps with token based governance.

Requirements:

Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related field
6+ years of industry experience as a software engineer working on large scale/distributed systems
A skilled programmer with a deep understanding of at least one systems software language like C, C++, or Rust. Our distributed systems components are written in Rust and we’re committed to training if that’s a skillset you’re looking to build.
Experience building large scale distributed systems - bonus if they are public-facing.
Experience operating large scale distributed systems, especially in fault/threat detection and mitigation.
Experience building governance and operations tools for large scale distributed systems
Nice to have: Familiarity with Cryptocurrency and Blockchain technologies.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Jeder soll so schnell wie möglich aufsteigen. Er muss nur die Hand heben und sagen „Ich will diese Position.“ Wenn er sich beweist, kann er sie bekommen.
„Flexibilität in der Arbeit“
Jeder hat seine Talente – wir wollen deine entdecken und dich dort fördern. Dann fühlt sich Arbeit nicht mehr als Arbeit an.
„Die Welt sehen“
Zweimal im Jahr machen wir Co-Working an irgendeinem schönen Fleck der Welt. Wir haben auch Partner-Agenturen, die man besuchen und dort eine Weile arbeiten kann.
„Tolles Team und Kultur“
Wir passen aufeinander auf, helfen einander und sind füreinander da. Deine Skills sind unwichtig, wenn du menschlich nicht in so einem Team arbeiten möchtest.
„Free-vacation policy“
Du kannst dir so viel freinehmen, wie du möchtest. Solange deine Arbeit on-time und gut gemacht wird und dein Team gerne mit dir arbeitet, ist es für uns 100% in Ordnung.
„Geld und Anerkennung“
Jeder bekommt seinen Lohn. Dazu kommt noch ein Bonus, wenn unsere Ziele erreicht werden. Wir loben sehr gerne und oft. Wir sagen offen, wenn etwas nicht passt. Ehrlich und transparent.


https://www.an-digital.com/at/karriere/senior-projektmanager-freelancer/

--------------------------------------

677 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] Product Designer (5년 이상)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

Migaloo는 블록체인을 활용하는 창작자 중심의 메타버스를 개발하는 프로젝트입니다. 더 자유로운 창작 활동과 새로운 플랫폼이 만나, 지금껏 없던 새로운 경험과 즐거움이 탄생할 거라 믿습니다. PUBG를 만든 크래프톤이 제페토를 만든 네이버 제트와 힘을 합쳐 세상을 놀라게 할 새로운 도전을 하고 있습니다.

Project Migaloo에 대해 좀 더 자세히 알고 싶으시다면 아래 링크의 내용을 확인해주세요!
Project Migaloo 소개 페이지: https://careers.migaloo.io/

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
메타버스 유저들이 이용할 통합 웹 프로덕트의 디자인을 초기 단계부터 고민하고 리딩 합니다.
유저들이 애셋을 자유롭게 거래할 수 있는 Marketplace, 창작자의 창작활동을 지원하는 Creator Center, 유저들의 자유로운 의견이 모이는 Community 등 다양한 시스템의 UX 설계 및 UI 디자인을 담당합니다
유저가 웹 프로덕트를 사용하면서 느끼는 불편을 여러 방법으로 수집 및 분석하여 더 나은 유저 경험을 이끌어냅니다.
개인과 팀 그리고 비즈니스가 같은 목표를 향해 가고 있는지 함께 고민하며 나아갑니다.

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
5년 이상의 웹 UI/UX 디자인 경력이 있으신 분
사용자 경험을 이해하고 깊이 고민해서 시각화하실 수 있으신 분
복잡한 정보, 정책, 기술들을 고려해 일관성, 지속 가능성, 확장성을 고려한 UI/UX를 만드실 수 있는 분
Figma 혹은 Sketch와 같은 협업 툴을 능숙히 다루며 효과적으로 제품팀과 커뮤니케이션 가능한 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
커머스 혹은 창작자 플랫폼과 관련된 디자인 경험이 있으신 분
스타트업에서 긴밀한 협업 경험이 있으신 분
신규 프로덕트를 런칭한 경험이 있으신 분
디자인 시스템을 구축하신 경험이 있으신 분
메타버스 혹은 게임에 대한 이해가 있으신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 포트폴리오(필수)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

BE BOLD, LEARN AND WIN! 크래프톤의 성장과 도전의 스토리를 알아가고 싶다면?

678 --> Portfolio Manager - Digital Workplace Automation & Lifecycle Solutions
Lenovo
Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands
Description And Requirements

The Lenovo Services and Solutions Group is experiencing tremendous growth and is hiring for Worldwide Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions Portfolio Manager.

You will be responsible for defining and delivering the full Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions & Managed Services portfolio required including short-term and long-term visions

You will work with strategy, product managers, sales, customers, analysts, hardware teams, delivery, and other stakeholders to understand the Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions market and will define the needed portfolio of Managed Services required to succeed as the best in class in the digital workspace automation and productivity market.

You should have a strong background in Digital Workplace Automation & Life Cycle Solutions and prior portfolio and/or product management experience. You will also need to have a background in Managed Services and a strong understanding of how to succeed in selling both direct and through the channel. Success will require the ability to influence and maintain open communication with all areas of the company at multiple levels. You should be able to manage complexity, think creatively, deal with ambiguity, and thrive in a fast-paced environment.

Your Key Responsibilities will be:

Utilize market intelligence, competitive analytics, sales feedback and customer feedback to formulate both a short-term and long-term Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions portfolio strategy that will drive Lenovo to be the industry leader in Digital Workplace Managed Services
Assess future technology for usage in Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle services portfolio to differentiate Lenovo Managed Services and drive it to the forefront of the industry
Rationalize the current Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle portfolio, identify gaps/overlaps and make recommendations on the future of all existing products
Prioritize offering development and create roadmaps for driving to a complete portfolio vision – may include bundling existing products into solutions as part of the portfolio
Create clear portfolio vision that can be utilized by marketing to create sales and customer-facing documentation
Function as the input for strategic and offering ideas coming from the geography sales teams to drive a centralized offering development process with services offering development team.
Drive alignment with Segments, other Offer Towers and sales on Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Service portfolio vision and strategy
Ensure Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Services portfolio is cohesive with the corporate strategy and other offerings being created outside of the portfolio
Be the internal & external lead SME for Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Managed Services Portfolio

Position Requirements:

We're looking to add talented individuals who are self-motivated and desire boundless opportunities, to join us. Come share in the discoveries that are forged from our shared achievements at Lenovo as we drive the next generation in technology.

Minimum Requirements:

5+ years of Managed Services product experience – sales/marketing and channel experience a plus
3+ years of portfolio management, product development or similar experience
Strong knowledge of Managed Services business & market landscape
Strong executive presence & leadership skills
High level of communication & presentation skills
Strong business & financial acumen
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
A collaborative approach to meeting business objectives and ability to influence at all levels of matrixed organizations
Experience working with global teams and conducting business internationally

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

679 --> Software Engineer (Senior to Principal) - Static Analysis
CertiK
San Francisco Bay Area (Remote)
Why us?
CertiK is the leader in blockchain security. Our mission is securing the web3 world.
Blockchain technology and smart contracts are the future of finance, underpinning web3 and the metaverse. Vulnerabilities and bugs in this software regularly put millions of dollars at stake. Our goal is to automatically find these vulnerabilities and bugs before the software is deployed on the blockchain using advanced static analysis. We are looking for experienced software engineers who are passionate about software quality and security and want to advance the state-of-the-art of smart contract static analysis. Join us on our mission of making the new digital world a safer place!
What You Will Do
As part of our multinational team of programming language, static analysis and formal methods experts, you will design and implement tools that automatically find vulnerabilities and other issues in smart contracts and blockchain source code, using various static analysis techniques such as abstract interpretation, dataflow analysis, function modeling, and inter-procedural/global analyses.
You will have the opportunity to work on all stages of tool development from idea generation to implementation and iterative improvements. We have positions available at all levels of seniority. Title and responsibilities will be commensurate with experience and background. Our team is highly supportive and collaborative with great opportunities to learn and grow.
About You
You have a background in programming languages and programming tools and want to work on the forefront of applying results from research. You like to tackle challenging problems and have a track record of achieving results, where results are people using your tool to do their jobs. You are collaborative: you share ideas, love to brainstorm with peers, and give and receive feedback. You are comfortable with the unknown and understand that #startuplife means that you may wear multiple hats.
Responsibilities
Research, develop, and extend vulnerability detectors, working closely with blockchain experts.
Design, prototype, and implement new abstract interpretation models and decision procedures.
Understand the semantics of various programming languages and translate them to intermediate representations.
Research new static analysis techniques and apply theories to practice.
Write tests covering all possible execution paths of your code
Required Qualifications
Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field, or an equivalent experience.
Minimum of 4 years of software development experience (including internship and academic/professional research).
Clear understanding of programming language semantics and related concepts such as AST and CFG.
Preferred Qualifications
PhD in static analysis or the broader field of automated reasoning.
Experience with static analysis techniques or formal methods such as abstract interpretation, dataflow analysis, model checking, theorem provers, decision procedures and SAT/SMT solvers.
Strong and creative problem-solving skills; always willing to learn and embrace new technologies and to collaborate.
Prior experience in a professional software development environment.
About The Company
Founded in 2018 by professors of Yale University and Columbia University, CertiK is a pioneer in blockchain security, utilizing best-in-class technology to secure and monitor blockchain protocols and smart contracts. CertiK’s mission is to secure the cyber world. Starting with blockchain, CertiK applies cutting-edge innovations from academia into enterprise, enabling mission-critical applications to be built with security and correctness.
Compensation, Benefits, And Perks
We offer a highly competitive salary and bonus. We have a comprehensive employee benefits package. Benefits include company-sponsored medical, dental, and vision insurance, FSA, short-term disability insurance, long-term disability insurance, and life/AD&D insurance. We provide flexible paid-time off. We provide a 401(k) with a 4% company match starting from your first day.
Compensation is negotiable, depending on level of experience - $115,000 - $230,000 base salary.
CertiK is proud to offer medical, vision, and dental insurance, 401(k) plan with company matching, life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance, HSA (with high deductible plan), FSA, and other benefits to all full-time employees, along with flexible paid time off and holidays.
In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.
CertiK is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We will not discriminate against any applicant or employee on the basis of age, race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, medical condition, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status or civil partnership/union status, physical or mental disability, pregnancy, childbirth, genetic information, military and veteran status, or any other basis prohibited by applicable federal, state or local law.
CertiK will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with local and federal requirements.
https://www.eeoc.gov/sites/default/files/migrated_files/employers/poster_screen_reader_optimized.pdf
All CertiK employees are expected to actively support diversity on their teams, and in the Company.

682 --> Account Director – Digital Experience (Metaverse/Gaming)
Cheil North America
Plano, TX (On-site)
About Us

Account Director – Digital Experience (Metaverse/Gaming)

Cheil Worldwide is the 11th-largest creative agency in the world. Headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we were founded by Samsung in 1973 to grow its local and global business. While Samsung is still one of our main clients, our roster has evolved to include other globally recognized brands such as Adidas, PayPal, ESPN, Lego, Coca-Cola, Nivea, Starbucks and many more.

Cheil Dallas serves as the lead agency for all Samsung projects in North America and is located steps from their office at Legacy Central in Plano, Texas. It’s the home base for more than 200 creative problem-solvers who share a passion for developing groundbreaking ideas rooted in data, driven by insights, and enabled by innovative technology.

And that brings us to you… or rather you to us. We’re seeking a highly motivated account service leader to build out our emerging technology pillar.

About You

You’re a seasoned agency-side or brand-side leader with a proven track record of leading large scale programs rooted in the digital world.
You keep up with cutting edge technology trends and enjoy thinking of new ways to incorporate them into projects.
A multidimensional thinker who prefers paving the way versus following a linear path for every project.
Well versed in the world of gaming, digital, social and experiential – with the ability to think across platforms and how to cross collaborate.
You’re a hands-on leader, willing to roll your sleeves all the way up and contribute at any level for the sake of the team and the end result.
A digital expert, with a specialty in leading fully integrated brand campaigns.
Not only are you contributing to the strategy and planning process, but you’re comfortable with executive level presentations and can present with the best of them.
Resourceful and inquisitive with an entrepreneurial spirit and the desire to build and lead.
Have great people skills and the natural ability to maintain a positive outlook, even when faced with challenging circumstances or high-pressure assignments.
You are a person who knows how to fix problems and navigate the road ahead to circumvent potential issues.

About The Role

The Account Director serves as the glue that keeps all teams, clients and partners aligned for overall program success. Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

Program strategy refinement and KPI setting.
Strategic direction and brand guideline alignment throughout the lifespan of a project.
Leading daily internal and client status meetings, ensuring all parts of the project are on track.
Identifying potential blockers and creative solutions to continue positive momentum.
Collaborating with partners in the gaming, digital and social space and serving as the agency lead for efficient communication and direction.
Managing a small team of direct reports, while indirectly leading a large team of internal partners.
Reviewing and analyzing performance data and crafting a clear, actionable story.
Budget management and financial tracking.
Serving as a true client partner, always keeping their business goals as your top priority.

About The Requirements

Bachelor’s Degree preferred in a marketing and advertising in a related field.
8+ years experience on the agency or brand side.
4+ years supervisory experience, agency side strongly preferred.
Experience managing large-scale fully integrated campaigns heavily rooted in the digital, gaming and metaverse space with a variety of capabilities and partner teams involved.
Must serve as the north star to cross-functional teams within the agency, able to collaborate across production, creative, and analytics teams with a deep understanding of how each work and the integral roles each play in the final product.
A proven track record of solid client partnership, exemplary team leadership, and world-class output.
A strong desire to coach and lead a team by example, willing to be hands-on at any level of the project for the good of the team and the business.

Your Responsibilities will be to:

Provide endpoint management and lifecycle and information technology expertise
Travel to and facilitate workshops with customers to analyze customer processes and environments and develop overall solution recommendations, including total cost of ownership assessments.

Promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.

7+ years of Contract Management, SOW’s, Business Development, Professional Services, Project Management and/or IT Services operations experience.

A strategic mindset and sound business acumen are required, along with effective decision-making, contract negotiation and partner management skills

Travel estimated at 40%

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

685 --> iOS Developer
Curie
Seattle, WA (Remote)
About Curie

Virtual showrooms save lives and the environment. We believe the Metaverse is a more sustainable way to support e-commerce, and we're looking for smart, driven people to help us populate the Metaverse.

Curie is a Seattle-based startup focused on supplying the growing need for 3D, from retail to online experiences, by creating AI-powered tools at the forefront of technology to generate 3D assets.

Work in a remote-work environment with room for autonomy and self-direction. You are self-motivated, work at the forefront of AI-powered tools, and have a passion for high-quality experiences of the future.

Description

This project is to help define and implement an extension to our company’s existing API system to allow our customer’s iOS applications to pull our 3D objects (hosted via Cloud Front). This link needs to track usage of the 3D object (number of views) and trigger actions (i.e. report usage to date, stop serving objects if budget targets are exceeded, ensure there is a ‘poster’ image for each 3D object, etc).

The developer who succeeds in this project will be able to certify that the links we provide to our customers are easy for them to implement, load our 3D objects quickly and certify that the iOS AR experience (via ARKit) will be excellent for the end-users.

Requirements
Proven experience working with ARKit inside native iOS applications utilizing Swift
Experience working with APIs, specifically Object Capture API, familiarization with sending authorization tokens, and pulling data
Familiarity in Computer Vision, 3D Reconstruction, Photogrammetry
Knowledge in any of the following AR tools: AR in Unity, AR in Unreal

About Us

Job Description

Want to create value with digital and turn your ideas into human impact? So do we.

We help clients to re-imagine their Workplace Experience (WX) encompassing technology, employee experience and business operations to remove cultural barriers, unlock new sources of value and drive sustainable growth.

By joining Avanade’s Modern Workplace community, you will have a fantastic opportunity to operate at the forefront of technology, with access to global clients, on challenging and exciting projects.

If you are the type of person who thrives on constantly learning and challenging yourself with a genuine desire to do your best, then you could be successful here. Our promise is to invest in you and help give you the platform for continuous learning and career development.

About the Role:

Avanade’s Modern Workplace Solution Area is responsible for making our Workplace vision a reality through three focused offerings:

Workplace Platform Modernization – modernizing and extend the workplace technology ecosystem to protect against attacks, supporting new ways of working and drive increased business value.
Workplace Value Realization – releasing business value through reimagined culture and employee experience, transforming business operations by reconfiguring how work gets done.
Workplace Managed Services – managing and continuously evolving the workplace technology ecosystem to support new ways of working and deliver increased business value.

Sales and solutioning for these offerings is also supported by a centre of excellence (COE) team that works with global, area (Europe) and regional (UK) offering, sales and delivery leads.

To further grow our portfolio of services and revenues, we are expanding our Workplace applications pre-sales expertise within the UK Modern Workplace Value Realisation team by hiring a Workplace Collaborative Applications Architect/Subject Matter Expert (SME).

We are looking for a Workplace Collaborative Applications Architect who is experienced in designing, solutioning and selling solutions that covers any combination of enterprise workflow, automation, AI, IoT and Augmented Reality leveraging Microsoft Office 365, Viva, Power Platform and Azure technologies.

You bring valuable experience working with clients in a consulting environment, with solid technical architecture and delivery management experience.

Responsibilities:

You will also have the chance to:

Understand business drivers, agree the optimum approach, and develop pragmatic, deliverable and sustainable Workplace solutions and roadmaps that allows clients to address their business needs and leverage the best value out of their Microsoft investments.
Provide subject matter expertise in relation to workplace applications for front line workers in our priority industry segments, alongside workflow management redesign and automation solutions to help optimize front and back-office business processes.

Coordinate with and leverage offshore resources.

Your skills:

Workplace applications strategy, lifecycle organization, governance and operations knowledge underpinned by Microsoft Office 365 and Power Platform.
Sales and/or end to end solutioning accountability and track record for a pipeline of $1M+ digital transformation deals with demonstrable innovation and value creation.
Solution design, integration, implementation/ transition to managed services including lifecycle management, applications factory (scaled application development and/or application in-take), service management and ideally experience optimization.
Expertise in developing solutions for information workers by building informationarchitecture as well as leveraging enterprise workflow and business process automation tools.

688 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] UE5 Sandbox Tool Programmer (경력 무관)

크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

NFT Metaverse Dept 소속의 Client 팀은 크래프톤에서 글로벌 시장 타겟으로 새롭게 준비 중인 NFT 메타버스 프로젝트의 클라이언트를 개발하는 부서입니다.

최적화, 자동화, 퀄리티업의 목표를 가지고 글로벌 멀티플랫폼 프로젝트의 라이브 서비스 경험을 바탕으로 역량을 갖춘 함께 일하고 싶은 소프트웨어 엔지니어들로 구성되어있습니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
언리얼 엔진 5에 대한 깊이있는 스터디와 이해를 바탕으로 크리에이터에게 배포될 자유도 높은 샌드박스 에디터를 개발하고 배포합니다.

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
C++ 프로그래밍에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
WYSIWYG 에디터 개발 또는 개선 경험이 있으신 분
윈도우즈 시스템 프로그래밍에 이해가 있으신 분
3D 수학에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
Lua 등 스크립트 언어 사용 경험이 있으신 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
전산학(컴퓨터과학) 전공하신 분
언리얼 파일시스템 및 애셋 구조에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
언리얼 슬레이트 UI 사용 경험 있으신 분
언리얼 엔진 플러그인 제작 경험이 있으신 분
WPF 등 멀티플랫폼 UI 서드파티 사용 경험이 있으신 분
게리모드, 로블록스 등 샌드박스 툴 사용 경험이 있으신 분
병렬 프로그래밍 경험이 있으신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 직무 테스트 (Technical Fit Test) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

689 --> Digital Identity Architect & Consultant (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Munich, Bavaria, Germany
Dezentrale-/Blockchain-Identity-Technologie, Self-Sovereign Identity sowie eIDAS & European DI Infrastructure sind Themen, die zu deinen Skills passen? Dann passt du perfekt zu Accenture: Wir sind ein internationales Beratungs- und Technologieunternehmen, digitales Innovationszentrum und zukunftsweisende Kreativagentur in einem. Unser global agierendes Team arbeitet nicht nur daran, die Grundsteine für die digitale Welt der Zukunft zu legen, sondern entwickelt gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden digitale Identitätslösungen, die von allen Bürger:innen genutzt werden. Unsere Lösungen bilden die Basis für voll digitale Prozesse bei Bürgerämtern, bis hin zur Identifizierung und Authentifizierung von Nutzer:innen im Metaverse. Dazu arbeiten wir mit verschiedenen öffentlichen Institutionen, als auch zahlreichen Kunden aus der Wirtschaft zusammen.

Das erwartet dich

Du berätst unsere nationalen sowie internationalen Kunden technisch wie fachlich zu digitalen Identitätslösungen – auch auf Basis der Blockchain-Technologie.

Ob Personalausweis, Führerschein oder Zeugnis: Du trägst dazu bei, sichere und vor allem nutzerfreundliche Identitätslösungen zu definieren und zu implementieren.

Zu diesem Zweck entwickelst du auch das technische Lösungsdesign, inklusive der Architektur für die jeweiligen Identitätslösungen (Wallet-Apps und Backend).

Mit deinen akkuraten Prozessanalysen gestaltest du Prozesse für die Ausstellung, als auch Verifizierung digitaler Identitäten.

Und bei technischen Code Reviews kooperierst du eng mit unseren Entwicklerteams, die du mit klugen Vorschlägen und wichtigen Insights bereicherst.

Darauf freuen wir uns

Abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftsinformatik, Informatik, des Wirtschaftsingenieurwesens oder vergleichbar

Erste Berufserfahrung (1+ Jahre) im Bereich der digitalen Identitäten (Beratung, Entwicklung etc.)

Gutes Verständnis der Konzepte Self-Sovereign Identity, IAM, Blockchain und Smart Contracts

Überblick über Entwicklungen auf EU-Ebene zur eIDAS Verordnung

Praxis in IT-Architektur, der Unternehmensberatung sowie grundlegende Programmierkenntnisse

Idealerweise Know-how in Digital-/Self-Sovereign-Identity-Frameworks, wie Hyperledger Indy/Aries sowie fließendes Englisch und Deutsch

Deine Vorteile bei Accenture

Du als Mensch bist uns wichtig. Das wirst du täglich spüren und erleben. Denn unsere Arbeitswelt ist auf dich ausgerichtet und bietet dir die umfassenden Benefits eines großen, verantwortungsvollen Arbeitgebers. Dein zukünftiges Team schätzt vor allem

flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle, mobiles Arbeiten und die Option, in Teilzeit und/oder im Homeoffice zu arbeiten

umfassende Trainingsangebote, Fort- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten

interessante Karriereoptionen

unser globales Team und die direkte Einbindung, auch auf globaler Ebene

unsere Arbeitskultur, die Diversität & Inklusion fördert

Dein Kontakt

Du hast Fragen? Dann schicke gerne eine E-Mail an deinen Recruiter michael.bergmann@accenture.com oder bewirb dich direkt online.

Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung.

691 --> Game Tech Team Lead
Mytaverse 
Austin, TX
Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Game Tech Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our work with Unreal, cloud streaming, and other cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities

Leads the development of the Game Tech team, responsible for Unreal development, and cloud streaming and spatial audio integrations.

Develops new features, enhances existing features, and implements bug fixes in existing code.

Optimizes game engine deployment in terms of memory, frame rate and performance.

Guides team members to create work that adheres to the design of game systems while maintaining good style and optimization standards.

Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards are consistently met across the team.

Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.

Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.

Develops and maintains strategic operational systems, tools, and processes for production-readiness.

Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.

Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.

Develops software to integrate with distributed web applications.

Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Game Tech team.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

At least five years of relevant experience as a Game Developer or similar software engineering role.

At least two years of experience developing optimized modules in C++ within Unreal.

Strong knowledge of C++.

Proficient with git and git workflows.

Experience building libraries and APIs.

Up-to-date with the latest gaming trends, techniques, best practices and technologies.

Interest in learning new tools and technologies.

Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.

Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.

Problem-solving attitude.

Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits

Experience with full-cycle game design and development.

Expert in one or more areas of specialization (artificial intelligence, 3D rendering, 3D animation, physics, multiplayer/networking, streaming technologies, or spatial audio).

Exposure to cloud-native applications (AWS GameLift, preferred).

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

698 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] UE5 Engine Programmer (경력 무관)

크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

NFT Metaverse Dept 소속의 Client 팀은 크래프톤에서 글로벌 시장 타겟으로 새롭게 준비 중인 NFT 메타버스 프로젝트의 클라이언트를 개발하는 부서입니다.

최적화, 자동화, 퀄리티업의 목표를 가지고 글로벌 멀티플랫폼 프로젝트의 라이브 서비스 경험을 바탕으로 역량을 갖춘 함께 일하고싶은 소프트웨어 엔지니어들로 구성되어있습니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
언리얼 엔진 5에 대한 깊이있는 스터디와 이해를 바탕으로 샌드박스, 메타버스, 멀티플랫폼, 고퀄리티, 저사양지원 키워드에 맞게 엔진을 수정 및 업그레이드합니다.

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
C++ 프로그래밍에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
최신 Graphics API(Vulkan / Metal) 이해가 있으신 분
언리얼 MeshDrawCommand 구조에 이해가 있으신 분
언리얼 렌더링 패스 추가 및 개선 경험 있으신 분
모바일 GPU 최적화 경험 있으신 분
3D 수학에 대한 이해가 있으신 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
전산학(컴퓨터과학) 전공하신 분
언리얼 엔진 활용 경험이 있으신 분
셰이더 디버깅 경험이 있으신 분
언리얼 스레드 시스템의 이해가 있으신 분
언리얼 패키징 프로세스 추가/개선 경험 있으신 분
언리얼 슬레이트 UI 개선 경험 있으신 분
언리얼 엔진 5의 나나이트/루멘에 대한 이해가 있으신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 직무 테스트 (Technical Fit Test) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

699 --> XR Sales Consultant - Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Stuttgart, Baden-Württemberg, Germany
Das Accenture Extended Reality (XR) Team sucht Verstärkung im Sales Bereich – das XR Team betreut alle Themen rund um Metaverse, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality und Mixed Reality. Auch ohne rosarotes VR-Headset hast du eine klare, multi-dimensionale Vorstellung davon, wie du als Teil des XR Sales Teams von Accenture, einem der weltweit führenden Technologie- und Beratungsunternehmen, mit Extended-Reality-Lösungen (XR-Lösungen) neuen Geschäftswert schaffst. Du identifizierst neue Kunden und Möglichkeiten und vermittelst mit Leidenschaft Ansätze und Wege, wie innovative XR-Erlebnisse im Unternehmensmaßstab erdacht, entwickelt und erfolgreich umgesetzt werden können. Du weckst das Interesse von Kunden an den Themen XR und Metaverse für die du brennst. Zukunftsweisender lassen sich Mitarbeiterleistung und Customer Journey nicht optimieren.

Diese Position ist in Voll- und Teilzeit verfügbar.

Das erwartet dich:

In deiner Rolle bist du der erste Kontaktpunkt für interne und externe Kunden und zeigst Ihnen welche Möglichkeiten es im Metaverse bereits gibt.

Deine Leidenschaft und Begeisterung für XR Themen und das Metaverse bleibt deinen Gesprächspantern / Kunden positiv im Gedächtnis.

Du bereitest Sales Pitches zusammen mit dem Sales-Team vor und setzt dich vorher intensiv mit dem Kunden auseinander, um den Pitch bzw. das Meeting optimal auf den Kunden zuzuschneiden.

Mit deiner Technologiekompetenz berätst du unsere Kunden in allen Industrien darin, wo und wie immersive Technologien, Mixed Reality, Augmented Reality und Virtual Reality, für sie den größten Mehrwert schaffen könnten.

Du formulierst und kalkulierst in Absprache mit Entwicklerinnen und Entwickler zusammen Angebote und verhandelst mit dem Kunden.

Dein Netzwerk, innerhalb und außerhalb von Accenture, verhilft dir neue Kontakte zu erkennen und neue potenzielle Kunden zu identifizieren.

Dein Kontakt

Du hast Fragen? Dann wende dich an unser Recruiting Team per E-Mail an recruiting_germany@accenture.com oder telefonisch unter 00800 45045045.

Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung.

700 --> Full Time Meta Store Retail Associate
BDS Connected Solutions, LLC.
Burlingame, CA (On-site)
At a Glance

Join the world’s first Meta Retail Store team, as we bring AR/VR experiences to life with consumers . Help drive the connection between people and our client’s products as we work together to build towards the metaverse . As a bonus to working on the Meta Burlingame campus , this opportunity will offer free on-site parking and electric car charging , provided meals , on -the- job paid training , and free client product throughout your employment ! Select locations within the Bay area may also have access to a free shuttle , further details TBD.

We are highlighting this opportunity to build our pipeline of amazing Full-Time and Part-Time Experience Expert talent for this Meta Store. A BDS Connected Solutions Talent Acquisition Partner will be in contact with qualified applicants to provide an update on the status of current openings and next steps.

Overview

P URPOSE

As a Meta Store Experience Expert, you will focus on creating a best-in-class in-store experience through immersive hands-on demos of our client’s AR/VR products and educating consumers. You will be the face of our client’s brand on their campus and represent cutting-edge technology that gives people the power to connect with friends and family, no matter the distance.

Essential Functions

Be a subject matter expert! Fully understand the features and benefits of our client’s products, including accessories, and how to position them with every customer type
Demonstrate AR/VR products to customers and influence how they play, learn, and experience the world around them
Perform day-to-day operations, including but not limited to, opening and closing procedures, maintaining consumer interactive displays, and putting away product deliveries
Achieve all goals and key performance indicators; in partnership with the Retail Manager, develop action plans when targets are not met
Other duties as assigned by management

Education And Experience
High School Diploma or equivalent
2-3 years of customer-facing experience in retail
Familiar with AR/VR technology

Skills And Requirements
Extremely strong interpersonal communication - written, verbal, and on camera
Must be results and detail-oriented
Must have passion for technology and innovation
Ability to ask effective questions and be an active listener
High level of initiative and self-motivation with a continued drive to learn
Able to work well in a team environment
Must have reliable transportation to get to and from work on time
Flexible availability including weekends and holidays
To be eligible for this position, the client requires full Covid-19 vaccination

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

While performing the duties of this job, employees are required to:
Regularly talk, sit, stand, walk, and bend over, repetitive use of hands/arms, repetitive use of legs and grasp
Frequently lift and carry up to 25 lbs.
Occasionally lift and carry up to 50 lbs.
Continuous hand/eye coordination and fine manipulation

Important Information

We will consider for employment all qualified Applicants, including those with Criminal Histories, in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable state and local laws, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance.

Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

BDS Connected Solutions. (“BDS”) is an equal opportunity employer in every aspect of employment, including but not limited to; selection, training, development and promotion of the most qualified candidates and employees without regard to their race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, age, physical or mental disability, citizenship status, veteran status, or any other characteristic prohibited by state or local law. BDS is committed to equal employment opportunity in all other privileges, terms and conditions of employment that may not be covered in this statement. BDS is an at-will employer.

BDS Connected Solutions offers a complete suite of Connected Commerce solutions that blend Advocacy, Training, Retail, Virtual, Experiential, and Digital environments to influence the modern buyer, regardless of where they are on their shopping journey. Since 1985, BDS has been inspired by innovation; as we continue to evolve as a trendsetter in today’s disruptive market, we enable our clients to do the same. Our industry-leading experts never stop working to discover, design, and deploy custom buying solutions that empower brands to achieve and exceed their unique sales goals. BDS is headquartered in Irvine, California with a regional office in New York City, New York. Visit us at www.BDSsolutions.com for more information.

701 --> Data Reporter, Tech
Morning Consult
Washington, DC
About Morning Consult
Morning Consult is a global decision intelligence company changing how modern leaders make smarter, faster, better decisions. The company pairs its proprietary high-frequency data with applied artificial intelligence to better inform decisions on what people think and how they will act.
Ideally this position would be based in Washington, DC, however we are open to our other office locations or remote within the US.
The Role
Morning Consult is hiring a data-focused reporter to helm our tech vertical. We’re looking for an energetic and entrepreneurial reporter who has a deep understanding of the tech industry and tech policy and can effectively use data to tell stories that will help inform our audience of executives and lawmakers. The Data Reporter, Tech will be responsible for crafting a daily email newsletter that expertly provides tech executives and policymakers with the information essential to starting their day. The ideal candidate will also write forward-looking analyses and features about tech by incorporating Morning Consult’s proprietary survey research data and exclusive reporting that delivers insights to our core audience.
This self-starting journalist should thrive on being the first to report on significant trends, developments and policies in the tech sector. Success in this role requires superb news judgment, an understanding of trends at the nexus of tech policy and business strategy, and an unrelenting attention to detail. Most of all, the ideal candidate should be able to put themselves in the shoes of their audience to strategically identify and synthesize the news topics critical to business and government executives.
At Morning Consult, we give reporters the autonomy to pursue their curiosities via survey research, dive into internal and external data and uncover exclusive information for an audience of decision-makers in the public and private sectors. Our tech coverage has included data-driven enterprise stories on lagging 5G broadband adoption amid the industry and governmental push for 6G , growing public appetite for Big Tech regulation , the financial toll of catfishing , the challenge of network resiliency in the wake of natural disasters , slow internet deployment on tribal lands and more. We’ve published exclusive, first-of-its kind data on the metaverse and have surveyed tech workers to provide readers with unique insights into their thoughts on the future of work . Morning Consult’s voter opinion reporting on tech policy has been cited regularly by lawmakers and government leaders.
Key Responsibilities And Essential Functions
Curate the Morning Consult Tech email briefing (which requires early morning work from home) and compile a comprehensive events calendar
Write stories and analyses about tech industry trends and policy developments, using Morning Consult’s proprietary survey research when possible, that help tech industry professionals better understand these trends
Develop a high-level network of industry sources with the goal of landing newsmaker interviews that help our Tech subscribers better understand their industry
Create compelling data analyses and visualizations using Morning Consult’s proprietary survey research
Stay up to date on industry trends and their effect on policy discussions and business strategy
Continuously improve through feedback
Contribute to other division-specific strategic projects as necessary
Perform such other tasks and duties as may be required or assigned from time to time at the company’s discretion
Desired Skills
5+ years of experience working in or covering the tech industry
A deep understanding of the tech industry and related policy, the key players and the trends and information that matter most to improving business strategies
Experience analyzing industry trends and data and can succinctly synthesize why it matters to tech professionals
Excellent writing ability
Ability to manage multiple projects independently while paying strict attention to detail
Excellent computer skills and a willingness to learn advanced technical tools
Experience working with survey research/polling data is a plus, though it is not required and we are willing to provide training
Note: we view the above section as a guide, not a checklist. We encourage you to apply even if you don’t satisfy every single bullet on this list!
We are committed to a work environment that is inclusive to all and free of discrimination. It is our policy to be an equal opportunity employer without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic predisposition or carrier status, veteran status, citizenship status or any other factors prohibited by law. Morning Consult will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals.
COVID-19: Morning Consult’s top priority is the health and safety of our employees, their families, and the communities where they live and work. As part of our commitment to health and safety, we require all U.S. employees to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 and receive their booster shot in accordance with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's guidelines. Morning Consult offers a reasonable accommodation process for individuals who are unable to meet our vaccination requirement due to a disability, medical condition, sincerely held religious belief, or other grounds protected by federal, state, or local laws.
JOB APPLICANT PRIVACY POLICY

Thiết kế mặt bằng (layout 2D) phân khu chức năng công năng nội thất

Thiết kế 3D theo layout và ý tưởng đã thống nhất với khách hàng, hoặc lên 3D theo nội dung khách hàng đã có sẵn
Lên 3D công trình, khu BĐS
Render corona, Vray, Lumion....

Yêu cầu ứng viên:

Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với khách hàng

Nắm bắt tiếp thu công việc nhanh, biết quản lý sắp xếp công việc

Video Editor

Mô tả công việc:
Đề xuất, lên kế hoạch, nội dung ý tưởng video trên các kênh online
Góp ý, dựng video theo kịch bản
Sản xuất video theo kịch bản: quay, dựng, edit, tạo hiệu ứng,...
Sáng tạo các nội dung video mới theo trend và định hướng của tổ chức
Xây dựng các video dạng ngắn về giới thiệu, mô tả về sản phẩm

Yêu cầu ứng viên:
Thành thạo các công cụ dựng video: After Effects,...
Biết sử dụng các phần mềm hỗ trợ khác
Có kinh nghiệm dựng video kết hợp với âm thanh
Đam mê công việc, sáng tạo, siêng năng, có trách nhiệm và chịu được áp lực công việc
Ưu tiên người có kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí Video Editor hoặc vị trí tương tự từ 1 năm trở lên
Ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm quay video tiktok

Quyền lợi chung:
Mức lương cạnh tranh theo năng lực, lương tháng 13
Hưởng đầy đủ các phúc lợi xã hội như: BHYT, BHXH,...
Môi trường năng động, cởi mở, hoan nghênh đóng góp ý kiến cá nhân
Thời gian làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6

Ứng viên gửi CV đến email: duyentpm@bizverse.world

VR360 là một thành viên của Bizverse - The Metaverse For Business. Bizverse là một trong những đơn vị tiên phong trong việc đầu tư nghiên cứu và cung cấp các giải pháp chuyển đổi số tại Việt Nam, xây dựng một thế giới thực tế ảo dựa trên bản đồ 3D của thế giới thực, nhằm phát triển kinh tế số và xã hội số theo mô hình “Digital Twin” và “Meta-Economy”.

Trong đó, VR360 là đơn vị thực hiện triển khai ứng dụng các công nghệ mới nhất: Metaverse, Digital Twin, Thực tế ảo (VR), 3D, 360, v.v. dành cho chính phủ, doanh nghiệp, cơ sở giáo dục, v.v.

Tìm hiểu thêm tại: vr360.com.vn và bizverse.io

703 --> 3D Artist
Curie
Seattle, WA (Remote)
About Curie

Virtual showrooms save lives and the environment. We believe the Metaverse is a more sustainable way to support e-commerce, and we're looking for smart, driven people to help us populate the Metaverse.

Curie is a Seattle-based startup focused on supplying the growing need for 3D, from retail to online experiences, by creating AI-powered tools at the forefront of technology to generate 3D assets.

Work in a remote-work environment with room for autonomy and self-direction. You are self-motivated, work at the forefront of AI-powered tools, and have a passion for high-quality experiences of the future.

Description

Curie is looking for a customer obsessed artist who will be responsible for ensuring the quality of the 3D imagery of our product selection. This candidate will leverage their demonstrated expertise of image quality and Augmented Reality/Virtual Reality to ensure the highest technical standards are maintained.

This candidate will generate high quality, realistic 3D models for retail AR purposes. To deliver solutions to our customers' needs, this candidate will need good communication for model questions, updates, and deliveries.

Responsibilities
Generate PBR level assets (color, roughness, shiny, metalness, normal maps).
Artist will be determined to have tested their own assets as quality before submission.
Artists need to balance between efficient and small files sizes under 5 megs while still being the best looking asset.
Develop and maintain knowledge management tools such as wikis and shared drives with other artists.

Requirements
At least 1 year of professional level creative/digital design experience in a start-up environment
Familiar with the latest techniques in machine assisted or automated content
Able to think of “modular workflows” that allow “batches” of models to quickly make similar objects/skus/variations
Familiar with practices and procedures across the industry including video games, visual effects, and advertising
Solid skills with 3D editing tools such as Maya, 3DS Max or Blender.
Experienced in using CRMs and AirTable
Knowledge in any of the following AR tools: AR in Unity, AR in Unreal, AR Quicklook, AR Scene View, Immersive Web, Model-Viewer
Knowledge in any of the the following 3D tools: USD/USDZ, GLTF/GLB, Model-Viewer, Substance Painter/Designer or similar tools
An online portfolio demonstrating digital design skills and innovative interactive work that we can review and match art styles/preferences
Excellent verbal, written and presentation skills

Bonus Skills
Scripting abilities for automation in 3D apps like Max, Maya, Blender for technical artist skills desired.
Latest in web, technology, NFT, gaming, and internet tools savvy

704 --> Sales Manager
SVAIY.ART
Ukraine (Remote)
SVAIY ART INDUSTRIES is a young, modern, and powerful company in the field of Computer graphics (CG). In a little more than two years, we were able to prove ourselves as a reliable partner. We guarantee production quality and a high level of service for our customers. Today, our company is actively developing and we are organizing a sales team!
This vacancy can be useful to all those for whom financial independence, stability, and the ability to work remotely are important today — in any city in Ukraine or abroad. This is an opportunity to build a career in the international market in an advanced industry. Even if you don’t have much previous experience, it’s not a problem, because we provide training and internships.
Therefore, if you have long dreamed of the opportunity to work in a friendly team on cool projects, receive a high salary, and develop as a professional — leave your resume, and we will definitely consider each candidate!
PLEASE READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION CAREFULLY!
Our ideal candidate:
Fluent in written and spoken English (B2-C2). This is the field of sales on the international market. Almost 100% of your time you will speak and correspond with clients in English. Therefore, English B2+ is a must!
We are ready to offer you a position even if you have at least 1 year of work experience in sales or in other professions where communication is actively involved!
Technical equipment: PC, Microphone, Web camera
Have experience working with programs: Word, Excel, Google Drive
Active life position:
high communication skills
lack of fear in communication
responsibility and punctuality
motivation and tenacity to overcome obstacles
What we will offer::
Salary: rate 400 USD* + % of sales. The main income of the Sales Manager is always a percentage of the sale. Therefore, your direct salary will depend primarily on you! We provide the opportunity to earn 1200−1500 USD*
Salary according to the US dollar rate*
Remote work is the main advantage because you will be able to work anywhere, without wasting time and money on the way to the office!
Flexible working hours — 40-hour work week. You have the opportunity to plan your day and week independently. For our team, the most important thing is not how much you work, but what results from you get!
Work in an international company — get experience communicating with clients from all over the world!
Work in the CG studio — you will work on the front lines of modern technological developments. An interesting industry that is changing the world already today: VR, AR, GameDev, Cinematics, VFX, BlockChain, CG Art — all this will become part of your daily work! Who knows, maybe you will sign a new contract in the development of a project like League of Legends, Fortnite, or the new MetaVerse? ;)
Additionally: — Corporate psychologist (one meeting per week), online team building (one meeting per week), professional training, and paid sick leave.
The possibility of rapid career growth to Key Account Manager, NewBiz, Team Lead.
Terms of study and internship:
For our company, the quality of services is always the first place. Therefore, we conduct training at our own expense. At the training, you will learn about the basis of the work of a CG studio: how computer games, cartoons, and advertising are created, and you will immerse yourself in the world of virtual reality!
Internships and probationary periods are necessary in order to consolidate the acquired knowledge and skills in practice, in which you will be helped by experienced colleagues and the head of the department.
03.10 — 14.10 — Training
14.10 — 04.11 — Paid internship — 100 USD*
07.11 — 02.12 — Trial period — rate 300 USD*
Starting from 05.12 — the rate is 400 USD* + % of sales
Responsibilities:
Active reception of leads from the marketing department;
Conducting negotiations with the client from the beginning to the signing of the contract and further communication with the client during the production of the project;
Development of relations with the client, transfer of the status of the client from «new» to «permanent» and «key;
Work with CRM;
Completing reporting;
Participation in online meetings of the department.
payments are made in hryvnias at the interbank exchange rate of the dollar
