705 --> Digital Analyst & Strategist
Hogarth Worldwide
Istanbul, Istanbul, Turkey (Hybrid)
Hogarth Worldwide is the world’s leading creative content production company. Born to make the best work brilliantly, we combine craft, insight and technology to bring creative work to life for many of the world’s most famous brands.

A Hybrid working model

Now offices are fully open we have embraced a hybrid working model, which allows our employees to split their time between the office and other locations, something we hope will provide everyone much more flexibility to their working week. The expectation is that working life at Hogarth will involve working from the office for about 50% of the time for most people. Please speak to the Talent Acquisition team to find out more information.

What does a Digital Analyst & Strategist do at Hogarth WW?

The role of the Digital Analyst & Strategist involves planning, documenting, executing and finalizing multiple digital campaigns to strict deadlines and within budget.

We’re looking for a self-starter, someone who is passionate about digital processes and becomes a safe pair of hands in terms of delivery. Digital project management best practices and being able to communicate well are an absolute must. This means that they will need to be able to communicate intelligently and effectively with Creative, Technical, Account Management, Client and Senior Leaders.

Reporting lines and key stakeholders

We are looking for a Digital Analyst & Strategist who will plan, document, execute and deliver campaigns to strict deadlines and within budget. This role reports to the Director of Projects & Partnerships.

This is a semi-client-facing role, working closely at first with the agency and the client directly so you must be an excellent networker and relationship builder. We live and breathe high-class delivery!

Experienced in delivering digital campaign projects (typically HTML5 and Rich Media campaigns)
Be an internal source of expertise in the digital campaign field and respond swiftly and concisely to any questions or queries
Emphasis on learning project management techniques and best practices
Manage and optimize internal workflow to ensure/increase productivity
Initiating projects including scope, budget and schedule, specs
Passionate about the Crypto/NFT/Web3 trends
Knowledge of Content Management and CRM systems
Knowledge of digital data analytics

Requirements

2+ years managing and delivering global digital advertising campaigns (HTML5 and Rich Media specifically) within a networked agency environment
2+ years of experience working with Media Agencies and Ad Serving platforms such as Doubleclick, Sizmek, Flashtalking and Atlas
End-to-end Digital Project experience, working with established processes and adhering to best practices.
Handling both new and ongoing digital advertising campaigns including reviewing Media Plans, analyzing digital campaign performance results, managing A/B tests, creating decision trees and strategies for new and ongoing projects as a next step; understanding and communicating with stakeholders and working with internal teams to estimate budget, schedule, brief the production teams to meet deadlines
Act as the interface between management and the execution teams for the NFT & Metaverse Project.
Familiarity with project management tools such as Jira
Familiarity with any online office and other tools
Excellent English, written and verbal communication skills

, LI-TA3

Diversity and Inclusion

Hogarth is committed to diversity and inclusion, through our ideas, our people, how we behave and conduct ourselves. Creating a truly inclusive culture at all levels of the organisation that encourages different points of view, making Hogarth not only a better company and place to work but an environment where everyone experiences connection, opportunity and a sense of belonging.

Please contact careers@hogarthww.com if you need the job advert or form in another format.

Data

We rely on legitimate interest as a legal basis for processing personal information under the GDPR for purposes of recruitment and applications for employment.

706 --> Digital Identity Architect & Consultant (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Hamburg, Hamburg, Germany
Dezentrale-/Blockchain-Identity-Technologie, Self-Sovereign Identity sowie eIDAS & European DI Infrastructure sind Themen, die zu deinen Skills passen? Dann passt du perfekt zu Accenture: Wir sind ein internationales Beratungs- und Technologieunternehmen, digitales Innovationszentrum und zukunftsweisende Kreativagentur in einem. Unser global agierendes Team arbeitet nicht nur daran, die Grundsteine für die digitale Welt der Zukunft zu legen, sondern entwickelt gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden digitale Identitätslösungen, die von allen Bürger:innen genutzt werden. Unsere Lösungen bilden die Basis für voll digitale Prozesse bei Bürgerämtern, bis hin zur Identifizierung und Authentifizierung von Nutzer:innen im Metaverse. Dazu arbeiten wir mit verschiedenen öffentlichen Institutionen, als auch zahlreichen Kunden aus der Wirtschaft zusammen.

Das erwartet dich

Du berätst unsere nationalen sowie internationalen Kunden technisch wie fachlich zu digitalen Identitätslösungen – auch auf Basis der Blockchain-Technologie.

Ob Personalausweis, Führerschein oder Zeugnis: Du trägst dazu bei, sichere und vor allem nutzerfreundliche Identitätslösungen zu definieren und zu implementieren.

Zu diesem Zweck entwickelst du auch das technische Lösungsdesign, inklusive der Architektur für die jeweiligen Identitätslösungen (Wallet-Apps und Backend).

Mit deinen akkuraten Prozessanalysen gestaltest du Prozesse für die Ausstellung, als auch Verifizierung digitaler Identitäten.

Und bei technischen Code Reviews kooperierst du eng mit unseren Entwicklerteams, die du mit klugen Vorschlägen und wichtigen Insights bereicherst.

Darauf freuen wir uns

Abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftsinformatik, Informatik, des Wirtschaftsingenieurwesens oder vergleichbar

Erste Berufserfahrung (1+ Jahre) im Bereich der digitalen Identitäten (Beratung, Entwicklung etc.)

Gutes Verständnis der Konzepte Self-Sovereign Identity, IAM, Blockchain und Smart Contracts

Überblick über Entwicklungen auf EU-Ebene zur eIDAS Verordnung

Praxis in IT-Architektur, der Unternehmensberatung sowie grundlegende Programmierkenntnisse

Idealerweise Know-how in Digital-/Self-Sovereign-Identity-Frameworks, wie Hyperledger Indy/Aries sowie fließendes Englisch und Deutsch

Deine Vorteile bei Accenture

Du als Mensch bist uns wichtig. Das wirst du täglich spüren und erleben. Denn unsere Arbeitswelt ist auf dich ausgerichtet und bietet dir die umfassenden Benefits eines großen, verantwortungsvollen Arbeitgebers. Dein zukünftiges Team schätzt vor allem

flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle, mobiles Arbeiten und die Option, in Teilzeit und/oder im Homeoffice zu arbeiten

umfassende Trainingsangebote, Fort- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten

interessante Karriereoptionen

unser globales Team und die direkte Einbindung, auch auf globaler Ebene

unsere Arbeitskultur, die Diversität & Inklusion fördert

707 --> Growth Markets Digital Enterprise Advisory Lead
Avanade
São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil
Job Description

Want to build new value with digital technology and turn your ideas into human impact? So do we!

There’s one in every group—the person who dreams big and has the motivation to bring their ideas to life, even as others might roll their eyes and prefer to play it safe. Are you that person? One who isn’t afraid to break the mould and who gets passionate about the power of digital to transform organizations and ways of working? Because we are building teams of people like that to help our clients unlock the power they need now and own what’s next.

At Avanade Advisory, we are breaking apart the traditional process of setting strategies and goals first, then finding technologies to achieve them. In the digital age, there’s no time for that linear process. We partner with clients to accelerate value from digital innovation by being ambitious, imaginative – and fast. We believe big and deliver personally. We relentlessly challenge, encourage, and support our clients and each other.

Want the agility and energy of a start-up, backed by the resources of Accenture, Microsoft and the Center for Information Systems Research at MIT Sloan School of Management? Here you will find a team of people who thrive on turning ideas and innovations into breakthrough results for leading organizations around the globe. Ultimately, we’re not just making business better. We’re making life better for our clients and their customers.

If that sounds like you, you sound good to us! Find your next opportunity at Avanade Advisory.

Overview :

Avanade is looking for a Digital Enterprise Advisory Lead to expand the impact of our advisory practice across Growth Markets regions (Japan, South East Asia, Greater China, Australia and Brazil). You will enable and drive the growth of our Digital Enterprise Advisory practices in our priority regions across all aspects of practice growth including shaping our market points of view and client propositions, helping to attract and retain great talent, embedding progressive learning and development, and of course leading by example through your contribution in building relationships and delivering great outcomes for our clients.

The role will be based in Brazil and you will be working closely with priority local clients as well as supporting other regions across Growth Markets. You must possess exceptional analytical, interpersonal and creative thinking capabilities. You will need to be entrepreneurial, enterprising and personable, and possess a servant leadership mindset to enable the scale of our Advisory Practice over time.

Key Role Responsibilities:

Client impact: collaborating with senior client executives, you will assist our clients in successfully defining and adopting modern approaches to technology including technology strategies, modern architectures, operating models & ways of working, and investment planning / business cases to support client business priorities. As part of the role, you will:

Manage and lead the delivery of a broad range of strategic advisory engagements to support clients through their modernisation, transformation, and innovation journeys
Leverage appropriate insights, trends, methodologies and assets to deliver high quality client advice
Balance your strong analytical and inter-personal skills including storytelling, facilitation, problem solving, negotiation, etc. to deliver client outcomes
Build clear and measurable strategic roadmaps and supporting business cases that both delineate a broader end-game, while also prioritizing quick wins with near-term measurable impact
Get involved in high priority pursuits and sales opportunities, including development of winning proposals, coaching bid teams, and embedding a continuous learning and improvement framework with ongoing focus on improving win rates
Actively develop and maintain senior client relationships and networks

Market / Practice Impact: working with the regional Advisory teams in each country to enable growth, accelerate maturity and scale out of our regional practices. As part of the role, you will:

Refine and expand Avanade’s Digital Enterprise Advisory go to market strategy and propositions
Contribute towards Avanade thought leadership to continue to position Avanade as a leader in our chosen markets
Embed clear talent attraction and retention expectations for each region and support in attracting and interviewing great talent
Identify and support the most appropriate learning and development plans for the Digital Enterprise Advisory practice
Encourage sharing and re-use across different regions and actively collaborating with Global Advisory leadership and initiatives

Required Skills & Experience:

Solid experience from top management consultancies, tech services, or digital agencies
Demonstrated experience in selling/delivery/solution leadership - interfacing with executive level clients
Excellent communication, presentation and consulting skills
Aptitude for critical and analytical thinking as well as the capacity to think outside of the box
Team builder, positive problem solver, highly flexible and able to work independently as well as part of multi-disciplinary teams
Previous experience in driving an impact across multiple geographies
Bi-lingual with Japanese and English language proficiency required
Bachelor’s degree in related field, MBA preferred

Preferred Experience and Skills:

The following skills and capabilities would be desired for this role:

Cross-sector experience with a preference for prior experience in Financial Services or Healthcare
Proven experience consulting to CDO/CMO/CCO clients
Passionate about the latest trends in digital and how technology enables business innovation and transformation
Working knowledge of digital strategies and business cases, marketing, customer experience across channels, product and service innovation, data strategy and data driven organisations, and shifts in ways of working that enable organisations to accelerate their digital journeys
Interest in and awareness of emerging topics including Metaverse and Web3 as well as Sustainability
Understanding of design thinking, agile and lean frameworks
Proficiency in English is expected, and any Japanese language skills will be highly beneficial

About Avanade

Avanade is the leading provider of innovative digital, cloud and advisory services, industry solutions and design-led experiences across the Microsoft ecosystem. Every day, our 59,000 professionals in 26 countries make a genuine human impact for our clients, their employees and their customers.

We have been recognized as Microsoft’s Global SI Partner of the Year more than any other company. With the most Microsoft certifications (60,000+) and 18 (out of 18) Gold-level Microsoft competencies, we are uniquely positioned to help businesses grow and solve their toughest challenges.

We are a people first company, committed to providing an inclusive workplace where employees feel comfortable being their authentic selves. As a responsible business, we are building a sustainable world and helping young people from underrepresented communities fulfil their potential.

Majority owned by Accenture, Avanade was founded in 2000 by Accenture LLP and Microsoft Corporation. Learn more at www.avanade.com .

Description And Requirements

Lenovo is seeking an experienced Transformation Consultant who will develop comprehensive, creative, and cost-effective services and solutions for our customers to help transform and modernize their environment.

Your role will be to evaluate customer opportunities as presented in, RFPs/RFQs or engagements, from the Services Sales teams and use this information to develop solutions to meet customer’s requirements. Lenovo solutions may incorporate one or more lifecycle services including Device as a Service (DaaS), Managed Services, Digital Workplace Services, and any additional endpoint lifecycle/management services.

Your Responsibilities will be to:

Provide endpoint management and lifecycle and information technology expertise
Travel to and facilitate workshops with customers to analyze customer processes and environments and develop overall solution recommendations, including total cost of ownership assessments.
Partner across multiple organizations including, but not limited to, sales; finance; service delivery; customers and business partners and contribute to all elements of the services sales cycle from the project kickoff; stakeholder coordination and end solution strategy.
Contribute to customer presentations and briefings, provide input during deal qualification reviews, and prepare content for solution reviews with key stakeholders as required.
Collaborate with Solution Architects for the development of a SOW contract with both the selected business partner and the customer.
Promote, sell, manage pipeline and contribute to the overall business management systems within the services group.
Ancillary responsibilities will include contributing to the ongoing education of our sales force through consistent and frequent interactions as well as contributing content and customer feedback to the worldwide Lenovo Services portfolio group

Position Requirements:

7+ years of Contract Management, SOW’s, Business Development, Professional Services, Project Management and/or IT Services operations experience.
Direct experience in IT Services Industry focused on the PC Lifecycle or have an understanding of typical IT client infrastructures, tools and associated endpoint lifecycle/management activities and have the ability to generate and communicate associated services value propositions.
Familiarity with and understanding of endpoint device management solutions and industry best practices
Proven success in building solutions in the IT services industry
A strategic mindset and sound business acumen are required, along with effective decision-making, contract negotiation and partner management skills
Excellent communication, both oral and written, and polished presentation skills
Proven ability to operate with a high level of professionalism; entrepreneurialism and agility

Travel estimated at 40%

Additional Preferred Qualifications

Technical certification from Microsoft, Virtualization tools, endpoint management tools and ITIL
Global Account or Global Enterprise Account Sales experience with multiple stakeholder buy-in

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

709 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] UE5 Content Programmer (경력 무관)
KRAFTON Inc.

크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

NFT Metaverse Dept 소속의 Client 팀은 크래프톤에서 글로벌 시장 타겟으로 새롭게 준비 중인 NFT 메타버스 프로젝트의 클라이언트를 개발하는 부서입니다.

최적화, 자동화, 퀄리티업의 목표를 가지고 글로벌 멀티플랫폼 프로젝트의 라이브 서비스 경험을 바탕으로 역량을 갖춘 함께 일하고싶은 소프트웨어 엔지니어들로 구성되어있습니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
언리얼 엔진 5를 폭넓게 이해하고 활용하여 샌드박스, 메타버스, 멀티플랫폼, UX, 최적화 키워드로 클라이언트 컨텐트 및 데디케이션 서버를 개발합니다.

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
C++ 프로그래밍에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
컴퓨터 구조와 OS 에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
언리얼 엔진 기반 게임 개발 경험이 있으신 분
네트워크 프로그래밍의 기초 지식이 있으신 분
3D 수학에 대한 이해가 있으신 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
전산학(컴퓨터과학) 전공하신 분
언리얼 데디케이션 서버 기반 게임 개발 경험이 있으신 분
스켈레탈 애니메이션과 언리얼 애니메이션 시스템에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
언리얼 리플렉션 및 리플리케이션 시스템에 대한 이해가 있으신 분
탈것, 캐릭터 이동 등 물리 기반 컨텐츠 개발 경험이 있으신 분
protobuf, gRPC 사용 경험이 있으신 분
Lua 등 스크립트 언어 사용 경험이 있으신 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 직무 테스트 (Technical Fit Test) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.

We originally came from the Metaverse with a trending top 15 NFT project on OpenSea called CryptoGOGOs. Our token GOGOcoin is constructing the most user-friendly open source DeFi protocol for asset management and savings. The genesis came from the idea of merging the power of NFTs with a DeFi protocol that is as user-friendly as world-class FinTech apps.

GOGO Protocol is built by a global team of 35+ professionals, spread across 3 continents, with deep Crypto/DeFi expertise and with roots in banking, finance, tech, arts, entertainment, and gaming, as well as more than 10 years of experience in building multi-billion dollar tech companies such as N26, Consensys, Binance, Deutsche Bank and Sovryn.

Create, create, create: Grow our presence with brilliant content that speaks to the emotions of tech enthusiasts and traders. Show the crypto community what great content looks like on our social and editorial channels.
Keep us at the top: Analyze the impact of what we put out into the world. Use those results to keep us informed and always moving our strategy forward. Research industry trends and evangelize our brand to stay ahead of the competition.
Drive it home: Ensure all our content plans come to fruition by managing the day-to-day operations of content ideation, selection, development with the help of our in-house videographer and cutter, as well as marketing designer.

You’re driven by empathy. Our customers are at the center of everything we do, and understanding their needs and how we can meet them at the intersection of our business is key.
You are proactive. You come up with great ideas and prove them with data.

Awesome extras:
Crypto knowledge or trading experience understanding the motives of crypto users preferred
Bachelor’s Degree preferred

A competitive compensation package and direct profit participation in our token

713 --> Game Tech Team Lead
Mytaverse 
Miami, FL
Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Game Tech Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our work with Unreal, cloud streaming, and other cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities

Leads the development of the Game Tech team, responsible for Unreal development, and cloud streaming and spatial audio integrations.

Develops new features, enhances existing features, and implements bug fixes in existing code.

Optimizes game engine deployment in terms of memory, frame rate and performance.

Guides team members to create work that adheres to the design of game systems while maintaining good style and optimization standards.

Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards are consistently met across the team.

Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.

Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.

Develops and maintains strategic operational systems, tools, and processes for production-readiness.

Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.

Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.

Develops software to integrate with distributed web applications.

Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Game Tech team.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

At least five years of relevant experience as a Game Developer or similar software engineering role.

At least two years of experience developing optimized modules in C++ within Unreal.

Strong knowledge of C++.

Proficient with git and git workflows.

Experience building libraries and APIs.

Up-to-date with the latest gaming trends, techniques, best practices and technologies.

Interest in learning new tools and technologies.

Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.

Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.

Problem-solving attitude.

Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits

Experience with full-cycle game design and development.

Expert in one or more areas of specialization (artificial intelligence, 3D rendering, 3D animation, physics, multiplayer/networking, streaming technologies, or spatial audio).

Exposure to cloud-native applications (AWS GameLift, preferred).

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Mytaverse is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

As the first decentralized talent network, our revolutionary Web3 model ensures the community that relies on Braintrust to find work are the same people who own and build it through the blockchain token, BTRST. So unlike other marketplaces that take 20% to 50% of talent earnings, Braintrust allows talent to keep 100% of earnings and to vote on key changes to improve the network. 718 --> Software Developer VoIP (Go / Rust)
Element
Berlin, Berlin, Germany (Remote)
Who We Are

Element is the startup that employs the core team behind matrix.org— the leading project for secure, open decentralised communication.

Matrix’s mission is to make messaging as open as email — allowing everyone to choose where their data is hosted, enjoy private conversations thanks to advanced encryption, and ultimately be in control of their own communication.

Matrix powers Element, our flagship messaging apps for the web, iOS & Android, along with Element Matrix Services (EMS), our SaaS platform for personal & professional use.

We build things for everyone, and we know we can’t succeed without a diverse team. Our hiring process is designed to be humane and give candidates the best chance to show us what you can do. If we ever fall down on this, please let us know.

The Role

Element is heavily investing in building out Matrix as the missing signalling layer for WebRTC: providing an open and decentralised E2EE transport for negotiating media streams and data channels. On top, we have recently extended Matrix to support scalable decentralised E2EE group voice and video calling too (MSC3401). These are the base building blocks for visionary applications such as Element Call as well as the open metaverse (aka third room).

Similar to the concept of bridges between matrix and classical messenger applications, we are also aiming for bridging real-time media applications to connect to more legacy systems, e.g., SIP / PSTN, as we are trying to work on interoperability with a unified collaboration & communication vision. The VoIP team will be responsible for designing and implementing a Matrix MSC3401 compatible backend including a generic bridging model.

Currently Element Call cannot interop with other VoIP platforms. You’d come along to help evolve the backend and add one of the first bridges to interop with, e.g., SIP / PSTN, using a modern tech stack that ensures future compatibility.

Our VoIP team ensures that there is a communication layer for an open metaverse, so this is a great chance to make a big impact on the future of communication.

Since (almost) everything we do is open source you can get a great feel for exactly what it would be like to work on the team, come and say hi!

Requirements

As part of our VoIP Team you are fascinated by real-time audio and video processing. You enjoy exciting challenges and work scientifically on cutting-edge technologies. You will be responsible for developing audio / video infrastructure components and services. Your ideas and work will improve our real-time communication platform which is used by several million users per day.

The most important thing is that you believe passionately in the mission of decentralisation of the internet. More specifically that you believe that communications should not be centralised in the hands of a small number of very large organisations and instead individuals should control their own data and choose who they share it with.

Additionally we are looking for someone who is:
Smart, curious and enthusiastic
Likes to ship early and often
Likes to write tests :)
A tireless advocate of code quality (understanding the need for trade-offs in the short term whilst keeping us honest in the long term)
Enjoys working in an Agile / Lean development environment
Is articulate and empathetic.
Your experience

We don’t have hard requirements, we just want to build the best possible team, but as a bonus it would be great if some of the following are true.
Knowledge in real-time streaming of live-media (WebRTC)
Experience in legacy VoIP protocols like SIP
Knowledge of Linux, Docker
Experience maintaining and / or contributing to open source projects
Experience working in a continuous delivery environment
Ideally you worked with Go or Rust already

If you have any questions before making an application reach out to Adam (adamt@element.io).

Benefits

People tend to stay with the company for a long time, we take this as a sign that we have a cohesive, supportive culture, that we have engaging challenging work and that people can develop their skills and careers here for the long term. We also have a family friendly environment, many of the team have small children and we look to accommodate that as best we can. Since our technology is relevant to anything that requires real-time comms, the role provides exposure to a wide range of domains from web and app dev through to VR, VoIP and IoT.

Our package generally contains:
Private Health Insurance
Pension
Annual Bonus
Share Options
Home Office Allowance
Coworking Space Allowance
Annual leave (40 days including local bank holidays)
Company Socials (virtual or in person)
Annual Global Offsite
Plumm Health (mental health platform)

You can find a more detailed explanation here and you might be eligible for other benefits depending on your location.

Element does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, colour, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

Based on an already very successful software product (real-time audio-video system), they have laid a stable foundation to take their core product to a higher level. Based on a holistic culture and working method, there is an opportunity to work together with a very high-quality dev team (CTO reads 10-15 software related books per month!), to build software at the highest level. The team consists of smart engineers who have contributed to the success of tech giants such as YouTube and Google, where according to them it is more impactful to be part of this IT scale up (fast feedback loops, no hierarchy, autonomous decisions as 1 team. )

Where a Zoom, Google Meet or MS Teams is only a tool with limited possibilities, an interactive virtual atmosphere is created here that will culminate in 'the Metaverse of digital interaction!'

Are you continuously stimulating yourself to keep ahead in the latest tech/tools, always striving for the best solution based on logic and SE fundamentals?

Then this is the job for you!

Your role: Senior Front-end Developer Amsterdam

As a Senior Front-end specialist, there is an opportunity to build new revolutionary features in React, Typescript, and CSS that contribute to a new experience of digital interaction. With a World Domination plan and product, you will always work from the JS fundamentals and best SE practices (functional programming, Domain-Driven Design). As a Front-end expert, you determine new Designs (Domain modelling) and you have a chance that the whole world will soon use your Front-end solutions! Within the passionate team, there is a real start-up vibe in which you get a lot of freedom to experiment and testing is also very important (unit testing, integration tests).

The quality of code is high and the people you can spar with excel in their knowledge! As a team, you will sometimes come out and participate, for example, in Hackathons and Algorithm contests. Chances are you and the team of smart minds will go home with the win! As a Senior Front end developer, the user experience always comes first and you can build a social interactive (real-time) atmosphere in a cross-functional team where you are end2end responsible for everything Front end!

The culture is characterized as open, and informal and there is also a lot of time and attention to personal development! As a close-knit team, you will regularly go on fun trips (abroad) and you will spend time with family and friends on the holidays (Sinterklaas party with gifts).

Stack: React, Typescript, CSS, Webpack, Domain-Driven Design, GitHub, REST, SSE, unit testing, integration tests, Jenkins. Nothing of this stack is written in stone, so there is a lot of room for your own input!

Do you simply want to work with the best engineers so that you are continuously stimulated to become a better version of yourself?

Then I'm sure you'll respond after reading their secondary terms below 😊

What Is Being Asked

7+ years of professional experience in high-level software development
4+ years of experience building Spa’s in React
Solid knowledge of Typescript + JS fundamentals
Strong testing skills (unit, integration tests)
BSc, MSc, or PHD in IT (e.g. in Comp Science, Mathematics)
Always want to keep developing yourself! (reading books, open-source)

What Is Offered

Salary up to 116,000 euros based on knowledge and experience (8 to 9K gross p.m.!)
Share in the company (big chance this will be worth at least 750.000 euros!)
Remote position with flexible working hours and freedom (if living in NL)
Possibilities for a good pension
Working at a financially stable scale up with the best engineers!
Fun team trips abroad and participation in hackathons

As a Senior Front end Developer, do you get energy from an open 'get things done' startup culture where you, together with experienced engineers, are constantly working to positively change the way software is built?

Then apply now using the form below or send your CV to Melchior Schimmel at m.schimmel@codeguild.nl.

722 --> DB Engineer, Portworx
Pure Storage
Prague, Prague, Czechia
BE PART OF BUILDING THE FUTURE.

What do NASA and emerging space companies have in common with COVID vaccine R&D teams or with Roblox and the Metaverse?

The answer is data, -- all fast moving, fast growing industries rely on data for a competitive edge in their industries. And the most advanced companies are realizing the full data advantage by partnering with Pure Storage. Pure’s vision is to redefine the storage experience and empower innovators by simplifying how people consume and interact with data. With 9,000 customers including 50% of the Fortune 500, we’ve only scratched the surface of our ambitions .

Pure Is Blazing Trails And Setting Records

For eight straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant
Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a certified Net Promoter Score in the top 1% of B2B companies globally
Industry analysts and press applaud Pure’s leadership across these dimensions
And, our 4,000+ employees are emboldened to make Pure a faster, stronger, smarter company as we go

If you, like us, say “bring it on” to exciting challenges that change the world, we have endless opportunities where you can make your mark.

PURE IN PRAGUE

We opened our R&D Second Home (besides the one in Silicon Valley) in Prague in January 2020 and since then we have experienced unbelievable growth. Our Engineers are solving complex engineering problems (from low-level system software to cloud computing) that help us innovate our cutting-edge products. Besides our world-class Software Engineering teams, we have many other talented colleagues working in Product Management, Sales, Finance, and HR to name a few. What’s more, we’ve developed these teams from talent across the globe.

PORTWORX

The Portworx Enterprise Storage Platform is your end-to-end storage and data management solution for all your Kubernetes projects, including container-based CaaS, DBaaS, SaaS, and Disaster Recovery initiatives. Your apps will benefit from container-granular storage, disaster recovery, data security, multi-cloud migrations and more.

Pure Storage Acquired Portworx in October 2020, Creating the Industry's Most Complete Kubernetes Data Services Platform for Cloud Native Applications. This acquisition represents Pure’s largest to date and our deeper expansion into the fast-growing market for multi-cloud data services to support Kubernetes and containers.

Portworx Data Services (PDS), the industry’s first database-as-a-service platform. Pure customers are reinventing their businesses and dominating their industries by building modern applications. These apps run in containers and on Kubernetes. They’re backed by a growing number of SQL, NoSQL, search, streaming, and analytics data services.

PDS provides a production-grade, managed database-as-a-service experience for running these services so developers can focus on using data services, not managing them.

IN THIS ROLE YOU WILL...

Build core of database as a service platform to manage the complete life-cycle of data intensive applications in a Kubernetes cluster. This would include not just basic installation, but day-2 operations like metrics, backups, migrations, autopilot capabilities, etc.

What You’ll Need To Bring To This Role...

Background in database administration, compute infrastructure, storage infrastructure, and container ecosystems that run on-premise and in the cloud.
Technical expertise with one or more data services including Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, Elastic, Kafka, or Cassandra.
Domain expertise in two or more of the following key areas: Kubernetes, OpenShift, DBA experience in a production environment, DBA architecture experience, Storage infrastructure.
Software development experience.
Candidate must have the passion and strong interest in learning new technologies.
Strong can do attitude, focus on innovation and customer centric approach.

BE YOU—CORPORATE CLONES NEED NOT APPLY.

Pure is where you ask big questions, think differently, and make an impact. This is not just a job, but a place where you have a voice and can accelerate your career. We value unique thoughts and celebrate individuality, and with ample opportunity to learn, develop yourself, and expand into different roles, joining Pure is an investment in your career journey.

Through our Pure Equality program, which supports a flourishing field of employee resource groups, we nourish the personal and professional lives of our team members. And our Pure Good Foundation gives back to local and global communities through volunteering and grants.

And because we understand the value of bringing your full and best self to work, we offer a variety of perks to manage a healthy balance, including flexible time off, wellness resources, and company-sponsored team events.

PURE IS COMMITTED TO EQUALITY.

Research shows that in order to apply for a job, women feel they need to meet 100% of the criteria while men usually apply after meeting about 60%. Regardless of how you identify, if you believe you can do the job and are a good match, we encourage you to apply.

Pure is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or any other characteristic legally protected by the laws of the jurisdiction in which you are being considered for hire.

If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at TA-Ops@purestorage.com .

If you're wondering how or why Pure collects or uses information you provide, we invite you to check out our Applicant & Candidate Personal Information Protection Notice .

DEEMED EXPORT LICENSE NOTICE.

Some positions may require a deemed export license for compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Please note: Pure does not currently sponsor deemed export license applications so we are unable to proceed with applicants requiring stated sponsorship.

PURE’S COMPLIANCE WITH THE U.S. GOVERNMENT COVID-19 MANDATE

In accordance with Pure’s policies, current and anticipated federal regulations, and our ongoing commitment to prioritizing the health and well-being of our employees, partners, and customers, and the community at large, where permitted by law, all Pure employees and contractors working in the United States are expected to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 prior to your start date. Should you require an exemption for medical or religious reasons, you must initiate Pure’s exemption request process which will determine if an exemption can be granted in accordance with applicable local, state, and/or federal law.

・カジノ市場は世界で約18兆円規模の市場を持つと言われ、日本国内で見れば当社はシェアTOP3に入ります。最も大きな市場は北米（アメリカ、カナダ）、次いで豪州を含むアジア太平洋地域になります。 724 --> Web3 Community Manager (Remote or Hybrid)
Toledo Museum of Art
Toledo, OH
Job Title: Web3 Community Manager (Remote or Hybrid)

Department: Brand Experience

Reports To: Director of Brand Strategy

FLSA Status: Exempt

Job Status: Full-Time

Please submit applications directly on the Toledo Museum of Art website http://www.toledomuseum.org/jobs.

Since our founding in 1901, the Toledo Museum of Art has earned a global reputation for the quality of our collection, our innovative and extensive education programs, and our architecturally significant campus.

And thanks to the benevolence of its founders, as well as the continued support of its members, TMA remains a privately endowed, non-profit institution and opens its collection to the public, free of charge.

Summary

Working within the Brand Experience team at the Toledo Museum of Art (TMA), the Web3 Community Manager will help shape innovative efforts including NFT drops, DAOs, events in Decentraland, DeFi fundraising, and community management within platforms such as Discord and Twitter. The Museum has active explorations in all these various spaces, but we now aim to organize them into a coordinated strategy and the Web3 Community Manager will play a key part in this evolution of our efforts.

Since this is a territory of rapid change, emerging technologies, and new ideas were looking for someone who is already immersed in Web3 community, technology, and lingo. This role will especially appeal to someone who is passionate about art and museums, as they will get a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to help guide a significant museum into the future through technology and culture. While the Museum has historically focused on the local and regional communities around Toledo, Web3 opens the TMA to the globe, so this role can be performed in person, hybrid, or remote.

The Toledo Museum of Art is committed to a strategic plan that creates a more inclusive experience, where a high-quality collection meets a culture of belonging. All Web3 community efforts at TMA must explore unique and relevant ways to express these strategic goals and our values of diversity, community, innovation, and trust.

Key Accountabilities

Helps develop and scales TMA’s online communities within Discord and Twitter.
Creates engagement activities for deeper relationships with the community.
Communicates with the community, especially fans, influencers, and other partners to increase the impact of each channel.
Keeps a pulse on trending topics in the community and identify areas of opportunity to grow our engagement.
On Twitter: Grows engagement by tweeting, scheduling and facilitating Twitter Spaces; drives recognition of TMA among collectors and creators.
On Discord: Grows loyalty by generating excitement about NFT drops, sharing news, stimulating conversation, curating private events, and hangouts.
Tracks performance goals through data measurement tools and dashboards.
Implements new technologies across Twitter and Discord to improve performance.
Performs other duties as assigned or required

Education And Experience

High school diploma or GED equivalent required
2-3+ years of experience in social media marketing, content creation, and editorial required
Some experience with community moderation in Discord, Twitter, and other community platforms required
Knowledge of NFT and metaverse including crypto language and meme culture required

Specialized Knowledge, Competencies, And Abilities

Coding and tech skills are not required, but are a huge plus
Ability to operate autonomously in an emerging space
An attitude of openness and inclusion; TMA seeks to build a global community with people across all backgrounds (nationality, race, gender, religion, politics)

WORK ENVIRONMENT

Option for fully remote work or hybrid of on-site work and remote work. On-site work would include a standard open office work environment shared with co-workers, with related phone, computer and printer noise. Position requires ability operate a computer and other office productivity machinery, such as a calculator, copy machine, printer and phone system; May occasionally lift up to 25 pounds; Support given to various departments across campus may result in occasional exposure to uncomfortable weather conditions.

The Toledo Museum of Art provides equal opportunity for employment and promotion to all qualified employees and applicants. No person shall be discriminated against in employment on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, age, national origin, marital status, disability, sexual orientation, veteran status or any other status or condition protected by applicable federal or state statutes. The Museum is committed to maintaining an environment in which all employees are treated equitably and given the opportunity to achieve their full potential in the workplace. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to access job openings or apply for a job on this site as a result of your disability. You can request reasonable accommodations by contacting Human Resources at jobs@toledomuseum.org or (567)-666-0387.

Thanks to your impressive expertise, you truly understand the needs of software and platform organizations, using your empathy and experience.

About PolicyPal

PolicyPal Tech Pte. Ltd. is one of the leading InsurTech companies in Singapore that believes in bringing tech and insurance together for families and communities to manage their insurance needs. We also believe in helping the community attain relevant knowledge on financial planning through gamification, and offering in-app credits incentives that can be used to help them get covered. PolicyPal Tech Pte. Ltd. is a policy management platform that helps users easily keep track of all their insurance policies in an app. Since 2016, it has helped over 100,000 users manage their policies.

About ValueChampion

ValueChampion is a recent acquisition of PolicyPal dedicated to providing clarity on all of life's financial decisions. As a leading financial platform, we create guides and tools based on both quantitative and qualitative analysis to make it easy to pay off debt, choose the best financial products and services (credit cards, loans, insurance policies, and investment platforms) to tackle major life goals, like buying a house and saving for retirement.

You will be

Come join a creative team dedicated to expanding the reach of the ValueChampion brand, providing useful and accurate financial analyses for consumers in Singapore. From analysing how a war on the other side of the world will affect food prices in Singapore to six hundred ways for people to tide over rising costs, you will be given an opportunity to get your thought and analyses out there for people to hear.

Here at PolicyPal, we strive to provide opportunities for our team to learn, grow and thrive. You will be supporting the Content and Campaign Manager and should be passionate about driving ValueChampion’s digital footprint and content marketing strategies.

728 --> Community Specialist & Moderator_ Albania
The Nemesis
Tirana, Tirana, Albania (Hybrid)
TheNemesis.io is an open-ended game metaverse targeted at the mass market, with an intuitive and entertaining UX/UI, fully available on browser/webGL and native iOS/Android mobile apps, with an incredible number of live features. While we have a strong blockchain footprint any player can just enter, play and enjoy TheNemesis by clicking on a simple link with no need for knowledge of the Web3. We provide branded engagement experiences, a fun social environment to hang out, and an opportunity for casual gamers and content creators to monetize and cash out on their work.

Our values

TheNemesis is an open, tech-neutral, fully inter-operable ecosystem, where Players and Brands can find tools to create, disseminate and enjoy their own experiences. We are an open employer that encourages diversity and autonomy, critical thinking and challenges.

Position:

We are looking for an enthusiastic, talented and motivated Community Specialist & Moderator.

By joining this team you are part of something that has a vision for transforming the very world and lives we live. We want to do this in a way that is a phenomenal and healthy experience to our users and community. We are glad you are now part of delivering our vision!

We at The Nemesis are building for the long term. With the sale of lands and launch of tokens relatively imminent, we need a team to come on board, be fast learners, and integrate into our discord and Telegram channel. We expect increased traffic through our channels and this traffic needs to be well directed and responded to!

Requirements:

Moderator Requirements:

Our main goal for moderators is for them to be active and helpful. Therefore we believe we require four things of you:
Knowledge of Discord and Telegram
Knowledge of known scams and the ways in which discords are infiltrated (scam links, web hooks, etc.)
Knowledge of editing and creation on discord.
Activity and presence are important, the faster we respond to posts and questions, the better. We want our presence as a mod to be useful and positive.
Moderators read our entire white paper to inform themselves and be able to answer questions from our community, which can be found here:

https://thenemesis.io/pdf/TheNemesis_WP.pdf

To engage in TheNemesis metaverse and become familiar with the different lands, games and dynamics of the worlds that have been created.

Other information:

Our mods need to know that phishing attacks are targeted at successful and larger projects. Mods need to be especially aware of these scams because they can often be victims without realizing it and their discord token can be manipulated and messages can be executed in your name to scam others. The most common methods of phishing are currently verification bots and the use of collablands. Be very careful when using them.

You can read more homework here: https://discord.com/moderation/4405230544663-111:-Your-Responsibilities-as-a-Moderator.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

다양한 문화 컨텐츠를 좋아하고 즐기시는 분

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!

731 --> Protocol Devops Engineer
Crypto.com
Singapore, Singapore
About Crypto.com:

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 50 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem.

Learn more at https://crypto.com .

Cronos is the first blockchain network that interoperates with both Ethereum and Cosmos technology, supporting Decentralized Finance, NFTs and Metaverse. It aims to massively scale the DeFi and decentralized application (Web3) user community, by providing builders with the ability to instantly port apps and crypto assets from other chains while benefiting from low cost, high throughput, and fast finality.

Cronos Labs is the ecosystem accelerator of Cronos chain. It drives the development of Cronos and its ecosystem, deploys a broad range of programs aimed at growing user and developer adoption of Cronos, and incubates selected Dapps in order to bootstrap the Cronos ecosystem.

Since mainnet launch in November 2021, Cronos has surpassed 4 B$ in total Defi asset value and safely processed tens of millions of network transactions. It is home to more than 300 Web3 projects and >900,000 crypto users, growing at a fast pace.

Cronos is an open-source project backed by Crypto.org , Crypto.com , and more than 200 Dapp developers and partners. It is powered by the Cronos ($CRO) cryptocurrency. Together, these partner communities number more than 50 M crypto users.

We are looking for several Devops Engineers, at all levels, to support the operation and scaling of the Cronos blockchain network in order to bring the next billion users to Web3.

As Devops engineer, you define and implement both the entire workflow of the Cronos chain protocol engineering team, and the Security and SRE processes that keep these applications running and scaling 24/7.

Responsibilities

Contribute to system architecture design
Improve and manage Terraform, K8S and CI/CD pipeline.
Develop tools for application and performance monitoring
Develop and deploy cloud infrastructure in IaC manner.
Design and implement Disaster Recovery ; backup solution,
Automate and streamline operations and processes.
Communicate, escalate and follow up as appropriate to ensure that problems are solved
Requirements

Solid experience in AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes is a must
Experience in building CICD pipelines of a large scale enterprise application
Experience in monitoring ; maintaining mission critical system
Experience in monitoring tools like Datadog, Grafana, ELK, New Relic, etc.
Experience in Linux and Network Security
Experience in MQ/ Kafka is a plus
Experience in Nodejs / Java development is a plus
Experience in GitOps is a plus
3 year+ Experience in DevOps ; AWS
Ability to code. You are expected to write some maintainable code.
A strong interest in working in technology and/or financial environments
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to engage both technical and non-technical stakeholders

Benefits

What you can expect from us?

We offer an attractive compensation package working in a cutting-edge field of Fintech.

Huge responsibilities from Day 1. Be the owner of your own learning curve.
The possibilities are limitless and depend on you.
You get to work in a very dynamic environment and be part of an international team.
You will get to have involvement in developing a brand new product from scratch alongside with a talented team.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted with information on the next steps of our application process.

Deutsche Bahn International

This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt suchen wir Dich als IT-Systemarchitekt für das Metaverse der Eisenbahninfrastruktur für die DB Systel GmbH am Standort Berlin.

Dies ist ein "Wo Du Willst-Job": In Abstimmung mit Deiner Führungskraft kannst Du Deinen Arbeitsort innerhalb Deutschlands selbst disponieren und zwischen mobilem Arbeiten und Arbeiten im Büro wählen.

Als Teil des Teams DigiRail schaffst Du aus revolutionären Ansätzen konkrete Lösungen und erschaffst ein Puzzle der morgigen Bahn. Die Digitale Schiene hat nichts weniger vor, als ein vollwertiges, autonomen Eisenbahnverbund in Deutschland zu schaffen. Mit Deinem Know-How gelingt Dir das. Du bist Teil eines gemischten Teams aus Berlin und Frankfurt, welches sich als Fokus das Thema DSD sowie die großen Infrastrukturthemen der DB Netz als Fokus gesetzt hat. Arbeiten auf Augenhöhe mit Projekt- und Programmleitern

Dein Profil

Du die Digitalisierung der Eisenbahninfrastruktur direkt in Aufgabenstellungen mit unseren Kunden gestalten und weiterentwickeln willst
Als Architekt, lebst Du Agilität und Team mit Eigeninitiative, Überzeugungskraft und strukturierter Arbeitsweise
In der Kundenkommunikation bist Du überzeugend und sicher

733 --> Directeur(trice) principal(e), numérique et innovation - responsable du métaverse
KPMG Canada
Toronto, ON (On-site)
Aperçu

Chez KPMG, vous ferez partie d’une équipe diversifiée et dévouée de professionnels de la résolution de problèmes ayant un objectif commun traduire l’information en occasions pour nos clients et nos communautés partout dans le monde.

Sommaire du poste

Chez KPMG, nous croyons que la réalité étendue est une nouvelle frontière qui exploite des technologies convergentes pour façonner l’univers virtuel du futur – un monde en 3D immersif et interconnecté dans lequel la réalité virtuelle, la réalité augmentée, l’intelligence artificielle, la chaîne de blocs et les cryptomonnaies redéfiniront notre façon de vivre, de travailler et de socialiser. Il s’agit d’une occasion exceptionnelle de rejoindre l’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG au Canada, qui connaît une croissance rapide, afin d’aider nos clients à franchir cette nouvelle frontière numérique qu’on appelle le métavers. Nous sommes à la recherche de pionniers passionnés pour aider nos clients à générer une valeur durable dans ce réseau émergent de réalité virtuelle qui transformera le commerce, l’expérience client et les communautés.

L’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG est composée de concepteurs innovateurs qui exploitent ensemble les technologies de pointe pour créer de nouvelles façons de travailler et d’interagir dans le monde numérique multisectoriel.

Ce que vous ferez

Relevant directement de l’associé directeur et président, Numérique et innovation, le titulaire travaille en étroite collaboration avec le leader, Cryptoactifs et chaîne de blocs, le leader, Expérience client, et d’autres équipes interfonctionnelles utilisant différentes plateformes virtuelles afin d’aider nos clients à mener à bien leurs projets dans le métavers. Il s’agit notamment d’informer les clients, de préparer des propositions, de créer des contenus stimulants sur le métavers, et de partager des expériences réussies sur diverses plateformes. Il met à profit son expérience et ses compétences en communication narrative pour simplifier, à l’intention des hauts dirigeants, certains aspects plus complexes du métavers et du Web3 et proposer des stratégies qui favoriseront le succès des initiatives actuelles et futures de l’organisation.

Les candidats retenus nourrissent une véritable passion pour le métavers, les jetons non fongibles (NFT), la finance décentralisée et le Web3, combinée à une connaissance approfondie des pratiques institutionnelles du secteur.

Bien que vos activités varieront chaque jour, voici les principales tâches dont vous devrez vous acquitter dans le cadre de vos fonctions
Définir et diriger la stratégie de mise sur le marché en collaboration avec le groupe de travail Métavers.
Diriger l’élaboration de propositions à fort impact et visuellement attrayantes, qui présentent des idées qui incitent à la réflexion, suscitent l’intérêt des clients et offrent une valeur ajoutée.
Conseiller les clients sur les stratégies de mise en œuvre du métavers, y compris l’établissement et la hiérarchisation des cas d’utilisation pertinents, et la conception de l’expérience.
Organiser des ateliers de formation stimulants et des démonstrations des plateformes virtuelles utilisées dans divers secteurs d’activité.
Établir et entretenir des collaborations stratégiques avec des organisations externes afin de dégager des occasions concrètes dans ce domaine.
Concevoir des événements numériques et des activités commerciales dans le métavers pour nos équipes, nos clients et nos collectivités; planifier, concevoir, animer et superviser la prestation de telles expériences.
Faire des recherches et développer du contenu qui informe et démontre notre clairvoyance et notre leadership éclairé, tant à l’interne qu’à l’externe.

Ce que vous apportez au rôle
Passion pour le métavers, les expériences de réalité augmentée/réalité virtuelle (RA/RV) et l’infrastructure technologique sous-jacente.
Présence active sur plusieurs plateformes virtuelles (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.).
Connaissance de base des processus, des outils et des éléments constitutifs de la réalité étendue (RA/RV), du métavers, des NFT, du système d’économie de jetons et des portefeuilles de cryptomonnaies.
Bonne compréhension des tendances émergentes et des cas d’utilisation dans l’espace du Web3 et du métavers.
Au moins cinq ans d’expérience dans le développement commercial des technologies.
Expérience dans la création, le lancement, le maintien et la croissance de communautés en ligne et d’initiatives visant à stimuler la mobilisation de la communauté.
Solides compétences en matière de communication et de collaboration, et capacité à s’exprimer à la fois à un niveau technique et à un niveau stratégique.
Capacité à diriger simultanément plusieurs flux de travail et plusieurs missions.
Expérience dans l’animation, la communication narrative et les présentations aux clients.
Les clés de votre succès

Les membres du personnel de KPMG agissent efficacement | favorisent la croissance | inspirent confiance et comprennent que la diversité de la main‐d’œuvre nous permet d’approfondir nos relations et d’enrichir le cabinet.

Nous sommes là pour vous soutenir afin que vous puissiez donner le meilleur de vous-même.

Pour en savoir plus sur les avantages sociaux et le bien-être de KPMG au Canada, cliquez ici.

Nos valeurs, la façon KPMG

Intégrité, nous faisons ce qui est juste | Excellence, nous ne cessons jamais d’apprendre et de nous améliorer | Courage, nous pensons et agissons avec audace | Ensemble, nous nous respectons les uns les autres et puisons notre force dans nos différences | Pour le mieux, nous faisons en sorte que notre travail compte

KPMG au Canada souscrit fièrement au principe de l’égalité d’accès à l’emploi et s’engage à offrir un environnement de travail respectueux, inclusif et sans obstacle, permettant ainsi à tous les membres de son personnel de se réaliser pleinement. Un effectif diversifié est la clé de notre réussite et nous croyons à notre mission qui vise à ce que vous soyez complètement vous-même au travail. Nous invitons tous les candidats qualifiés à se manifester et nous espérons que vous ferez de KPMG au Canada votre employeur de choix. Pour obtenir plus de renseignements sur l’Inclusion, diversité et équité au recrutement, cliquez ici.

Pour toute question de recrutement d’ordre général, communiquez avec le Centre de prestation des RH à l’adresse cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca.

Si vous avez des questions en matière d’accessibilité à l’emploi chez KPMG ou si vous désirez entamer une conversation confidentielle à propos de vos besoins personnels en matière d’accessibilité et de mesures d’aménagement pendant le processus de recrutement, nous vous encourageons à communiquer avec notre Service des relations avec les employés, par courriel au cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca ou par téléphone au 416-777-8002 ou sans frais au 1-888-466-4778.

736 --> Unity 3D Developer
Curie
Seattle, WA (Remote)
About Curie

Virtual showrooms save lives and the environment. We believe the Metaverse is a more sustainable way to support e-commerce, and we're looking for smart, driven people to help us populate the Metaverse.

Curie is a Seattle-based startup focused on supplying the growing need for 3D, from retail to online experiences, by creating AI-powered tools at the forefront of technology to generate 3D assets.

Work in a remote-work environment with room for autonomy and self-direction. You are self-motivated, work at the forefront of AI-powered tools, and have a passion for high-quality experiences of the future.

Description

This project is to help define and implement a Unity-based client app to our company’s existing API system to allow our customers to pull our 3D objects (hosted via Cloud Front). This app needs to track usage of the 3D object (number of views) and trigger actions (i.e. report usage to date, stop serving objects if budget targets are exceeded, ensure there is a ‘poster’ image for each 3D object, etc). We will give you more details regarding the specific requirements during the interview.

The developer who succeeds in this project will be able to certify that the links we provide to our customers are easy for them to implement, load our 3D objects quickly and certify that the Unity AR experience will be excellent for the end-users.

Requirements
Proven experience working with Unity 3D Platform
Proficiency in C# for Unity 3D
Experience in consuming APIs in Unity3D for pulling/pushing 3D objects is a plus

740 --> Air - Digital Technologist - Practitioner
BAE Systems
Warton, England, United Kingdom (Hybrid)
Job title: Air - Digital Technologist - Practitioner

Location: Warton or Samlesbury, We also offer a range of hybrid and flexible working arrangements

Salary: £49,135 - £70,385 with potential flexibility to accommodate for niche skills/qualifications

What You’ll Be Doing
You will takes responsibility for the identification and development of digital and information capabilities that will provide advantage to BAE Systems and its customers. This includes being exploitable as an enabler to other critical technologies in development, driving operational excellence of the Air sector / extended enterprise, digitising existing products /services or supporting the launch of new information centric products or services.
You will lead activities in developing digital and information technologies, infrastructure and services. These technologies will evolve into the future digital “Tech Stack” for the Air Sector and include, hybrid cloud computing infrastructure, high performance computing networking and gateways, collaboration technologies, AI / ML, API, data, analytics, automation, digital twin, IoT, user experience and mobile platforms, digital workplace.
You will be develop and maintain elements of the digital technology strategy and roadmap.
You will perform horizon scanning and identify opportunities for value generation from new technologies and approaches, collaborating with academia, research agencies, partners and the digital supply chain.
You will maintains knowledge of specific technical specialisms, provide detailed advice regarding their application and execute specialised tasks. The specialism can be any area of information or communication technology, architecture, technique, method, product or application area.
Essential

Your skills and experiences:
Relevant vocational qualification or equivalent experience (e.g. HNC / Prince 2 Foundations / Numerate or Computer Science Degree)
Experience in IT and a strong interest in leading edge technology
Experience of modern hybrid cloud standards and principles, including, Azure, AWS (amazon web services), Google etc.
Desirable
AI techniques, their potential benefits and drawbacks, AIOps
Software development, integration and test approaches, DevOps, DevSecOps
Benefits

You’ll receive benefits including a competitive pension scheme, enhanced annual leave allowance and a Company contributed Share Incentive Plan. You’ll also have access to additional benefits such as flexible working, an employee assistance programme, Cycle2work and employee discounts – you may also be eligible for an annual incentive.

The Digital Technology Value Stream Team

The successful candidate will work with leading edge cloud technologies from Microsoft, AWS, Google and Open Source to create the Air Sector compute platform of the future. The role holder will identify and research technologies, approaches and perform experiments and demonstrations to prove the concept, technology and value of cloud native computing within the Air Labs environment before readying them for adoption for production and scale. Technology areas will include, but not be limited to cloud compute infrastructure, containerisation, cyber security, AI and ML, big data, IoT, digital twins, systems integration, real-time and stream analytics, XR and the metaverse. The role holder and will work with other parts of the IM&T Function and operation to ensure there is a clear technology strategy and direction created and communicated, with specific alignment into Capability Planning, Architecture, Engineering and Service Management, also with Group CTO and CIO Offices.

Why BAE Systems?

This is a place where you’ll be able to make a real difference. You’ll be part of an inclusive culture that values diversity, rewards integrity, and merit, and where you’ll be empowered to fulfil your potential. We welcome candidates from all backgrounds and particularly from sections of the community who are currently underrepresented within our industry, including women, ethnic minorities, people with disabilities and LGBTQ+ individuals. We also want to make sure that our recruitment processes are as inclusive as possible. If you have a disability or health condition (for example dyslexia, autism, an anxiety disorder etc.) that may affect your performance in certain assessment types, please speak to your recruiter about potential reasonable adjustments.”

Please be aware that many roles working for BAE Systems will be subject to both security and export control restrictions. These restrictions mean that factors including your nationality, any previous nationalities you have held, and your place of birth may limit those roles you can perform for the organisation.

742 --> Network Software (5G Network Integration) - Senior Engineer / Engineer (Reference #: CTO/CT/NSOFT/3027a-b)
ASTRI - Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute
Hong Kong, Hong Kong SAR (On-site)
The Hong Kong Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (ASTRI) was founded by the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region in 2000 with the mission of enhancing Hong Kong’s competitiveness through applied research. ASTRI’s core R&D competence in various areas is grouped under four Technology Divisions: Communications Technologies, Trust and AI Technologies, Integrated Circuits and Systems, and IoT Sensing and AI Technologies.

It is applied across six core areas which are Smart City, Financial Technologies, Intelligent Manufacturing and Re-Industrialization, Digital Health, Application Specific Integrated Circuits, and Metaverse.

Over the years, ASTRI has nurtured a pool of research, I&T talents and received numerous international awards for its pioneering innovations as well as outstanding business and community contributions. To date, ASTRI has transferred over 800 technologies to the industries and been granted more than 900 patents in the Mainland, the US, and other countries.

To support our constant endeavour to position Hong Kong as a world-class smart city and an international hub of innovation and technology, we are seeking qualified professionals to fill the following position(s):

Reference #: CTO/CT/NSOFT/3027a-b
Openings: 2

Job Responsibilities
Support R&D in 5G core network, edge computing system and 5G applications integration
Build and execute end-to-end system integration, inter-operability testing, verifications, performance testing and tuning on 5G system (5G features, such as Mobile Edge Computing (MEC), Network Slicing, Cloud Native 5GC, IMS, …)
Develop hands on experience and know-hows in cloud based technologies (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes, ELK, Kafka)
Communicate and support customers for commercialization

Requirements
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electronic Engineering, Information Engineering and Mathematics or relevant discipline.
Basic knowledge of computer networks and protocols is preferred
Experience in programming languages, like C++/C/Go/Python, is preferred
Knowledge of Linux, Docker, Kubernetes would be a plus
Knowledge/experience in HTTP/REST, Python, would be a plus
Good command of both written/spoken English and/or Chinese
Overseas candidates are welcomed to apply. For the right candidate, the company can sponsor an Employment Visa in Hong Kong
Lives ASTRI values

Application
The appointment will be on renewable contract terms with a competitive salary and performance-linked variable pay. Fringe benefits include paid leave, medical and dental benefits, insurance coverage and contribution to MPF. The incumbent will normally work a five-day week.

For Application, please email careers@astri.org quoting the Ref. No. CTO/CT/NSOFT/3027a-b with an updated detailed resume. You are suggested NOT to include sensitive personal information such as HKID or passport number, photo, etc.

Position offer is subject to the applicant’s experience and academic qualification. The application will be open until the position is filled. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. ASTRI reserves the right not to fill the position.

ASTRI is an Equal Opportunities Employer. Personal data provided by job applicants will be used exclusively for recruitment only. For details, please refer to ASTRI Privacy Policy Statement., (https://www.astri.org/privacy/) in particular section 9.
