744 --> Associate Content Programming Specialist
Zwift
Long Beach, CA (On-site)
About The Role And About You

The Content Programming team is a core part of the Zwift Product team focused around creating enticing and engaging things to do in our sports utopia. Content Programming creates on-demand and scheduled rides and runs in the eleven worlds within Zwift. We have constant cross-functional connections between Product, Game, Marketing, Data Analytics, Strategy, Connected Hardware, and Community Support. We establish and prioritize content programs originating from Zwift, Brand Partners, and the Community to create the variety of content and activities available for Zwifters on an hourly basis.

You are a self-starter, and love opportunities to partner and work with others to create meaningful and fun experiences. You are driven by high quality execution and creative and varied problem solving in a space that is full of opportunity and new possibilities.

As the Content Programming Community Specialist you will play a key role in working closely with our passionate Zwifters, who create and participate in thousands of weekly events and build their own community within the fitness “metaverse” of Zwift. In this role you will work with a variety of community members, Zwift clubs and content creators to help them bring their vision to life. Their creativity paired with your support and positive feedback loop will foster amazing events and group creation with the goal of helping every Zwifter to have an event they will love and a community they feel a part of. In your toolchest is a passionate community of Zwifters, a massive amount of experience data, a team of talented Community Specialists, and the Zwift public calendar with 168 hours each week for you to schedule and curate an amazing mix of public and private events.

What You’ll Do

Reporting into the Senior Manager of Community Engagement, you will:

Act as a critical Event team member to modify, update, configure and publish events via our web-based event portal
Manage new event requests from existing groups and also new event requests directed to events@zwift.com and clubs@zwift.com emails via dedicated CRM toolkit
Proof-read & polish event descriptions/titles to fit overall Content Programming goals for look-&-feel of events feed in the Zwift Companion App
Manage our communications with our various community groups and execute their requests while providing feedback and 2-way communication that increase the value of the events and our Zwift to user relationships
Be a vocal teammate on our Content Programming team, voicing your learnings and discoveries so we can unite together to plan our weekly and yearly schedule to ensure we have the right content at the right times
With your community interactions, become an expert on our users, being obsessed with their journeys, their motivations and what they love about Zwift
Fill a supporting role in helping underserved communities by partnering with them to help grow on the Zwift platform.
Learn and observe the operations of our community communication channels, and provide feedback around optimizing and building flows to allow the best experience for our users.

What We’re Looking For

1 - 3 years of experience creating and managing market centric communications including community support, customer service experience, marketing, or public relations
An analytical mind that can segment data and make logical conclusions
A customer-centric producer who is a self-starter and knows how to get things done with a team
Exceptional attention to detail with few data entry errors
Excellent interpersonal, writing, and verbal communication skills
Proactive thinker that likes to make life easy for and takes pride in helping others
Collaborative team player that takes initiative to resolve support needs
A sincere and empathetic communicator
Skilled multitasker with multiple forms of input
Ability to adapt and innovate quickly
Willingness to work additional hours and weekends when needed (infrequently)
A passion for learning and a solid grasp of technology (PC, Mac, iOS, and Android software and hardware)
A passion for sport

Bonus Points

Being a Zwifter!
Able to work a flexible schedule (evenings and/or weekends)
Experience with CRM software (Zendesk, Kustomer, etc)
Experience with Project Management Software (Confluence, JIRA, SmartSheets)
Experience with data analytics platforms (Tableau, Amplitude, Periscope)
Online gaming experience (MMOs)
Cycling, running, and/or indoor training knowledge

(Colorado only) Minimum salary of $56,000 + bonus + equity + benefits.

(New York only) Minimum salary of $60,200 + bonus + equity + benefits.

How To Stand Out Among The Rest

Your resume/CV is enough to show off your skills, accomplishments, and experience. However, if you choose to include a cover letter introducing us to your awesome personality, we will read that too.

We strongly believe that different backgrounds and ideas are a competitive advantage; we hire candidates of any race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital or family status, disability, Veteran status, and any other status. Zwift is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by emailing careers@zwift.com.

Zwift, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Transparency In Coverage

Health plan price transparency is designed to help consumers know the cost of covered items or healthcare-related services prior to the date upon which they receive care. Transparency in Coverage (TIC) regulations require health insurers and group health plans to create machine readable files (MRFs) that contain the negotiated rates for in-network providers and allowed amounts derived from historical claims for out-of-network providers and make those files publicly available.

Here is the link to the site on which Kaiser Permanente posts its in-network and out-of-network allowed amount machine-readable files (MRFs).

Here is the link to the site on which Anthem posts its in-network and out-of-network allowed amount machine-readable files (MRFs). The link will allow you to search for your files using your Employer Identification Number (81-2798595)

Accenture DACH
Dresden, Saxony, Germany
Das Accenture Extended Reality (XR) Team sucht Verstärkung im Sales Bereich – das XR Team betreut alle Themen rund um Metaverse, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality und Mixed Reality. Auch ohne rosarotes VR-Headset hast du eine klare, multi-dimensionale Vorstellung davon, wie du als Teil des XR Sales Teams von Accenture, einem der weltweit führenden Technologie- und Beratungsunternehmen, mit Extended-Reality-Lösungen (XR-Lösungen) neuen Geschäftswert schaffst. Du identifizierst neue Kunden und Möglichkeiten und vermittelst mit Leidenschaft Ansätze und Wege, wie innovative XR-Erlebnisse im Unternehmensmaßstab erdacht, entwickelt und erfolgreich umgesetzt werden können. Du weckst das Interesse von Kunden an den Themen XR und Metaverse für die du brennst. Zukunftsweisender lassen sich Mitarbeiterleistung und Customer Journey nicht optimieren.

Das erwartet dich:

In deiner Rolle bist du der erste Kontaktpunkt für interne und externe Kunden und zeigst Ihnen welche Möglichkeiten es im Metaverse bereits gibt.

Deine Leidenschaft und Begeisterung für XR Themen und das Metaverse bleibt deinen Gesprächspantern / Kunden positiv im Gedächtnis.

Du bereitest Sales Pitches zusammen mit dem Sales-Team vor und setzt dich vorher intensiv mit dem Kunden auseinander, um den Pitch bzw. das Meeting optimal auf den Kunden zuzuschneiden.

Mit deiner Technologiekompetenz berätst du unsere Kunden in allen Industrien darin, wo und wie immersive Technologien, Mixed Reality, Augmented Reality und Virtual Reality, für sie den größten Mehrwert schaffen könnten.

Du formulierst und kalkulierst in Absprache mit Entwicklerinnen und Entwickler zusammen Angebote und verhandelst mit dem Kunden.

Dein Netzwerk, innerhalb und außerhalb von Accenture, verhilft dir neue Kontakte zu erkennen und neue potenzielle Kunden zu identifizieren.

746 --> Directeur(trice) principal(e), numérique et innovation - responsable du métaverse
KPMG Canada
Toronto, ON (On-site)
Aperçu

Chez KPMG, vous ferez partie d’une équipe diversifiée et dévouée de professionnels de la résolution de problèmes ayant un objectif commun traduire l’information en occasions pour nos clients et nos communautés partout dans le monde.

Sommaire du poste

Chez KPMG, nous croyons que la réalité étendue est une nouvelle frontière qui exploite des technologies convergentes pour façonner l’univers virtuel du futur – un monde en 3D immersif et interconnecté dans lequel la réalité virtuelle, la réalité augmentée, l’intelligence artificielle, la chaîne de blocs et les cryptomonnaies redéfiniront notre façon de vivre, de travailler et de socialiser. Il s’agit d’une occasion exceptionnelle de rejoindre l’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG au Canada, qui connaît une croissance rapide, afin d’aider nos clients à franchir cette nouvelle frontière numérique qu’on appelle le métavers. Nous sommes à la recherche de pionniers passionnés pour aider nos clients à générer une valeur durable dans ce réseau émergent de réalité virtuelle qui transformera le commerce, l’expérience client et les communautés.

L’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG est composée de concepteurs innovateurs qui exploitent ensemble les technologies de pointe pour créer de nouvelles façons de travailler et d’interagir dans le monde numérique multisectoriel.

Ce que vous ferez

Relevant directement de l’associé directeur et président, Numérique et innovation, le titulaire travaille en étroite collaboration avec le leader, Cryptoactifs et chaîne de blocs, le leader, Expérience client, et d’autres équipes interfonctionnelles utilisant différentes plateformes virtuelles afin d’aider nos clients à mener à bien leurs projets dans le métavers. Il s’agit notamment d’informer les clients, de préparer des propositions, de créer des contenus stimulants sur le métavers, et de partager des expériences réussies sur diverses plateformes. Il met à profit son expérience et ses compétences en communication narrative pour simplifier, à l’intention des hauts dirigeants, certains aspects plus complexes du métavers et du Web3 et proposer des stratégies qui favoriseront le succès des initiatives actuelles et futures de l’organisation.

Les candidats retenus nourrissent une véritable passion pour le métavers, les jetons non fongibles (NFT), la finance décentralisée et le Web3, combinée à une connaissance approfondie des pratiques institutionnelles du secteur.

Bien que vos activités varieront chaque jour, voici les principales tâches dont vous devrez vous acquitter dans le cadre de vos fonctions
Définir et diriger la stratégie de mise sur le marché en collaboration avec le groupe de travail Métavers.
Diriger l’élaboration de propositions à fort impact et visuellement attrayantes, qui présentent des idées qui incitent à la réflexion, suscitent l’intérêt des clients et offrent une valeur ajoutée.
Conseiller les clients sur les stratégies de mise en œuvre du métavers, y compris l’établissement et la hiérarchisation des cas d’utilisation pertinents, et la conception de l’expérience.
Organiser des ateliers de formation stimulants et des démonstrations des plateformes virtuelles utilisées dans divers secteurs d’activité.
Établir et entretenir des collaborations stratégiques avec des organisations externes afin de dégager des occasions concrètes dans ce domaine.
Concevoir des événements numériques et des activités commerciales dans le métavers pour nos équipes, nos clients et nos collectivités; planifier, concevoir, animer et superviser la prestation de telles expériences.
Faire des recherches et développer du contenu qui informe et démontre notre clairvoyance et notre leadership éclairé, tant à l’interne qu’à l’externe.

Ce que vous apportez au rôle
Passion pour le métavers, les expériences de réalité augmentée/réalité virtuelle (RA/RV) et l’infrastructure technologique sous-jacente.
Présence active sur plusieurs plateformes virtuelles (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.).
Connaissance de base des processus, des outils et des éléments constitutifs de la réalité étendue (RA/RV), du métavers, des NFT, du système d’économie de jetons et des portefeuilles de cryptomonnaies.
Bonne compréhension des tendances émergentes et des cas d’utilisation dans l’espace du Web3 et du métavers.
Au moins cinq ans d’expérience dans le développement commercial des technologies.
Expérience dans la création, le lancement, le maintien et la croissance de communautés en ligne et d’initiatives visant à stimuler la mobilisation de la communauté.
Solides compétences en matière de communication et de collaboration, et capacité à s’exprimer à la fois à un niveau technique et à un niveau stratégique.
Capacité à diriger simultanément plusieurs flux de travail et plusieurs missions.
Expérience dans l’animation, la communication narrative et les présentations aux clients.
Les clés de votre succès

Les membres du personnel de KPMG agissent efficacement | favorisent la croissance | inspirent confiance et comprennent que la diversité de la main‐d’œuvre nous permet d’approfondir nos relations et d’enrichir le cabinet.

Nous sommes là pour vous soutenir afin que vous puissiez donner le meilleur de vous-même.

Nos valeurs, la façon KPMG

KPMG au Canada souscrit fièrement au principe de l’égalité d’accès à l’emploi et s’engage à offrir un environnement de travail respectueux, inclusif et sans obstacle, permettant ainsi à tous les membres de son personnel de se réaliser pleinement. Un effectif diversifié est la clé de notre réussite et nous croyons à notre mission qui vise à ce que vous soyez complètement vous-même au travail. 크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

NFT Metaverse Dept 소속의 Art Team은 크래프톤에서 글로벌 시장 타겟으로 새롭게 준비 중인 NFT 메타버스 프로젝트의 아트를 담당하는 부서입니다.

Art Team은 하이퀄리티 비주얼 제작 능력과 각종 글로벌 프로젝트 라이브 서비스 경험으로 다양한 플랫폼의 최적화 기술력과 효율적인 그래픽 구현 능력을 갖춘 아티스트로 구성되어있습니다.

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
UE5 에디터에서 배경 레벨 제작
3DsMAX, Substance Painter/Designer, Zbrush 이용한 에셋제작
최적화 및 리소스 셋팅 작업

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
UE4 or UE5를 이용한 배경 작업 유경험자
PBR에 대한 높은 이해도와 제작 능력을 보유하신 분
사용 가능 프로그램: UE4 editor, 3DsMAX, Photoshop, Substance Painter, Zbrush
협업을 중요시 하며 구성원간 원활한 소통이 가능하신 분

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
다양한 툴을 활용하여 효율적인 업무 적용이 가능하신 분
최적화된 리소스 제작의 경험이 있으신 분
캐주얼 스타일 3D 프로젝트 참여 경험자

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(필수)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

755 --> XR Senior Architect - Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Berlin, Berlin, Germany
Overview Of Technology Innovation

Our software engineers and technical architects get to build cool software systems. We’re combining technology, industry expertise, and entrepreneurial experience to massively disrupt our clients’ core businesses, in order to propel them into the future and create better products and experiences for everyone.

You will be part of a team that is leading innovation in the VR/AR enterprise space by utilizing what is great about the game industry, while shedding some of its negative aspects. We do not crunch, our salaries are more competitive, our projects generally have shorter development cycles, and we do not layoff teams after projects are completed.

Everyone on the team is self-motivated, has a positive attitude, and great interpersonal skills. Our projects are driven by innovation, not by necessity. If you are interested in a career where your hard work is always noticed and appreciated among a team of true professionals, then this is the place for you.


Job Description


Create World Class XR Experiences

Work on interesting, challenging projects that have high visibility and impact

Design and architect complex XR systems composed of XR frameworks, external systems and cloud services

Support business development activities including solutioning, team composition, timeline and cost estimates

Lead team of XR engineers and provide overall technical guidance

Evaluate XR technologies and guide the team of strengths and weaknesses of different platforms

Communicate and collaborate with other departments on technology solutions

Perfectly balance pragmatism and idealism when solving technical challenges and meeting deadlines

Advise and mentor other AR/VR developers

Help define best practices for coding and software design

Help plan and deliver technical training content for the department

Continuously suggest improvements for the development organization

Attend, participate in, and host the various technical training activities held in the department

Implement world-class XR Software

Define, design, build, deliver and run the engagements, platform’s and/or product’s required architecture (i.e., development, operations, execution, data, application, etc.)

Provide the work’s technical conscience, defining and driving the right solution to meet the technical performance, scalability, flexibility, operations and capability needs

Follow and help implement technology standards and use new emerging technologies

Provide architecture Quality Assurance reviews for proposals and ongoing engagements

Lead/support technology solutioning and estimating in proposals, planning and pricing

Basic Qualifications:

Minimum 10 years' professional software development experience

Minimum 4 years' AR/VR development experience

Requirements

Ability to take a development project and start it from scratch

Expert in time management, multitasking, and task prioritization

Strong positive attitude (during the good and during the bad)

Has solid understanding advanced XR elements like 3D modelling, content pipelines, shaders, animation and real time rendering.

Unity 5.0+ or Unreal Engine 4.0

Current VR hardware

VR UI and UX best practices

Agile methodologies

Code management using Git

Preferred Skills

Able to thrive in a nimble work environment

Project management tools, such as JIRA

Current VR hardware

Accenture is an EEO and Affirmative Action Employer of Females/Minorities/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.

Equal Employment Opportunity

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law. Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process. Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women. Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

756 --> Studentische Hilfskraft (w/m/d)
RWTH Aachen University
Aachen, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany (On-site)
Ihr Profil

Du Bist
Student der Ingenieurwissenschaften, Informatik oder verwandter Studiengänge und interessiert an immersiven Technologien (AR VR MR XR Metaverse), 3D-Druck und additiver Fertigung
Interessiert an Kontakten mit Industriepartnern, um mehr über die zahlreichen Herausforderungen bei der Implementierung von AM in der realen Welt zu erfahren
Hochmotiviert und interessiert an interdisziplinärer Teamarbeit in einem inspirierenden, Start-Up gleichen Umfeld
Dann bist du bei uns richtig. Erfahrung in AR-VR-XR Entwicklung (z. B. mit Unity, Vuforia, UnityXR oder VRTK), Modellierung (z. B. CAD, Blender) und Interesse an 3D-Druck ist nützlich, aber nicht vorausgesetzt.

Ihre Aufgaben

Angesichts Dieser Herausforderung Sind Deine Aufgaben

Kenntnisse über Additive Manufacturing (AM) ist eine der Haupteinstiegshürden für die industrielle Verbreitung von AM. Aus diesem Grund investieren zahlreiche Unternehmen Zeit und Ressourcen in die Ausbildung ihrer Belegschaft. Die schnelle Evolution der AM-Technologien und die Komplexität des Anwendungsfeldes machen dies zu einer Herausforderung. Moderne Lernwerkzeuge können die Lernkurve von Mitarbeitern verbessern, um mit der hohen AM-Entwicklungsgeschwindigkeit mitzuhalten. Basierend auf Ergebnissen aus einem Workshop mit Industriepartnern konnten verschiedene Anwendungsfälle für Bildung mittels AR, VR, MR, XR identifiziert werden.
Unterstützung bei der Weiterentwicklung von AR & VR Applikationen für AM Bildungszwecke und grundlegende 3D-Modellierung
Bewertung von AR & VR Autorenwerkzeugen hinsichtlich Benutzbarkeit und Funktionsumfang
Mitwirkung bei der Selektion von Softwareentwicklungskits (SDKs) für AR & VR
Bewertung von Ergebnissen aus Pilotanwendungen und Ableiten weiterer Implementierungsschritte in der Industrie
Die Arbeit kann in Deutsch oder Englisch erfolgen.

Unser Angebot

Die Einstellung erfolgt als Studentische Hilfskraft.

Die Stelle ist zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt zu besetzen und befristet auf 6 Monate.

Eine Verlängerung ist vorgesehen und erwünscht.

Es handelt sich um eine Teilzeitstelle.

Die regelmäßige Wochenarbeitszeit beträgt 12 Stunden.

Die Eingruppierung richtet sich nach der Richtlinie für studentische und wissenschaftliche Hilfskräfte.

Die Stelle ist bewertet mit 12,00 € pro Stunde.

Über uns

Die RWTH ist als familiengerechte Hochschule zertifiziert.

Die RWTH bietet im Rahmen eines Universitären Gesundheitsmanagements eine Vielzahl von Gesundheits-, Beratungs- und Präventionsangeboten (z. B. Hochschulsport) an. Für Tarifbeschäftigte und Beamtinnen und Beamte besteht ein umfangreiches Weiterbildungsangebot und die Möglichkeit, ein Jobticket zu erwerben.

Die Stellenausschreibung richtet sich an alle Geschlechter.

Wir wollen an der RWTH Aachen University besonders die Karrieren von Frauen fördern und freuen uns daher über Bewerberinnen.

Frauen werden bei gleicher Eignung, Befähigung und fachlicher Leistung bevorzugt berücksichtigt, sofern sie in der Organisationseinheit unterrepräsentiert sind und sofern nicht in der Person eines Mitbewerbers liegende Gründe überwiegen.

Bewerbungen geeigneter schwerbehinderter Menschen sind ausdrücklich erwünscht.

Im Sinne der Gleichbehandlung bitten wir Sie, auf ein Bewerbungsfoto zu verzichten.

Informationen zur Erhebung personenbezogener Daten nach Artikeln 13 und 14 Datenschutz-Grundverordnung (DS-GVO) finden Sie unter

757 --> Software Engineer (Senior to Principal) - Static Analysis
CertiK
Seattle, WA (Remote)
Why us?
CertiK is the leader in blockchain security. Our mission is securing the web3 world.
Blockchain technology and smart contracts are the future of finance, underpinning web3 and the metaverse. Vulnerabilities and bugs in this software regularly put millions of dollars at stake. Our goal is to automatically find these vulnerabilities and bugs before the software is deployed on the blockchain using advanced static analysis. We are looking for experienced software engineers who are passionate about software quality and security and want to advance the state-of-the-art of smart contract static analysis. Join us on our mission of making the new digital world a safer place!
What You Will Do
As part of our multinational team of programming language, static analysis and formal methods experts, you will design and implement tools that automatically find vulnerabilities and other issues in smart contracts and blockchain source code, using various static analysis techniques such as abstract interpretation, dataflow analysis, function modeling, and inter-procedural/global analyses.
You will have the opportunity to work on all stages of tool development from idea generation to implementation and iterative improvements. We have positions available at all levels of seniority. Title and responsibilities will be commensurate with experience and background. Our team is highly supportive and collaborative with great opportunities to learn and grow.
About You
You have a background in programming languages and programming tools and want to work on the forefront of applying results from research. You like to tackle challenging problems and have a track record of achieving results, where results are people using your tool to do their jobs. You are collaborative: you share ideas, love to brainstorm with peers, and give and receive feedback. You are comfortable with the unknown and understand that #startuplife means that you may wear multiple hats.
Responsibilities
Research, develop, and extend vulnerability detectors, working closely with blockchain experts.
Design, prototype, and implement new abstract interpretation models and decision procedures.
Understand the semantics of various programming languages and translate them to intermediate representations.
Research new static analysis techniques and apply theories to practice.
Write tests covering all possible execution paths of your code
Required Qualifications
Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field, or an equivalent experience.
Minimum of 4 years of software development experience (including internship and academic/professional research).
Clear understanding of programming language semantics and related concepts such as AST and CFG.
Preferred Qualifications
PhD in static analysis or the broader field of automated reasoning.
Experience with static analysis techniques or formal methods such as abstract interpretation, dataflow analysis, model checking, theorem provers, decision procedures and SAT/SMT solvers.
Strong and creative problem-solving skills; always willing to learn and embrace new technologies and to collaborate.
Prior experience in a professional software development environment.
About The Company
Founded in 2018 by professors of Yale University and Columbia University, CertiK is a pioneer in blockchain security, utilizing best-in-class technology to secure and monitor blockchain protocols and smart contracts. CertiK’s mission is to secure the cyber world. Starting with blockchain, CertiK applies cutting-edge innovations from academia into enterprise, enabling mission-critical applications to be built with security and correctness.
Compensation, Benefits, And Perks
We offer a highly competitive salary and bonus. We have a comprehensive employee benefits package. Benefits include company-sponsored medical, dental, and vision insurance, FSA, short-term disability insurance, long-term disability insurance, and life/AD&D insurance. We provide flexible paid-time off. We provide a 401(k) with a 4% company match starting from your first day.
Compensation is negotiable, depending on level of experience - $115,000 - $230,000 base salary.
CertiK is proud to offer medical, vision, and dental insurance, 401(k) plan with company matching, life and accidental death and dismemberment insurance, HSA (with high deductible plan), FSA, and other benefits to all full-time employees, along with flexible paid time off and holidays.
In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.
CertiK is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We will not discriminate against any applicant or employee on the basis of age, race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, medical condition, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status or civil partnership/union status, physical or mental disability, pregnancy, childbirth, genetic information, military and veteran status, or any other basis prohibited by applicable federal, state or local law.
CertiK will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with local and federal requirements.
https://www.eeoc.gov/sites/default/files/migrated_files/employers/poster_screen_reader_optimized.pdf
All CertiK employees are expected to actively support diversity on their teams, and in the Company.

758 --> Portfolio Manager - Digital Workplace Automation & Lifecycle Solutions
Lenovo
Eindhoven, North Brabant, Netherlands
Description And Requirements

The Lenovo Services and Solutions Group is experiencing tremendous growth and is hiring for Worldwide Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions Portfolio Manager.

You will be responsible for defining and delivering the full Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions & Managed Services portfolio required including short-term and long-term visions

You will work with strategy, product managers, sales, customers, analysts, hardware teams, delivery, and other stakeholders to understand the Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions market and will define the needed portfolio of Managed Services required to succeed as the best in class in the digital workspace automation and productivity market.

You should have a strong background in Digital Workplace Automation & Life Cycle Solutions and prior portfolio and/or product management experience. You will also need to have a background in Managed Services and a strong understanding of how to succeed in selling both direct and through the channel. Success will require the ability to influence and maintain open communication with all areas of the company at multiple levels. You should be able to manage complexity, think creatively, deal with ambiguity, and thrive in a fast-paced environment.

Your Key Responsibilities will be:

Utilize market intelligence, competitive analytics, sales feedback and customer feedback to formulate both a short-term and long-term Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Solutions portfolio strategy that will drive Lenovo to be the industry leader in Digital Workplace Managed Services
Assess future technology for usage in Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle services portfolio to differentiate Lenovo Managed Services and drive it to the forefront of the industry
Rationalize the current Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle portfolio, identify gaps/overlaps and make recommendations on the future of all existing products
Prioritize offering development and create roadmaps for driving to a complete portfolio vision – may include bundling existing products into solutions as part of the portfolio
Create clear portfolio vision that can be utilized by marketing to create sales and customer-facing documentation
Function as the input for strategic and offering ideas coming from the geography sales teams to drive a centralized offering development process with services offering development team.
Drive alignment with Segments, other Offer Towers and sales on Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Service portfolio vision and strategy
Ensure Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Services portfolio is cohesive with the corporate strategy and other offerings being created outside of the portfolio
Be the internal & external lead SME for Digital Workplace Automation and Life Cycle Managed Services Portfolio

Position Requirements:

We're looking to add talented individuals who are self-motivated and desire boundless opportunities, to join us. Come share in the discoveries that are forged from our shared achievements at Lenovo as we drive the next generation in technology.

Minimum Requirements:

5+ years of Managed Services product experience – sales/marketing and channel experience a plus
3+ years of portfolio management, product development or similar experience
Strong knowledge of Managed Services business & market landscape
Strong executive presence & leadership skills
High level of communication & presentation skills
Strong business & financial acumen
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
A collaborative approach to meeting business objectives and ability to influence at all levels of matrixed organizations
Experience working with global teams and conducting business internationally

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

Amsterdam - North Holland - Netherlands, * BASINGSTOKE - Hampshire - United Kingdom, * EINDHOVEN - North Brabant - Netherlands, * Essen - North Rhine-Westphalia - Germany, * Frankfurt am Main - Hesse - Germany, * Greenock - Renfrewshire - United Kingdom, * Holte - Zealand - Denmark, * IDSTEIN - Hesse - Germany, * Madrid - Madrid - Spain, * Renfrew - Renfrewshire - United Kingdom, * Rueil-Malmaison - Hauts-de-Seine - France, * Soeborg - Zealand - Denmark, * ZAVENTEM - Flemish Brabant - Belgium

759 --> Software Engineer
Motorola Mobility (a Lenovo Company)
Chicago, IL
Description And Requirements

Motorola Mobility, A Lenovo Company, is one of the world’s fastest growing smartphone providers, creating groundbreaking, affordable, high-quality products designed and built with the global customer in mind. We’re a US$60 billion revenue Fortune Global 500 company serving customers in 180 markets around the world. And it’s our people who make this all happen. We are thinkers, risk-takers and problem solvers, working together to constantly challenge the status quo. If you share our commitment to ingenuity, creativity and innovation we want you to help us define our world of tomorrow. Motorola is at the forefront of designing and developing products supporting 5G technology. Explore the opportunities and apply today.

Motorola 312 Labs, a newly chartered internal innovation group within the Motorola product organization, comprising global research, design and engineering experts focused on first-of-its-kind product development. This group will explore the unknown through research, ideation, concepting, and prototyping to usher in radically different mobile solutions and technologies in both the near and distant future. Motorola has brought innovation to market such as shatterproof screens, moto mods and the foldable Razr. Motorola 312 Labs will continue to accelerate new technologies to market and assist the wider Lenovo Group. Looking ahead, 312 Labs is focused on a few key research areas including the connected ecosystem of the future, metaverse evolution, exploring new and unique mobile form factors and wearables, advancing displays, and AR/VR technologies

This role is responsible for implementing mobile display components, including panel bring up, color tuning, performance and power optimizations, integration with Android framework.

Candidates must have BS in computer science or electrical engineering,
2 years of relevant industry experience.
Strong skills with C programming, familiarity with Linux kernel and embedded systems are required.

Preferred Qualifications:

Ideal candidates will have experience with mobile chipsets and relevant display technologies, such as MIPI DSI and DisplayPort.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any federal, state, or local protected class.

To be fully vaccinated means individuals must receive the full series of a vaccine either approved by the FDA or WHO and listed by the CDC (e.g. two dose of the Moderna, AstraZeneca or Pfizer-BioNTech vaccines; or one dose of the Johnson & Johnson vaccine). This applies to all US-based employees, contractors and interns, regardless of work location. It is to be a community builder that can raise the level of every market to the highest standards. It is an innovator’s role that looks at new technologies, platforms and experience to push the capabilities of what is possible. While technical strength is important, imagination and innovation are critical to help our clients deliver delightful experiences.

Build the Growth Markets Adobe Content and Commerce Practice that includes:

Content Management build operate and run for multiple environments and experiences.

Commerce platform that integrates with multiple technologies and is part of a total omnichannel go to market.

Content operations including brands as publishers and synthetic photography.

We believe that equality drives innovation. Our commitment to accelerating equality starts at the top with our board and CEO and extends across every part of the company. 762 --> Game Tech Team Lead
Mytaverse 
Budapest, Budapest, Hungary
Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Game Tech Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our work with Unreal, cloud streaming, and other cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities

Leads the development of the Game Tech team, responsible for Unreal development, and cloud streaming and spatial audio integrations.

Develops new features, enhances existing features, and implements bug fixes in existing code.

Optimizes game engine deployment in terms of memory, frame rate and performance.

Guides team members to create work that adheres to the design of game systems while maintaining good style and optimization standards.

Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards are consistently met across the team.

Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.

Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.

Develops and maintains strategic operational systems, tools, and processes for production-readiness.

Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.

Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.

Develops software to integrate with distributed web applications.

Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Game Tech team.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

At least five years of relevant experience as a Game Developer or similar software engineering role.

At least two years of experience developing optimized modules in C++ within Unreal.

Strong knowledge of C++.

Proficient with git and git workflows.

Experience building libraries and APIs.

Up-to-date with the latest gaming trends, techniques, best practices and technologies.

Interest in learning new tools and technologies.

Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.

Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.

Problem-solving attitude.

Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits

Experience with full-cycle game design and development.

Expert in one or more areas of specialization (artificial intelligence, 3D rendering, 3D animation, physics, multiplayer/networking, streaming technologies, or spatial audio).

Exposure to cloud-native applications (AWS GameLift, preferred).

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

763 --> Client Engineer – Rendering
Sansar
United States (Remote)
About the job:
You’ll be part of the elite and legendary Sansar Client team; continuing the legacy of Earth’s first metaverse; Second Life.

You will work on code written by legends in the industry that have moved on to Meta, Magic Leap, Roblox and more. You will design, develop, debug and maintain our existing proprietary C++ render engine, work with your tech lead to scope out new engine features and issues, break down those issues into tasks, and provide time estimates for your project manager.

You’ll work with media structures such as media surfaces (videos playing on textures), audio files, FBX and similar formats, you’ll help write tools for your fellow engineers and content creators to help with their day-to-day activities.

You’ll use a Windows environment and Visual Studio/Visual Studio Code, communicate on slack and complete tasks in GitHub.

Qualifications:
Must have
8 years of experience in software engineering
3 years of experience specifically in online games using Visual Studio and C++
Experience with basic 3D rendering techniques including lighting, BSPs, texture mapping, shading, shaders, LOD and culling
Experience in various optimization techniques for finite resources in CPU, memory, draw call, core and thread-blocking
Nice to have
Experience with FBX format
Experience with glTF
Experience with other platforms like Mobile, Quest, Playstation, XBOX
Experience with minimal rendering platforms like TV and web
Experience with mesh selection in 2D & 3D
Trainable
Experience with three.js, Babylon.js
Simulation algorithms such as mechanics, physics, material, lighting, path finding, liquids, gasses, weather systems, soft and rigid bodies, etc.
Agile methodology and providing accurate time and task estimates.

Des avantages financiers comme la Participation/Intéressement et l'épargne salariale
Une protection sociale (mutuelle) très intéressante
Travailler dans un environnement international avec des opportunités de carrière dans le monde
Des déplacements possibles régulièrement au sein du Groupe (conférences, évènements, réunions de travail...)

Le poste que nous te proposons

Rattaché(e) à la fonction GSI de la Direction d’Allianz Informatique France, tu seras rattaché à l'équipe "Tech Management DEV Open" et aura l'opportunité de rejoindre la communauté des développeurs : "Craft Community".

Tu opéreras directement au sein de la squad OneMArketing et socle AN. La squad OneMarketing et socle AN a en charge les projets et le run du site Allianz.fr et des espaces clients des particuliers, avec 1.2 Million de clients web ou mobile et 3 Millions d'actes en ligne par mois.

Au sein du Domaine Data Client et Communication, la squad est composée d'une quinzaine de personnes : designers, développeurs, testeurs et intégrateur, travaillant avec les Product Owner de plusieurs entités et travaillant en mode agile Scrum. Elle conduit ou contribue à différents projets stratégiques tels que la mise en place d'une messagerie sécurisée pour nos clients, la migration vers les systèmes cibles du groupe, et l'évolution vers l'infrastructure cloud.

Missions

En tant que Tech Lead, tu auras en charge la conception logicielle de nos solutions afin qu'elles répondent aux enjeux de fiabilité, sécurité, maintenabilité, performance et de sobriété numérique
Dans ce contexte, tes collègues reconnaitront en toi ta capacité à prendre les meilleures décisions garantissant le développement de solutions à forte valeur
Tu sauras t'appuyer sur l'expertise de tes collègues et réciproquement tu sauras aussi les faire grandir
Dans un contexte plus large tu seras amené, avec tes pairs, à déployer les meilleures pratiques en t'appuyant sur les communautés en place (Craftmanship, DevSecOps, Agile...)
Ta veille active te donnera l'opportunité de partager, au sein des communautés, tes connaissances autour de l'émergence de nouvelles technologies, pratiques...etc
La dimension internationale du Groupe Allianz te permettra d'intégrer des équipes projets multiculturelles et de participer à des évènements d'ampleur à l'étranger (Conférences Tech...etc)
Tu contribueras à faire rayonner la marque Allianz Technology au cours d'évènements externes (Devoxx, Apidays, AgileEnSeine...)
En rejoignant Allianz Technology, tu découvriras une société qui, forte de ses 17000 collaborateurs, ambitionne de devenir un acteur majeur de l'IT

776 --> Game Tech Team Lead
Mytaverse 
Charlotte, NC
Role Description

Mytaverse is a platform radically changing how we do business, enabling people to meet in immersive, true-to-life 3D worlds. Practically anything needed in real-life can be realized in Mytaverse thanks to its best-in-class technology and photo-realistic renderings. The platform has been built to meet the demand enterprises have for innovative, engaging experiences.

Our mission is to create realistic environments that empower more engaging and real-to-life interactions, free from physical limitations thanks to the inherent anytime-anywhere feature of the metaverse.

People and businesses are in need of a solution to bridge the divide between physical and digital reality. Companies and their customers are struggling to align the experiences of in-person, hybrid, and remote interactions. Mytaverse enables its customers to deploy digital twins of their products in their own branded and photo-realistic 3D settings such as in showrooms or innovation labs. Our technology is also being used for meetings, conferences, exhibitions and for the training of employees through job simulations. Really, we are only limited by one’s imagination.

We are looking for a Game Tech Team Lead to contribute to the growth of our company. This is an opportunity to lead our work with Unreal, cloud streaming, and other cutting-edge gaming technology.

Core Responsibilities

Leads the development of the Game Tech team, responsible for Unreal development, and cloud streaming and spatial audio integrations.

Develops new features, enhances existing features, and implements bug fixes in existing code.

Optimizes game engine deployment in terms of memory, frame rate and performance.

Guides team members to create work that adheres to the design of game systems while maintaining good style and optimization standards.

Performs code reviews to ensure high-quality standards are consistently met across the team.

Self-documents development processes, conducts peer reviews, and provides actionable feedback.

Architects and provide guidance on building end-to-end systems optimized for speed and scale.

Develops and maintains strategic operational systems, tools, and processes for production-readiness.

Involved in project management decisions and collaborates with project managers, other team leads, and the CTO to plan out projects.

Supports interdepartmental teams to complete assigned projects on time, to specifications, and with efficiency.

Develops software to integrate with distributed web applications.

Performs root cause analysis for production errors, and investigates and resolves technical issues.

Delegates work and assignments to team members based on expertise, work experience, and time constraints.

Addresses questions and/or concerns throughout the project.

Collaborates across time zones via Slack, GitHub comments, Jira, documents, and video calls.

Understands the needs of stakeholders and conveys this to the rest of the Game Tech team.

Minimum Requirements

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

At least five years of relevant experience as a Game Developer or similar software engineering role.

At least two years of experience developing optimized modules in C++ within Unreal.

Strong knowledge of C++.

Proficient with git and git workflows.

Experience building libraries and APIs.

Up-to-date with the latest gaming trends, techniques, best practices and technologies.

Interest in learning new tools and technologies.

Ability to prioritize tasks and delegate them when appropriate.

Ability to quickly learn about the project or product being developed and begin proposing improvements.

Problem-solving attitude.

Collaborative team spirit.

Additional Desired Skills/Traits

Experience with full-cycle game design and development.

Expert in one or more areas of specialization (artificial intelligence, 3D rendering, 3D animation, physics, multiplayer/networking, streaming technologies, or spatial audio).

Exposure to cloud-native applications (AWS GameLift, preferred).

Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

About Us

Cheil Worldwide is the 11th-largest creative agency in the world. Headquartered in Seoul, South Korea, we were founded by Samsung in 1973 to grow its local and global business. While Samsung is still one of our main clients, our roster has evolved to include other globally recognized brands such as Adidas, PayPal, ESPN, Lego, Coca-Cola, Nivea, Starbucks and many more.

Cheil Dallas serves as the lead agency for all Samsung projects in North America and is located steps from their office at Legacy Central in Plano, Texas. It’s the home base for more than 200 creative problem-solvers who share a passion for developing groundbreaking ideas rooted in data, driven by insights, and enabled by innovative technology. Adweek recognized Cheil as one of the fastest growing agencies in 2021. Business is booming and we’re building a more robust team to tackle a wide variety of projects – from interactive shoppable livestream experiences to jumping into the metaverse.

786 --> Directeur(trice) principal(e), numérique et innovation - responsable du métaverse
KPMG Canada
Vancouver, BC (On-site)
Aperçu

Chez KPMG, vous ferez partie d’une équipe diversifiée et dévouée de professionnels de la résolution de problèmes ayant un objectif commun traduire l’information en occasions pour nos clients et nos communautés partout dans le monde.

Sommaire du poste

Chez KPMG, nous croyons que la réalité étendue est une nouvelle frontière qui exploite des technologies convergentes pour façonner l’univers virtuel du futur – un monde en 3D immersif et interconnecté dans lequel la réalité virtuelle, la réalité augmentée, l’intelligence artificielle, la chaîne de blocs et les cryptomonnaies redéfiniront notre façon de vivre, de travailler et de socialiser. Il s’agit d’une occasion exceptionnelle de rejoindre l’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG au Canada, qui connaît une croissance rapide, afin d’aider nos clients à franchir cette nouvelle frontière numérique qu’on appelle le métavers. Nous sommes à la recherche de pionniers passionnés pour aider nos clients à générer une valeur durable dans ce réseau émergent de réalité virtuelle qui transformera le commerce, l’expérience client et les communautés.

L’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG est composée de concepteurs innovateurs qui exploitent ensemble les technologies de pointe pour créer de nouvelles façons de travailler et d’interagir dans le monde numérique multisectoriel.

Ce que vous ferez

Relevant directement de l’associé directeur et président, Numérique et innovation, le titulaire travaille en étroite collaboration avec le leader, Cryptoactifs et chaîne de blocs, le leader, Expérience client, et d’autres équipes interfonctionnelles utilisant différentes plateformes virtuelles afin d’aider nos clients à mener à bien leurs projets dans le métavers. Il s’agit notamment d’informer les clients, de préparer des propositions, de créer des contenus stimulants sur le métavers, et de partager des expériences réussies sur diverses plateformes. Il met à profit son expérience et ses compétences en communication narrative pour simplifier, à l’intention des hauts dirigeants, certains aspects plus complexes du métavers et du Web3 et proposer des stratégies qui favoriseront le succès des initiatives actuelles et futures de l’organisation.

Les candidats retenus nourrissent une véritable passion pour le métavers, les jetons non fongibles (NFT), la finance décentralisée et le Web3, combinée à une connaissance approfondie des pratiques institutionnelles du secteur.

Bien que vos activités varieront chaque jour, voici les principales tâches dont vous devrez vous acquitter dans le cadre de vos fonctions
Définir et diriger la stratégie de mise sur le marché en collaboration avec le groupe de travail Métavers.
Diriger l’élaboration de propositions à fort impact et visuellement attrayantes, qui présentent des idées qui incitent à la réflexion, suscitent l’intérêt des clients et offrent une valeur ajoutée.
Conseiller les clients sur les stratégies de mise en œuvre du métavers, y compris l’établissement et la hiérarchisation des cas d’utilisation pertinents, et la conception de l’expérience.
Organiser des ateliers de formation stimulants et des démonstrations des plateformes virtuelles utilisées dans divers secteurs d’activité.
Établir et entretenir des collaborations stratégiques avec des organisations externes afin de dégager des occasions concrètes dans ce domaine.
Concevoir des événements numériques et des activités commerciales dans le métavers pour nos équipes, nos clients et nos collectivités; planifier, concevoir, animer et superviser la prestation de telles expériences.
Faire des recherches et développer du contenu qui informe et démontre notre clairvoyance et notre leadership éclairé, tant à l’interne qu’à l’externe.

Ce que vous apportez au rôle
Passion pour le métavers, les expériences de réalité augmentée/réalité virtuelle (RA/RV) et l’infrastructure technologique sous-jacente.
Présence active sur plusieurs plateformes virtuelles (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.).
Connaissance de base des processus, des outils et des éléments constitutifs de la réalité étendue (RA/RV), du métavers, des NFT, du système d’économie de jetons et des portefeuilles de cryptomonnaies.
Bonne compréhension des tendances émergentes et des cas d’utilisation dans l’espace du Web3 et du métavers.
Au moins cinq ans d’expérience dans le développement commercial des technologies.
Expérience dans la création, le lancement, le maintien et la croissance de communautés en ligne et d’initiatives visant à stimuler la mobilisation de la communauté.
Solides compétences en matière de communication et de collaboration, et capacité à s’exprimer à la fois à un niveau technique et à un niveau stratégique.
Capacité à diriger simultanément plusieurs flux de travail et plusieurs missions.
Expérience dans l’animation, la communication narrative et les présentations aux clients.
Les clés de votre succès

Les membres du personnel de KPMG agissent efficacement | favorisent la croissance | inspirent confiance et comprennent que la diversité de la main‐d’œuvre nous permet d’approfondir nos relations et d’enrichir le cabinet.

Nous sommes là pour vous soutenir afin que vous puissiez donner le meilleur de vous-même.

Pour en savoir plus sur les avantages sociaux et le bien-être de KPMG au Canada, cliquez ici.

Nos valeurs, la façon KPMG

Intégrité, nous faisons ce qui est juste | Excellence, nous ne cessons jamais d’apprendre et de nous améliorer | Courage, nous pensons et agissons avec audace | Ensemble, nous nous respectons les uns les autres et puisons notre force dans nos différences | Pour le mieux, nous faisons en sorte que notre travail compte

KPMG au Canada souscrit fièrement au principe de l’égalité d’accès à l’emploi et s’engage à offrir un environnement de travail respectueux, inclusif et sans obstacle, permettant ainsi à tous les membres de son personnel de se réaliser pleinement. Un effectif diversifié est la clé de notre réussite et nous croyons à notre mission qui vise à ce que vous soyez complètement vous-même au travail. Nous invitons tous les candidats qualifiés à se manifester et nous espérons que vous ferez de KPMG au Canada votre employeur de choix. 788 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Vernon, BC (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

Forms design, development and scaling as part of broader eco-systems and integration platforms including workflow and e-signatures. Work closely with the Communications and Design capabilities to ensure deals and deliveries are about end experiences and not just the technology.

At least 5 years in the digital technology space with an understanding of digital marketing, digital advertising and customer experience.

Curious problem solver, especially in technology, content, commerce and customer experiences.

792 --> Lead Technical Designer - Design, Metaverse
Improbable
Warsaw Metropolitan Area (Remote)
At Improbable, we’ve been venturing into unexplored territory for over a decade, seeking new ways to connect people and amplify their lives. We’re shaping virtual worlds of unprecedented scale for the gaming, web3, defence, and related sectors, creating world-changing technology from Morpheus to M2. With us, you’ll tackle questions that no one else is asking and find answers that define the future.

We’re leading the way in defining what the metaverse can be. This is where you get to explore interconnected, immersive, exciting worlds that have never been seen before and where you decide what the future looks like. Are you ready?

We are hiring remotely across Poland.

Your Mission

We are looking to create new massive online experiences in collaboration with our community and partners. We have already started this journey by holding the ScavLab event with over 4,000 players crowding into a single world, and a live Meet and Greet with K-Pop star AleXa attended by thousands of fans as well as launched 'The Otherside' with Yuga Labs, see here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4NEUPQzH0D0

Areas Of Impact
Be accountable for discrete areas of the game, crossing multiple features and gameplay systems.
Direct more junior technical designers in creating features throughout the design and implementation process.
Design and build gameplay features that set a standard for others to follow.
Manage a growing team of designers and technical designers.
See your work in players hands and iterate the features over time with player feedback.
Drive the development of tools and pipelines to assist content creators in producing work quickly and efficiently.
Work alongside the technical leads to plan out features and dependent systems, and then schedule work tasks accordingly
Manage a growing team of designers and technical designers.
Inspire and motivate the design team to produce high-quality content within the project deadlines
Solve problems and improve the player experience by collaborating closely with other disciplines.
We'd like to hear from you if you identify with the following:
A desire to grow and develop a team, considering each individual's wellbeing, differing needs and goals for their careers.
A desire to understand the moment-to-moment, hour-to-hour, day-to-day and week-to-week impact of the features you design and build.
Display a high degree of discipline in following and creating technical design processes.
A passion to create mechanics that layer together to create depth and complexity without overwhelming the player.
An understanding of the value of using Jira (or another tracking methodology) to organize work and communicate priorities and design goals.
Ability to prioritize & manage end-to-end design projects across the team, interfacing with different disciplines.
A desire to create guides, and other important documentation for more junior designers.
A passion to mentor more junior technical designers in best technical practices, growing their skills through feedback and reviews.
Strong knowledge of Unreal Engine Blueprint development and best practices.
While we believe the mentioned experiences could be important, we're keen to hear from people that have valuable experience to bring to the role. If you identify with the team and mission, but not all of the requirements, please still apply!

797 --> Architecte XR - F/H
Accenture France
Paris, Île-de-France, France (On-site)
Dans un souci d’accessibilité et de clarté, l’écriture inclusive n’est pas utilisée dans cette annonce. Les termes employés au masculin se réfèrent aussi bien au genre féminin que masculin.

Et si vous viviez l’expérience du changement ? Développer, imaginer, créer, digitaliser, accompagner, transformer : l’expérience du changement est stimulante et épanouissante.

Nous vous proposons de venir la vivre avec nous, en rejoignant un univers où le design de solutions rencontre la technologie de pointe. Faites bouger les lignes en gagnant en agilité et en créativité et en prenant place dans un large réseau d’experts international. Construisez une carrière agile dans un environnement de travail flexible. Rejoignez Accenture certifiée Great Place To Work, et venez imaginer, transformer et impacter positivement le monde. Be a change maker.

En cette période particulière, nous avons adapté notre processus de recrutement pour que celui-ci se fasse en visio-conférence.

Au sein du Metaverse Continuum Business Group d'Accenture, nous contribuons à redéfinir ce qui est possible pour nos clients, pour nous-mêmes et pour le monde. Notre vision est fondée sur l'expérience humaine et nous considérons le Metaverse comme un continuum, un spectre de mondes, de réalités et de modèles commerciaux améliorés par le numérique.

En rejoignant notre équipe, vous ferez partie d'une communauté Accenture diversifiée, dynamique et mondiale, qui repousse sans cesse les limites de manière responsable et durable. Vous travaillerez sur des projets significatifs et innovants qui changent radicalement la façon dont nos clients voient ce qui est possible, tout en vous engageant dans des initiatives transformationnelles alimentées par les dernières technologies Metaverse.

En tant qu'Architecte XR, vos missions seront :

Accompagner nos clients dans leur transformation digitale en façonnant, dirigeant et mettant en œuvre des solutions technologiques par des systèmes multipartites (Blockchain, Tokenization, NFTs), et par la réalité étendue (Réalité augmentée, Réalité virtuelle et Réalité mixte) ;

Diriger la création d'offres et d'actifs nouveaux ou l'évolution d'offres et d'actifs existants ;

Articuler et expliquer la vision et la stratégie technologique à nos clients dans un contexte international ;

Concevoir et fournir des solutions sur des projets techniques complexes : donner des conseils sur l'architecture et évaluer les éléments de risques ;

Soutenir le développement de la stratégie Metaverse d'Accenture.

Le métier d’Architecte XR est fait pour vous si :

Vous justifiez de plus de 7 ans d'expérience dans le développement de logiciels professionnels ;

Vous maîtrisez l'outils Unity ou Unreal Engine (ou un moteur similaire) ;

Vous avez une bonne connaissance de la création de solutions numériques modernes et des éléments XR avancés (la modélisation 3D, les pipelines de contenu, les shaders, l'animation, le rendu en temps réel...) ;

Vous avez une expérience significative en tant qu'architecte et vous maîtrisez plusieurs langages de programmation.

Vous tirerez également votre épingle du jeu grâce aux éléments suivants :

Vous maîtrisez toutes les phases d'un cycle de vie de développement logiciel (SDLC) typique, de préférence avec des méthodes agiles comme Scrum, Kanban, SAFe ;

Vous avez une expérience significative dans la mise en œuvre de technologies émergentes à grande échelle.

En tant qu'Architecte XR, vous rejoignez nos experts Technology pour exploiter la puissance du digital, stimuler l’innovation et améliorer le quotidien de nos clients. Conjuguez expertise business et connaissance des technologies de pointe pour aider nos clients à réinventer leur entreprise, tout en renforçant leur cyber-résilience.

Accenture, c'est une communauté de plus de 600 000 talents et une mission commune réaliser la promesse technologique alliée à l’ingéniosité humaine.

Dans un monde en perpétuel changement, nous accélérons la transformation des plus grandes entreprises, de la stratégie à la réalisation des projets, à l’aide des technologies de demain et dynamisons leur croissance grâce à l'expertise multi-sectorielle de nos experts !

Vivez l’expérience du changement en rejoignant notre équipe, une équipe qui aspire à créer de la valeur pour ses clients et à faire toujours mieux pour ses talents.

Envie d’en savoir plus sur le quotidien des collaborateurs Accenture ? Posez-leur directement vos questions.

Vivez l’expérience du changement ? Postulez dès maintenant.

798 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] Content Designer (신입 ~ 8년)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

콘텐츠 크리에이터 또는 브랜드 및 IP 홀더들이 쉽고 자유로운 샌드박스 툴을 이용해 콘텐츠를 제작하고, 이용자들은 다양한 콘텐츠를 향유하고 거래 및 소유할 수 있는 신규 메타버스 프로젝트

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
스크립트 ,툴을 활용한 컨텐츠 제작
신규 컨텐츠 제안 및 리서치
월드 레벨 디자인

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
게임 및 IT 서비스에 대한 개발 경험
게임 엔진의 이해와 활용 능력 (언리얼)
스크립트 사용 경험

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
메타버스 플랫폼에 대한 이해
언리얼 엔진, 로블록스 스튜디오 등의 툴을 통한 1인 게임 개발 경험
플레이 투게더, 로블록스, 제페토 등의 플레이 경험
평소 최신 트렌드에 민감하신 분
루아 등의 스크립트 등으로 게임, 모드 등을 제작해 본 경험
로블록스 스튜디오, 심시티, 심즈 등의 툴 등을 통한 월드 제작 경험

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(선택)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해 주시기 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

BE BOLD, LEARN AND WIN! 크래프톤의 성장과 도전의 스토리를 알아가고 싶다면?

▶ 크래프톤 제작 스튜디오 ▶ 크래프톤 게임

▶ 크래프톤 비전 & 핵심가치 ▶ 크래프톤 라이프 & 복리후생

▶ 크래프톤 공식 유튜브 채널 ▶ 배틀그라운드 공식 유튜브 채널

▶ 크래프톤 인스타그램 ▶ 크래프톤 블로그

799 --> Lecturer in Visualisation
King's College London
Campus, IL (On-site)
Job Description

As part of its strategic development, the Department of Informatics is seeking applications from candidates for the position of Lecturer in Visualization for AI and Data Science, starting in January 2023, or as soon as possible thereafter.

The successful applicant for this post is a computer scientist who will undertake research in the area of Visualization for AI and Data Science. They will be assigned to teach on modules on postgraduate and undergraduate degree programmes offered by the Department of Informatics, and will be expected to supervise both undergraduate and postgraduate projects.

The Department seeks to broaden and deepen its current strengths in this area, so all candidates engaged in research and teaching that add to the expertise of the existing members of the Department will be considered favourably. Topics of interest in Visualization for AI and Data Science include, but are not limited to: human data interfaces and human AI interfaces (HDI and HAI), the Metaverse, Digital Twins, 3D graphics and advanced rendering, the application of interactive AR/VR hardware, psychophysics of human perception and cognition and interdisciplinary visualization methods including urban informatics visualization.

The successful candidate will be given the opportunity to join the most relevant group, will be expected to contribute to the departmental hubs, and contribute to the Centre for Doctoral Training in Safe and Trusted Artificial Intelligence. Research collaboration across research groups, departmental hubs and with other Departments in the Faculty and across the College is strongly encouraged.

Our staff and students come from all over the world, and the Department is proud of its friendly and inclusive culture. Diversity is positively encouraged with a number of family-friendly policies, including the operation of a core hours policy, the right to apply for flexible working and support for staff returning from periods of extended absence, for example maternity leave. The Department of Informatics is committed to ensuring an inclusive interview process and will reimburse up to £250 towards any additional care costs (for a dependent child or adult) incurred as a result of attending an interview for this position.

Applicants must have a PhD in a relevant area, an excellent publication record, and the ability to attract research funding. It is essential that applicants have the enthusiasm and commitment required to contribute to the further development of the research standing of the Department of Informatics, and to make a full contribution to teaching and administrative activities.

For further information about the Department of Informatics at King’s, please see https://nms.kcl.ac.uk/luc.moreau/informatics/overview.pdf.

Key responsibilities

The Successful Candidate Is Expected To

engage in advanced research, maintain an outstanding track record of published research at a level of international excellence, and lead activities promoting research impact.
make a significant contribution to the teaching, examining and project supervision of undergraduate and MSc students in the Department of Informatics.
supervise research students in the Department of Informatics and act as personal tutor to students as agreed with the Head of Department, assist with difficulties, e.g. learning support/problems and be responsible for the pastoral care of students.
undertake any other reasonable duties that may be requested by the Head of Department.

The above list of responsibilities may not be exhaustive, and the post holder will be required to undertake such tasks and responsibilities as may reasonably be expected within the scope and grading of the post.

Skills, Knowledge, And Experience

Essential criteria

PhD in computer science, artificial intelligence, visualisation or related field.
Strong research record in computer science, artificial intelligence, and/or visualization as evidenced by publications in high quality journals and conferences; research experience and good reputation in relevant research field; potential to acquire research project funding; ability to supervise research students.
Ability to teach undergraduate and postgraduate modules in computer science and/or artificial intelligence.
Ability to make a significant contribution to administrative work.

Desirable criteria

Teaching and examining experience.
Experience in attracting external research funds.
Administrative experience.

Further information

The selection process will include a presentation and a panel interview. The candidates will also have the opportunity to meet members of the department. Interviews are scheduled to be held on 30 November 2022. Scheduling of presentations will be confirmed once shortlisting has taken place. Meetings, presentations and interviews are subject to pandemic constraints and may be held online.
