800 --> XR Senior Architect - Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Munich, Bavaria, Germany
Overview Of Technology Innovation

Our software engineers and technical architects get to build cool software systems. We’re combining technology, industry expertise, and entrepreneurial experience to massively disrupt our clients’ core businesses, in order to propel them into the future and create better products and experiences for everyone.

You will be part of a team that is leading innovation in the VR/AR enterprise space by utilizing what is great about the game industry, while shedding some of its negative aspects. We do not crunch, our salaries are more competitive, our projects generally have shorter development cycles, and we do not layoff teams after projects are completed.

Everyone on the team is self-motivated, has a positive attitude, and great interpersonal skills. Our projects are driven by innovation, not by necessity. If you are interested in a career where your hard work is always noticed and appreciated among a team of true professionals, then this is the place for you.


Job Description


Create World Class XR Experiences

Work on interesting, challenging projects that have high visibility and impact

Design and architect complex XR systems composed of XR frameworks, external systems and cloud services

Support business development activities including solutioning, team composition, timeline and cost estimates

Lead team of XR engineers and provide overall technical guidance

Evaluate XR technologies and guide the team of strengths and weaknesses of different platforms

Communicate and collaborate with other departments on technology solutions

Perfectly balance pragmatism and idealism when solving technical challenges and meeting deadlines

Advise and mentor other AR/VR developers

Help define best practices for coding and software design

Help plan and deliver technical training content for the department

Continuously suggest improvements for the development organization

Attend, participate in, and host the various technical training activities held in the department

Implement world-class XR Software

Define, design, build, deliver and run the engagements, platform’s and/or product’s required architecture (i.e., development, operations, execution, data, application, etc.)

Provide the work’s technical conscience, defining and driving the right solution to meet the technical performance, scalability, flexibility, operations and capability needs

Follow and help implement technology standards and use new emerging technologies

Provide architecture Quality Assurance reviews for proposals and ongoing engagements

Lead/support technology solutioning and estimating in proposals, planning and pricing

Basic Qualifications:

Minimum 10 years' professional software development experience

Minimum 4 years' AR/VR development experience

Requirements

Ability to take a development project and start it from scratch

Expert in time management, multitasking, and task prioritization

Strong positive attitude (during the good and during the bad)

Has solid understanding advanced XR elements like 3D modelling, content pipelines, shaders, animation and real time rendering.

Unity 5.0+ or Unreal Engine 4.0

Current VR hardware

VR UI and UX best practices

Agile methodologies

Code management using Git

Preferred Skills

Able to thrive in a nimble work environment

Project management tools, such as JIRA

Current VR hardware

Accenture is an EEO and Affirmative Action Employer of Females/Minorities/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.

Equal Employment Opportunity

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law. Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process. Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women. Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Sydney, New South Wales, Australia (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Ensure squads deliver high-value quality customer outcomes through the adoption and mastery of agile principles and practices.

The company is an Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solution, built to bring digital assets, NFTs, and blockchain gaming to life. Our mission is to empower digital asset ownership for people and businesses. If you get excited by the thought of joining a highly experienced, fast-paced global team that is building the future, this role may be for you.

We are looking for an experienced and adaptable Scrum Master to deliver immediate value through their deep understanding of Agile methodologies and customer-centric approach. You’ll play an influential role to help our teams unlock their potential while supporting the adoption of Agile principles and practices.

Responsibilities

Provide agile coaching for squads, influencing and driving best practices among the scrum masters
Ensure squads deliver high-value quality customer outcomes through the adoption and mastery of agile principles and practices
Apply techniques to support effective product backlog management within the squads
Influence change that increases the flow of valuable outcomes through the squads
Help the squads maintain a healthy dynamic with their Product Owner to build alignment in values and approach
Assist the squads to identify, raise and remove blockers to enable the smooth flow of work at a sustainable pace
Assist the squads to identify and escalate risks and issues, and help resolve them
Leverages metrics to inform continuous improvement opportunities that increase the effectiveness of squads
Facilitate the constructive resolution of conflicts that may arise both internally and externally
Qualifications

2+ years in a similar role
Prior project delivery experience within Agile environments, with a good understanding of Agile values, principles, and practices
A bias toward action and improvement, making decisions as they work, and getting better every step of the way
A continuous learning mindset and an interest in developing it in those around you to nurture a culture of curiosity and innovation
An intrinsic desire to learn about web3, NFTs, and the blockchain gaming space and the determination to stay on the bleeding edge of technological advances

805 --> Software Engineer
SPECTRAFORCE
Elk Grove Village, IL
Software Engineer

12 Months

Remote

Pay Rate starts from 80$/hr. on W2. (may vary based on candidate's experience)

Approved Remote Locations: State ofIllinois, IL, Denver, CO, New York, NY, Houston, TX, Los Angeles, CA, San Diego, CA

Summary: Reality Labs Research (RL-R) brings together a world-class team of diverse and highly interdisciplinary researchers, hardware engineers, and software developers to create the future of augmented and virtual reality. Our team builds tools and infrastructure to accelerate the work that other software developers and researchers do within the organization to enable the next great wave of human experience; the Metaverse. In this role, you’ll work with world class experts across many research fields including optics, audio, avatar design, etc. to create and maintain critical systems, so they can generate viable paths to consumer products that will connect people in meaningful ways for decades to come. Our team is not only comfortable with ambiguity but also values proactiveness and ownership. We strive for inclusion by fostering open and honest communication where all voices are considered with equity. We invite you to join us as we work together to help propel state-of-art research in Metaverse technologies.

RL Research Software Engineer - Full Stack Responsibilities
Ideate, design, and create tools and infrastructure to be used by our partners in software development and research.
Design and implement a service architecture that is scalable and agile.
Develop communication standards and strategies to facilitate the rapid onboarding.
Identify and deliver on project milestones, maintain a task board.
Help make informed architectural tradeoffs and rapidly deliver software solutions.
Work side-by-side with partners to understand their software tool pain points, prioritize solutions and create the systems and tools that turbocharge their work.
Coordinate with infrastructure and tools teams across client to evaluate and integrate with internal systems.
Write clean readable code, debug complex problems that span systems, understand priorities, and fulfill project needs efficiently.
Learn constantly, dive into new areas with unfamiliar technologies, and embrace the ambiguity of problem solving within a research organization.
Minimum Qualifications
BS degree in Computer Science, Physics, or related field, or equivalent work experience
Preferred Qualifications
2-4+ years of coding or devops experience including application development or operational system administration
Solid knowledge of the Linux command-line and architecture
Experience with configuration management tools such as Puppet, Chef, Salt, or Ansible
Familiarity with common devops programming tools like Python, Bash, Buck, or Clang
Cloud infrastructure experience with AWS, GCP or Azure including knowledge around Containerization, Compute Engine, or Cloud Storage
Comfortable with languages in use by partners like C++, Python, or Rust
About Us

Established in 2004, SPECTRAFORCE is one of the largest and fastest-growing diversity-owned staffing firms in the US. SPECTRAFORCE is built on the concept of “human connection,” defined by our branding tagline NEWJOBPHORIA®, which is the excitement of bringing joy and freedom to the work lifestyle so our people (and clients) can reach their highest potential. Our entire workflow cultivates NEWJOBPHORIA® with candidates and employees throughout their engagement with SPECTRAFORCE. http://www.spectraforce.com

We have built our business by providing talent and project-based solutions, including Contingent, Permanent, and Statement of Work (SOW) services to over 130 clients in the US, Canada, Puerto Rico, Costa Rica, and India. Key industries that we service include Technology, Financial Services, Life Sciences, Health care, Telecom, Retail, Utilities and Transportation.

Benefits: SPECTRAFORCE offers ACA compliant health benefits as well as dental, vision, accident, EAP (Employee Assistance Program) and hospital indemnity insurances. Additional benefits SPECTRAFORCE offers to the eligible employees include commuter benefits, 401K plan with matching and a referral bonus program. SPECTRAFORCE offers unpaid leave as well as paid sick leave when required by law. Employees who will be filling this role will also be eligible for PTO as per the client’s specific policy.

Equal Opportunity Employer: SPECTRAFORCE is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, religion, color, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, disability or veteran status, or any other category protected by applicable federal, state, or local laws. Please contact Human Resources at nahr@spectraforce.com if you require reasonable accommodation.

806 --> コンサルタント / プロジェクトマネージャー - ヘルスケア・ライフサイエンス業界
Landry's
Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan (On-site)
589455BR

前書き

IBM のプロジェクト管理者は、プロジェクト・チームを導き、その全体のパフォーマンス、スコープ、コスト、成果物を調整することに長けています。お客様はタイムリーで効率的な状況レポートを信頼するため、プロジェクト管理者はプロジェクトの指揮、メトリック定義、パフォーマンス管理によりその義務を遂行します。お客様やプロジェクト・チームの成功を助ける準備ができているなら、ぜひお会いしましょう。

あなたの役割と責任

【ミッション/ポジションの募集】

ヘルスケア＆ライフサイエンス業界におけるビジネス拡大に伴い、コンサルタント/PMを募集しております。

案件には提案段階からの参画となりますので、案件の最初から、時には最後まで、

技術的な課題を乗り越えながらお客様をご支援できるところにやりがいがあります。

また、弊社ヘルスケア＆ライフサイエンスチームの戦略的な施策にも初期の段階から参画し、

形の無いところから少しずつ物事を作り上げていく喜びを感じながら働くこともできます。

ヘルスケア＆ライフサイエンス業界の様々なプロジェクトに適したITのデザインと構築をリードし、

業界の更なる発展に貢献したい仲間を募集しています。

必要なスキル・経験

【必須要件】

＊Metaverse/NFTに対する理解と業界の動向の把握

＊XRアプリ・3Dゲーム事業会社での3年以上の勤務経験、もしくは、コンサルティング企業での同等の経験

＊経営企画や経営管理、ビジネスアライアンス、コンサルティングなど経営的な視座をもって業務遂行した経験

＊XRアプリ・3Dゲームの企画構想策定・要件定義をリードした経験

＊XRアプリ・3Dゲームの開発・リリース・保守運用の一連の流れの経験

＊システム開発プロジェクトマネジメントの経験・知見

＊提案書作成、およびプレゼンテーション能力

歓迎するスキル・経験

【歓迎されるスキル】

＊エンジニアを含むチームのマネージャー経験

＊ゲーム開発（特に多人数オンラインゲーム、MMORPGなど。パブリッシャー経験歓迎。）に関する進行管理・プロジェクトマネジメント経験

＊かんたんなワールド作成/アバター作成などの経験

＊Metaverse上でのイベントの企画やNFTによる作品の販売経験

＊Unity or Unreal Engineを用いた、XRアプリあるいは3Dゲームの開発経験

＊Unity or Unreal Engineを用いたマルチプラットフォーム（Windows/Mac/iOS/Android)アプリのビルド経験

＊C# or C++を用いた開発経験

＊Blender、Maya、3D Max等の3DCGソフトウェア、および、とPhotoshop、Substaince Painter等の3Dテクスチャペイントツールを用いた、XR向け3Dアセット制作経験 (For Unity Prefered)

＊リギング、モーション、ライティング、エフェクト、シーンなど一連のワークフロー経験＊1年以上同一タイトルのオンラインゲームを運営・管理した経験

＊アジャイル開発経験

＊ヘルスケア・ライフサイエンス業界でのプロジェクト経験・知見

【求める人物像】

先進的なテクノロジー（人工知能, Analytics, Cloud, など）に興味を持ち、モバイルデバイスとこれらの先端技術との組み合わせでお客様に価値を提供したい方
弊社のグローバルチームとの協業など、国際的視野を持った活動を志す方（アプリ開発プロジェクトにおいては、グローバルのデリバリー・リソースとの協業が前提となる )
課題やリスクの程度に応じて、テクノロジー一辺倒ではなく、幅広く解決策を模索することができる方。
やるべきことを自ら定義し、推進できるリーダーシップを持った方。
ヘルスケア＆ライフサイエンス業界に貢献したいという思いを持っている方。

事業部について

このポジションは現在、グローバル・テクノロジー・サービス (GTS)、インフラストラクチャー・サービス (IS)、または GTS をサポートする共有サービス部門に属しています。

2020 年 10 月に発表したとおり、IBM は、GTS のマネージド・インフラストラクチャー・サービス事業を 2021 年末までに「Kyndryl (キンドリル)」という名前の新しい独立した企業とし、市場をリードする別個の強力な 2 社に分社化する予定です。

両社の協業の下、IBM と Kyndryl はデジタル・エコノミーを推進する極めて重要なシステムの進歩に取り組んでいきます。高度なテクノロジーを活用している 4,600 社以上のお客様 (Fortune 100 企業の 75% 以上を含みます。) にサービスを提供しながら、Kyndryl は、今日、世界が依存している最もモダンで効率的、かつ信頼性の高いテクノロジー・インフラストラクチャーを設計、実行、管理します。

IBM はお客様と柔軟に連携して、あらゆる機会の改善と対応にまい進しながら、ビジネスの成果を拡大していきます。情熱を持って仕事に没頭する多様なテクノロジー専門家の集まるチームに加わり、次の時代を切り開く中心的役割を担ってみませんか。

なお、このポジションが IBM から Kyndryl に移行されるかどうかについては最終的な判断が下されていない点に留意してください。

Your Life @ IBM

あなたにとって、次のキャリアの挑戦を探すときに重要なことは何ですか? 世界を大きく変える仕事に関わることかもしれません。あなたの情熱を正確に発見できる、驚くほどの多様なキャリアと成長の機会がある職場はいかがでしょう。全員に発言権のある、オープンネス、コラボレーション、信頼の文化を探していますか? これらがすべて揃っている職場はいかがでしょう。それをお望みであれば、IBM があなたの次のキャリアの挑戦になるかもしれません。私達と一緒に、より良い何かをするのではなく、不可能だと思っていたことを試みましょう。影響力。インクルージョン。無限の経験。あなた史上最高の仕事をしましょう。

IBMについて

IBM は、クラウド・プラットフォームとコグニティブ・ソリューションのリーディング・カンパニーです。1911 年から休むことなく改革してきた IBM は、380,000 人を超える従業員が 170 カ国のお客様にサービスを提供する世界最大規模のテクノロジーとコンサルティングの企業となりました。データで動くビジネス向け AI プラットフォームの Watson を活用して、現実の問題に対する業界に基づいたソリューションを構築しています。

ロケーション・ステートメント

勤務地のご要望につき詳しくは、下記のご応募提出先のリクルーターにご相談ください。

Being You @ IBM

IBM は多様な環境の構築に力を注いでおり、雇用の機会均等に積極的に取り組んでいます。資格を有する応募者はいずれも、人種、皮膚の色、宗教、性別、性同一性および性別表現、性的傾向、出生国、遺伝、障害、年齢、兵役経験を問わず、採用選考の対象となります。IBM はまた、市民権および在留資格に関してすべての公正雇用慣行を順守することにも取り組んでいます。

807 --> Directeur(trice) principal(e), numérique et innovation - responsable du métaverse
KPMG Canada
Vaughan, ON (On-site)
Aperçu

Chez KPMG, vous ferez partie d’une équipe diversifiée et dévouée de professionnels de la résolution de problèmes ayant un objectif commun traduire l’information en occasions pour nos clients et nos communautés partout dans le monde.

Sommaire du poste

Chez KPMG, nous croyons que la réalité étendue est une nouvelle frontière qui exploite des technologies convergentes pour façonner l’univers virtuel du futur – un monde en 3D immersif et interconnecté dans lequel la réalité virtuelle, la réalité augmentée, l’intelligence artificielle, la chaîne de blocs et les cryptomonnaies redéfiniront notre façon de vivre, de travailler et de socialiser. Il s’agit d’une occasion exceptionnelle de rejoindre l’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG au Canada, qui connaît une croissance rapide, afin d’aider nos clients à franchir cette nouvelle frontière numérique qu’on appelle le métavers. Nous sommes à la recherche de pionniers passionnés pour aider nos clients à générer une valeur durable dans ce réseau émergent de réalité virtuelle qui transformera le commerce, l’expérience client et les communautés.

L’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG est composée de concepteurs innovateurs qui exploitent ensemble les technologies de pointe pour créer de nouvelles façons de travailler et d’interagir dans le monde numérique multisectoriel.

Ce que vous ferez

Relevant directement de l’associé directeur et président, Numérique et innovation, le titulaire travaille en étroite collaboration avec le leader, Cryptoactifs et chaîne de blocs, le leader, Expérience client, et d’autres équipes interfonctionnelles utilisant différentes plateformes virtuelles afin d’aider nos clients à mener à bien leurs projets dans le métavers. Il s’agit notamment d’informer les clients, de préparer des propositions, de créer des contenus stimulants sur le métavers, et de partager des expériences réussies sur diverses plateformes. Il met à profit son expérience et ses compétences en communication narrative pour simplifier, à l’intention des hauts dirigeants, certains aspects plus complexes du métavers et du Web3 et proposer des stratégies qui favoriseront le succès des initiatives actuelles et futures de l’organisation.

Les candidats retenus nourrissent une véritable passion pour le métavers, les jetons non fongibles (NFT), la finance décentralisée et le Web3, combinée à une connaissance approfondie des pratiques institutionnelles du secteur.

Bien que vos activités varieront chaque jour, voici les principales tâches dont vous devrez vous acquitter dans le cadre de vos fonctions
Définir et diriger la stratégie de mise sur le marché en collaboration avec le groupe de travail Métavers.
Diriger l’élaboration de propositions à fort impact et visuellement attrayantes, qui présentent des idées qui incitent à la réflexion, suscitent l’intérêt des clients et offrent une valeur ajoutée.
Conseiller les clients sur les stratégies de mise en œuvre du métavers, y compris l’établissement et la hiérarchisation des cas d’utilisation pertinents, et la conception de l’expérience.
Organiser des ateliers de formation stimulants et des démonstrations des plateformes virtuelles utilisées dans divers secteurs d’activité.
Établir et entretenir des collaborations stratégiques avec des organisations externes afin de dégager des occasions concrètes dans ce domaine.
Concevoir des événements numériques et des activités commerciales dans le métavers pour nos équipes, nos clients et nos collectivités; planifier, concevoir, animer et superviser la prestation de telles expériences.
Faire des recherches et développer du contenu qui informe et démontre notre clairvoyance et notre leadership éclairé, tant à l’interne qu’à l’externe.

Ce que vous apportez au rôle
Passion pour le métavers, les expériences de réalité augmentée/réalité virtuelle (RA/RV) et l’infrastructure technologique sous-jacente.
Présence active sur plusieurs plateformes virtuelles (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.).
Connaissance de base des processus, des outils et des éléments constitutifs de la réalité étendue (RA/RV), du métavers, des NFT, du système d’économie de jetons et des portefeuilles de cryptomonnaies.
Bonne compréhension des tendances émergentes et des cas d’utilisation dans l’espace du Web3 et du métavers.
Au moins cinq ans d’expérience dans le développement commercial des technologies.
Expérience dans la création, le lancement, le maintien et la croissance de communautés en ligne et d’initiatives visant à stimuler la mobilisation de la communauté.
Solides compétences en matière de communication et de collaboration, et capacité à s’exprimer à la fois à un niveau technique et à un niveau stratégique.
Capacité à diriger simultanément plusieurs flux de travail et plusieurs missions.
Expérience dans l’animation, la communication narrative et les présentations aux clients.
Les clés de votre succès

Les membres du personnel de KPMG agissent efficacement | favorisent la croissance | inspirent confiance et comprennent que la diversité de la main‐d’œuvre nous permet d’approfondir nos relations et d’enrichir le cabinet.

Nous sommes là pour vous soutenir afin que vous puissiez donner le meilleur de vous-même.

Pour en savoir plus sur les avantages sociaux et le bien-être de KPMG au Canada, cliquez ici.

Nos valeurs, la façon KPMG

Intégrité, nous faisons ce qui est juste | Excellence, nous ne cessons jamais d’apprendre et de nous améliorer | Courage, nous pensons et agissons avec audace | Ensemble, nous nous respectons les uns les autres et puisons notre force dans nos différences | Pour le mieux, nous faisons en sorte que notre travail compte

KPMG au Canada souscrit fièrement au principe de l’égalité d’accès à l’emploi et s’engage à offrir un environnement de travail respectueux, inclusif et sans obstacle, permettant ainsi à tous les membres de son personnel de se réaliser pleinement. Un effectif diversifié est la clé de notre réussite et nous croyons à notre mission qui vise à ce que vous soyez complètement vous-même au travail. Nous invitons tous les candidats qualifiés à se manifester et nous espérons que vous ferez de KPMG au Canada votre employeur de choix. Pour obtenir plus de renseignements sur l’Inclusion, diversité et équité au recrutement, cliquez ici.

Si vous avez des questions en matière d’accessibilité à l’emploi chez KPMG ou si vous désirez entamer une conversation confidentielle à propos de vos besoins personnels en matière d’accessibilité et de mesures d’aménagement pendant le processus de recrutement, nous vous encourageons à communiquer avec notre Service des relations avec les employés, par courriel au cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca ou par téléphone au 416-777-8002 ou sans frais au 1-888-466-4778.

We’re shaping virtual worlds of unprecedented scale for the gaming, web3, defence, and related sectors, creating world-changing technology from Morpheus to M2. With us, you’ll tackle questions that no one else is asking and find answers that define the future.

We’re leading the way in defining what the metaverse can be. This is where you get to explore interconnected, immersive, exciting worlds that have never been seen before and where you decide what the future looks like. Are you ready?

Your Opportunity
Be accountable for discrete areas of the game, crossing multiple features and gameplay systems.
Direct more junior technical designers in creating features throughout the design and implementation process.
Design and build gameplay features that set a standard for others to follow.
Manage a growing team of designers and technical designers.
See your work in players hands and iterate the features over time with player feedback.
Drive the development of tools and pipelines to assist content creators in producing work quickly and efficiently.
Work alongside the technical leads to plan out features and dependent systems, and then schedule work tasks accordingly
Manage a growing team of designers and technical designers.
Inspire and motivate the design team to produce high-quality content within the project deadlines
Solve problems and improve the player experience by collaborating closely with other disciplines.

Why You're Made For This
A desire to grow and develop a team, considering each individual's wellbeing, differing needs and goals for their careers.

Display a high degree of discipline in following and creating technical design processes.
A passion to create mechanics that layer together to create depth and complexity without overwhelming the player.
An understanding of the value of using Jira (or another tracking methodology) to organize work and communicate priorities and design goals.
Ability to prioritize & manage end-to-end design projects across the team, interfacing with different disciplines.
A desire to create guides, and other important documentation for more junior designers.
A passion to mentor more junior technical designers in best technical practices, growing their skills through feedback and reviews.
Strong knowledge of Unreal Engine Blueprint development and best practices.

Everyone brings different experiences, perspective, knowledge and skills that makes each one of us brilliant. You don't have to meet all the requirements and experiences on this job advert to apply for and be successful in this role.

While we believe the mentioned experiences could be important, we're keen to hear from people that have valuable experience to bring to the role. If you identify with the team and mission, but not all of the requirements, please still apply!

809 --> Distinguished Engineer, Online
Epic Games
St Louis, MO (On-site)
WHAT MAKES US EPIC?

At the core of Epic’s success are talented, passionate people. Epic prides itself on creating a collaborative, welcoming, and creative environment. Whether it’s building award-winning games or crafting engine technology that enables others to make visually stunning interactive experiences, we’re always innovating.

Being Epic means being a part of a team that continually strives to do right by our community and users. We’re constantly innovating to raise the bar of engine and game development.

ENGINEERING

What We Do

Driving the plug-in power behind Unreal Engine 5. We bridge connections for licensees and our own internal game teams to online services. This allows games like Fortnite to utilize a combination of platform online services as well as Epic’s own online services to build cross-platform online features. Login, parties, voice chat, matchmaking, purchasing, cloud storage, and analytics are just a few examples of online features that our Online Game Services team helps games utilize.

What You'll Do

At the core of Epic’s success are talented, passionate people. Epic prides itself on creating a collaborative, welcoming, and creative environment. Whether it’s building award-winning games, services, or engine technology that enables others to make visually stunning interactive experiences, we’re always innovating.

Being Epic means being a part of a team that continually strives to do right by our community and users. We’re constantly innovating to raise the bar.

This Distinguished Engineer role will partner with Online’s existing engineering leader to guide Epic’s whole Online team towards continuous improvement in pursuit of engineering excellence. This person will play a key role in driving and developing Epic’s company-wide architectural vision for the metaverse. They will be responsible for guiding the larger organization through establishing standards to achievement efficiency in development of robust, highly scalable solutions.

In this role, you will

Lead the team in creating and operating online systems and solutions spanning backend services, web apps, and native client integrations
Own technical design and drive implementation of robust, highly scalable online solutions
Definition, delivery, and ongoing improvement of SLAs for Epic’s Online experiences - system health and monitoring, reporting and response, on-call resolution
Partner with stakeholders to establish clear priorities and defining expectations which translate into a scope of work the team can effectively deliver on
Understanding strengths and opportunities for growth for Epic’s online architecture, surfacing opportunities for development
Ongoing, transparent communication with a focus on expectations fostering trust with internal stakeholders and external partners
Deep knowledge and ability to drive best practices around industry standards including scalability, resiliency, security

What We're Looking For

10+ years software engineering industry experience developing online systems and integrating software at scale
Proven track record of guiding and developing online solutions at scale leveraging industry best practices and standards at a very broad company scale
Knowledge and understanding of system health, monitoring, and troubleshooting for distributed online solutions

EPIC JOB + EPIC BENEFITS = EPIC LIFE

Our intent is to cover all things that are medically necessary and improve the quality of life. We pay 100% of the premiums for both you and your dependents. Our coverage includes Medical, Dental, a Vision HRA, Long Term Disability, Life Insurance & a 401k with competitive match and profit share. We also offer a robust mental well-being program through Modern Health, which provides free therapy and coaching for employees & dependents.

Throughout the year we celebrate our employees with events and company-wide paid breaks. We offer unlimited PTO and sick time and recognize individuals for 7 years of employment with a paid sabbatical.

About Us

Epic Games spans across 19 countries with 55 studios and 4,500+ employees globally. For over 25 years, we’ve been making award-winning games and engine technology that empowers others to make visually stunning games and 3D content that bring environments to life like never before. Epic’s award-winning Unreal Engine technology not only provides game developers the ability to build high-fidelity, interactive experiences for PC, console, mobile, and VR, it is also a tool being embraced by content creators across a variety of industries such as media and entertainment, automotive, and architectural design. As we continue to build our Engine technology and develop remarkable games, we strive to build teams of world-class talent.

Like what you hear? Come be a part of something Epic!

Epic Games deeply values diverse teams and an inclusive work culture, and we are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. Learn more about our Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) Policy here.

Building the future of decentralized data 🚀

orbit is pleased to be working with one of the digital businesses of the future, as the are in the process of building the highest-performing blockchain infrastructure to power the world's value exchange. The company are here to define the future of information services in global markets, they are an exciting, ambitious, ground-breaking and very well-funded start-up, that bring unique technical capabilities that has the potential to make them the leader in decentralized data.

Blockchain is here to stay and as more businesses and projects start to embrace decentralization, the need for fast, secure and reliable off-chain data through oracles is crucial to providing useful features and widespread adoption. From DeFi to the metaverse, almost every digital project will need to be connected to other data sources. That’s where they come in. Their solution provides cross-chain interoperability, 3-5 second finality, and cutting edge cryptography—all backed by thousands of hours of R&D and simulations.

Providing solutions for the existing blockchain platform used
Preparing docs for every project and leading the team to create better solutions for the existing blockchain technology

Contributor to open-source projects

An academic mindset forms the bedrock of their organization, and that means they're committed to deep research and a rigorous academic process. They have brought together the best minds possible to execute our vision, they are also passionate about creating an excellent working environment, with generous and flexible benefits along with a highly collaborative and intuitive working culture.

Our client relationships are based on our shared values of respect, thinking beyond, and responsiveness. While we see ourselves as experts in the digital field, we are always learning, always challenging our thinking, and always looking for the next big step to improve businesses. That’s why we believe that the perfect candidate will challenge the status quo on a daily base while bringing exciting projects to

life.

We are hungry for more – join us if your appetite is big enough.

The Lead Web Developer manages development of rich, interactive user experiences across all kinds of diverse web platforms. We are looking for a person who will have a passion for technology and the will to find the best way for Frontend and Backend development, while working in a fast-paced and collaborative environment, and will be driven to help push web development initiatives.

Tasks

What You Will Do

Your most important task is to help your team deliver good software projects and platforms that the whole team is proud of. That can include the following tasks
Lead position of the web development team, working with project managers and UX/UI designers.
Design and write code & system architectures for web applications that scale to high-volume production quality.
Deciding in Cooperation with our CTO about Frontend and Web end Stack changes
Assist project managers to make sure the backlog is efficiently planned and occasionally assist in technical discussions.
Write automated tests to build and support the Hypercare Team maintaining the software
Do code reviews with your team members.
Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the evolving needs of our clients.
Contribute and collaborate in the creation and consumption of open, standards-based solutions, while working with existing technologies and infrastructure.
Identify opportunities for process and tool improvements and drive those from concept to implementation.
Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission

Requirements

What you will have:
5+ years of professional web development experience
At least expert experience with a modern JavaScript framework like React JS/Redux, Vue JS or Angular JS and one popular Backend Languages like PHP, Ruby, Python, Java or JavaScript for Node.js
High confidence in working with new tech-stacks that you haven't worked with before (platform agnostic)
Advanced experience in writing automated tests for web applications
Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.
Experience with front-end architecture in an enterprise-level website
Strong customer focus, excellent problem solving and analytical skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Confidence in communicating in English.
Experience with agile development and agile based testing approaches
Good command of English communications and presentation

Benefits

Career & Continuing Education
Benefiting from success together: For compensation, we follow the principle of good pay for good performance. Our maxim is: Profit from success together. That's why performance-based compensation systems play a crucial role for us - even outside the upper management levels.
We support your further development: For on-the-job learning, we offer the DMG Academy, a mentoring program and advanced internal training.
Step by step to the top: Regular evaluation and employee appraisals

Individualized
Individualized working hours and working time models: You are free to choose when you work, around the 2 hour core hours. We offer part-time and full-time positions as well as flexible changes in between.
Individualized work locations: We support you in freely choosing your work location - you decide from where you work with us, worldwide.
Individualized benefits: Extended health insurance, also worldwide - support for private pension plans.
Individualized support for home/remote office

What we do?
The next big thing: We are doing today what customers will see as innovative tomorrow. Topics like NFTs, Sound Interfaces, LoRa, Metaverse and Metahuman are currently topics we are working on.
Our Groundwork: We implement the full range of digital projects for our clients - from CMS, PWAs and mobile apps to 3D animations and deployment structures.
Our style: We work on projects worldwide with teams of over 15 nationalities, our working language is English, we work on topics that move our clients forward and our people are good at finding the most efficient solution.

No matter who you are, where you come from, what you believe, or what you geek out about, we bring people together to make great work. That's what makes us THIS IS! Digital Media Group.

If you love development, you should join us!

--------------------------------------

812 --> Unity Designer
KellyMitchell Group, Inc
Seattle, WA (Hybrid)
Job summary: Our client is looking for a designer to support their mixed realities team.

The KellyMitchell Group is a premier technology consulting company dedicated to matching the most qualified IT professionals with top organizations nationwide. Our clients, ranging from Fortune 500 corporations to rapidly growing high-tech companies, are exceptionally served by our 1500+ IT and business consultants.

KellyMitchell has been recognized for the past seven years by ClearlyRated and Staffing Industry Analysts for “Best in Staffing - Client Satisfaction.” These awards are coveted by the top 1% of workforce solutions firms in the industry based on client feedback and appreciation. Come work with us!

Responsibilities

Design new immersive reality features that contribute to the product roadmap
Translate design and product documentation into technical specifications and subsequently develop them as new features
Focus on metaverse experiences, unity and designing prototypes

Skills And Qualifications

8+ years of experience in visual and experience design
STRONG unity experience
Experience building own models
VR or MR experience
Experience creating avatars to embody AI characters in space
Strong understanding of how avatars navigate around space/visual layout of space/interaction on picking up objects/discussing feedback from the users

Preferred Qualifications

Game design experience
C++ experience
Maya or blender

813 --> Studio Manager – Extended Reality / Metaverse (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Hof, Bavaria, Germany
Groß denken, klein anfangen, schnell skalieren – ab geht die Reise ins Metaverse. – Mit deinem umfangreichen Medienwissen und sicherer Routine gehörst du als Studiomanager:in für XR und Multimedia zu Accentures marktführenden Expert:innen für Metaverse-Technologien und -Erfahrungen. In einem der weltweit größten Technologie- und Beratungsunternehmen bist du zu Hause im technologisch-kreativen XR-Alltag. Gemeinsam begleiten wir Unternehmen auf ihrer Metaverse-Reise, revolutionieren das Interagieren in virtuellen Räumen und medial erweiterten physischen Orten und schaffen ganz neue Business-Möglichkeiten.

Das erwartet dich

Als Studiomanager:in unseres Studios in Kronberg bei Frankfurt/M. bist du für die Organisation und Umsetzung von XR-Maßnahmen verantwortlich.

Vor Ort bist du für interne und externe Kunden Hauptansprechperson in Sachen XR und Multimedia und bringst dein kontinuierlich erweitertes Medienwissen in die Kundenbetreuung ein.

Du unterstützt, filmst und recordest auch Kolleg:innen unterschiedlicher Hierarchie-Level und bereitest das Bild- und Ton-Material in Absprache mit den jeweiligen Partner:innen professionell auf.

Verschiedene Kamerasysteme, Mikrofone und Cutting-Sets handhabst du routiniert und sicher wie im Schlaf.

Mit kreativer Begeisterung und einem guten Auge für Video- und Audioschnitt übernimmst du auch die zielkanalgerechte Nachbearbeitung.

Darauf freuen wir uns

Abgeschlossenes Studium der Medien-, Kommunikations-, Filmwissenschaften oder Psycholinguistik

Praxis in DaVinci Resolve und Fusion sowie sicherer Umgang mit den Tools der Adobe Creative Cloud

Begeisterung für kreativen Video- und Audioschnitt

Kenntnisse in der Nutzung gängiger Hardware, z. B. Blackmagic Design Equipment, Canon C-Kameras, Cinema light, Onsite-Audio, Multimedia usw.

Spaß und Sicherheit im Umgang mit Menschen sowie Medienaffinität und generelle Technologiebegeisterung

Deine Vorteile bei Accenture

Du als Mensch bist uns wichtig. Das wirst du täglich spüren und erleben. Denn unsere Arbeitswelt ist auf dich ausgerichtet und bietet dir die umfassenden Benefits eines großen, verantwortungsvollen Arbeitgebers. Dein zukünftiges Team schätzt vor allem

flexible Arbeitszeitmodelle

Homeoffice

umfassende Trainingsangebote, Fort- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten

tolle Events für Mitarbeitende

unsere Arbeitskultur, die Diversität und Inklusion fördert

Dein Kontakt

Du hast Fragen? Dann wende dich an unser Recruiting Team per E-Mail an recruiting_germany@accenture.com oder telefonisch unter 00800 45045045.

Wir freuen uns auf deine Bewerbung.

815 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

818 --> Technical Services Engineer - Flash Array
Pure Storage
Paris, Île-de-France, France
BE PART OF BUILDING THE FUTURE.

What do NASA and emerging space companies have in common with COVID vaccine R&D teams or with Roblox and the Metaverse?

The answer is data, -- all fast moving, fast growing industries rely on data for a competitive edge in their industries. And the most advanced companies are realizing the full data advantage by partnering with Pure Storage. Pure’s vision is to redefine the storage experience and empower innovators by simplifying how people consume and interact with data. With 9,000 customers including 50% of the Fortune 500, we’ve only scratched the surface of our ambitions .

Pure Is Blazing Trails And Setting Records

For eight straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant
Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a certified Net Promoter Score in the top 1% of B2B companies globally
Industry analysts and press applaud Pure’s leadership across these dimensions
And, our 4,000+ employees are emboldened to make Pure a faster, stronger, smarter company as we go

If you, like us, say “bring it on” to exciting challenges that change the world, we have endless opportunities where you can make your mark.

Location: France, Remote

SHOULD YOU ACCEPT THIS CHALLENGE...

Pure Storage has Support centers in Mountain View, CA, Lehi, UT, Dublin, Ireland & Singapore, Asia. We are looking for a senior Technical Support Engineer to join our 24x7 Support team. You will be part of the best Support team in the industry. Our culture focuses on 5 key values – Persistence, Creativity, Teamwork, Ownership, and Customer First. You will work on problems of diverse scope where analysis will include hardware, software, and environmental factors within our FlashArray product. Our Support Engineers utilize their deep technical expertise to troubleshoot customer issues and resolve them. Successful Support Engineers will be able to build strong networks across different departments in the company.

Proactively seek to understand customer expectations
Answer and resolve support cases across all severity levels
Own and track customer issues using our ticket tracking system
Own all customer facing communications, ensuring the message is concise and professional
Shares, and documents knowledge via FAQ / KB articles, which can be internal or customer facing
Develops junior support engineers through training, and coaching
Manage multiple projects/support cases simultaneously
Champion customer issues internally, and represent the company externally
Leads large multi participant customer calls, including hot escalations
Normally receives little instruction on day-to-day work, general instructions on new assignments
Weekend, holiday, and on call duties as required

What You’ll Need To Bring To This Role...

Minimum 1 years of experience in customer-facing, technical support work
Subject Matter Expert in one or more technologies
Proven ability to resolve customer problems, and escalations utilizing appropriate internal and external resources
Proven technical troubleshooting skills in a complex multi-platform-system-vendor environment
Experience in supporting both hardware, and software products
Ability to triage issues, and escalate them to appropriate engineering groups as necessary
Advanced to expert knowledge of technologies such as operating systems (Solaris, LINUX, Windows, VMware), LANs & WANs, and storage area networks
Knowledge, and ability to troubleshoot Networking, Replication, Performance and Space issues
Demonstration of subject matter expertise in one or more of the following: SAN, iSCSI, FCoE, FCP, Block Protocols
Must be willing and able to work in an open office, team environment.

BE YOU—CORPORATE CLONES NEED NOT APPLY.

Pure is where you ask big questions, think differently, and make an impact. This is not just a job, but a place where you have a voice and can accelerate your career. We value unique thoughts and celebrate individuality, and with ample opportunity to learn, develop yourself, and expand into different roles, joining Pure is an investment in your career journey.

Through our Pure Equality program, which supports a flourishing field of employee resource groups, we nourish the personal and professional lives of our team members. And our Pure Good Foundation gives back to local and global communities through volunteering and grants.

And because we understand the value of bringing your full and best self to work, we offer a variety of perks to manage a healthy balance, including flexible time off, wellness resources, and company-sponsored team events.

PURE IS COMMITTED TO EQUALITY.

Research shows that in order to apply for a job, women feel they need to meet 100% of the criteria while men usually apply after meeting about 60%. Regardless of how you identify, if you believe you can do the job and are a good match, we encourage you to apply.

Pure is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, transgender status, sexual stereotypes, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or any other characteristic legally protected by the laws of the jurisdiction in which you are being considered for hire.

If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at TA-Ops@purestorage.com .

APPLICANT & CANDIDATE PERSONAL INFORMATION PRIVACY NOTICE.

If you're wondering how or why Pure collects or uses information you provide, we invite you to check out our Applicant & Candidate Personal Information Protection Notice .

DEEMED EXPORT LICENSE NOTICE.

Some positions may require a deemed export license for compliance with applicable laws and regulations. Please note: Pure does not currently sponsor deemed export license applications so we are unable to proceed with applicants requiring stated sponsorship.

PURE’S COMPLIANCE WITH THE U.S. GOVERNMENT COVID-19 MANDATE

In accordance with Pure’s policies, current and anticipated federal regulations, and our ongoing commitment to prioritizing the health and well-being of our employees, partners, and customers, and the community at large, where permitted by law, all Pure employees and contractors working in the United States are expected to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 prior to your start date. Should you require an exemption for medical or religious reasons, you must initiate Pure’s exemption request process which will determine if an exemption can be granted in accordance with applicable local, state, and/or federal law.

819 --> Web3 Engineer
Altered State Machine
Auckland, Auckland, New Zealand (Remote)
Altered State Machine are looking for a technically excellent, motivated and proven Ethereum Blockchain Engineer with at least one high volume Solidity project under their belt, to be part of a strong core team that are well versed in the security, performance and commercial viability concerns of developing smart contract based applications.

Experience with Functional Programming, Typescript, React, GraphQL, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, Kinesis and API Gateway or Unity Game Engine would be highly desirable.

Key Objectives / Outcomes
Develop  software to meet agreed technical and design specifications to a high-quality, with little supervision;
Make contributions to product architecture;
Effectively review other developers’ code;
Contribute to business requirements and technical specification documents;
Thoroughly test software and log defects including - Unit Tests, Integration Tests, Performance Testing; and
Provide on-call support to applications in production when necessary

Requirements

Knowledge and Experience
Experience designing, delivering and supporting secure, high volume smart contracts.
Ability to design smart contracts to minimise gas costs to users
Ability to contribute to a high profile protocol launch including, a governance DAO, ERC20 Token, ERC721/1155 NFT drops
Confidence in designing critical, high value contracts for token vesting, liquidity mining and play-to-earn gaming.
Experience integrating backend/frontend applications with smart-contracts and execution logs.
Strong communication skills and highly effective when working with a team.

Key Work Behavioural Competencies
Highly motivated, takes ownership and thrives when working in small teams to implement scalable, high-performing solutions;
Outgoing and engaging, able to build or bring together a strong community of developers;
Excellent verbal and non-verbal communication skills: asks questions, is transparent, keeps people updated;
Strong relationship building and relationship management skills: is respectful, supportive, inclusive and flexible;
Action driven: focuses on core responsibilities, is proactive, shows initiative and delivers on objectives and timelines;
Effective collaboration abilities: listens, trusts and shares, shows readiness to take on or give up responsibilities as needed;
Learning focussed: continually develops technical and non-technical skills and knowledge, seeks feedback; and
High integrity: always operates with the best interests of the company in mind.

Benefits

We're a great place to work at
Experienced and wickedly talented team of 50 and growing
Venture funded by a consortium of 20 leading crypto investors… and more every day
Plenty of opportunity
Real work-life balance

We can offer
Great variety (no two days are the same)
Exciting international projects
Engaging with global AAA gaming companies, game platforms and investors
The right salary
Flexibility with WFH options
The chance to be part of the next generation of the internet… the decentralised metaverse

We’re looking for people to help us build the future of AI and gaming in Web3. If the above sounds like you and the idea of new technologies, gaming and the Metaverse excites you, we’d love to chat.

820 --> Decentralized Identity Consultant (all genders)
Accenture DACH
Kronberg, Hesse, Germany
We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for innovative pioneers to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The Work

You’ll often be:

Developing global Digital Identity & Biometrics technical assets (technical architecture blueprints, demos, technology & standards outlook)

Researching latest technology trends and standards to develop a detailed POV’s

Supporting the development of technical training assets to train local teams and enable Digital Identity & Biometrics engagement delivery

Developing and updating Digital Identity & Biometrics technology policies, standards, solution patents, and global reference architectures

Contributing to Digital Identity & Biometrics teams’ written/oral sales opportunities, business development, and proposals

What’s In It For You?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Required Qualifications

3+ years’ experience leveraging emerging technologies to deliver large scale transformations for clients

Demonstrated experience with Digital/Decentralized Identity initiatives

Awareness of the Digital / Decentralized Identity use cases and enterprise value

Knowledge of processes, tools, or technologies related to Decentralized/Blockchain Identity technology architectures

Demonstrated experience explaining how an offering and service provides value and addresses industry and business challenges

Preferred Qualifications

Experience designing high level technical architectures

Proficiency communicating new and complex scenarios and solutions to varying audiences ranging from business process leads to C-suite executives

Understanding of Biometrics, Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), and service sales and delivery lifecycle

Demonstrated experience facilitating discussions through storytelling and a strong management presence

822 --> Business Development Executive EduTech
The Justified Talent Group
Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
iSee™ is an Australian video meeting solution that enables many-to-many crowd collaboration, merging video conferencing with interactive, virtual spaces. Participants' video and audio is streamed in real time via personal webcams into an immersive setting where they can move around freely, form groups, talk and share content just as they would in the real world.

The iSee technology enables large video meetings to take place using an order of magnitude less bandwidth, with a higher level of engagement, than existing video conferencing systems.

This platform delivers rich stimulating experiences, immersive activity, community & culture. It's a compelling venue for team interaction, fostering the freedom to build strong relationships - to engage & discuss, debate & innovate - and to ultimately drive achievement online.

It is an exceptional, world-class Australian EduTech solution!

And this is our invitation to you, to join iSee, working from their Barangaroo offices as Business Development Executive.

Who are you?

Education

Well, in addition to your 3+ years in Education sector sales, (or, a strong software background especially ICT, cloud service providers, selling to senior procurement positions) if most people describe you as

A quick learner and commercially savvy;
Good at juggling multiple priorities at the same time;
Very goal driven and energetic;
Self-confident but not overbearing;
Someone who enjoys meeting with technology decision-makers and influencers;
A creative and adaptable thinker;
Comfortable in taking charge of sales situations when needed;
Good under pressure;
Resilient;
Pro-active and keen to take the initiative;
Good at reading both people - and the facts; and
Methodologically able to approach the sales process in a well organised way...

We'd be keen to chat with you. Especially if you have experience selling into large organisations with long sales cycles, strategic sales and contract negotiation skills.

The role?

You'll be selling a unique metaverse live video-conferencing product, sold by subscription with installed client, into the Australian K-12 education market, direct to schools and education departments, dealing with Principals, A/Ps, Curriculum Heads - and to Area Managers in the various Education Departments. There are significant opportunities in the University sector and you'll also be making inroads into the events and conferencing market.

The role will see you across the full gamut of identifying contacts, leveraging marketing, generating discovery opportunities, conducting discovery meetings, navigating their decision-making process, putting together proposals and negotiating sales.

Success in this role will evidenced in the building of a strong sales pipeline, retaining existing customers, growth of product use within the existing customer base, meeting sales revenue targets and delivering new sales in all target markets, especially new K-12.

Why would you?

iSee is an Australian SME software developer selling a highly unique product, with high growth potential. It's a small, agile business, with a flexible working environment and a great team of highly motivated and talented people. It's a vibrant culture and a product offering that is a genuine game charger. This is an opportunity to deliver new and interesting learning opportunities for school children, as well as delivering greater learning opportunities to remote and rural students.

You'll have full autonomy over all things sales and the respect of a CEO that values what it is you're bringing to work each day.

BONUS!! If you land this gig, we will pay for you to undertake a 6-week "Prospecting Outbound Workshop", facilitated by Australia's leading expert in social-selling, Mark Mcinnes. He will help you absolutely fill your pipeline using the latest methods that buyers actually appreciate.

We want you to be successful!

Interested? You know you are, right? So, why not go ahead and click on Apply Now, build your profile in our platform, complete a short 10-minute self-assessment that tells us a bit about your nature and we'll be in touch? No need for a Cover Letter or a Resume.

iSee is an Equal Opportunity employer and we encourage both female and mature-aged applicants as equally as all other suitably experienced individuals to apply.

Every application will be acknowledged and every applicant will learn the outcome of their application.

824 --> Directeur(trice) principal(e), numérique et innovation - responsable du métaverse
KPMG Canada
Vanderhoof, BC (On-site)
Aperçu

Chez KPMG, vous ferez partie d’une équipe diversifiée et dévouée de professionnels de la résolution de problèmes ayant un objectif commun traduire l’information en occasions pour nos clients et nos communautés partout dans le monde.

Sommaire du poste

Chez KPMG, nous croyons que la réalité étendue est une nouvelle frontière qui exploite des technologies convergentes pour façonner l’univers virtuel du futur – un monde en 3D immersif et interconnecté dans lequel la réalité virtuelle, la réalité augmentée, l’intelligence artificielle, la chaîne de blocs et les cryptomonnaies redéfiniront notre façon de vivre, de travailler et de socialiser. Il s’agit d’une occasion exceptionnelle de rejoindre l’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG au Canada, qui connaît une croissance rapide, afin d’aider nos clients à franchir cette nouvelle frontière numérique qu’on appelle le métavers. Nous sommes à la recherche de pionniers passionnés pour aider nos clients à générer une valeur durable dans ce réseau émergent de réalité virtuelle qui transformera le commerce, l’expérience client et les communautés.

L’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG est composée de concepteurs innovateurs qui exploitent ensemble les technologies de pointe pour créer de nouvelles façons de travailler et d’interagir dans le monde numérique multisectoriel.

Ce que vous ferez

Relevant directement de l’associé directeur et président, Numérique et innovation, le titulaire travaille en étroite collaboration avec le leader, Cryptoactifs et chaîne de blocs, le leader, Expérience client, et d’autres équipes interfonctionnelles utilisant différentes plateformes virtuelles afin d’aider nos clients à mener à bien leurs projets dans le métavers. Il s’agit notamment d’informer les clients, de préparer des propositions, de créer des contenus stimulants sur le métavers, et de partager des expériences réussies sur diverses plateformes. Il met à profit son expérience et ses compétences en communication narrative pour simplifier, à l’intention des hauts dirigeants, certains aspects plus complexes du métavers et du Web3 et proposer des stratégies qui favoriseront le succès des initiatives actuelles et futures de l’organisation.

Les candidats retenus nourrissent une véritable passion pour le métavers, les jetons non fongibles (NFT), la finance décentralisée et le Web3, combinée à une connaissance approfondie des pratiques institutionnelles du secteur.

Bien que vos activités varieront chaque jour, voici les principales tâches dont vous devrez vous acquitter dans le cadre de vos fonctions
Définir et diriger la stratégie de mise sur le marché en collaboration avec le groupe de travail Métavers.
Diriger l’élaboration de propositions à fort impact et visuellement attrayantes, qui présentent des idées qui incitent à la réflexion, suscitent l’intérêt des clients et offrent une valeur ajoutée.
Conseiller les clients sur les stratégies de mise en œuvre du métavers, y compris l’établissement et la hiérarchisation des cas d’utilisation pertinents, et la conception de l’expérience.
Organiser des ateliers de formation stimulants et des démonstrations des plateformes virtuelles utilisées dans divers secteurs d’activité.
Établir et entretenir des collaborations stratégiques avec des organisations externes afin de dégager des occasions concrètes dans ce domaine.
Concevoir des événements numériques et des activités commerciales dans le métavers pour nos équipes, nos clients et nos collectivités; planifier, concevoir, animer et superviser la prestation de telles expériences.
Faire des recherches et développer du contenu qui informe et démontre notre clairvoyance et notre leadership éclairé, tant à l’interne qu’à l’externe.

Ce que vous apportez au rôle
Passion pour le métavers, les expériences de réalité augmentée/réalité virtuelle (RA/RV) et l’infrastructure technologique sous-jacente.
Présence active sur plusieurs plateformes virtuelles (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.).
Connaissance de base des processus, des outils et des éléments constitutifs de la réalité étendue (RA/RV), du métavers, des NFT, du système d’économie de jetons et des portefeuilles de cryptomonnaies.
Bonne compréhension des tendances émergentes et des cas d’utilisation dans l’espace du Web3 et du métavers.
Au moins cinq ans d’expérience dans le développement commercial des technologies.
Expérience dans la création, le lancement, le maintien et la croissance de communautés en ligne et d’initiatives visant à stimuler la mobilisation de la communauté.
Solides compétences en matière de communication et de collaboration, et capacité à s’exprimer à la fois à un niveau technique et à un niveau stratégique.
Capacité à diriger simultanément plusieurs flux de travail et plusieurs missions.
Expérience dans l’animation, la communication narrative et les présentations aux clients.
Les clés de votre succès

Les membres du personnel de KPMG agissent efficacement | favorisent la croissance | inspirent confiance et comprennent que la diversité de la main‐d’œuvre nous permet d’approfondir nos relations et d’enrichir le cabinet.

Nous sommes là pour vous soutenir afin que vous puissiez donner le meilleur de vous-même.

Pour en savoir plus sur les avantages sociaux et le bien-être de KPMG au Canada, cliquez ici.

Nos valeurs, la façon KPMG

Intégrité, nous faisons ce qui est juste | Excellence, nous ne cessons jamais d’apprendre et de nous améliorer | Courage, nous pensons et agissons avec audace | Ensemble, nous nous respectons les uns les autres et puisons notre force dans nos différences | Pour le mieux, nous faisons en sorte que notre travail compte

KPMG au Canada souscrit fièrement au principe de l’égalité d’accès à l’emploi et s’engage à offrir un environnement de travail respectueux, inclusif et sans obstacle, permettant ainsi à tous les membres de son personnel de se réaliser pleinement. Un effectif diversifié est la clé de notre réussite et nous croyons à notre mission qui vise à ce que vous soyez complètement vous-même au travail. Nous invitons tous les candidats qualifiés à se manifester et nous espérons que vous ferez de KPMG au Canada votre employeur de choix. Pour obtenir plus de renseignements sur l’Inclusion, diversité et équité au recrutement, cliquez ici.

Pour toute question de recrutement d’ordre général, communiquez avec le Centre de prestation des RH à l’adresse cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca.

Si vous avez des questions en matière d’accessibilité à l’emploi chez KPMG ou si vous désirez entamer une conversation confidentielle à propos de vos besoins personnels en matière d’accessibilité et de mesures d’aménagement pendant le processus de recrutement, nous vous encourageons à communiquer avec notre Service des relations avec les employés, par courriel au cafmcdnhrsthotline@kpmg.ca ou par téléphone au 416-777-8002 ou sans frais au 1-888-466-4778.

826 --> Virtual Reality VR Unity Developer / 3D Model Designer - Science Fiction
Museum of Science Fiction
Washington, DC (Remote)
The Museum of Science Fiction is currently designing a digital twin of an eventual physical facility and is looking for volunteers to help build it and establish an immediate VR presence for the Museum. As a nonprofit 501c(3) organization, we have assembled a large all-volunteer team and have successfully crowd-sourced our programs, activities, and events since 2013.

The Museum of Science Fiction believes that science fiction is rich with ideas that can serve as a springboard for curiosity and seeks to make a measurable positive impact on STEAM-related educational activities. Based on the belief that science fiction holds educational value for all ages, the Museum is creating a VR experience that will educate and spark interest in STEAM through science fiction. The VR Museum, in its final form, will consist of a major entrance hall, seven themed galleries, and outside spaces. The seven galleries include: Creators, Time Travel, Lifeforms, Computers and Robots, Vehicles, Technology, and Other Worlds.

Looking to the future of Web3 and the next phase of the internet, we feel that the metaverse is rapidly coming of age for mass adoption. If you are a VR developer or 3D model designer and would like to lend a hand for just a few hours a week, we would love to hear from you!

Responsibilities / Qualifications
Strong 3D skills with a deep knowledge of computer graphics (lighting, texturing shading, rigging, FX, etc.)
Familiar with agile software development philosophy and practices
Experience developing, performance profiling, and optimizing in Unity
Proficient with computer graphics content creation tools
Experience working with a software development team lead and a project team of designers, project managers and quality analysts
Experience working with the creative team to realize a design concept into implementation
Experience testing innovative new technologies to gain visitor experience insights to help plan a future physical museum

Additional Information
https://www.museumofsciencefiction.org
https://www.museumofsciencefiction.org/vrmosf
https://www.museumofsciencefiction.org/s/VR-Museum-Design-White-Paper-3-14-2022-web.pdf
