827 --> Directeur(trice) principal(e), numérique et innovation - responsable du métaverse
KPMG Canada
Oakville, ON (On-site)
Aperçu

Chez KPMG, vous ferez partie d’une équipe diversifiée et dévouée de professionnels de la résolution de problèmes ayant un objectif commun traduire l’information en occasions pour nos clients et nos communautés partout dans le monde.

Sommaire du poste

Chez KPMG, nous croyons que la réalité étendue est une nouvelle frontière qui exploite des technologies convergentes pour façonner l’univers virtuel du futur – un monde en 3D immersif et interconnecté dans lequel la réalité virtuelle, la réalité augmentée, l’intelligence artificielle, la chaîne de blocs et les cryptomonnaies redéfiniront notre façon de vivre, de travailler et de socialiser. Il s’agit d’une occasion exceptionnelle de rejoindre l’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG au Canada, qui connaît une croissance rapide, afin d’aider nos clients à franchir cette nouvelle frontière numérique qu’on appelle le métavers. Nous sommes à la recherche de pionniers passionnés pour aider nos clients à générer une valeur durable dans ce réseau émergent de réalité virtuelle qui transformera le commerce, l’expérience client et les communautés.

L’équipe Création du contenu de KPMG est composée de concepteurs innovateurs qui exploitent ensemble les technologies de pointe pour créer de nouvelles façons de travailler et d’interagir dans le monde numérique multisectoriel.

Ce que vous ferez

Relevant directement de l’associé directeur et président, Numérique et innovation, le titulaire travaille en étroite collaboration avec le leader, Cryptoactifs et chaîne de blocs, le leader, Expérience client, et d’autres équipes interfonctionnelles utilisant différentes plateformes virtuelles afin d’aider nos clients à mener à bien leurs projets dans le métavers. Il s’agit notamment d’informer les clients, de préparer des propositions, de créer des contenus stimulants sur le métavers, et de partager des expériences réussies sur diverses plateformes. Il met à profit son expérience et ses compétences en communication narrative pour simplifier, à l’intention des hauts dirigeants, certains aspects plus complexes du métavers et du Web3 et proposer des stratégies qui favoriseront le succès des initiatives actuelles et futures de l’organisation.

Les candidats retenus nourrissent une véritable passion pour le métavers, les jetons non fongibles (NFT), la finance décentralisée et le Web3, combinée à une connaissance approfondie des pratiques institutionnelles du secteur.

Bien que vos activités varieront chaque jour, voici les principales tâches dont vous devrez vous acquitter dans le cadre de vos fonctions
Définir et diriger la stratégie de mise sur le marché en collaboration avec le groupe de travail Métavers.
Diriger l’élaboration de propositions à fort impact et visuellement attrayantes, qui présentent des idées qui incitent à la réflexion, suscitent l’intérêt des clients et offrent une valeur ajoutée.
Conseiller les clients sur les stratégies de mise en œuvre du métavers, y compris l’établissement et la hiérarchisation des cas d’utilisation pertinents, et la conception de l’expérience.
Organiser des ateliers de formation stimulants et des démonstrations des plateformes virtuelles utilisées dans divers secteurs d’activité.
Établir et entretenir des collaborations stratégiques avec des organisations externes afin de dégager des occasions concrètes dans ce domaine.
Concevoir des événements numériques et des activités commerciales dans le métavers pour nos équipes, nos clients et nos collectivités; planifier, concevoir, animer et superviser la prestation de telles expériences.
Faire des recherches et développer du contenu qui informe et démontre notre clairvoyance et notre leadership éclairé, tant à l’interne qu’à l’externe.

Ce que vous apportez au rôle
Passion pour le métavers, les expériences de réalité augmentée/réalité virtuelle (RA/RV) et l’infrastructure technologique sous-jacente.
Présence active sur plusieurs plateformes virtuelles (Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces, etc.).
Connaissance de base des processus, des outils et des éléments constitutifs de la réalité étendue (RA/RV), du métavers, des NFT, du système d’économie de jetons et des portefeuilles de cryptomonnaies.
Bonne compréhension des tendances émergentes et des cas d’utilisation dans l’espace du Web3 et du métavers.
Au moins cinq ans d’expérience dans le développement commercial des technologies.
Expérience dans la création, le lancement, le maintien et la croissance de communautés en ligne et d’initiatives visant à stimuler la mobilisation de la communauté.
Solides compétences en matière de communication et de collaboration, et capacité à s’exprimer à la fois à un niveau technique et à un niveau stratégique.
Capacité à diriger simultanément plusieurs flux de travail et plusieurs missions.
Expérience dans l’animation, la communication narrative et les présentations aux clients.
Les clés de votre succès

Nous sommes là pour vous soutenir afin que vous puissiez donner le meilleur de vous-même.

KPMG au Canada souscrit fièrement au principe de l’égalité d’accès à l’emploi et s’engage à offrir un environnement de travail respectueux, inclusif et sans obstacle, permettant ainsi à tous les membres de son personnel de se réaliser pleinement. Un effectif diversifié est la clé de notre réussite et nous croyons à notre mission qui vise à ce que vous soyez complètement vous-même au travail. Our software engineers and technical architects get to build cool software systems. Everyone on the team is self-motivated, has a positive attitude, and great interpersonal skills. Our projects are driven by innovation, not by necessity. 829 --> IP Analyst (Hybrid/Remote)
Utopia Music
Helsinki, Uusimaa, Finland (Remote)
WELCOME TO UTOPIA

Music is incredible. It can excite hundreds, and unite thousands. But as an industry, it has been slow, complicated, and disparate. While the tech world has moved into the future, the music industry continues to be shaped by inefficient systems of the past. At Utopia we believe there is a better way. Which is why today we are setting out to transform the entire industry; creating new revenue streams, consolidating the data and decluttering the admin. Unlocking the industry’s full potential by unifying it all in one truly holistic space. Some might call that a Utopia.

Funnily enough, so do we. Welcome to Utopia. Where music lives.

What Utopians Do

The open secret is that the music industry is struggling with the very basics of music accounting: What was played, when and where? Who should get paid and how much?

Utopia Music is bridging the data gap by connecting global consumption, accurate metadata, and fast payments to an industry-wide trust platform. Our goal is to unlock creative value and enable Fair Pay For Every Play to make a better world for Music. The solutions we offer do not threaten to usurp the role of industry incumbents - it is about bringing transparency in the industry and supporting efficient royalty collection for all.

THE ROLE

As IP Analyst, you will work on the first line, advising on all matters relating to IP landscaping and provide regular IP reports to different business and functions. As a key member of the BA – Intellectual Property team you will be a corner stone in achieving Utopia’s objective to Gain the Trust of the Industry, and will collaborate closely with our Strategy and Business Units.

You will be a key player, a strategic business partner providing IP searches and analysis to enable effective and informed decision making within Utopia Group.

You will collaborate closely with our inventor’s community to develop a first class WW IP portfolio, and with our Business Analysts to provide insights on dynamic market changes within the competition and other insights that positively impact business decisions and strategy, by ensuring all competitive IP intelligence is available and easily accessible to key customers, partners and other stakeholders.

Responsibilities

In this position, you will be primarily accountable for consistently and effectively:
Developing and delivering regular analysed IP data, insights and reports, including competitor IP landscapes, threat assessments, strength positioning, etc.
Conducting IP landscape evaluations to identify trends in a technology field, deliver IP competitive intelligence, identify potential new research areas, licensing and acquisition opportunities
Preparing search reports and IP landscaping analysis and share with key stakeholders adapting the content to the audience
Acting in providing support to develop and maintain a first class World Wide IP Portfolio
Provide technical research and analysis with respect to patentability, validity, freedom-to-operate, infringement, monitoring of the competitive landscape in different technological areas
Prepare search strategies to identify relevant patent and scientific literature in a given technology domain, and subsequent analysis
Identify and report innovations in a specific technology domain through analysis of patent, product, and academic literature
Provide support in assisting inventors with invention disclosure forms, refining/pivoting inventions if/when needed
Assisting Business Units with innovation capture
Review and provide technical analysis related to patent applications search reports.

Requirements
At least 3 years in similar roles with competitive intelligence and IP search - with advanced degree required in Electrical/Data Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field
Patent/IP Agent/Scientific /Business Analyst - experience in search and patent literature
Experience with patent related databases and proven experience in the patent searcher field is preferable
Technical background/knowledge in data and databases, signal processing, music industry, gaming industry, new technologies (blockchain, metaverse, Big Data management, etc.)
Proficient in MS Office including Word, Excel and PowerPoint
Fluent in English, additional languages are a plus!
Experience leading actionable and cross-functional strategic workshops

What We Offer
Great atmosphere - we live, love & breathe music & tech!
Working in an impact oriented team and inclusive company culture.
An experienced team to learn from, with proven track records in multiple startups and big tech companies.
Our flexible remote policy provides Utopians the freedom to work either from one of our inspiring offices or from home.
We celebrate being an international and multicultural company.
Competitive benefits; packages depend on location. You’ll be given more details on this during the interview process.
We are recruiting across the following of our European locations for this role (UK, Sweden, Switzerland, Finland, Spain, Germany, Netherlands) and can therefore only move forward with applications from those already based in these locations and with eligibility to work in the country you are based in.

THE HIRING PROCESS
You send us your CV in English
We invite you for an introductory video call with the Talent Acquisition team to get to know you better and share more about us
We invite you for a video interview with our head of IP and Licensing
We kindly ask that you complete a assignment at home to be presented and discussed during a final interview with the team

UTOPIANS

As we want to bring transparency, trust, and clarity to the music industry we serve, we know a change comes from within. Utopia is a transparent, trust-based organization striving to have clarity in thinking and doing what we set out to do.

We execute urgently and innovate to grow faster. We ship things that make a difference today, so we can make them better tomorrow. We embrace fairness and are all accountable.

Strictly diverse and inclusive. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We celebrate our diverse backgrounds and we welcome everyone who identifies with the above to apply. Welcome to Utopia - Where Music Lives!

We’re eager to meet You! :)

Utopia Music is a Swiss Music fintech company leveling up the Music Industry through clear, transparent, and reliable data-based solutions. We support the whole Industry to make more money, faster, with less costs, and less errors.

In Utopia, the Industry sees market opportunities live. Investors elevate Music catalogs into a real asset class. Collection societies track more and spend less. Labels, publishers, and distributors simplify and enhance their business. And everyone gets Fair Pay for Every Play.

Utopia is serving the music copyrights and the industry from creation to consumption, and will never compete against it. It means that we will never own copyrights. We will never be owned by the major stakeholders of the industry. We will never share or sell data of our customers to anyone else.

832 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

833 --> Social Media Advertising Director- Comptes Luxe F/M/X
Prosperity Recruitment
Paris, Île-de-France, France (On-site)
Nous recrutons un.e Social Media Advertising Director (publicité sur les réseaux sociaux) au sein d’une grande Agence Media en CDI à Paris Centre.

Scope: tu seras responsable de 3 grands comptes Luxe et d’une équipe de 10 personnes.

C’est une opportunité fantastique de travailler au sein d’un des plus grands Groupes Media en France et dans le monde, rejoindre une grande équipe digitale qui gagne de nouveaux clients tous les mois et grandit à vue d’oeil et avoir un impact sur le développement marketing et commercial des plus grandes maisons de Luxe en Europe et WW !

Si tu es expert.e Social Ads (Meta, TikTok, Snapchat, Pinterest, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube), si tu as une expérience en management d’équipe et si tu souhaites progresser au sein d’un groupe ambitieux, ce poste est fait pour toi.

Tu travailleras dans une équipe Social de 50+ personnes, main dans la main avec 5 autres Managers et reporteras au Head of Social. Tu formeras et accompagneras 2/3 Leads, 3/4 Seniors et 4/5 Juniors et participeras activement à la rétention et au staffing de ton équipe.

Tu auras accès à tous les outils du marché et bénéficieras de nombreuses formations en interne.

Missions

Management de 10 personnes spécialisé.e.s Social Media : Leads, Seniors et Juniors
Formation, recrutement, rétention des membres de ton équipe
Management de 3 grands comptes Luxe
Pilotage des besoins Social Media Advertising (SMA) – scope FR, EUR, et WW
Lead des prises de briefs client
Construction et présentation des meilleures recommandations stratégiques avec ton équipe
Supervision de l’avancée des campagnes Social (Meta, TikTok, Snapchat, Pinterest, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube), bilans & reportings
Gestion et suivi de la relation client
Collaboration étroite avec les autres Managers et les autres expertises en interne : Display, Search, SEO, Programmatique, Conseil, e-Retail, Data, etc.
Suivi des budgets et investissements – scope FR, EUR, et WW

Profil Recherché

Environ 7+ ans d’expérience en gestion de campagnes Social Ads / Social Media Advertising / Paid Social et management d’équipe
Connaissances pointues du fonctionnement et système d’achat des plateformes Meta (Facebook, Instagram), TikTok, Snapchat, Pinterest, Twitter, LinkedIn
Connaissance des KPIs performance, branding, traffic
Excellente organisation et gestion des priorités
Curiosité pour les tendances digitales et l’analyse des data
Excellent niveau de français à l’oral et à l’écrit
Français et Anglais courant
Eligible à travailler en Europe (UE)

‘Nice-to-Have'

Connaissance de l’univers du luxe
Grande curiosité, intérêt ou connaissance du Metaverse et des NFTs

Avantages :

Prime de Performance Groupe
Plans Épargne & Retraite  Entreprise
Prime d’intéressement
Primes de cooptation
Restaurant d’entreprise
27 jours de congés + 12 RTT
90 jours de télétravail (2j /semaine) + 6 semaines de télétravail de n’importe où en France ou à l’étranger
Excellente mutuelle & prévoyance
Nombreuses formations disponibles pour chaque employé.e
Nombreuses options de mobilité interne : inter-équipe, inter-bureaux, internationale
CSE

Notre client est engagé dans une politique RSE en faveur de la Diversité Equité & Inclusion et de la lutte contre le dérèglement climatique avec des objectifs concrets d’ici 2030, comme par exemple : aider les marques à réduire leur impact environnemental de leurs campagnes marketing, réduire leurs déplacements en avion, leur conso d’énergie et l’utilisation de matières premières, agir pour le recyclage en interne et en externe, soutenir les communautés et minorités sous-représentées dans le monde entier en interne et via leurs clients, etc.

834 --> IP Analyst (Hybrid/Remote)
Utopia Music
Stockholm City, Stockholm County, Sweden (Remote)
WELCOME TO UTOPIA

Music is incredible. It can excite hundreds, and unite thousands. But as an industry, it has been slow, complicated, and disparate. While the tech world has moved into the future, the music industry continues to be shaped by inefficient systems of the past. At Utopia we believe there is a better way. Which is why today we are setting out to transform the entire industry; creating new revenue streams, consolidating the data and decluttering the admin. Unlocking the industry’s full potential by unifying it all in one truly holistic space. Some might call that a Utopia.

Funnily enough, so do we. Welcome to Utopia. Where music lives.

What Utopians Do

The open secret is that the music industry is struggling with the very basics of music accounting: What was played, when and where? Who should get paid and how much?

Utopia Music is bridging the data gap by connecting global consumption, accurate metadata, and fast payments to an industry-wide trust platform. Our goal is to unlock creative value and enable Fair Pay For Every Play to make a better world for Music. The solutions we offer do not threaten to usurp the role of industry incumbents - it is about bringing transparency in the industry and supporting efficient royalty collection for all.

THE ROLE

As IP Analyst, you will work on the first line, advising on all matters relating to IP landscaping and provide regular IP reports to different business and functions. As a key member of the BA – Intellectual Property team you will be a corner stone in achieving Utopia’s objective to Gain the Trust of the Industry, and will collaborate closely with our Strategy and Business Units.

You will be a key player, a strategic business partner providing IP searches and analysis to enable effective and informed decision making within Utopia Group.

You will collaborate closely with our inventor’s community to develop a first class WW IP portfolio, and with our Business Analysts to provide insights on dynamic market changes within the competition and other insights that positively impact business decisions and strategy, by ensuring all competitive IP intelligence is available and easily accessible to key customers, partners and other stakeholders.

Responsibilities

In this position, you will be primarily accountable for consistently and effectively:
Developing and delivering regular analysed IP data, insights and reports, including competitor IP landscapes, threat assessments, strength positioning, etc.
Conducting IP landscape evaluations to identify trends in a technology field, deliver IP competitive intelligence, identify potential new research areas, licensing and acquisition opportunities
Preparing search reports and IP landscaping analysis and share with key stakeholders adapting the content to the audience
Acting in providing support to develop and maintain a first class World Wide IP Portfolio
Provide technical research and analysis with respect to patentability, validity, freedom-to-operate, infringement, monitoring of the competitive landscape in different technological areas
Prepare search strategies to identify relevant patent and scientific literature in a given technology domain, and subsequent analysis
Identify and report innovations in a specific technology domain through analysis of patent, product, and academic literature
Provide support in assisting inventors with invention disclosure forms, refining/pivoting inventions if/when needed
Assisting Business Units with innovation capture
Review and provide technical analysis related to patent applications search reports.

Requirements
At least 3 years in similar roles with competitive intelligence and IP search - with advanced degree required in Electrical/Data Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field
Patent/IP Agent/Scientific /Business Analyst - experience in search and patent literature
Experience with patent related databases and proven experience in the patent searcher field is preferable
Technical background/knowledge in data and databases, signal processing, music industry, gaming industry, new technologies (blockchain, metaverse, Big Data management, etc.)
Proficient in MS Office including Word, Excel and PowerPoint
Fluent in English, additional languages are a plus!
Experience leading actionable and cross-functional strategic workshops

What We Offer
Great atmosphere - we live, love & breathe music & tech!
Working in an impact oriented team and inclusive company culture.
An experienced team to learn from, with proven track records in multiple startups and big tech companies.
Our flexible remote policy provides Utopians the freedom to work either from one of our inspiring offices or from home.
We celebrate being an international and multicultural company.
Competitive benefits; packages depend on location. You’ll be given more details on this during the interview process.
We are recruiting across the following of our European locations for this role (UK, Sweden, Switzerland, Finland, Spain, Germany, Netherlands) and can therefore only move forward with applications from those already based in these locations and with eligibility to work in the country you are based in.

THE HIRING PROCESS
You send us your CV in English
We invite you for an introductory video call with the Talent Acquisition team to get to know you better and share more about us
We invite you for a video interview with our head of IP and Licensing
We kindly ask that you complete a assignment at home to be presented and discussed during a final interview with the team

UTOPIANS

As we want to bring transparency, trust, and clarity to the music industry we serve, we know a change comes from within. Utopia is a transparent, trust-based organization striving to have clarity in thinking and doing what we set out to do.

We execute urgently and innovate to grow faster. We ship things that make a difference today, so we can make them better tomorrow. We embrace fairness and are all accountable.

Strictly diverse and inclusive. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We celebrate our diverse backgrounds and we welcome everyone who identifies with the above to apply. Welcome to Utopia - Where Music Lives!

We’re eager to meet You! :)

Utopia Music is a Swiss Music fintech company leveling up the Music Industry through clear, transparent, and reliable data-based solutions. We support the whole Industry to make more money, faster, with less costs, and less errors.

In Utopia, the Industry sees market opportunities live. Investors elevate Music catalogs into a real asset class. Collection societies track more and spend less. Labels, publishers, and distributors simplify and enhance their business. And everyone gets Fair Pay for Every Play.

Utopia is serving the music copyrights and the industry from creation to consumption, and will never compete against it. It means that we will never own copyrights. We will never be owned by the major stakeholders of the industry. We will never share or sell data of our customers to anyone else.

--------------------------------------

835 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

836 --> Remote Full-Stack Developer Jobs
Turing.com
Colombia (Remote)
A fast-growing company operating in stealth mode while building the core infrastructure that will become the foundation for a decentralized metaverse is looking for a Full-Stack Developer. The developer will be interacting with the technical leadership, understanding their requirements, and executing them efficiently. The company is determined to help users to truly own their digital assets while enabling a seamless transfer from experience to experience. This will be a long-term position requiring some overlap with the PST time zone.

Job Responsibilities:

Build Unity plugins for developers to import the models at runtime
Refine model delivery service to send assets at runtime to game developers
Implement improvements to the company’s asset delivery UX
Participate in the team’s on-call rotation

Job Requirements:

Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science (or equivalent experience)
At least 3-5+ years of relevant experience as a full-stack engineer
Extensive experience in Node.js and Unity
Prolific experience in React and MySQL
Nice to have experience in UX design
Fluent in verbal and written English

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

--------------------------------------

839 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

840 --> PIXEL ART ENVIRONMENT ARTIST
Moon Boi Studios Ltd.
London, England, United Kingdom (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Moon Boi Studios are looking for interns to join our development team and help to create a space fantasy rpg intended for mobile and the metaverse. This is an unpaid position, ideal for candidates who wish to make their first steps/gain more experience within the industry and get a shipped title under their belt.

Heavily inspired by animé and sci-fi our game is set in a futuristic alternate universe.

We are offering the best candidates the opportunity to explore their creative skills and begin their journey into becoming a successful contributor to the professional industry of gaming.

As a team we will develop many fun loveable characters with deep and intricate storylines, focusing on comedic delivery in gameplay and speech coupled with explosive over the top action and power ups.

Our ideal candidate for the PIXEL ART ENVIRONMENT ARTIST position will have:
the ability to demonstrate their pixel art portfolio
Strong enviromental scope and attention to detail
knowledgeable in level design
a great work ethic
the ability to communicate effectively in a team setting
the determination and focus to see the project through to completion
Our internship can lead to permanent opportunities within the team.

--------------------------------------

841 --> Lead Technical Designer - Design, Metaverse
Improbable
Ireland (Remote)
At Improbable, we’ve been venturing into unexplored territory for over a decade, seeking new ways to connect people and amplify their lives. We’re shaping virtual worlds of unprecedented scale for the gaming, web3, defence, and related sectors, creating world-changing technology from Morpheus to M2. With us, you’ll tackle questions that no one else is asking and find answers that define the future.

We’re leading the way in defining what the metaverse can be. This is where you get to explore interconnected, immersive, exciting worlds that have never been seen before and where you decide what the future looks like. Are you ready?

Your Opportunity
Be accountable for discrete areas of the game, crossing multiple features and gameplay systems.
Direct more junior technical designers in creating features throughout the design and implementation process.
Design and build gameplay features that set a standard for others to follow.
Manage a growing team of designers and technical designers.
See your work in players hands and iterate the features over time with player feedback.
Drive the development of tools and pipelines to assist content creators in producing work quickly and efficiently.
Work alongside the technical leads to plan out features and dependent systems, and then schedule work tasks accordingly
Manage a growing team of designers and technical designers.
Inspire and motivate the design team to produce high-quality content within the project deadlines
Solve problems and improve the player experience by collaborating closely with other disciplines.

Why You're Made For This
A desire to grow and develop a team, considering each individual's wellbeing, differing needs and goals for their careers.
A desire to understand the moment-to-moment, hour-to-hour, day-to-day and week-to-week impact of the features you design and build.
Display a high degree of discipline in following and creating technical design processes.
A passion to create mechanics that layer together to create depth and complexity without overwhelming the player.
An understanding of the value of using Jira (or another tracking methodology) to organize work and communicate priorities and design goals.
Ability to prioritize & manage end-to-end design projects across the team, interfacing with different disciplines.
A desire to create guides, and other important documentation for more junior designers.
A passion to mentor more junior technical designers in best technical practices, growing their skills through feedback and reviews.
Strong knowledge of Unreal Engine Blueprint development and best practices.

We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, colour, ancestry, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, marital status or any other legally protected status.

While we believe the mentioned experiences could be important, we're keen to hear from people that have valuable experience to bring to the role. If you identify with the team and mission, but not all of the requirements, please still apply!

--------------------------------------

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

--------------------------------------

845 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

849 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Equal Employment Opportunity Statement

Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation.

All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.

Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.

For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement.

Requesting An Accommodation

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are hired by Accenture and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of your role, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.

If you would like to be considered for employment opportunities with Accenture and have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.

Other Employment Statements

Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.

Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.

Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

850 --> Technical Director - Metaverse Project
Crypto Recruit 
Sydney, New South Wales, Australia (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
Deep knowledge of game front end languages (C++, C#), methodologies and libraries, multiple game engines (Unity, Unreal, etc)

Job Description/ Responsibilities

The company is looking for an experienced technical director to oversee the creation of a backend platform and client SDK to support a multi-game ecosystem. The role will involve understanding and anticipating the needs of a variety of different game projects and coordinating the development of the technologies to support and grow a rich and complex infrastructure.

Requirements

At least 10+ years of experience in game development technology - Shipped at least 3 high-quality large-scale multiplayer games in a capacity as a lead programmer or technical director. - Deep understanding of back end technology stacks including database (SQL &NoSQL), web services (micro and monolithic), containerization, CDN, scalability, versioning, security, CI/CD, serverless, cloud platforms, languages (Nodejs, C#, Go, Python, Java) - Deep knowledge of game front end languages (C++, C#), methodologies and libraries, multiple game engines (Unity, Unreal, etc) - Strong commitment to clean code structure, avoiding tech debt, “rightsizing” code scope (neither under- nor over-engineered) - Familiarity with blockchain gaming and related technologies

To Hear More About This Role You Can

email - neil@cryptorecruit.com

Cryptorecruit are the worlds leading specialist recruiter for the blockchain/Cryptocurrency industry. We recruit positions from CEO,CTO, Project Manager, Solidity developer, frontend and Backend Blockchain developers to marketing/sales and customer service roles. Please browse our website and at www.cryptorecruit.com to search all our job vacancies.

Nanyang Technological University Singapore
Singapore, Singapore (On-site)
The School of Computer Science and Engineering (SCSE) invites applications for the position of Research Fellow.

Key Responsibilities
Develop mathematical modeling of real-time edge intelligent algorithms to support multimedia-based metaverse services
Develop and implement optimization algorithms for resource management by using mathematical tools and machine learning techniques
Job Requirements
PhD degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related disciplines
Strong research experience
Good track record of publications
Good teamwork and collaboration skills
Research background in stochastic process, machine learning, and optimization
We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
