Reporting to our Head of Project Management, you'll plan and budget exciting projects from start to delivery.
Being passionate about digital innovation, you'll love every part of the creative process.
A great communicator and relationship-builder, you'll be our key contact with major clients and stakeholders.
You'll thrive in teams, working with PMs and discipline leads to redefine approaches, costs and timelines.
Always looking for improvement, you'll assess processes and recommend improvements.
Brilliantly analytical, you'll pinpoint the success of campaigns – producing reports and presenting your findings.
What you can bring?
Experience working within a professional environment.
As we're a national team with offices and resources in multiple locations, you will need to be able to coordinate local and remote teams to deliver the best solution for our clients across multiple disciplines (e.g. branding, events, print, digital, web).
Excellent project management skills, with experience managing budgets, estimates and schedules.
Strong client management skills with the proven ability to add value.
Excellent written and verbal skills.
Strong problem-solving/troubleshooting skills.
Ability to work under pressure and work on a range of projects simultaneously.
Previous experience within a creative/digital agency or similar.
Experience of using monday.com would be a bonus.
Meeting Your Needs

When you start with us, you'll enjoy "Total Reward", a package that can be tailored to your lifestyle, career and personal needs. From flexible holidays to life assurance, health & wellbeing benefits, and career planning for the senior stage of your career.

Making sure you're supported is important to us. So, if you identify as having a disability, tell us ahead of your interview. And let's talk about any adjustments you might need.

YourReward at SNC-Lavalin (snclavalin.com).

Training

Atkins is committed to developing its people both personally and professionally. Our colleagues have the advantage of access to a high ranging training portfolio and development activities designed to help make the best of individual’s abilities and talents. We also actively support staff in achieving corporate membership of relevant institutions.

More About Us

Atkins, a member of the SNC-Lavalin Group, is a leading global consultancy with over 80 years of design and engineering expertise. With us, you'll be surrounded by the skills, knowledge and support to help you succeed. Together, we can deliver projects which have a positive, sustainable impact on the world. Atkins, ranked as one of LinkedIn’s Top 25 Companies, where UK professionals want to work and stay once they join.

Check out some of our recent, most exciting projects.

972 --> Web and Digital Marketing Manager
DZS
Plano, TX
We are seeking a Web and Digital Marketing leader with a strong website management and digital marketing background to drive DZS’s web presence. You will manage implementing the brand and help drive demand generation through the DZS website. The position will report directly to the Chief Marketing Officer of the company.

The ideal candidate not only has extensive knowledge and experience of core web site management and digital marketing—including web metrics, SEO, A/B testing, heatmap analytics, usability, AI chat bots, user experience, content strategy, web design, and site maintenance—but also understands new use cases, applications, and abilities for web marketing and web sites. This person will be a leader in understanding the applicability of emerging web technologies and will introduce new ideas that keep DZS’s web properties on the cutting edge of web and digital marketing and ahead of the competition.

DZS (NSDQ DZSI) is transforming today’s service provider into tomorrow’s experience provider by enabling the ultimate subscriber experience. Service providers around the world select DZS cloud software and access, subscriber, mobile and optical edge networking platforms to deliver superior fixed and wireless broadband performance with the best subscriber experience available in the industry.

Our solutions give both the service provider and subscriber more control over their services through open, cloud-software and software-defined networks that simplify operations and automate deployment of new high-value services. Service providers gain unprecedented end-to-end visibility of their multi-vendor networks and leverage data analytics capabilities to dramatically improve the subscriber’s quality of experience and ARPU.

In the Metaverse-era, DZS enables low latency, symmetrical and non-blocking multi-gigabit networks at-home and on-the-go with immersive experiences that include enhanced 8K video streaming, AI-based IoT companions, and extended reality (XR)-enabled e-learning, remote work, gaming, telehealth and more.

Come help us achieve our next pinnacle in our growth plan!

Successful Candidates Responsibilities
Website and Digital strategy leader for ongoing website development, project management, and digital marketing roadmap. You will partner with stakeholders across the organization to develop and execute the strategic roadmap for global web properties.
Developing the UX and UI of the DZS website to ensure easier conversion, content navigation, scalability for personalization and A/B testing, and effective online buyer journeys.
Ensure the DZS brand is amplified consistently through dzsi.com and any DZS owned online digital properties.
Constantly manage and improve website and digital marketing key performance indicators (KPIs).
Document the online strategy for DZS, including dzsi.com and the DZS partner portal, leverage new technologies to augment interaction, create intuitive navigation and user journeys for our visitors and target market.
Manage the content and structure updates to the web site, optimizing for organic search
Manage and improve website demand generation to increase funnel and pipeline activity.
Work with IT, outside agencies and contractors to build and maintain the web infrastructure.
Manage the DZS’ domain name strategy and existing domain name portfolio.
Direct and implement the localization of DZS’ web properties into new languages.
Work with the campaign team to generate leads through dzsi.com.
Remain in tune with and take advantage of emerging trends and platforms within Marketing (e.g., eBooks, interactive content, social media, video, blogs, forums, infographics, etc.)
Partner closely with the other functions within Marketing (PR, Events, Field, Product, Operations, etc.) to deliver valuable content and effective design as a service organization to these groups.
Qualifications/Necessary Skills
7+ years of IT industry Marketing experience, ideally in the cloud software, networking, IT or network infrastructure industry
Proven track record of managing all aspects of an effective Web presence for a high-tech and fast-pace company
Extensive knowledge of the technical aspects of managing a website, analytics, UX, technical and content SEO, domain management, platform tools, and budgeting
Strong experience with Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Optimize, Google Data Studio
Track record working effectively with Marketing Ops, Product Marketing, Field Marketing, PR, Sales, Customer Support and external agencies
Understanding of the IT systems and marketing technology stack that underpin marketing systems (Web content management, attribution, lead nurturing/scoring, etc.)
Global experience with implementing multilingual websites (Korean, Japanese, German,..)
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) experience
Exceptional attention to detail
Team player with strong cross-functional collaboration
Outstanding written and verbal presentation skills
Working knowledge and experience with HTML5, CSS, JavaScript
Regex (with Google Tag Manager or page redirection filtering)
Pantheon, WPEngine or Acquia hosting services/infrastructure
Analytics tools such as CrazyEgg, Hotjar, ahrefs
WordPress, Elementor, YoastSEO
A/B Testing tools such as Google Optimize, CrazyEgg, others
Education

Bachelor’s degree required with formal education in web design or web development (or equivalent experience). MBA or advanced degree a plus.

Why Join DZS?

DZS (Nasdaq:DZSI) is headquartered in Plano, Texas and is a global leader in access and optical edge infrastructure and cloud edge software solutions that support the once-in-a-lifetime broadband upgrade cycle. Driven by megatrends like the Metaverse, high-definition video, gaming, AI and the unprecedented demand for fiber connectivity, DZS enables Service Providers around the world to deliver the ultimate subscriber experience while future-proofing their networks. Today, DZS serves more than 700 service providers with solutions connecting tens of millions of homes and businesses in over 100 countries.

Our platforms and software portfolio fueled DZS for a transformational 2022, and we are committed to the relentless pursuit of expanding our business in 2023. As an instrumental member of the DZS team, you will be encouraged to achieve the extraordinary and continuously challenge traditional ways of doing things. Our leadership team is dedicated and focused on People, Innovation, Growth and Operational Excellence. We are always looking for top talent to join our team! Is that you?

What happens once you apply? Your resume will be reviewed against the requirements listed and if a match is made, a member of our team will reach out to you directly. Hiring top talent is our top priority and we are thrilled that you chose us.

The health and safety and well-being of our employees is our priority. Successful applicants are requested to self-certify vaccination status prior to employment. Compliance with government and customers’ requirements regarding vaccination may preclude unvaccinated applicants from employment for a particular job.

DZS team members enjoy a comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision, and life insurance; company-matching 401k contributions; flexible spending accounts; paid vacation, holiday, and volunteer time; an employee assistance program; and continuing professional development

DZS is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. DZS is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status. For individuals with disabilities who would like to request an accommodation, please let us know during your application process.

Analytisches und strukturiertes Denkvermögen zur Lösung komplexer Kundenanfragen
Reisebereitschaft sowie Deutsch und Englisch sehr gut in Wort und Schrift

Spannende Aufgaben in einem innovativen Umfeld mit hochmotivierten Kolleg:innen, die sich schon jetzt auf deine Impulse freuen
Gute Rahmenbedingungen mit attraktivem Gehalt und zahlreichen Zusatzleistungen, z. B. Firmen-Smartphone zur privaten Nutzung, Fahrradleasing und Corporate Benefits
Work-Life-Balance durch Remote-Working & Teilzeit, Sabbaticals, Mitarbeiter:innen-Events, Well-being Angebote wie z. B. Gesundheitstage, Kooperationen mit Fitness-Anbietern und den Familienservice, der dich bei privaten Herausforderungen unterstützt
Exzellente Weiterbildung in On- und Offline-Seminaren und im Rahmen der Berufsqualifikation
Vielfältige Gestaltungsräume und aktive Förderung einer inklusiven Unternehmenskultur – u. a. durch unsere globale Diversity & Inclusion-Initiative ALL IN und lokale Mitarbeiter:innen-Netzwerke

974 --> Senior Manager, Digital and Innovation- Metaverse Lead
KPMG Canada
Laval, QC (Remote)
Overview

At KPMG, you’ll join a team of diverse and dedicated problem solvers, connected by a common cause turning insight into opportunity for clients and communities around the world.

Overview Of The Opportunity

At KPMG, we believe that Extended Reality (XR) is a new frontier of converging technologies shaping the metaverse of tomorrow – an immersive, interconnected 3D world in which Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and Cryptoassets will redefine how we live, work and socialize. This is an exceptional opportunity to join the fast-growing Studio team at KPMG Canada to help our clients enter this new digital frontier called the Metaverse. We are looking for passionate pioneers to help our clients realize sustainable business value in the emerging virtual reality network for commerce, experience, and community.

KPMG Studio consists of a team of innovative business designers, who are collectively working with cutting edge technologies to shape how we operate and interact in the digital world across multiple industries.

What You Will Do

As the KPMG Metaverse Lead, you report into and work directly with the Managing Partner and President of Digital and Innovation at KPMG, while also working closely with the Crypto-Asset & Blockchain Leader and Customer Practice Leader, as well as a cross-functional team demonstrating thought leadership across various metaverse platforms in support of our clients’ metaverse endeavors. This includes educating clients, developing proposals, create thought-provoking content on metaverse, and demo meaningful experiences across multiple Metaverse platforms. You will leverage your experience and effective story telling skills to simplify the complex topics of the Metaverse and Web3 for the senior executives and articulate opportunities in support of their strategies in existing and future initiatives.

Successful candidates will have passion and enthusiasm for the Metaverse, NFTs, DeFi, and excitement about Web3, along with in-depth knowledge of the industry’s institutional practices.

Your responsibilities as the Metaverse Lead will be different each day, but will primarily include
Defining and leading the go-to-market strategy in collaboration with the Metaverse Taskforce
Lead the development of high-impact and visually compelling proposals, presenting thought-provoking ideas that connect with clients and add business value
Advising clients on metaverse activation strategies including, identification and prioritization of relevant use cases, and experience design
Deliver engaging educational workshops and metaverse platform demos for several industries
Establishing and managing strategic collaborations with external organizations in the space for tangible opportunities
Ideate digital events and commercial activities in the Metaverse for our teams, clients, and community, as well as planning, hosting, designing, and overseeing delivery of such consumer experiences
Research and develop content that educates and demonstrates our foresight and thought leadership both internally and externally
What You Bring To The Role
Passion for Metaverse, AR/VR experiences and underlying technology infrastructure
Actively engaged in multiple Metaverse platforms, such as Decentraland, The Sandbox, Horizon Worlds, Engage, Altspaces etc.
Foundational knowledge of processes, tools, and building blocks of XR – AR/VR, Metaverse, NFTs, Tokenomics and crypto wallets
Strong understanding of emerging trends and use cases in the web3 and Metaverse space
5+ years in technology business development
Experience building, launching, sustaining, and growing online communities and initiatives to drive community engagement
Strong communication and collaboration skills, while being able to speak both at a technical level and strategic level
Ability to lead multiple workstreams and engagements simultaneously
Facilitation experience with storytelling skills in addition to experience with presenting to clients
This is a remote/hybrid position.

KPMG individuals Deliver Impact | Seek Growth | Inspire Trust and understand that a diverse workforce enables us to deepen relationships and strengthen our business.

Providing you with the support you need to be at your best

For more information about KPMG in Canada’s Benefits and well-being, click here.

Our Values, The KPMG Way

Integrity, we do what is right | Excellence, we never stop learning and improving | Courage, we think and act boldly | Together, we respect each other and draw strength from our differences | For Better, we do what matters

KPMG in Canada is a proud equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating a respectful, inclusive and barrier-free workplace that allows all of our people to reach their full potential. A diverse workforce is key to our success and we believe in bringing your whole self to work. We welcome all qualified candidates to apply and hope you will choose KPMG in Canada as your employer of choice. 975 --> Content Optimization Technical Director
Lucasfilm
San Francisco, CA (Hybrid)
The Lucasfilm Advanced Development Group (ADG) is looking for Technical Directors to join our content pipeline team. As a Content Optimization Technical Director at the ADG, you will be responsible for setting standards and best practices for asset creation and material authoring resulting in the highest quality content running at target framerates on target hardware. You will also have a role as product owner for our next generation content pipeline tooling and workflows that will empower the creation of Disney’s Metaverse.

What you’ll do

Plans and enacts the best practices for real-time content authoring given specific hardware targets
Plans and aids real-time productions in providing asset budgets and level of detail (LOD) targets specific to target hardware
Designs, implements and maintains methods of performance profiling for productions, clearly documenting diagnostics and proposed solutions back to production
Designs, implements and maintains tooling and systems to empower content creators and expose performance metrics of real-time scenes and environments on target hardware
Contributes to strategy to determine potential automation in our content pipeline that encourages and enforces defined standards, without compromising visual fidelity
Contributes to product ownership for the Content Pipeline Team’s next generation content creation tools and system, ensuring that tooling and processes meet production standards
Contributes to input and direction for proprietary performance profiling instrumentation and test frameworks
Maintain software products released to production
Provide support for end-users and assist with technical issues, system use and raise any usability or bugs with the Content Pipeline team to resolve
Partner with the ADG DevOps and other ILM technology departments build scalable and robust systems for all ILMxLAB, Virtual Production and Virtual Art Department productions
Creates and maintains clear and concise documentation outlining the use of products and solutions in production
Participate in special projects as needed

What we’re looking for

Bachelor’s degree in, or professional equivalent to, Computer Science or related technical field or equivalent professional experience
5-8 years relevant experience
Experience developing software and shipping to a production environment be it games, immersive experiences, film, commercials or television/episodical
Strong grasp of real-time content creation pipelines and the impact of well authored assets on runtime performance
Strong grasp of real-time rendering engines like Unreal Engine or Unity
Good knowledge of real-time rendering pipelines and be able to troubleshoot and diagnose performance bottlenecks
Good knowledge or awareness of computer graphics interchange formats like USD, FBX, MaterialX, Alembic, etc
Good familiarity with one or more production Digital Content Creation (DCC) tools like Unreal Engine, Maya, 3DS Max, Substance, Houdini, Blender, etc
Good knowledge of source control management systems like Git, Perforce, SVN, etc
Good knowledge of tool development either using C++ or visual scripting tools like Unreal’s Blueprints
Knowledge of software engineering best practices, engineering trends, emerging products and the role of the pipeline engineering team in VFX, feature Animation or AAA games production
Knowledge of developing software in Linux or Windows environments
Self-motivated individual with excellent problem solving skills.
Flexibility to handle a variety of tasks.
A passion for real-time graphics and its potential for VR, AR and immersive entertainment
A passion for creating efficient and stable workflows that allow artists to focus on content creation
Excellent communication skills, able to work as part of a team
Ability and willingness to communicate cross-discipline and provide innovative solutions to production pipeline problems

977 --> UX Designer
Unity
Tokyo, Tokyo, Japan
We are Accelerate Solutions, an innovative team building custom software for a wide range of clients! Our professional services team works across multiple platforms building digital twin and metaverse solutions that incorporate ground breaking technologies like XR, robotics, machine learning and IoT. We work on a diverse range of business verticals including games, automotive, transportation, retail, manufacturing and entertainment.

This role will have the opportunity to embody true ownership in the work, collaborate with complementary teams on numerous projects and help solve problems for a global customer base.

The UX Designer will be encouraged to adopt new technologies, explore new solutions and learn from our customers and colleagues while assisting in the growth of our internal processes.

What You’ll Be Doing

Craft human-centric experiences that are intuitive
Support Design Leads in the facilitation of design-led workshops
Map customer and user journeys and conduct research to support design decisions
Develop Low and High fidelity production ready documentation
Communicate and rationalize the work with clients and work closely with software engineers and others cross-functional teams

What We’re Looking For

A portfolio demonstrating expertise in user experience
Candidates will have detailed outputs that demonstrate: conceptual diagrams, flows, UX wireframes and interactive prototypes
Have collaborated with Engineers, Artists, UI Designers, Project Managers, and QA
Expert level knowledge of sketching tools like: Lucidchart, Figma, Balsamic
Working proficiency Japanese

You might also have
Good understanding of Backend technologies
Unity Experience
XR knowledge

About Unity Technologies


Unity is the world’s leading platform for creating and operating real-time 3D (RT3D) content. Creators, ranging from game developers to artists, architects, automotive designers, filmmakers, and others, use Unity to make their imaginations come to life. Unity’s platform provides a comprehensive set of software solutions to create, run and monetize interactive, real-time 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices.

The company’s 1,400+ person research and development team keeps Unity at the forefront of development by working alongside partners to ensure optimized support for the latest releases and platforms. Apps developed by Unity creators were downloaded more than three billion times per month in 2019 on more than two billion unique devices. For more information, please visit www.unity.com.

Unity is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. 978 --> [HN/HCM] 1 QA Manual Engineer (Blockchain/Crypto/DeFi)
KyberNetwork
Hanoi, Hanoi, Vietnam (On-site)
This job is sourced from a job board. Learn more
ABOUT KYBER NETWORK
Kyber Network (https://kyber.network) is an industry-leading blockchain company, providing cryptocurrency liquidity for the largest companies in the DeFi (decentralized finance), Metaverse, and NFT spaces. The company raised US$52M in its token sale in 2017, making it one of the largest cryptocurrency-based fundraising in history.

Two co-founders, Dr. Luu The Loi (Chairman) and Victor Tran Huy Vu (CEO), were honored in Asia’s Forbes 30 under 30 in the ‘Finance - Investment’ category by Forbes magazine in 2017 and have since established the company as a market leader. Dr. Luu The Loi also has a PhD in blockchain security technology, and is one of the 10 most prominent Innovators under 35 in the Technology field in the Asia Pacific region (Innovators Under 35 Asia Pacific) published by the MIT Technology Review.

Kyber Has Developed a Family Of Products Including
KyberSwap: KyberSwap.com - Trade & Earn at the Best Rates in DeFi with our leading Decentralized Exchange (DEX) Aggregator that does >US$1B in monthly trading volume
KyberDAO: Kyber.org - Be part of the community governing Kyber Network to shape the future of DeFi and earn $KNC tokens
And many more stealth developments and ventures that the company has taken stake in.
Kyber Network has offices in Singapore, Hanoi, and Ho Chi Minh City:
Singapore office: 1 Upper Circular Road, #05-01 Singapore 058400
Hanoi office: 6th floor, Comatce Tower, 61 Nguy Nhu Kon Tum, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi, Vietnam

Join our team of brilliant and committed professionals pursuing the goal of creating a “Decentralized Economy for Everyone” based on blockchain technology.

Are you ready to take up the challenge of creating world-changing innovations in the next decade? Apply now.

At least 5 years of experience in software testing (QA tier 3)

980 --> Site Reliability Engineer
DFINITY
Zurich, Switzerland (Hybrid)
The Internet Computer is the fastest and only infinitely scalable general-purpose blockchain — incubated and launched by the DFINITY Foundation in May 2021. A team of over 200 world renowned cryptographers, distributed systems engineers, and programming language experts have taken on the massive technological challenge of building, maintaining, and continuously improving a ‘world computer’ powerful enough to host Web3 dapps, DeFi, games, NFTs, social media, and metaverse projects.

DFINITY was founded in 2016 by entrepreneur and crypto theoretician, Dominic Williams, and attracted interest and financial contributions from early members of the Ethereum community. Later, top-tier institutions such as Andreessen Horowitz, Polychain Capital, and SV Angel backed the Internet Computer in a collective effort to help build out Web3.

As the Site Reliability Engineering, you will be providing operational support for the Internet Computer components at the application layer. This includes on-going development of systems that monitor the Internet Computer’s health, corrective actions in case of incidents,.

Responsibilities:

Select, design, build, deploy, and maintain the services used to ensure high availability of DFINITY's product
Identify opportunities to automate or improve processes by writing code, and then write the code
Bake reliability and operability in to the product from the start, by participating in design and code reviews, identifying risks, problems, and mitigations
Work with other engineering and security teams to define processes that preserve the goals of the Internet Computer while remaining operationally feasible and automatable
Work with product owners to set SLOs, then implement SLOs in code and observability infrastructure
On-call for production services. 12/7 (on-call is split across two sites), roughly 1 week in 6. As issues may be caused by problems in wildly different areas of the code the chief responsibility is to coordinate the response to the issue and ensure it is resolved, pulling in engineers from other teams as necessary. On-call work is compensated with generous time off
This is not a team that exists to be on-call. This is a team that elects to be on-call because it helps do the job better. Being on-call makes it easier and more motivating to identify opportunities to reduce the number of alerts the system generates.
Operating, troubleshooting, and deploying software to Unix systems

Requirements:

Think about things in a systemic, methodical way, especially when troubleshooting
Know when "This is good enough for the next 12 months" is appropriate
Coordinate incident response across multiple teams -- clearly understanding and communicating what is going on, next steps, who is responsible for what, and so on
Write code. We use Rust -- you don't need to know Rust already, there'll be opportunities to learn, but experience designing and writing moderate sized applications (up to ~ 10Kloc) is necessary. Identifying opportunities to automate or improve processes by writing code, and then write the code to do it is key.

Within 1 month you will:

Understand DFINITY's infrastructure and production environment
Picked a suitable starter project
Submitted improvements to our documentation and process that you will have noticed during onboarding.

Within 3 months you will:
Have delivered the starter project
Shadowed other team members on-call, and be ready to join the on-call rotation from month 4 onwards
Pro-actively identified other improvements and proposed projects to deliver them

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.

Du hältst dich lieber zurück und machst einfach deinen Job? Mach das! Bei uns fühlt sich jeder wohl. Werde Teil unseres Teams und hilf uns dabei, die Welt ein bisschen besser zu machen! Wir freuen uns schon jetzt auf deine Bewerbung!

Your role will be to expand our digital opportunities within the practice, drawing on these specialists as required. You’ll liaise with third party suppliers within a project internal & external (eg. adtech partners)

Highlight results, measure success, and promote wins and key learnings to client.
Create proposals and control costs for digital activity
Support the development of the Brussels ‘hub’ for digital work
Get involved and make your own contributions in agency development and assist with new business.

You have minimum 3 years’ work experience with exposure to digital & direct marketing
You are a social butterfly immersing yourself in social media and digital culture
You have incredible levels of organisation
You have experience across owned, earned and paid online media
You’re no stranger to digital research, analysis and measurement techniques

You understand commercial aspects of digital projects (costs, margins, ROI)
You’re able to track digital activity back to business outcomes (conversions, awareness, sales, etc.)
You know how to use social media tools
You’re a strong communicator and you know how to handle clients. You’re fluent in English with proficiency in French and/or Dutch.

What We Offer

An opportunity to work on digital communications projects in an international environment filled with passionate and diverse people.
Growing professionally in a trendsetting agency working with both local and global clients.
A creative and casual dress company culture where you can be yourself, grow and innovate.
Our flexible working model: it is up to you to work from home or join your team in the office.
A competitive package and benefits.
A great chance to learn and develop in this highly agile role.

We are a global company, so we offer the advantages of a big firm – leading-edge research, sophisticated technology, the resources to invest in growth… But, in our heart, we still have the spirit of the small company we used to be – entrepreneurial, ambitious, fun. We are known for our imaginative and powerful campaigns, innovative solutions, great client relations, collaboration, and teamwork – and our success is down to our amazing people. 985 --> [NFT Metaverse Dept.] Character Concept Art (경력 무관)
KRAFTON Inc.
Seoul, Seoul, South Korea (On-site)
크래프톤은 서로 차별화된 크리에이티브 아이덴티티를 가진 제작 스튜디오들로 구성된 회사입니다.

창작에 대한 간절함을 가진 인재들이 모여 끊임없이 도전하고 스스로의 역량을 확장해 나가면서,

팬들을 매료시키는 즐거움과 오래도록 사랑받는 작품을 만들어 냅니다.

이것이 기술을 기반으로 창작을 지속하며 차별화된 결과물을 만들어 내는 크래프톤의 동력입니다.

Krafton consists of several production studios which possess unique and creative identities

By finding talented individuals who display a strong desire for production, continue to move forward,

and broaden their capabilities, we strive to create enduring titles that offer fun captivating fans' hearts.

Talent is a driver behind Krafton's continuous technology-based creation and unparalleled outcomes.

우리 팀(프로젝트)을 소개합니다.

부서 : 크래프톤 NFT 메타버스 개발 아트팀

프로젝트 : 신규 메타버스 프로젝트

그래픽 : 북미 스타일, 스타일리쉬하게 디폼된 비주얼

우리 팀과 함께할 미션을 소개합니다.
아바타 및 의상 컨셉 디자인
각종 3D 제작을 위한 컨셉 디자인

이런 경험을 가진 분과 함께 성장하고 싶습니다! (필수요건)
다양한 스타일의 감각적인 캐릭터 컨셉 디자인 능력
개성있고 매력있는 컨셉 디자인 능력
감각적인 색감과 쉐입의 활용 능력

이런 경험들이 있다면 저희가 찾는 그 분입니다! (우대요건)
원활한 협업이 가능하신 분
패션스타일에 관심 많으신 분
메타버스에 대한 관심
글로벌 아트 스타일에 대한 깊은 관심

크래프톤의 도전에 함께 하기 위해 아래의 전형 과정이 필요합니다.
서류 전형 > 전화 인터뷰 (Phone Interview) > 실무 면접 (Technical Fit Interview) > 최종 면접 (Culture Fit Interview) > 합격 및 입사
상시채용으로 우수 인재 채용 시 조기에 마감될 수 있습니다.
전형별 합격자에 대해 지원서에 등록하신 이메일 혹은 유선으로 개별 안내 드립니다.
전화 인터뷰의 경우, 필수 전형이 아닌 필요에 따라 진행되는 선택 전형임을 사전 안내 드립니다. 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.
필요 시 면접은 추가될 수 있으며, 이에 대한 상세 내용은 개별 안내 드립니다.

필요 서류를 확인해주세요!
입사지원서 (자유 양식), 자기소개서, 경력기술서, 포트폴리오(필수)
신입일 경우 자기소개서를, 경력일 경우 경력기술서를 중심으로 기술해 주시기를 바랍니다.
포트폴리오 첨부 시, 하단 안내 사항을 확인해주시기를 바랍니다.

근무지
서초 마제스타 시티 타워I

고용형태
정규직

아래 안내 사항을 확인해주세요!
장애인 및 국가유공자 등 취업 보호 대상자는 관계 법령에 따라 우대합니다.
자격 요건이 충족된다면, 서로 다른 모집 공고에 대한 중복지원이 가능합니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
채용 전형 중 궁금하신 항목은 크래프톤 채용 FAQ 내에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.
기타 궁금하신 사항은 이메일(career@krafton.com) 혹은 카카오톡 채널(KRAFTON)을 통해 1:1 문의 바랍니다.

Perth, Western Australia, Australia

It is an innovator’s role that looks at new technologies, platforms and experience to push the capabilities of what is possible. While technical strength is important, imagination and innovation are critical to help our clients deliver delightful experiences.

Drive the Growth Markets Adobe Content and Commerce Practice that includes:

Content Management build operate and run for multiple environments and experiences.

Commerce platform that integrates with multiple technologies and is part of a total omnichannel go to market.

Content operations including brands as publishers and synthetic photography.

Forms design, development and scaling as part of broader eco-systems and integration platforms including workflow and e-signatures. Work closely with the Communications and Design capabilities to ensure deals and deliveries are about end experiences and not just the technology.

Optimise the processes, operating procedures and development programs that will allow the practice to scale including the creation of development studios and resources from multiple parts of Accenture.

Help solution and architect all large and complex deals, while being the SME and leading the pitch for the technology solution.

At least 5 years in the digital technology space with an understanding of digital marketing, digital advertising and customer experience.

Worked in teams that have delivered work that has delivered complex pitches and projects in content and commerce platforms.

Worked on multiple channels and technologies beyond websites and pushed the boundaries to new experiences such as chat, voice, AR/VR.

Solution architected and pitched complex, multi-platform solutions to technical and non-technical audiences.

Played an SME or supporting role for colleagues in both sales and delivery in multiple geographies.

Hands on knowledge of the Adobe Experience Cloud stack (and ideally it’s competitors).

A successful applicant will be:

Curious problem solver, especially in technology, content, commerce and customer experiences.

Explainer and simplifier – able to make the complex understandable.

Up to date with the latest technologies and channels, including experimenting with the Metaverse.

Adaptable to multiple cultures – working with people in different roles around the world.

Empathetic with genuine interest in the client outcomes and the best interest of the team.

Accenture Song accelerates growth and value for our clients through sustained customer relevance. Our capabilities span ideation to execution: growth, product and experience design; technology and experience platforms; creative, media and marketing strategy; and campaign, content and channel orchestration. With strong client relationships and deep industry expertise, we help our clients operate at the speed of life through the unlimited potential of imagination, technology and intelligence. Visit us at: www.accenture.com/song

The opportunities to make a difference while working on exciting client initiatives are limitless in this ever-changing space. Your role will require you to directly work with the client to bring ideas and innovation for customer relationships, digital marketing, ecommerce, and omni-channel solutions. You will also be accountable for helping to drive new ideas with the client and working with the practice specific teams to ensure client value and ability to execute are front and centre.

About Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

At Accenture, our philosophy is anchored in recognising that our people are multi-dimensional. We take an intersectional human approach to create a work environment where all people feel like they can bring their authentic selves to work, every day.

We believe that equality drives innovation. Our commitment to accelerating equality starts at the top with our board and CEO and extends across every part of the company. We do not tolerate discrimination because of differences, such as age, ability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity or expression, religion, or sexual orientation. Do you have a passion for cultural experiences? Are you an explorer at heart, with a love for cool technology? Are you interested in being part of a growing company and team? If so, you might be the perfect fit to join Guru Experience Co. – a SaaS & service company that sits at the intersection of mobile technology and creativity.

At Guru Experience Co., we work with museums, historic sites, and other cultural destinations to bring engaging mobile guides to their visitors. Together with the museum teams we curate and implement apps and web apps, that include creative content and multimedia experiences like audio tours, maps, augmented reality, ticketing, and memberships, games, scavenger hunts and more. If our clients dream it, our platform can likely do it!

We are looking to hire a new team member who can work seamlessly with all departments as our technical lead on our platform and client projects. Working as a technical lead, you’ll set and maintain visions for development teams, make sure developers have the environment, budget, and support they need, and work alongside our developers doing some programming yourself where necessary. The ideal candidate will be experienced in managing the growth of a technical product, such as a content management system and data platform, and have experience in building/managing apps for both iOS & Android. Experience in augmented reality is also of crucial importance, given the apps we build bring AR moments of both low and high complexity to our clients. This person must be exceedingly well organized, flexible, and solution oriented. The ability to communicate internally with patience and externally with confidence and be flexible across multiple time zones from Europe to California is a must.

It is important to note that this role is designed to promote growth to the career of the chosen teammate. Working in a start-up can be challenging, but we value the growth of our employees just as much as the growth of the company. We encourage the hired candidate to take ownership over their role with a proactive “go-getter” attitude to help us drive our platform and services deeper into the metaverse.

Duties & Responsibilities: Working closely with the development and customer success team, this role entails:
Become proficient in our Museum App Content Management System and Data Dashboard in order to serve as our company’s technical lead
Work our development team’s project manager, and the main liaison between our platform & app developers, and the client-services team-members
Work closely with the CTO, CEO, and development team to manage the technical side of client projects as well as the growth of our product
Execute the integration of AR packages into a client’s app infrastructure, including troubleshooting and QA
Collaborate with project teams to ensure products and features are delivered on time, within scope, adhere to high-quality standards, and meet customer expectations
Support the Business Development team with technical/platform related strategy related to prospective clients
Think creatively on how to manipulate our existing product to accommodate out of the box/bespoke client solutions
Inform and contribute a product roadmap and develop feature definitions
Exhibit excellent judgment on how to prioritize between customer features, architectural improvements, and operational excellence
Leverage operational metrics that measure customer experience and product usage, imploring a data-driven approach to product development and business insight
Facilitate quick resolution of product & technical related issues to support product delivery and customer satisfaction
Help to build/facilitate successful and growing partnerships within the museum and cultural experience field
Engage with museum/cultural attraction communities and museum-tech communities (i.e. following industry specific news, engaging on twitter or LinkedIn, reading collateral from industry thought-leaders, etc.) and be able to translate insightful, comprehensive market research to turn them into product requirements

Requirements:
2+ years’ experience in building and deploying augmented reality using Unity AR and Web AR technologies
2+ years’ experience in leading development teams 5+ years’ experience in multiple languages/platforms strongly preferred such as Swift, Django, Python, Angular, Java, and/or Kotlin

991 --> Digital Strategy Innovation Manager, Blockchain

Job Description

Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?

Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It Uniquely Yours.

You are part of a team that experiments with cutting-edge technologies, delivering solutions revealed as a result of the testing and learnings, and developing strong partnerships to enable growth through innovation and agile methodologies.

How You Will Contribute

Innovations is a new space that Mondelez International is building on. Innovations encapsulates projects considered as Learns & Pilots that drive disruptive ideas across the organization. These are projects that will run on Agile methodology and for a duration of typically 8-10 weeks. Based on the learnings of these initiatives a decision would be made to incorporate this as a portfolio project to scale or introduce a new test & learn.

The role calls for experimenting cutting edge technologies while at the same time build strong partnership with the North America Business Units involving:

Experience of having led a large program. Understanding Digital Transformation. Knowledge of Enterprise Architecture. Ability to stich together strategy / roadmap with the ability to fill in whitespaces, and identify test & learn opportunities.
Experience in digital technologies such as Artificial Intelligence /NLP/ML , Metaverse, AR/VR and experience in working with emerging startups and innovation incubator ecosystems.
Prior team management experience: a cross functional business and technology experience. Ability to understand a variety of disruptive technology products and services and platforms that will help build the journey form 'Test and learns' to 'Digital Platforms'
Demonstrated ability to understand the Industry trends and help build an organization digital strategy / Platform / Roadmap. Understanding of Enterprise Architectural construct. C Suite Engagement and ability to represent MDLZ in global forums; proven skills of learning on the fly & agility

THE KEY RESPONSIBILITES FOR THE ROLE:

Expected to design the Strategy, develop the roadmap and lead key Programs identified under Innovation and Digital Pillars. E.g. The leader will help bring the outside in view of building digital journey for an experience tower and also be the POC for the region across all experience towers. e.g. US Digital, Latin America Digital and Customer. The BU / Market Digitalization will cut across towers and there also support in building the Customer / Consumer / Supply Chain Digital Roadmaps

Innovation Hub is an evolving pillar within Mondelez MDS. Innovations encapsulates three different service lines:

Initiatives considered as 'test & learn' that drive disruptive ideas across Experience Towers. These initiatives run on Agile methodology and for a duration of typically 8-12 weeks. Based on the learnings a decision could be made to convert these initiatives to a portfolio project that can provide Mondelez great competitive advantage and business benefit. The role impacts the entire innovation agenda of tower/region/BU's, ranging in billions of revenue, 1000's of stakeholders, and 100's of customers.
Rapid application development - expand the concept of citizen development and enable functional teams to digitize processes using low code-no code technologies.

The role calls for strong partnership with senior business function leads (in many cases MLT, MLT+1) and external parties (Vendors / Incubators) involving:

Accountability of bringing outside in thinking and ideas for the allocated experience tower e.g. Customer / Consumer / Supply / Enterprise that will help leap frog the Digital Journey
Strong C suit Stakeholder Management for representing MDLZ at various Global Incubator forums setting collaborations / partnerships for development of Leap frog Ideas
Collaborate and partner with Snack Futures (recommending M&A opportunities) other Innovation Leads to lead and drive resolution of roadblocks for the allocated region e.g. AMEA, MEU, NALA, and represent innovation team for respective region
Coaching and direct Team Members to effectively delivery their respective initiatives

THE KEY EXPERIENCE FOR THE ROLE:

10+ years’ experience leveraging emerging tech to deliver large scale Digital transformations and solve complex business problems
Masters or Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Computer Science
Ability to understand a variety of disruptive technology products and services that will guide Supply Chain, Sales and Marketing (digital & eCom)
Passionate about innovations, digital technologies and possess technical acumen to evaluate new opportunities with internal and external partners.
3+ years’ of demonstrated capability working with Distributed Ledger Technology
3+ years’ foundational knowledge of enterprise value, processes, tools, or technologies related to the Multi Party Systems (Distributed Database, Distributed Ledger, Tokenization & Confidential compute)
Familiarity with WEB3, permissioned and permission less systems with an understanding of Layer 1, Layer 2 and Layer 3 solutions in the CPG Industry
Experience with designing and developing APIs for blockchain integration
Experience with designing and developing the frontend and backend of decentralized applications
Experience with designing, developing, and implementing Smart Contracts
Experience in digital technologies such as Artificial Intelligence /NLP/ML , Metaverse, AR/VR and experience in working with emerging startups and innovation incubator ecosystems.
Experience with one or more cloud platforms, including AWS, GCP, or Azure
Proven track record of learning new skills proactively and applied it to business opportunities
Understand the impact of data and digital technologies in the context of business
Experience in a major CPG or parallel industry

#dice

No Relocation support available

Business Unit Summary

The United States is the largest market in the Mondelēz International family with a significant employee and manufacturing footprint. Here, we produce our well-loved household favorites to provide our consumers with the right snack, at the right moment, made the right way. We have corporate offices, sales, manufacturing and distribution locations throughout the U.S. to ensure our iconic brands—including Oreo and Chips Ahoy! cookies, Ritz, Wheat Thins and Triscuit crackers, and Swedish Fish and Sour Patch Kids confectionery products —are close at hand for our consumers across the country.

Equal Opportunity Employer/Disability/Veterans

About The Job

JPMorgan Chase is shifting to a product-driven way of working. We are making this change so that we are fully organized around our customers to deliver personalized experiences throughout an employee or manager journeys. This shift is a change in the way we organize and prioritize the work that needs to get done across legacy organizations, Human Resources (HR), Technology and our Chief Administration Office (CAO) to ensure a higher quality output for our customers. This role can/may sit within HR, Technology, CAO or centrally (Firmwide).

Our intention is to build products that our customers (employees) love. As such we will:

Rally behind an employee-first mindset focused on holistic employee needs across experiences, to drive all decisions
Adopt Proactive end-to-end strategies that prioritizes and tackles key facets of the overall employee experience to maximize impact and value
Galvanize a unified cross-function collaborative environment with unified leadership, robust governance, role clarity and cross-cutting collaboration to deliver best in class, next gen solutions and experiences

Our Ambition Statement: Create a customer grade, employee centered Firmwide Integrated Help experience that measurably enhances overall business agility, reduces operational overhead and reinforces J.P. Morgan Chase's position as a leading global workplace.

We Are Bought Into This And Are Committed To Show That We Can Do It And Are Looking For Others To Join And For You To

Why join. This is a fascinating time in our industry, our firm, and the future of work has forever changed. Digital first design and transformation is critical for the employee experience- Firms must act now to keep employees engaged, connected and continually learning and growing; They expect firms to listen to their feedback. HR is being transformed to focus on employee experience and culture. Technology innovation is critical to future operating models (Big Data, Machine Learning, AI, Applied Math/Tech, Metaverse, Virtual Reality, Self-Healing Bots, Web 3.0)- Technology helps deliver the blueprint and vision of the company and will be how employees experience culture.

Put the customer (the employee) at the center of everything we do to improve the overall experience
Work on some of the most complex problems imaginable at the intersection of both experience and tech
Help develop products, solutions and experiences that can build trust, connectivity and human connections
Partner with other high-performing feature teams within JPM to inspire innovation and champion change

We are looking for an outstanding full stack developer with experience in working in a highly-matrixed organization to build the next generation of employee-centric experiences, tooling, tech and help offerings

Specific Role Requirements/Qualifications

Technology / Science degree or equivalent experience
5 years of experience within a corporate technology environment preferred
5 years' experience with one or more general purpose programming languages. Java and/or Python preferred
3 years' experience with modern JavaScript. ReactJS preferred
Experience with database design (SQL / NoSQL), message queuing / event streaming
Exposure to and understanding of container-based development (Docker and Kubernetes)
A desire to expand into Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence is advantageous
Adherence to coding best practices while still pushing the boundaries of creativity and ingenuity
Familiarity with Agile principles
Strong critical-thinking and problem-solving skills with clear communication
Ability to collaborate with different roles to achieve common goals

Core Requirements/Qualifications

Scaled Agile Delivery - In depth knowledge of Agile Frameworks and Principles as well as the operating dynamics of working in a fast-paced agile environment. Capable of following language, practices, patterns and ceremonies
Product Operating Model Experience - Experienced working in a product-centric culture driven by an organized process of product decision making; ability to create impactful and commercial products through advocacy
Process Mapping - Able to review/analyze existing processes and recommend improvements - push the status quo and able to strategize, plan and execute on new vision
Matrix Collaboration - Able and excited to working in a highly-matrixed environment across the firm to pave a new way of working (not embedded in a single-org mindset culture)
Self-Motivation and a Team Player - Highly motivated and eager to roll up your sleeves to make things happen
Attitude of Empowerment - Must be able to lead/partner with teams to self-organization and or highly effective in boundaryless organizations or highly matrixed organizations. Good balance of EQ/IQ
Communicative and Social - Must be able to communicate well with teams, stakeholders and thought leaders
Conflict Resolution - Raise issues and/or partner with leaders across the HR/Tech/CAO organizations to address systemic challenges and local optimizations that hinder end-to-end effectiveness/collaboration

J.P. Morgan is a global leader in financial services, providing strategic advice and products to the world's most prominent corporations, governments, wealthy individuals and institutional investors. Our first-class business in a first-class way approach to serving clients drives everything we do. We strive to build trusted, long-term partnerships to help our clients achieve their business objectives.

We recognize that our people are our strength and the diverse talents they bring to our global workforce are directly linked to our success. We are an equal opportunity employer and place a high value on diversity and inclusion at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of any protected attribute, including race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital or veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. In accordance with applicable law, we make reasonable accommodations for applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs.

993 --> IP Analyst (Hybrid/Remote)
Utopia Music
Zug, Zug, Switzerland (Remote)
WELCOME TO UTOPIA

Music is incredible. It can excite hundreds, and unite thousands. But as an industry, it has been slow, complicated, and disparate. While the tech world has moved into the future, the music industry continues to be shaped by inefficient systems of the past. At Utopia we believe there is a better way. Which is why today we are setting out to transform the entire industry; creating new revenue streams, consolidating the data and decluttering the admin. Unlocking the industry’s full potential by unifying it all in one truly holistic space. Some might call that a Utopia.

Funnily enough, so do we. Welcome to Utopia. Where music lives.

What Utopians Do

The open secret is that the music industry is struggling with the very basics of music accounting: What was played, when and where? Who should get paid and how much?

Utopia Music is bridging the data gap by connecting global consumption, accurate metadata, and fast payments to an industry-wide trust platform. Our goal is to unlock creative value and enable Fair Pay For Every Play to make a better world for Music. The solutions we offer do not threaten to usurp the role of industry incumbents - it is about bringing transparency in the industry and supporting efficient royalty collection for all.

THE ROLE

As IP Analyst, you will work on the first line, advising on all matters relating to IP landscaping and provide regular IP reports to different business and functions. As a key member of the BA – Intellectual Property team you will be a corner stone in achieving Utopia’s objective to Gain the Trust of the Industry, and will collaborate closely with our Strategy and Business Units.

You will be a key player, a strategic business partner providing IP searches and analysis to enable effective and informed decision making within Utopia Group.

You will collaborate closely with our inventor’s community to develop a first class WW IP portfolio, and with our Business Analysts to provide insights on dynamic market changes within the competition and other insights that positively impact business decisions and strategy, by ensuring all competitive IP intelligence is available and easily accessible to key customers, partners and other stakeholders.

Responsibilities

In this position, you will be primarily accountable for consistently and effectively:
Developing and delivering regular analysed IP data, insights and reports, including competitor IP landscapes, threat assessments, strength positioning, etc.
Conducting IP landscape evaluations to identify trends in a technology field, deliver IP competitive intelligence, identify potential new research areas, licensing and acquisition opportunities
Preparing search reports and IP landscaping analysis and share with key stakeholders adapting the content to the audience
Acting in providing support to develop and maintain a first class World Wide IP Portfolio
Provide technical research and analysis with respect to patentability, validity, freedom-to-operate, infringement, monitoring of the competitive landscape in different technological areas
Prepare search strategies to identify relevant patent and scientific literature in a given technology domain, and subsequent analysis
Identify and report innovations in a specific technology domain through analysis of patent, product, and academic literature
Provide support in assisting inventors with invention disclosure forms, refining/pivoting inventions if/when needed
Assisting Business Units with innovation capture
Review and provide technical analysis related to patent applications search reports.

Requirements
At least 3 years in similar roles with competitive intelligence and IP search - with advanced degree required in Electrical/Data Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field
Patent/IP Agent/Scientific /Business Analyst - experience in search and patent literature
Experience with patent related databases and proven experience in the patent searcher field is preferable
Technical background/knowledge in data and databases, signal processing, music industry, gaming industry, new technologies (blockchain, metaverse, Big Data management, etc.)
Proficient in MS Office including Word, Excel and PowerPoint
Fluent in English, additional languages are a plus!
Experience leading actionable and cross-functional strategic workshops

What We Offer
Great atmosphere - we live, love & breathe music & tech!
Working in an impact oriented team and inclusive company culture.
An experienced team to learn from, with proven track records in multiple startups and big tech companies.
Our flexible remote policy provides Utopians the freedom to work either from one of our inspiring offices or from home.
We celebrate being an international and multicultural company.
Competitive benefits; packages depend on location. You’ll be given more details on this during the interview process.
We are recruiting across the following of our European locations for this role (UK, Sweden, Switzerland, Finland, Spain, Germany, Netherlands) and can therefore only move forward with applications from those already based in these locations and with eligibility to work in the country you are based in.

THE HIRING PROCESS
You send us your CV in English
We invite you for an introductory video call with the Talent Acquisition team to get to know you better and share more about us
We invite you for a video interview with our head of IP and Licensing
We kindly ask that you complete a assignment at home to be presented and discussed during a final interview with the team

UTOPIANS

As we want to bring transparency, trust, and clarity to the music industry we serve, we know a change comes from within. Utopia is a transparent, trust-based organization striving to have clarity in thinking and doing what we set out to do.

We execute urgently and innovate to grow faster. We ship things that make a difference today, so we can make them better tomorrow. We embrace fairness and are all accountable.

Strictly diverse and inclusive. We are an equal opportunity employer.

We celebrate our diverse backgrounds and we welcome everyone who identifies with the above to apply. Welcome to Utopia - Where Music Lives!

We’re eager to meet You! :)

Utopia Music is a Swiss Music fintech company leveling up the Music Industry through clear, transparent, and reliable data-based solutions. We support the whole Industry to make more money, faster, with less costs, and less errors.

In Utopia, the Industry sees market opportunities live. Investors elevate Music catalogs into a real asset class. Collection societies track more and spend less. Labels, publishers, and distributors simplify and enhance their business. And everyone gets Fair Pay for Every Play.

Utopia is serving the music copyrights and the industry from creation to consumption, and will never compete against it. It means that we will never own copyrights. We will never be owned by the major stakeholders of the industry. We will never share or sell data of our customers to anyone else.

994 --> Studio Account Lead – Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group
Accenture
Albany, New York Metropolitan Area
Studio Account Lead–Lighthouse Clients - Metaverse Continuum Business Group (ML5)

Who We Are

As part of Accenture’s Metaverse Continuum Business Group, we're helping redefine what is possible for our clients, ourselves, and the world. Our vision is one that is built on human experience—and we see the Metaverse as a continuum, a spectrum of digitally enhanced worlds, realities, and business models. It's a new medium for commerce, experience and community and we’re looking for pioneers driven to help us bring our vision to life responsibly, generating sustainable and diverse value in the short and long term.

We're a passionate global group of business strategists, creatives, architects, engineers, innovators, and entrepreneurs—and we work with pioneering ecosystem partners, forward-thinking regulators and industry influencers who are collectively ushering in the next evolution of how we engage and interact with the world.

Learn more about the trends we see shaping businesses and industries in our Accenture Technology Vision 2022.

The work

The Studio Account Lead will be responsible for managing a team of creative, design, technical and strategy team members in defining strategy, establishing product/market fit, and test and learn product approaches for clients to discover and thrive in the metaverse. While there will never be a typical day in the Metaverse studio, we’ve highlighted a few of your exciting responsibilities.

Interfaces with clients, senior Accenture management, cross functional internal teams to ensure projects are on target with objectives, budget, and schedule. Intercedes between client and team for issues related to changes in project scope, budget, or strategic creative direction

Strategically align with client on studio discovery and work by managing - internal and external - stakeholders, assessing resources and approaches that and ensure strategic, creative, and technical represent the best fit the strategy of the client and Accenture

Leading a team on an approach to illicit the right approaches, people, and tactics to explore metaverse opportunities through workshops, brainstorming sessions, concept ideation, design thinking, and organization alignment.

Development, communicate and oversee test and learn plans for POCs, prototypes, and research.

Collaborates across Accenture Song and Accenture to generate value creation opportunities for our clients which utilize Accenture’s unique set of integrated capabilities

Consistent student of the metaverse, culture and consumer trends to identify opportunities and help keep clients and colleagues at the forefront of new developments

What’s in it for you?

By joining our team, you'll become part of a diverse, vibrant, and global Accenture community—one that is continually pushing boundaries in responsible and sustainable ways.

You'll work on meaningful and innovative projects that radically change the way our clients view what is possible, while engaging in transformational initiatives powered by the latest Metaverse technologies.

You'll have ongoing support in your learning and growth, with Accenture investing in opportunities for you to research, understand, and eventually help define the Metaverse as it continues to evolve and take shape.

You'll be joining our diverse team of metaverse-skilled professionals with market-leading capabilities dedicated to designing, executing, and accelerating our clients’ metaverse journeys.

The time is now to think big, start small and scale fast.

Here’s What You’ll Need

Minimum 10 years’ experience in account management, account planning, advertising, communications, or marketing

Minimum 10 years of experience design, product leadership, innovation or client-side experience managing complex relationships and delivering multi-channel experiences

Bachelor's degree or equivalent (minimum 12 years) work experience

Bonus points if you have

Product and experience innovation expertise that leads to the product going live in a massive way

Experience with development, communication and overseeing test and learn plans

Solid understanding of creative processes across virtual and physical channels

Strong ability to understand insights and turn them into strategic plans

Ability to inspire and lead teams by setting forth a vision for the account

Ability to mentor and develop talent

Travel

For now, all Accenture business travel, international and domestic, is currently restricted to client-essential sales/delivery activity only. Please note: The safety and well-being of our people continues to be the top priority, and our decisions around travel are informed by government COVID-19 response directives, recommendations from leading health authorities and guidance from a number of infectious disease experts.

As required by the Colorado Equal Pay Transparency Act, Accenture provides a reasonable range of compensation for roles that may be hired in Colorado. Actual compensation is influenced by a wide array of factors including but not limited to skill set, level of experience, and specific office location. For the state of Colorado only, the range of starting pay for this role is $110,376 - $235,200 and information on benefits offered.

COVID-19 update:

The safety and well-being of our candidates, our people and their families continues to be a top priority. Until travel restrictions change, interviews will continue to be conducted virtually.

Subject to applicable law, please be aware that Accenture requires all employees to be fully vaccinated as a condition of employment. Accenture will consider requests for accommodation to this vaccination requirement during the recruiting process.

What We Believe

We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.

Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here

Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. 996 --> Portfolio Manager Collaboration and Productivity Solutions
Lenovo
München, Bavaria, Germany
Description And Requirements

We are looking for a person who challenges the ordinary and seeks to innovate in learning, while also balancing execution. The Lenovo Services and Solutions Group is experiencing tremendous growth and is hiring for Worldwide Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity Portfolio Manager. You will be responsible for defining and delivering the full Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity Solutions & Managed Services portfolio required including short-term and long-term visions

You will work with strategy, product managers, sales, customers, analysts, hardware teams, delivery, and other stakeholders to understand the digital workplace productivity & collaboration market and will define the needed portfolio of Solutions & Managed Services required to succeed as best in class in the digital workplace solutions market.

You should have a strong background in Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity and prior portfolio and/or product management experience. You should also have a background in Solutions & Managed Services and a strong understanding of how to succeed in selling both direct and through the channel. Your success will require the ability to influence and maintain open communication with all areas of the company at multiple levels. You must be able to manage complexity, think creatively, deal with ambiguity, and thrive in a fast-paced environment

Your Key Responsibilities:

Utilize market intelligence, competitive analytics, sales feedback and customer feedback to formulate both a short-term and long-term Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity strategy that will drive Lenovo to be the industry leader in Digital Workplace Solutions & Managed Services
Assess future technology for usage in Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity Portfolio to differentiate Lenovo Digital Workplace Solutions & Managed Services and drive it to the forefront of the industry
Evolve the current Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity portfolio, identify gaps/overlaps and make recommendations on the future of all existing products
Prioritize offering development and create roadmaps for driving to a complete portfolio vision – may include bundling existing products into managed services as part of the portfolio
Create a clear portfolio vision that can be utilized by marketing to create sales and customer-facing documentation
Function as the input for strategic and offering ideas coming from the geography sales teams to drive a centralized offering development process with services offering development team.
Drive alignment with Segments, other Offer Towers and sales on Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity portfolio vision and strategy
Ensure Digital Workplace Collaboration & Productivity portfolio is cohesive with the corporate strategy and other offerings being created outside of the portfolio
Position Requirements:
We're looking to add talented individuals who are self-motivated and desire boundless opportunities, to join us. Come share in the discoveries that are forged from our shared achievements at Lenovo as we drive the next generation in technology.

Minimum Requirements:

7+ years of Managed Services product experience – sales/marketing and channel experience a plus
4+ years of portfolio management, product development, or similar experience
Strong knowledge of Managed Services business & market landscape
Strong executive presence & leadership skills
High level of communication & presentation skills
Strong business & financial acumen
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment
A collaborative approach to meeting business objectives and the ability to influence at all levels of matrixed organizations
Experience working with global teams and conducting business internationally

You will report to SSG (Solutions & Services Group) organization structure.

SSG has been focusing on the expanding IT service market, especially the digital workplace services opportunity, the growing demand for aaS (as-a-Service) model, and customers’ stronger preference for sustainability services. Meanwhile, SSG continued to invest in software tools, platforms, and repeatable vertical solutions with our own IP, and focus on vertical solutions in manufacturing, retail, healthcare, education, and Smart City. We are expanding TruScale as-a-Service to Digital Workplace solutions, developing our Hybrid Cloud solutions, and exploring Metaverse solutions.

What Lenovo can offer you:

Opportunities for career development & growth
Access to various training
Performance-based rewards
Flexible working environment (combination of working from home/office)
